Numbers 35:15 Waaye muy bànni Israyil, muy doxandéem, muy gan gu nekk ci seen biir, na juróom benni dëkk yooyu doon seen rawtu yeen ñépp, ba képp ku rey nit te du teyeefam, man faa raweji.
Numbers 35:16 ¶ «Su dee ag weñ la ko dóor, mu dee, moo ko rey, te dee rekk mooy àtteb ki rey.
Numbers 35:17 Su dee aw doj wu mana rey la jël, dóor ko ko, mu dee, moo ko rey, te dee rekk mooy àtteb ki rey.
Numbers 35:18 Su dee bant bu mana rey la jël, dóor ko ko, mu dee it, moo ko rey, te dee rekk mooy àtteb ki rey.
Numbers 35:19 Jotkat biy toppe bakkan ba nag, mooy rey ka rey; fu mu dajeek moom, moo koy rey.
Numbers 35:20 Su dee ci biir mbañeel la dale ci kawam, mbaa mu sànni ko aw saan wu mu ko waajal, ba mu dee,
Numbers 35:21 mbaa ci biir mbañeel la ko dóore loxoom ba mu dee, su boobaa dee rekk mooy àtteb ka dóore. Moo ko bóom. Jotkat bay toppe bakkan ba nag, bu dajeek ka rey, da koy rey.
Numbers 35:22 ¶ «Ndegam nag du caageenu mbañeel, xanaa mu jekki dal ci kawam, mbaa mu sànni ko këf ku mu mana doon, te du lu mu waajoon,
Numbers 35:23 mbaa muy doj wu mana rey wu mu waddal ci kaw nit ki, ba nit ki dee, te gisul woon nit ki, te nit ka du woon ab noonam, te fekkul itam muy sàkku loraangey nit ka,
Numbers 35:24 su boobaa la mbooloo may wéyal diggante ki rey, ak jotkat bay toppe, moo di àtte yii ci yoon tëral:
Numbers 35:25 Mbooloo mi day musal ki rey ci loxol jotkatu bakkanu ka dee, te mbooloo ma da koy delloo ca dëkkub rawtoom ba mu làquji woon. Fa lay toog, ba kera deewug sarxalkat bu mag ba ñu baaxoo fale diw gu sell.
Numbers 35:26 Ndegam nag ka rey moo génna génn, ba wees kemu dëkkub rawtoom ba mu làquji woon,
Numbers 35:27 ba jotkat bay toppe bakkan fekk ko fu wees kemu dëkkub rawtoom, su boobaa su ko jotkatu bakkan ba reyee, du tax mu gàddu bakkan.
Numbers 35:28 Ndax kat ci biir dëkkub rawtoom la wara toog, ba kera deewug sarxalkat bu mag bi. Gannaaw bu sarxalkat bu mag bi deeyee nag, ki rey sañ naa dellu fa mu bokk.
Numbers 35:29 ¶ «Loolu mooy dogalu yoon bi leen ñeel, yeen ak seen askan, ci seen mboolemi dëkkuwaay.
Numbers 35:30 ¶ «Képp ku faat bakkan nag, ci kaw kàddu gu tukkee ci ay seede doŋŋ lees ko saña reye, moom ma rey, waaye bennub seede du seedeel nit, ngir ñu teg ko àtteb dee.
Numbers 35:31 ¶ «Te it buleen jël benn xaalisu njotug bakkanu kenn ku rey nit ku yelloo dee. Kooku dee rekk mooy àtteem.
Numbers 35:32 Buleen jël it xaalisu njotug nit ku làquji ca dëkkub rawtoom, ngir may ko mu dellu fa mu dëkk, te sarxalkat bu mag bi deewul.
Numbers 35:33 Buleen tilimal réew mi ngeen nekk. Deret kat mooy tilimal réew mi, te réew mi deesu ko jote lenn, ci deret ju ñu tuur ci biiram, lu moy deretu ka tuur deret.
Numbers 35:34 Buleen sobeel réew mi ngeen dëkk, te man ma màkkaanoo ci biiram, ndax man Aji Sax ji maa màkkaanoo ci biir bànni Israyil.»
Numbers 36:1 ¶ Ba loolu wéyee kilifay njaboot yi askanoo ci Yuusufa, te bokk ci làngu Galàdd doomu Makir mi sëtoo ci Manase, ñoo dikk. Ñu wax fa kanam Musaa, ak kilifay njabooti bànni Israyil.
Numbers 36:2 Ñu ne: «Sang bi, xam nga Aji Sax ji moo digle woon ñu tegal bant bànni Israyil, séddale leen réew mi. Ci biir loolu, sang bi, ndigal ñeel la, tukkee ci Aji Sax ji, ngir nga jël sunu céru doomu baay Selofat, jox ko ay doomam yu jigéen.
Numbers 36:3 Waaye bu ñu séyee ci yeneen giiri bànni Israyil de, seen céru suuf mooy wàññikoo ci sunu céru maam, dolliku ca céru giir ga ñu séyi ca seen biir, te kon cér ba nu tegoo woon bant moo cay wàññikoo.
Numbers 36:4 Te it bu atum Yiwiku mu bànni Israyil agsee, seen cér day dolliku ca céru giir ga ñu séyi ca seen biir. Te kon it ci sunu céru giiru maam, la seen cér boobu di wàññikoo.»
Numbers 36:5 ¶ Ba loolu wéyee, Musaa jox bànni Israyil ndigal, ci ndigalal Aji Sax ji, ne: «Dëgg la giirug Yuusufeen ñi wax.
Numbers 36:6 Kàddu gii nag mooy li Aji Sax ji santaane ci doomi Selofat yu jigéen yooyu: Ku leen neex, nañu séy ak moom, na fekk rekk, ka ñuy séyal askanoo ci làng gu bokk ci seen giirug baay.
Numbers 36:7 Du benn céru suuf ci biir bànni Israyil, buy jóge ci genn giir, toxu ca geneen, waaye na ku nekk ci bànni Israyil yem kepp ca suufas giiram, ga mu donne cay maamam.
Numbers 36:8 Mboolem ku jigéen ku donn suuf ci giiri bànni Israyil, ci biir làng gu bokk ci giirug maamam rekk lay séy, ngir ku nekk ci bànni Israyil mana ñoŋal céru maamam.
Numbers 36:9 Su ko defee du benn céru suuf buy jóge ci genn giir, toxu ca geneen, waaye giirug bànni Israyil gu ci nekk day yem kepp ca céru suufam.»
Numbers 36:10 ¶ Na ko Aji Sax ji sante Musaa nag, na la ko doomi Selofat yu jigéen defe.
Numbers 36:11 Muy Maala, di Tirca, di Ogla, di Milka, di Nowa, doomi Selofat yooyu, ñoom ñépp seen bokki baay lañu séyal.
Numbers 36:12 Ca làngi askanu Manase doomu Yuusufa lañu séy, seen céru suuf daldi des ca giir ga seen làngu baay bokk.
Numbers 36:13 ¶ Loolu mooy santaane yeek àttey yoon yi Aji Sax ji dénkoon bànni Israyil, Musaa jottli leen ko ca joori Mowab, fa feggook dexu Yurdan, te janook Yeriko.
Deuteronomy 1:1 ¶ Lii mooy kàddu yi Musaa wax bànni Israyil gépp, ca wàllaa dexu Yurdan, ca màndiŋ ma, fa joor ga jàkkaarlook Suf, diggante Paran ak Tofel ak Laban ak Aserot ak Disayab.
Deuteronomy 1:2 Fukki fan ak benn mooy dox diggante tundu Oreb ba Kades Barneya, boo ko jaaree yoonu tundu Seyir.
Deuteronomy 1:3 ¶ Waaye ñeent fukkeelu atam, gannaaw ba bànni Israyil génnee Misra, keroog benn fan ca fukkeelu weer waak benn, ca la Musaa doora wax bànni Israyil mboolem lu ko Aji Sax ji santoon ca ñoom.
Deuteronomy 1:4 Fekk na Musaa duma Siwon, ma toogoon Esbon, di buurub Amoreen ña, duma it ca Eddrey, Og buuru Basan ba toogoon Astarot.
Deuteronomy 1:5 ¶ Ca wàllaa dexu Yurdan, ca réewum Mowab la Musaa tàmbalee leeral yoonu Yàlla wii. Mu ne:
Deuteronomy 1:6 ¶ Sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji da noo waxoon ca Oreb ne nu: «Seen toogaayub tund wii doy na.
Deuteronomy 1:7 Walbatikuleen dem, jàll-leen ca biir diiwaanu tundi Amoreen ña, ak mboolem réew ya mu feggool, ca joor ga, ak tund wa, ak suufu tund ya, ak Negew ca bëj-saalum, ba ca tefes ga, ca réewum Kanaaneen ña, ak Libaŋ, ba ca Efraat, dex gu mag ga.
Deuteronomy 1:8 Mu ngoog, maa leen jox réew moomu. Demleen nangu réew mi Aji Sax ji giñaloon seeni maam Ibraayma ak Isaaxa ak Yanqóoba, ñeel leen ñook seen askan wi leen di wuutu.»
Deuteronomy 1:9 ¶ Musaa teg ca ne leen: jant yooyu laa leen wax, ne leen: «Duma leen àttan yeen ñépp, man doŋŋ.
Deuteronomy 1:10 Seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moo leen ful, ba yeena ngii tey, bare ba tollu ni biddiiwi asamaan.
Deuteronomy 1:11 Yal na leen seen Yàllay maam Aji Sax ji yokkati junniy yoon, te barkeel leen ni mu leen ko waxe!
Deuteronomy 1:12 Waaye nu ma leen di àttane man doŋŋ, ak seen coono, ak seeni lëj-lëj, ak seeni jote?
Deuteronomy 1:13 Beral-leen seen bopp ay nit ñu rafet xel, am ug dégg, te di ñu ràññiku ci seeni giir. Su ko defee ma tabb leen, ñuy seeni njiit.»
Deuteronomy 1:14 Ba loolu amee ngeen wax ma ne ma: «Loolu nga wax de, xel la.»
Deuteronomy 1:15 Ci kaw loolu ma jël seen njiit yu rafet xel yu ràññiku, yi ngeen jukkee ci seeni giir, daldi leen def seeni njiit, ñii yilif junniy nit, ñii téeméer, ñii juróom fukk, ñii fukk, ñii diy jawriñ ci seeni giir.
Deuteronomy 1:16 Jant yooyu laa sant seeni àttekat ne leen: «Deeleen déglu seeni bokk tey àtte dëgg, diggante bànni Israyil ak mbokkam, akub doxandéem.
Deuteronomy 1:17 Buleen far-farloo cib àtte, dégluleen ku tuut, ni ngeen di dégloo ku mag, te buleen ragal kenn, ndax àtte bi Yàllaay boroom. Bu leen mbir mi ëppee loxo nag, ngeen indil ma ko, ma seet ko.»
Deuteronomy 1:18 Jant yooyu laa leen sant mboolem lu ngeen wara def.
Deuteronomy 1:19 ¶ Gannaaw gi nu bàyyikoo tundu Oreb, jaare mboolem màndiŋ mu yaa, mu raglu ma ngeen gis. Nu topp yoonu diiwaanu tundi Amoreen ñi, na nu ko sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji sante woon, ba àgg Kades Barneya.
Deuteronomy 1:20 Ci kaw loolu ma ne leen: «Agsi ngeen fii ci tundu Amoreen ñi nu sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji di jox.
Deuteronomy 1:21 Mu ngoog, seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moo teg réew mi fi seen kanam. Demleen nangu ko, ni leen ko seen Yàllay maam Aji Sax ji, waxe. Buleen ragal, buleen yoqi.»
Deuteronomy 1:22 ¶ Ci kaw loolu ngeen dikk yeen ñépp fi man, ne ma: «Nan yebal aw nit, ñu jiitu nu, yëral nu réew ma, te délsi wax nu yoon wu nuy jaare, ak dëkk yu mag ya nuy duggeji.»
Deuteronomy 1:23 Ma rafetlu xel ma, tànn ci yeen fukki góor ak ñaar, giir gu nekk, genn góor.
Deuteronomy 1:24 Ñu walbatiku jubal yoonu diiwaanu tund ya, ba àgg xuru Eskol, daldi seet foofa,
Deuteronomy 1:25 ba noppi sàkk ca meññeefum réew ma, indaaleel nu. Ñu wax nu nag ne nu: «Réew mu baax la nu sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji jox.»
Deuteronomy 1:26 Teewul bugguleen woona dem, xanaa di gàntal seen ndigalal Yàlla Aji Sax ji.
Deuteronomy 1:27 Ngeen di ñurumtoo seen biiri xayma, naan: «Bañ nu kay a tax Aji Sax ji jële nu réewum Misra, teg nu ci loxoy Amoreen ñi, ngir ñu faagaagal nu.
Deuteronomy 1:28 Ana fu nu jëm? Te sunu bokk ya demoon yoqiloo nu, ne nu waa réew maa nu ëpp, sut nu, dëkk ya réy te dàbblikoo ay tata yu àkki asamaan. Rax ci dolli, ay ponkal yu bokk ci askanu Anageen ñi lanu fa gis!»
Deuteronomy 1:29 ¶ Ma wax leen yeen ne leen: «Buleen yox-yoxi, buleen leen ragal.
Deuteronomy 1:30 Seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji leen jiitu, moom moo leen di xeexal, noonee mu defoon ak yeen ca Misra, ngeen gis,
Deuteronomy 1:31 ca màndiŋ ma it, gis ngeen na leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji fabe, ni baay di fabe doomam, ci yoon wi ngeen dox wépp, ba agsi bérab bii.»
Deuteronomy 1:32 Loolu lépp taxul ngeen am kóolute ci seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji,
Deuteronomy 1:33 ki leen daan jiitu ci yoon wi, ngir sàkkal leen fu ngeen di dale; guddi, mu nekk ci biir sawara, di leen niital yoon wu ngeen jaare; bëccëg, mu nekkal leen ci biir aw niir.
Deuteronomy 1:34 ¶ Ba Aji Sax ji déggee seeni kàddu, dafa mer ba giñ ne:
Deuteronomy 1:35 «Du kenn ci nit ñii, maas gu bon gii, kuy gis réew mu baax mi ma giñaloon seeni maam.
Deuteronomy 1:36 Xanaa Kaleb doomu Yefune moo koy gis, te réew ma mu teg tànkam, moom laa koy jox, mook askanam, ndax moo matal kóolute ci Aji Sax ji.»
Deuteronomy 1:37 Man itam Aji Sax ji mere na ma ci ndax yeen, ba ne ma: «Yaw itam doo ca dugg.
Deuteronomy 1:38 Yosuwe doomu Nuun mi ci sa kilifteef moo cay dugg. Nanga ko ñaax, ndax moom mooy jox Israyil réew ma.
Deuteronomy 1:39 Seen tuut-tànk yi ngeen noon dees na leen sëxëtoo, seen doom yii xamagul lu baax ak lu bon, ñooy duggi réew ma. Ñoom laa koy jox, te ñoo koy nangu.
Deuteronomy 1:40 Yeen nag walbatikuleen dellu màndiŋ ma, topp yoonu géeju Barax ya.»
Deuteronomy 1:41 ¶ Ci kaw loolu ngeen wax ma, ne ma: «Noo tooñ Aji Sax ji. Waaye dinanu dem xareji noonee nu ko sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji sante woon.» Ku nekk ci yeen daldi ràngoo ngànnaayam, ngeen defe ne yéegi diiwaanu tund wa dina leen yomb.
Deuteronomy 1:42 Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Wax leen ne leen buñu dem, buñu xeexi ndax man Aji Sax ji àndumaak ñoom. Lu ko moy dinañu daanu ci seen kanami noon.»
Deuteronomy 1:43 Ma wax leen ko, dégluwleen, xanaa gàntal ndigalal Aji Sax ji, fétteeral, ba yéegi diiwaanu tund wa.
Deuteronomy 1:44 Ba loolu amee Amoreen ña dëkke tund woowa dikk, dajeek yeen, ne leen dann niy yamb, yitte leen fa Seyir, ba Xorma.
Deuteronomy 1:45 Ngeen walbatiku, jooy ko Aji Sax ji, Aji Sax ji dégluwu leen, faalewu leen.
Deuteronomy 1:46 Gannaaw gi ngeen toog Kades, lu yàgg la ngeen fa toog lépp.
Deuteronomy 2:1 ¶ Ba loolu amee nu walbatiku, dellu màndiŋ ma, topp yoonu géeju Barax ya, na ma ko Aji Sax ji waxe woon. Wër nanu diiwaanu tundu Seyir ay fani fan.
Deuteronomy 2:2 ¶ Aji Sax ji wax ma, ne ma:
Deuteronomy 2:3 «Seen wërub tund wii doy na. Walbatikuleen, jublu bëj-gànnaar.
Deuteronomy 2:4 Mbooloo mi ngay sant ne leen: “Yeena ngi waaja jéggi seen kemu réewum bokki Esaween, ñi dëkke Seyir. Dinañu leen ragal, waaye nangeen moytu bu baax.
Deuteronomy 2:5 Buleen xeex ak ñoom, ndax duma leen jox ci seen suuf fu téstën sax tege, ngir Esaween ñi laa sédd diiwaanu tundu Seyir.
Deuteronomy 2:6 Aw ñam, weccikoo leen kook ñoom xaalis, door koo lekk; am ndox it, nangeen ko jëndeek ñoom, door koo naan.
Deuteronomy 2:7 Ndax yeen kat seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moo barkeel seen mboolemu ñaq te moo ràññee seen doxub màndiŋ mu yaa mii. Ñeent fukki at a ngii seen Yàlla Aji Sax jaa ngeek yeen, ñàkkuleen dara.”»
Deuteronomy 2:8 Ba mu ko defee nu romb sunu bokki Esaween ñi dëkke Seyir. Danoo wacc yoonu joor ga, ak Elat ak Esiyon Geber, daldi walbatiku jaareji màndiŋu Mowab.
Deuteronomy 2:9 ¶ Ba loolu amee Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Buleen dal ci kaw Mowabeen ñi, di leen song ub xare, ngir duma leen jox benn cér ci seenum réew, ndax askanu Lóot laa sédd réewum Ar.»
Deuteronomy 2:10 ¶ Emeen ñaa fa jëkkoona dëkk, askan wu am kàttan lañu woon, bare, yegg ca kaw ni Anageen ñi.
Deuteronomy 2:11 Ay Refayeen lañu jàppe woon Emeen ñooñu ak Anageen ñi, teewul Mowabeen ñi di leen wooye ay Emeen.
Deuteronomy 2:12 Seyir nag la Oreen ña jëkkoona dëkk, waaye Esaween ñaa leen fa dàqe, faagaagal leen, wuutu leen, noonu Israyil def rekk ak céru suufam bi leen Aji Sax ji jox.
Deuteronomy 2:13 ¶ Aji Sax ji neeti: «Jàll-leen walum Seredd.» Nu jàll walum Seredd.
Deuteronomy 2:14 Diggante ba nu bàyyikoo Kades Barneya, di dox, ba keroog bés ba nu jàllee walum Seredd, fanweeri at ak juróom ñett la. Fekk na mboolem maasu góor ña tollu woon ci xare, ca ndoortel yoon wa, ñoom ñépp a wuute dal ba, dee ba jeex, na leen ko Aji Sax ji giñale woon.
Deuteronomy 2:15 Aji Sax jee leen toppe diisaayu loxoom, wollee leen ci biir dal bi, ba ñu jeex tàkk.
Deuteronomy 2:16 ¶ Ba mboolem ña tollu woon ci xare deeyee ba jeex, ba ñoom ñépp wuute ca mbooloo ma,
Deuteronomy 2:17 Aji Sax ji wax ma, ne ma:
Deuteronomy 2:18 «Yaa ngi waaja jéggi kemu réewum Mowab, ca Ar.
Deuteronomy 2:19 Bu ngeen àggee ca Amoneen ña nag, buleen dal ci seen kaw, buleen xeex ak ñoom, ndax duma leen jox benn cér ci réewum Amoneen ñi, ngir askanu Lóot woowu laa ko sédd.»
Deuteronomy 2:20 Diiwaan boobu it réewum Refayeen lees ko jàppe woon, te Refayeen ñaa fa jëkkoona dëkk. Teewul Amoneen ñi di leen wooye ay Samsumeen,
Deuteronomy 2:21 askan wu am kàttan, bare, te yegg ca kaw ni Anageen ñi. Aji Sax jee leen fàkkasal Amoneen ñi, Amoneen ñi dàq leen, sanc, wuutu leen.
Deuteronomy 2:22 Mooy na mu defaloon Esaween ña dëkke Seyir rekk, ba mu leen fàkkasalee Oreen ña, Esaween ña dàq leen, sanc, wuutu leen, ba bésub tey jii.
Deuteronomy 2:23 Aween ña dëkke woon dëkk yu ndaw ya dem, ba àkki Gasa nag, Kaftoreen ña bàyyikoo Keret ñoo leen faagaagal, wuutu leen.
Deuteronomy 2:24 ¶ Aji Sax ji neeti: «Ayca, jàll-leen walum Arnon. Mu ngoog, maa teg ci seen loxo, Siwon Amoreen ba, buurub Esbon, mook réewam. Dal-leen di nangu réew mi, song ko xare.
Deuteronomy 2:25 Bés niki tey maa tàmbalee wàcce njàqareek tiitaange ci kaw mboolem askan yi asamaan tiim, ba bu ñu déggee seenum riir, dañuy jaaxle, di lox.»
Deuteronomy 2:26 ¶ Ci kaw loolu ma yebal ay ndaw yu bàyyikoo màndiŋu Kedemot, ba ca Siwon buurub Esbon. Ma yóbbante ko kàdduy jàmm, ne ko:
Deuteronomy 2:27 «May nu, nu jaare sam réew. Yoon wi rekk lanuy topp; dunu jàdd ndijoor, dunu jàdd càmmoñ.
Deuteronomy 2:28 Aw ñam, xaalis nga nu koy weccee, nu lekk; am ndox sax, xaalis nga nu koy joxe, nu naan. May nu rekk nu dox, ba jàll.
Deuteronomy 2:29 Noonu nu Esaween ña dëkke Seyir defaloon, ñook Mowabeen ña dëkke Ar rekk. Su ko defee nu mana jàll dexu Yurdan, ba àgg ca réew ma nu sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji jox.»
Deuteronomy 2:30 ¶ Siwon buurub Esbon nag nanguwu noo may nu jaare fa moom, ndax booba seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moo dëgëral boppam, wowal xolam, ngir teg ko ci seen loxo niki bésub tey jii.
Deuteronomy 2:31 Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Gis nga, maa ngi nii tàmbalee teg Siwon akum réewam ci seen loxo. Dal-leen di nangum réewam.»
Deuteronomy 2:32 Ba mu ko defee Siwon dikk dajeek nun, mook gàngooram gépp, ngir song nu xare ca Yaxacc.
Deuteronomy 2:33 Sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji daane ko fi sunu kanam, nu duma ko, mook ay doomam, ak gàngooram gépp.
Deuteronomy 2:34 Jant yooyu lanu nangu dëkkam yu mag yépp, faagaagal dëkk yu mag yépp: góor ak jigéen, ba ca tuut-tànk ya, bàyyiwunu kuy dund.
Deuteronomy 2:35 Xanaa jur ga lanu sëxëtoo, ak mboolem alali dëkk ya nu nangu.
Deuteronomy 2:36 La ko dale Arower ga tiim walum Arnon, boole ca dëkk ba ca xur wa, ba ca Galàdd, du benn dëkk bu nu të. Foofu fépp la sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji daane fi sunu kanam.
Deuteronomy 2:37 Réewum Amoneen ña doŋŋ ngeen jegewul; muy réew ma leru dexu Yabog, ak dëkki tund ya, mboolem daal, fu nu sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji aaye woon.
Deuteronomy 3:1 ¶ Ba loolu wéyee nu walbatiku, awe yoon wa yéeg jëm Basan. Og buuru Basan nag dikk dajeek nun, mook gàngooram gépp, ngir song nu xare ca Eddrey.
Deuteronomy 3:2 Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Bu ko ragal, ndax ci say loxo laa ko teg, mook gàngooram gépp, akum réewam. Nanga ko def na nga defoon Siwon buurub Amoreen ba woon ca Esbon.»
Deuteronomy 3:3 Noonu la sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji tege Og buuru Basan itam ci sunuy loxo, mook gàngooram gépp, nu duma leen ba desewul kuy dund.
Deuteronomy 3:4 Booba lanu nangu mboolemi dëkkam. Amul benn dëkk bu nu nanguwul ci ñoom: juróom benn fukki dëkk, mboolem diiwaanu Argob, ba bokk ca nguurug Og ca Basan.
Deuteronomy 3:5 Yooyu yépp di dëkk yu dàbblikoo tata yu kawe, ak bunt yu tëje ràpp, te limaaleesul dëkk-dëkkaan yu baree bare, yu dara wërul.
Deuteronomy 3:6 Nu faagaagal leen, na nu defoon ak Siwon buurub Esbon. Dëkk yépp lanu faagaagal: góor ak jigéen ba ca tuut-tànk ya.
Deuteronomy 3:7 Mboolem jur gaak alali dëkk ya nag, nu sëxëtoo.
Deuteronomy 3:8 ¶ Jant yooyu lanu nangoo ci loxol ñaari buuri Amoreen ñooña ca wàllaa dexu Yurdan, réew ma dale ca xuru Arnon, ba ca tundu Ermon.
Deuteronomy 3:9 Ermon googu la waa Sidon di wooye Siryoŋ, Amoreen ñi di ko wooye Senir.
Deuteronomy 3:10 Mboolem dëkki joor ga lanu nangu, ak mboolem diiwaanu Galàdd, ak mboolem Basan, ba ca Salka ak Eddrey, dëkki nguurug Og mu Basan.
Deuteronomy 3:11 Mennum Og buuru Basan doŋŋ moo muccoon ca ndesu Refayeen ñu ponkale ña. Lalam ba, lalu weñ gu ñuul la. Ma nga noonee ca Raba, dëkkub Amoneen ña. Guddaayu lal ba ci xasabu góor, juróom ñeenti xasab la, di ñeenti meetar ak genn-wàll, yaatuwaay ba, ñeenti xasab, di ñaari meetar.
Deuteronomy 3:12 ¶ Suuf soosu nu nangu ca jant yooya, te dale ca Arower ga ca xuru Arnon ca bëj-saalum, ak ca bëj-gànnaar, genn-wàllu diiwaanu tundi Galàdd, aki dëkkam, maa ko jox Rubeneen ñi, ak Gàddeen ñi.
Deuteronomy 3:13 Ndesu Galàdd ak mboolem Basan gu nguurug Og, ma jox ko genn-wàllu giirug Manase. Diiwaanu Argob gépp ak Basan googu gépp, lañu daan wooye réewum Refayeen ña.
Deuteronomy 3:14 Yayir mi askanoo ci Manase moo nangu mboolem diiwaanu Argob, ba ca kemu réewum Gesureen ña, ak Maakateen ña. Moo tudde boppam Basan googu, ba tax ñu di ko wooye Sanci Yayir ba tey jii.
Deuteronomy 3:15 Askanu Makir laa jox diiwaanu Galàdd.
Deuteronomy 3:16 Rubeneen ñeek Gàddeen ñi laa jox la dale diiwaanu Galàdd ba ca xuru Arnon, diggu xur wa di seen kemu suuf ci genn wet, dexu Yabog di seen kemu ñook Amoneen ña.
Deuteronomy 3:17 Fa joor ga feggook dexu Yurdan it di kemu, diggante dexu Kineret ca bëj-gànnaar, ak ca bëj-saalumu géeju Xorom ga, ba ba ngay àgg ca suufu tundu Pisga, ca penku.
Deuteronomy 3:18 ¶ Jant yooyu laa leen sant ne leen: «Seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moo leen jox réew mii, ngir ngeen nangu ko. Na xarekat yépp gànnaayu, jàll, jiitu seen bokki bànni Israyil.
Deuteronomy 3:19 Seeni jabar doŋŋ, ak seeni doom ak seenug jur, ndax xam naa ne jur gu takku ngeen am, ñooy des ci seen dëkk yi ma leen jox,
Deuteronomy 3:20 ba keroog Aji Sax ji noppalee seen bokki bànni Israyil ni yeen, fekk leen nangu, ñoom it, réew ma leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji jox, ca wàllaa dexu Yurdan. Su ko defee ku nekk ci yeen saña dellu ca céru suufam ba ma ko jox.»
Deuteronomy 3:21 ¶ Yosuwe itam, sant naa ko ci jant yooyu ne ko: «Sa bët moo la may mboolem ni seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji def ak ñaari buur yii. Noonu rekk la Aji Sax jiy def ak mboolem nguur ya nga jëm.
Deuteronomy 3:22 Buleen leen ragal, ndax seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moo leen di xeexal.»
Deuteronomy 3:23 ¶ Jant yooyu laa tinu Aji Sax ji, ne ko:
Deuteronomy 3:24 «Éy Boroom bi Aji Sax ji, yaa ma wonagum lenn ci sa màggaay ak sa doole, Sang bi. Ana yàlla ju nekk asamaan, mbaa ci kaw suuf ju mana roy say jëf ak say jaloore?
Deuteronomy 3:25 May ma rekk ma jàll, ba gis réew mu baax, ma ca wàllaa dexu Yurdan, tund wu rafet woowu ba ca Libaŋ!»
Deuteronomy 3:26 Waaye fekk na Aji Sax ji mere ma lool ndax yeen, ba faalewu ma. Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Na doy. Bu ma waxati lu jëm ci loolu.
Deuteronomy 3:27 Yéegal ba ca kaw tundu Pisga, nga dawal sa bët, te séenu réew ma wetu sowu, ba bëj-gànnaar, bëj-saalum, ba penku. Xoolal bu baax, nde doo jàll dexu Yurdan gii.
Deuteronomy 3:28 Waaye nanga yebal Yosuwe, ñaax ko, jàjj ko, ndax moom mooy jàll, jiite mbooloo mii, te moo leen di jox réew moomu ngay séen.»
Deuteronomy 3:29 Ba mu ko defee nu toog ca xur wa, janook Bet Pewor.
Deuteronomy 4:1 ¶ Léegi nag yeen waa Israyil, dégluleen dogali yoon yeek àttey yoon yii ma leen di xamal, ngir ngeen di ko jëfe, ndax ngeen dund ba dugg, nanguji réew ma leen Aji Sax ji seen Yàllay maam, di jox.
Deuteronomy 4:2 Buleen yokk dara ci kàddu gi ma leen di dénk, te buleen ci wàññi dara, ndax ngeen sàmm seen santaaney Yàlla Aji Sax, ji ma leen di dénk.
Deuteronomy 4:3 Seen bët moo leen may la Aji Sax ji def ca Baal Pewor. Mboolem ku toppoon tuur ma ñuy wax Baal ca Pewor, seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moo ko sànke ci seen biir.
Deuteronomy 4:4 Waaye yeen ñi ŋoyoon ci seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, yeen ñépp a ngi dund tey jii.
Deuteronomy 4:5 ¶ Mu ngoog, jàngal naa leen ay dogali yoon, aki àttey yoon, na ma ko sama Yàlla Aji Sax ji sante, ngir ngeen war koo jëfe ca biir réew ma ngeen di nanguji.
Deuteronomy 4:6 Sàmmooleen koo jëfe, ndax mooy doon seenug rafet xel, ak seenug ràññee fi kanam xeet yi, ba bu ñu déggee mboolem dogali yoon yii, dinañu ne: «Wii askan wu mag rekk a rafet um xel te ràññee!»
Deuteronomy 4:7 Ana wan xeet wu mag wu am yàlla ju leen jege ni nu sunu Yàlla Aji Sax jiy jegee saa yu nu ko wooyee wall?
Deuteronomy 4:8 Ana xeet wu ko màgge, ba am dogali yoon ak àttey yoon yu jekke ni yoon wii ma joxe fi seen kanam bésub tey?
Deuteronomy 4:9 ¶ Waaye wattuleen, wattuleen seen bopp bu baax, bala ngeena fàtte mbir yi ngeen teg seen bët, ba du génn seenum xel seen giiru dund gépp. Te nangeen ko xamal seeni doom ak seeni sët.
Deuteronomy 4:10 Bés ba ngeen taxawee fa seen kanam Yàlla Aji Sax ji, fa tundu Oreb, Aji Sax jee ma ne: «Dajaleel ma mbooloo mi, ma dégtal leen samay kàddu, ngir ñu tàggatu ci ragal ma li feek ñuy dund ci kaw suuf, te seeni doom it, ñu tàggat leen ci.»
Deuteronomy 4:11 Yeena dikk taxaw ca suufu tund wa, tund wa ne jippét, sawara wa jolli ba ca xolu asamaan, ci biir xàmbaari guddi gu ne këruus.
Deuteronomy 4:12 Aji Sax ji àddoo ca digg sawara wa, wax ak yeen, ngeen di dégg baat, te jëmm, gisuleen ko, xanaa baat doŋŋ.
Deuteronomy 4:13 Ci kaw loolu mu biralal leen kóllëreem gi mu leen sant ngeen sàmm ko, muy fukki santaane yi. Mu daldi leen bindal santaane yi ci ñaari àlluway doj.
Deuteronomy 4:14 Man nag la Aji Sax ji sant ca yooya jant, ne ma xamal leen dogali yoon yeek àttey yoon, yi ngeen wara jëfe ca réew ma ngeen jëm, ngir nanguji ko.
Deuteronomy 4:15 ¶ Nangeen wattu seen bopp bu baax nag ndax keroog ba Aji Sax jiy àddoo ca digg sawara wa, wax ak yeen ca tundu Oreb, gisuleen jenn jëmm.
Deuteronomy 4:16 Kon buleen def ug yàqute, di sàkkal seen bopp menn tuur muy jëmmal lenn lu mel ni góor mbaa jigéen,
Deuteronomy 4:17 mbaa lu mel ni menn malam suuf, mbaa malam kaw mu mel ni njanaaw,
Deuteronomy 4:18 mbaa lu mel ni ndëgmeent, di raam, mbaa lu mel niw jën, nekk ci ndox mu suuf tiim.
Deuteronomy 4:19 Buleen séentu asamaan, gis jant bi, mbaa weer wi, mbaa biddiiw yi, ak mboolem leeri asamaan, ba mu xiirtal leen ci di leen sujjóotal ak a jaamu, te seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji féetale yooyii, mboolem xeet yi asamaan tiim.
Deuteronomy 4:20 Yeen nag Aji Sax jee leen jël, bellee leen ca Misra, taalu xellikaayu weñ gu ñuul ba, ngir ngeen doon ñoñam ñi mu séddoo niki bésub tey.
Deuteronomy 4:21 ¶ Waaye yeena tax Aji Sax ji mere ma ba giñ ne duma jàll dexu Yurdan, te duma dugg ca réew mu baax, ma leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moomale.
Deuteronomy 4:22 Man nag ci réew mii laay dee. Du maay jàll dexu Yurdan. Waaye yeen yeenay jàll, ba nanguji réew mu baax moomu.
Deuteronomy 4:23 Wattuleen seen bopp ba baña fàtte kóllëre gi seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji fas ak yeen, di sàkkal seen bopp tuur muy jëmmal lenn, te seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji aaye leen ko.
Deuteronomy 4:24 Seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji kat, mooy sawara wuy xoyome, Yàlla ju fiir la.
Deuteronomy 4:25 ¶ Bu ngeen demee ba am ay doom aki sët, fekk leen yàgg ca réew ma, su boobaa su ngeen defee ag yàqute, di sàkk am tuur, ak jëmmu lu mu mana doon, mbaa ngeen def lenn lu seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji ñaawlu, lu koy merloo,
Deuteronomy 4:26 maa ngi sàkku asamaan ak suuf seedeel maak yeen bésub tey jii, ne su boobaa yeenay sànkoo sànku ci lu gaaw, ba wuute ca réew, ma ngeen jàll dexu Yurdan, jëm fa, ngir nanguji ko. Su boobaa dungeen fa yàgge, ndax dees leen di raafal, ba ngeen jeex tàkk.
Deuteronomy 4:27 Aji Sax ji moo leen di tasaare ci biir xeet yi, te lu néew la seenu ndes di doon ci biir xeeti jaambur yi leen Aji Sax jiy dàq jëme.
Deuteronomy 4:28 Foofa ngeen di jaamoo ay yàlla yu loxoy nit sàkke bant, mbaa doj, yàlla yu dul gis, du dégg, du lekk, du xeeñtu.
Deuteronomy 4:29 Waaye su ngeen fa sàkkoo seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, dingeen ko daj, ndegam seen léppi xol, ak seen léppi bakkan ngeen ko sàkkoo.
Deuteronomy 4:30 Bu leen njàqare dikkalee, fekk mboolem mbir yooyu dab leen, su boobaa dingeen mujj délsi ci seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji te dingeen ko déggal.
Deuteronomy 4:31 Ndax seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji Yàllay yërmande la. Du leen wacc, du leen yàqte te du fàtte kóllëre, ga mu fasoon ak seeni maam ci kaw ngiñ.
Deuteronomy 4:32 ¶ Seetleen rekk ci janti démb yi leen jiitu, la dale bés ba Yàlla sàkke nit fi kaw suuf, mbaa ngeen seet asamaan, cat ba cat. Ndax lu màgge nii mas naa am? Am masees naa dégg lu ni mel?
Deuteronomy 4:33 Ana askan wu masa dégg baatu Yàlla bu jibe ci sawara, ni ngeen ko dégge te dese bakkan?
Deuteronomy 4:34 Jan yàlla moo masa fexee dikk foqatil boppam aw xeet, bellee leen ci weneen xeet, ci biiri nattu, aki firnde aki kéemaan ak xare yu mu sottale dooley loxoom, ak kàttanu përëgam, ak jëf ju raglu, noonee leen ko seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji defale ca Misra, ngeen teg ci bët?
Deuteronomy 4:35 Yeen déy lañu won loolu lépp ngir ngeen xam ne Aji Sax ji doŋŋ mooy Yàlla, te jeneen yàlla amul, ju dul moom.
Deuteronomy 4:36 Fa asamaan la àddoo, dégtal leen baatam, ngir yar leen, ci kaw suuf it la leen wone sawaraam su mag sa, te ay kàddoom ngeen dégg, mu jibe ca digg sawara sa.
Deuteronomy 4:37 Sopp seeni maam nag moo tax mu taamu leen, yeen askan wi leen wuutu, génneel leen boppam Misra, ci dooleem ju bare,
Deuteronomy 4:38 ngir dàqal leen xeet yu leen sut, ëpp leen doole, ba dugal leen seenum réew, sédd leen ko bés niki tey.
Deuteronomy 4:39 ¶ Kon xamleen tey te délloosi ci seen xel, ne Aji Sax ji mooy Yàlla fa kaw asamaan ak fi kaw suuf. Du keneen.
Deuteronomy 4:40 Sàmmleen dogali yoonam, ak santaaneem yi ma leen dénk bés niki tey, ndax ngeen baaxle yeen ak seen doom yi leen di wuutu, te ngeen yàgg ca réew ma leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji jox ba fàww.
Deuteronomy 4:41 ¶ Ba loolu wéyee Musaa ber na ñetti dëkk ca penkub dexu Yurdan,
Deuteronomy 4:42 mu diy rawtu ci ku rey moroomu nitam, te reyu ko cig teyeef, wonu ko woon it mbañeel, lu jiitu loola. Kooku sañ naa làquji ci dëkk yooyu benn, ngir rawale bakkanam.
Deuteronomy 4:43 Dëkk yooyu ñoo doon Beccer, ga ca màndiŋ ma, ca kaw dénd wu tell wa ca kaw tund wa, su dee ab Rubeneen; ak Ramot ga ca Galàdd, su dee ab Gàddeen; ak Golan ga ca diiwaanu Basan, su dee ab Manaseen.
Deuteronomy 4:44 ¶ Lii moo di ndigalu yoon wi Musaa biraloon fi kanam bànni Israyil.
Deuteronomy 4:45 Lii moo di seedey yoon yi, ak dogali yoon yi, ak àttey yoon yi Musaa dénkoon bànni Israyil, gannaaw ba ñu bàyyikoo Misra,
Deuteronomy 4:46 ca wàllaa dexu Yurdan, ca xur wa janook Bet Pewor, ca réewum Siwon buurub Amoreen ba toogoon Esbon, te Musaa ak bànni Israyil duma woon ko, ba ñu génnee Misra.
Deuteronomy 4:47 Ñoo nangu am réewam, ak réewum Og buuru Basan, ñaari buuri Amoreen ña moomoon wàllaa dexu Yurdan, ca penku,
Deuteronomy 4:48 fa dale ca Arower, ga ca catal walum Arnon, ba ca tundu Siyoŋ, ga ñuy wax itam Ermon,
Deuteronomy 4:49 boole ca mboolem joorug wàllaa dexu Yurdan, ca penku, ba àgg ca géeju Xorom ga, ca suufu tundu Pisga.
Deuteronomy 5:1 ¶ Musaa moo woo bànni Israyil gépp, wax leen ne leen: Yeen, bànni Israyil, dégluleen dogali yoon yi, ak àttey yoon yi may wax, ngeen dégg, tey. Jàngleen ko te farlu koo jëfe.
Deuteronomy 5:2 Sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji moo fasoon kóllëre ak nun ca tundu Oreb.
Deuteronomy 5:3 Du sunuy maam rekk la Aji Sax ji fasoon kóllëre gii ak ñoom; waaye ñook nun ñi fii tey, mboolem nun ñiy dund, ci lanu.
Deuteronomy 5:4 Ci biir jàkkaarloo la Aji Sax ji waxe woon ak yeen ca kaw tund wa, àddoo ca digg sawara wa.
Deuteronomy 5:5 Maa taxaw diggante Aji Sax jeek yeen, jant yooyu, di leen jottli kàddug Aji Sax ji, ndax yeena ragaloon sawara wa, ba yéeguleen ca kaw tund wa. Mu ne:
Deuteronomy 5:6 ¶ «Man Aji Sax ji maay seen Yàlla, ji leen génne réewum Misra, kërug njaam ga.
Deuteronomy 5:7 ¶ «Buleen am yeneen yàlla ci sama kanam.
Deuteronomy 5:8 ¶ «Buleen sàkkal seen bopp tuur muy jëmmal lenn lu nekk ci kaw asamaan, mbaa ci kaw suuf, mbaa lu nekk ci ndox mu suuf tiim.
Deuteronomy 5:9 Buleen ci sujjóotal lenn, buleen ci jaamu lenn, ndax man seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, Yàlla ju fiir laa. Maay topp doom tooñu waajur, ba ca seen maasi sët, ba ca maasug sëtaati nit ñi ma bañ.
Deuteronomy 5:10 Waaye maay baaxe ñi ma sopp, di sàmm samay santaane, ba ci junniy maas ya leen di wuutuji.
Deuteronomy 5:11 ¶ «Buleen tudd seen turu Yàlla Aji Sax ji ci neen, ndax Aji Sax ji du ñàkka topp kuy tudd aw turam ci neen.
Deuteronomy 5:12 ¶ «Sàmmleen bésub Noflaay, ngir sellal ko, ni leen ko seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji sante.
Deuteronomy 5:13 Juróom benni fan ngeen wara liggéey, def ci seen soxla yépp.
Deuteronomy 5:14 Waaye bésub juróom ñaareel ba, Noflaay lay doon, ñeel seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji. Buleen ci liggéey lenn; du yeen, du seen doom ju góor, ak ju jigéen, du seen jaam bu góor, ak bu jigéen, du seen nag, du seen mbaam, du mboolem seenug jur, du seen gan gu nekk ci seen biir dëkk. Su ko defee seen jaam bu góor, ak seen jaam bu jigéen mana dal-lu ni yeen.
Deuteronomy 5:15 Fàttlikuleen ne ay jaam ngeen woon ca réewum Misra. Seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moo leen fa génnee dooley loxoom, ak kàttanu përëgam. Moo tax seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji sant leen ngeen wàccoo ak bésub Noflaay.
Deuteronomy 5:16 ¶ «Teral-leen seen baay, ak seen ndey, ni leen ko seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji sante, ndax ngeen gudd fan, ndax it ngeen baaxle ca réew ma leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji jox.
Deuteronomy 5:17 ¶ «Buleen bóom.
Deuteronomy 5:18 ¶ «Buleen jaaloo.
Deuteronomy 5:19 ¶ «Buleen sàcc.
Deuteronomy 5:20 ¶ «Buleen seedeel seen moroom lu dul dëgg.
Deuteronomy 5:21 ¶ «Buleen xédd seen jabaru dëkkandoo, buleen xemmem këram, mbaa toolam, mbaa jaamam bu góor, mbaa jaamam bu jigéen, mbaa aw nagam, mbaa mbaamam, mbaa mboolem seen alalu dëkkandoo.»
Deuteronomy 5:22 ¶ Kàddu yii la Aji Sax ji wax seen ndaje ma mépp, ca tund wa, ba mu àddoo ca digg sawara wa, kàddu gu xumb, ci biir xàmbaar gu lëndëm këruus. Tegaatu ca dara. Mu daldi bind kàddu yi ci ñaari àlluway doj, jox ma.
Deuteronomy 5:23 Ba ngeen déggee kàddu gay jibe ca lëndëm ga, tund wa jàpp, di tàkk, yeena dikk, seen mboolem kilifay giir ak seeni mag, ba ci man.
Deuteronomy 5:24 Ngeen ne ma: «Sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji kat, moo nu won darajaam ak màggaayam. Kàddoom lanu dégg, mu jibe ca digg sawara wa. Bésub tey noo gis Yàlla wax ak doom aadama, ba noppi, muy wéye bakkanam!
Deuteronomy 5:25 Waaye lu nuy jaayati nag sunu bakkan, doye? Ndax kat, sawara wu réy wii, su nu déggatee sunu kàddug Yàlla Aji Sax ji, da nuy xoyom.
Deuteronomy 5:26 Ana ci mboolem boroomu suux, ku ci masa dégg kàddug Yàlla jiy dund, mu jibe ci sawara, nii nu ko dégge, ba noppi di dund?
Deuteronomy 5:27 Jegejil yaw te déglu mboolem li sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji wax. Yaw yaa nuy àgge mboolem li la sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji wax, nu dégg, jëfe.»
Deuteronomy 5:28 ¶ Ci biir loolu Aji Sax ji dégg la ngeen ma wax. Mu ne ma: «Dégg naa li la mbooloo mii wax. Ñoo yey wax yooyu kàddu yépp.
Deuteronomy 5:29 Waaye céy bu ñu amoon boobu xol ngir ragal ma, di sàmm sama santaane yépp bés bu nekk, ba tax ñu baaxle, ñoom ak seen askan, ba fàww!
Deuteronomy 5:30 Demal, nga ne leen ñu dellu ca seeni xayma.
Deuteronomy 5:31 Yaw nag, taxawal fi man, ba ma jox la mboolem santaane bi, dogali yoon yi, ak àttey yoon yi nga leen di jàngal, te ñu war koo jëfe ca réew ma ma leen jox, ngir ñu nangu ko.»
Deuteronomy 5:32 ¶ Kon nag sàmmooleen koo jëfe ni leen ko seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji sante. Buleen lajjee ndijoor mbaa càmmoñ.
Deuteronomy 5:33 Mboolem yoon wi leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji teg, toppleen ko, ndax ngeen dund, baaxle te gudd fan ca réew ma ngeen di moom.
Deuteronomy 6:1 ¶ Lii mooy santaane bi, ak dogali yoon yeek àttey yoon yi seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji santaane ma jàngal leen ko, ngir ngeen di ko jëfe ca réew ma ngeen jàll jëm, ngir nanguji ko,
Deuteronomy 6:2 ndax ngeen ragal seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, di sàmm mboolem dogali yoonam, ak santaaneem, yi ma leen di dénk, yeen ak seeni doom, ak seeni sët, seen giiru dund, su ko defee ngeen gudd fan.
Deuteronomy 6:3 Kon yeen Israyil, dégluleen te sàmmoo jëfe, ndax ngeen baaxle te yokku bu baax, ni leen ko Aji Sax ji seen Yàllay maam waxe, ca réew ma meew maak lem ja tuuroo.
Deuteronomy 6:4 ¶ Dégluleen, bànni Israyil, Aji Sax ji sunu Yàlla, Aji Sax ji kenn la.
Deuteronomy 6:5 Seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, soppeleen ko seen léppi xol, ak seen léppi bakkan, ak seen léppi doole.
Deuteronomy 6:6 Kàddu yii ma leen di dénk bésub tey, na dëkk ci seen xol.
Deuteronomy 6:7 Nangeen ko xamal seeni doom, di ko waxe bu ngeen toogee seen biir néeg, ak bu ngeen di dox ciw yoon, ak bu ngeen tëddee, ak bu ngeen jógee.
Deuteronomy 6:8 Takkleen ko, muy firnde ci seen loxo, te na doon am mbandal ci seen diggantey gët.
Deuteronomy 6:9 Te itam bindleen ko ci seen kaw jëni buntu néeg, ak ci seen bunti dëkk.
Deuteronomy 6:10 ¶ Bu ngeen demee ba seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji yóbbu leen ca réew ma mu giñaloon seeni maam Ibraayma ak Isaaxa ak Yanqóoba, ne yeen la koy jox, muy dëkk yu mag yu baax yu ngeen tabaxul,
Deuteronomy 6:11 kër ya feese mboolem lu baax lu ngeen ko feesaluloon, ak teen yu ngeen gasul, ak garabi reseñ ak oliw yu ngeen jëmbatul; bu ngeen ca lekkee ba regg,
Deuteronomy 6:12 wattuleen seen bopp bala ngeena fàtte Aji Sax ji leen génnee réewum Misra, kërug njaam ga.
Deuteronomy 6:13 Seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, ragal-leen ko. Moom ngeen di jaamu, te aw turam ngeen di giñe.
Deuteronomy 6:14 Buleen topp yeneen yàlla, ci yàllay xeet yi leen séq.
Deuteronomy 6:15 Ndax kat seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji ci seen biir, ku fiir la. Lu ko moy sànjum Aji Sax ji dina tàkk ci seen kaw, te dina leen sànk, ba raafal leen ci kaw suuf.
Deuteronomy 6:16 Buleen seetlu seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, na ngeen ko seetloo woon ca Maasa.
Deuteronomy 6:17 Sàmmleena sàmm seen santaaney Yàlla Aji Sax ji, ak seedey yoonam, ak dogali yoonam, yi mu leen dénk.
Deuteronomy 6:18 Jëfeleen njub, ak mbaax gi Aji Sax ji rafetlu. Su ko defee dingeen baaxle, ba dem, nanguji réew mu baax mi Aji Sax ji giñaloon seeni maam,
Deuteronomy 6:19 te dingeen fa dàqe seen noon yépp, na ko Aji Sax ji waxe woon.
Deuteronomy 6:20 ¶ Bu leen seen doom laajee ëllëg, ne leen: «Ana lu waral seedey yoon yi, ak dogali yoon yeek àttey yoon yi leen sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji dénk?»
Deuteronomy 6:21 Su boobaa waxleen seen doom, ne ko: «Ay jaami Firawna lanu woon ca Misra, waaye Aji Sax jee nu génnee Misra ci dooley loxoom.
Deuteronomy 6:22 Aji Sax jee nu defal ay firnde, ak kéemaan yu mag te metti ci kaw Misra ak ci kaw Firawna ak ci kaw waa këram gépp, nu teg ci sunuy gët.
Deuteronomy 6:23 Nun nag, moo nu fa jële, ngir indi nu ci réew mi mu giñaloon sunuy maam, ne nun la koy jox.
Deuteronomy 6:24 Aji Sax jee nu sant nuy jëfe mboolem dogali yoon yii, te ragal sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji, ngir nu baaxle bés bu nekk, ngir itam mu sàmm sunu bakkan ni bésub tey jii.
Deuteronomy 6:25 Sunu njekk lay doon nag, ndegam sàmmoo nanoo jëfe mboolem santaane bii, fi sunu kanam Yàlla Aji Sax ji, ni mu ko santaanee.»
Deuteronomy 7:1 ¶ Bu leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji yóbboo réew ma ngeen jëm, ngir nanguji ko, moo fay dàqe xeet yu bare fi seen kanam: Etteen ñi ak Girgaseen ñi ak Amoreen ñi ak Kanaaneen ñi ak Periseen ñi ak Eween ñeek Yebuseen ñi; juróom ñaari xeet yu leen ëpp, ëpp leen doole.
Deuteronomy 7:2 Bu leen leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji jébbalee, ba ngeen duma leen, nangeen leen faagaagal ba ñu jeex tàkk. Buleen fasook ñoom kóllëre, te buleen leen yërëm.
Deuteronomy 7:3 Buleen séyanteek ñoom: seen doom ju jigéen, buleen ko may doomu xeet yooyu, jigéenu xeet yooyu it, buleen ko jëlal seen doom ju góor.
Deuteronomy 7:4 Ndax dañu may dëddale ak seen doom yu góor, ñu mujj di jaamu yeneen yàlla, ba sànjum Aji Sax ji tàkk ci seen kaw yeen, fàkkas leen ci lu gaaw.
Deuteronomy 7:5 Ni ngeen di def ak ñoom kay mooy nii: seeni sarxalukaay, ngeen màbb; seen tuuri doj, ngeen rajaxe; seen xer yi ñuy jaamoo Asera tuur mi, ngeen gor; seen jëmmi tuur, ngeen lakk.
Deuteronomy 7:6 Ndax kat askan wu sell ngeen, ñeel seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji. Yeen la seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji taamu, ngir ngeen doon askan wi mu séddool boppam, ci mboolem askani kaw suuf.
Deuteronomy 7:7 ¶ Du seen barewaay bu ngeen ëpplee xeet yépp moo tax Aji Sax ji naw leen, ba taamu leen, nde yeena gëna néew ci xeet yépp.
Deuteronomy 7:8 Waaye cofeel gu leen Aji Sax ji sopp, ak sàmm gu mu sàmm ngiñam la mu giñaloon seeni maam, moo tax mu génnee leen dooley loxoom, jote leen ca kërug njaam ga, ak ca loxol Firawna buuru Misra.
Deuteronomy 7:9 Xamleen boog ne seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moom mooy Yàlla; mooy Yàlla ju dëggu jiy sàmm kóllëre ak ngor ñeel soppeem ñiy sàmm ay santaaneem, sët ba sëtaat, ba ci junniy maas.
Deuteronomy 7:10 Waaye mooy fey ci saa si ay bañam, ngir sànk leen. Du yeexe bañam, ci saa si la koy fey.
Deuteronomy 7:11 ¶ Kon nag sàmmleen santaane bi, muy dogali yoon yi, ak àttey yoon yi ma leen dénk tey, ngir di ko jëfe.
Deuteronomy 7:12 Bu ngeen déggalee àttey yoon yii, te sàmmoo koo jëfe, su boobaa seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji dina sàmm diggam ak yeen, kóllëre ak ngor, ga mu giñaloon seeni maam.
Deuteronomy 7:13 Moo leen di sopp, barkeel leen, yokk leen, barkeel seen meññeefum njurukaay, ak seen meññeefum suuf; seen pepp ak seen biiñ, ak seenug diw, ak seen doomi jur gu gudd, ak gu gàtt, ca réew ma mu giñaloon seeni maam, ne yeen la koy jox.
Deuteronomy 7:14 Su boobaa yeenay gëna barkeel mboolem xeet yi, te du lenn, góor ak jigéen, luy jaasir ci seen biir, ak seen biirug jur.
Deuteronomy 7:15 Su boobaa Aji Sax jee leen di xàjjil mboolem wéradi. Mboolem jàngoroy Misra yu bon yu ngeen xamoon, du leen ci teg lenn, te mboolem seeni bañ la koy teg.
Deuteronomy 7:16 Fàkkasleen mboolem xeet yi leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji jébbal nag. Buleen leen xool bëtu yërmande, buleen jaamu seeni tuur: Lu ko moy muy seenug fiir.
Deuteronomy 7:17 ¶ Jombul ngeen di wax ci seen xel naan: «Xeet yii gën noo bare, ana nu nu leen mana dàqe?»
Deuteronomy 7:18 Buleen leen ragal. Fàttlikuleen bu baax ni seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji def Firawna ak Misra gépp,
Deuteronomy 7:19 ak mitit yu réy ya ngeen gisal seen bopp, ak firnde yaak kéemaan ya, ak seen dooley loxol Yàlla Aji Sax jeek kàttanam gu réy, ga mu leen génnee. Noonu la seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji di def mboolem xeet yi ngeen ragal.
Deuteronomy 7:20 Te itam seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, am mbas lay yebal ci seen kaw, ba seenu ndes wu leen làqu woon sànku.
Deuteronomy 7:21 Buleen am tiitaange ci ñoom, ndax seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji ci seen biir, Yàlla ju màgg la te raglu.
Deuteronomy 7:22 Seen Yàlla Aji Sax jee leen di dàqe fi seen kanam, ndànk-ndànk; dungeen leen mana gaawa jeexal, lu ko moy rabi àll yi mujj ne gàññ ci seen kaw.
Deuteronomy 7:23 Seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moo leen di jébbal xeet yooyu, moo leen di salfaañe salfaañoo gu réy, ba ñu sànku.
Deuteronomy 7:24 Mooy teg seeni buur ci seeni loxo, ngeen far seenu tur fi asamaan tiim. Kenn ci ñoom du leen të, ba kera ngeen leen sànkee.
Deuteronomy 7:25 Seen jëmmi tuur yooyu nag, lakkleen leen. Buleen xemmem lenn luy xaalis mbaa wurus ci kaw tuur yi. Buleen ko aakimoo, lu ko moy muy seenug fiir, ndax lu seexluwoo ngoogu ci seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji.
Deuteronomy 7:26 Buleen dugal yëf yu seexluwu seen biir néeg, lu ko moy àtteb faagaagal bi war ci yëf yooyu, moo leen di dab, yeen itam. Xofleen koo xof, seexlu koo seexlu, ndax yëf yooyu, faagaagal moo ci war.
Deuteronomy 8:1 ¶ Mboolem santaane bi ma leen dénk bésub tey nag, sàmmooleen koo jëfe, ndax ngeen dund, yokku, ba dugg nanguji réew ma Aji Sax ji giñaloon seeni maam.
Deuteronomy 8:2 Fàttlikuleen mboolem yoon wi leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji awale diiru ñeent fukki at yii ci màndiŋ mi, teg leen coono, nattu leen ngir xam li ci seen biir xol, xam ndax dingeen wormaal ay santaaneem, am déet.
Deuteronomy 8:3 Moo leen teg coono, xiifal leen, leel leen mànn mu ngeen xamul, te seeni maam xamuñu ko woon, ngir xamal leen ne du aw ñam doŋŋ la doom aadama di dunde, waaye gépp kàddu gu tukkee ci gémmiñu Aji Sax ji, dees na ko dunde.
Deuteronomy 8:4 Seeni yére ràppul, seeni tànk newiwul diiru ñeent fukki at yii.
Deuteronomy 8:5 Xamleen xéll ne ni baay di yare doomam, ni la leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji yare.
Deuteronomy 8:6 Kon sàmmleen seen santaaney Yàlla Aji Sax ji, di topp ay yoonam te ragal ko.
Deuteronomy 8:7 Ndax seen Yàlla Aji Sax jaa ngi leen di yóbbu réew mu baax; réew mu ami wal, ak bëti ndox, ak ndoxi xóote yu waley xur aki tund,
Deuteronomy 8:8 réewum bele ak lors ak reseñ ak figg ak gërënaat, ak diwu oliw, ak lem.
Deuteronomy 8:9 Réew ma dungeen fa néewe njël, te dungeen fa ñàkke dara. Réew ma, ay dojam, weñ gu ñuul la, ay tundam, xànjar ngeen cay gase.
Deuteronomy 8:10 Dingeen lekk ba regg, di sante seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, réew mu baax ma mu leen jox.
Deuteronomy 8:11 ¶ Wattuleen seen bopp nag, bala ngeena fàtte seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, baña sàmm ay santaaneem, ak àttey yoonam, ak dogali yoonam yi ma leen di dénk tey.
Deuteronomy 8:12 Su ngeen lekkee ba regg, am kër yu baax yu ngeen tabax dëkke,
Deuteronomy 8:13 seen jur gu gudd ak gu gàtt yokku, xaalis ak wurus yokkul leen, seen jépp alal yokku,
Deuteronomy 8:14 su boobaa moytuleen daldi xoggliku, fàtte seen Yàlla Aji Sax, ji leen génnee réewum Misra, kërug njaam ga,
Deuteronomy 8:15 ki leen wommate biir màndiŋ mu yaa mu raglu ma, ak jaani daŋar yaaki jiitam, ci biir maral ak ñàkk um ndox. Moo leen xellil ndox mu balle doj wu ne sereŋ.
Deuteronomy 8:16 Moo leen leele mànnu màndiŋ, ma seeni maam xamuloon, ngir teg leen coono, nattu leen, te mujje baaxe leen.
Deuteronomy 8:17 Dingeen wax ci seen xel ne: «Sunu doole ak sunu njàmbaaru bopp moo nu may jii alal.»
Deuteronomy 8:18 Waaye fàttlikuleen ne seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji mooy ki leen may dooley liggéey alal ji, ngir feddli ni mu ko defe tey, kóllëreem ga mu giñaloon seeni maam.
Deuteronomy 8:19 ¶ Bu ngeen demee ba fàtte lu jëm ci seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, di topp yeneen yàlla, di leen jaamook a sujjóotal, seedeel naa leen bés niki tey, ne su boobaa déy, dingeen sànku cànkute gu mat sëkk.
Deuteronomy 8:20 Ni xeet yi Aji Sax ji nara sànk fi seen kanam, noonu ngeen di sànkoo ndax ñàkka déggal seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji.
Deuteronomy 9:1 ¶ Israyil dégluleen! Yeena ngii tey, di jàll dexu Yurdan ngir dàqi xeet yu leen ëpp, ëpp leen doole, ngir nangu seen dëkk yu réy, dàbblikoo tata yu àkki asamaan.
Deuteronomy 9:2 Askan wu am kàttan, yegg ca kaw, soqikoo ci Anageen, ñi ngeen xam, te dégg ñuy wax ci ñoom, naan: «Ku mana të Anageen ñi?»
Deuteronomy 9:3 Waaye xamleen bés niki tey ne seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji mooy kiy jàll jiite leen, di sawara wuy xoyome. Moo leen di fàkkas, mooy ki leen leen di notal, ngeen dàq leen, sànk leen ci lu gaaw, ni leen ko Aji Sax ji waxe woon.
Deuteronomy 9:4 ¶ Gannaaw bu leen leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji dàqalee nag, buleen wax ci seen xel ne: «Sunu njekk a nu may Aji Sax ji indi nu, ngir nu moom réew mii.» Mbonug xeet yii kay moo waral Aji Sax ji dàqal leen leen.
Deuteronomy 9:5 Du seen genn njekk, akug njub gu leen may ngeen nanguji seenum réew. Waaye mbonug xeet yii moo waral seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji dàqal leen leen, ngir sottal kàddu ga mu giñaloon seeni maam Ibraayma ak Isaaxa ak Yanqóoba.
Deuteronomy 9:6 Kon na leen bir ne du seenug njekk moos la leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji joxe mii réew mu baax, ngir ngeen moom ko ndax, askan wu daŋŋiiral ngeen.
Deuteronomy 9:7 ¶ Fàttlikuleen! Buleen fàtte na ngeen merloo woon seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji ca màndiŋ ma. La dale bés ba ngeen bàyyikoo réewum Misra, ba ba ngeen agsee bérab bii, fippu ci kaw Aji Sax ji ngeen masa nekke.
Deuteronomy 9:8 Ca tundu Oreb ngeen merloo Aji Sax ji, Aji Sax ji mere leen, ba nar leena faagaagal.
Deuteronomy 9:9 Ba ma yéegee ca tund wa, di jëli àlluway doj ya, àlluway kóllëre, gi Aji Sax ji fas ak yeen; toog naa ca kaw tund wa ñeent fukki bëccëg ak ñeent fukki guddi. Du ñam wu ma lekk, du ndox mu ma naan.
Deuteronomy 9:10 Aji Sax ji jox ma ñaari àlluway doj yu loxol Yàlla bind mboolem kàddu ya leen Aji Sax ji waxoon ca kaw tund wa, ba mu àddoo fa digg sawara wa, keroog bésub ndaje ma.
Deuteronomy 9:11 ¶ Ba ñeent fukki guddi ak ñeent fukki bëccëg matee, Aji Sax ji jox ma ñaari àlluway doj ya, àlluway kóllëre ga.
Deuteronomy 9:12 Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Jógal wàcce fii gaaw, ndax sa bokk ya nga génnee Misra def nañu yàqute. Teggi nañu xaat yoon wa ma leen santoon. Móolal nañu seen bopp jëmmu tuur.»
Deuteronomy 9:13 ¶ Aji Sax ji waxati ma, ne ma: «Gis naa ne mbooloo mii kat, ñu dëgër bopp lañu.
Deuteronomy 9:14 Bàyyi ma rekk ma faagaagal leen, ba far seen tur fu asamaan tiim, te def la ngay xeet wu ëpp wii, ëpp ko doole.»
Deuteronomy 9:15 ¶ Ba loolu amee ma walbatiku, wàcce ca tund wa, maak yaari àlluway kóllëre ga ca sama yaari loxo, tund wépp di tàkk.
Deuteronomy 9:16 Ma gis ne ndeke moy ngeen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, daldi sàkkal seen bopp wëllu wu ñu móol, dëddu xaat yoon wa leen Aji Sax ji santoon.
Deuteronomy 9:17 Ci kaw loolu ma ne cas yaari àlluwa ya ca sama yaari loxo, sànni, rajaxe ko, ngeen di gis.
Deuteronomy 9:18 ¶ Ba loolu amee ma daanu tëdd fa kanam Aji Sax ji, na woon, diiru ñeent fukki bëccëg ak ñeent fukki guddi. Du ñam wu ma lekk, du ndox mu ma naan ndax seen gépp moy gu ngeen moy, di def lu Aji Sax ji ñaawlu, ba merloo ko.
Deuteronomy 9:19 Booba am naa tiitaange ci merum Aji Sax ji, ak sànjam mi mu nara sànju ci seen kaw, ngir sànk leen. Teewul Aji Sax ji nangul ma boobu yoon itam.
Deuteronomy 9:20 Aaróona nag, Aji Sax ji mere ko lool, nar koo sànk. Ma daldi ñaanalaale Aaróona.
Deuteronomy 9:21 Seen bàkkaarukaay boobu ngeen sàkkoon nag, jëmmu wëllu wa, ma jël ko, lakk ko, tojat, wol ba mu mokk, ba doon pënd. Ma daldi sotti pënd ba ca biir yol ga wale kaw tund wa.
Deuteronomy 9:22 ¶ Ca Tabera itam, ak ca Maasa, ak ca Kibbrot Taawa, ngeen merlooti fa Aji Sax ji.
Deuteronomy 9:23 Ak ba leen Aji Sax ji yebalee fa Kades Barneya, ne leen: «Demleen nanguji réew ma ma leen jox.» Yeena gàntal seen kàddug Yàlla Aji Sax ji, gëmuleen ko, déggaluleen kàddoom.
Deuteronomy 9:24 Gàntal Aji Sax ji ngeen nekke naka jekk, dale ko ca bés ba ma leen xamee.
Deuteronomy 9:25 ¶ Maa daanu tëdd fa kanam Aji Sax ji diiru ñeent fukki bëccëg yooyu, ak ñeent fukki guddi ya ma tëdd fa kanamam ndax la Aji Sax ji noon da leen di sànk.
Deuteronomy 9:26 Ma ñaan Aji Sax ji, ne ko: «Éy Boroom bi Aji Sax ji, bul sànk sa ñoñ ñi nga séddoo, ñi nga jote sa màggaay, génnee leen Misra ci sa dooley loxo.
Deuteronomy 9:27 Ngalla bàyyil xel sa jaam ña, Ibraayma ak Isaaxa ak Yanqóoba. Bul xool ci tëwug mbooloo mii ak seen mbon, ak seenug moy.
Deuteronomy 9:28 Lu ko moy kat waa réew ma nga nu jële dinañu ne: “Tële leena yóbbu réew ma mu leen digoon, ak jéppi leen moo tax Aji Sax ji génne leen, ngir rey leen ca màndiŋ ma.”
Deuteronomy 9:29 Ñii de ñooy sa ñoñ ñi nga séddoo, ñi nga génnee sa doole ju bare, ci sa kàttanu loxo.»
Deuteronomy 10:1 ¶ Jant yooyu la ma Aji Sax ji wax ne ma: «Yettal ñaari àlluway doj yu mel ni yu jëkk ya, nga yéegsi fi man, ci kaw tund wi. Te nanga sàkk itam gaalu bant.
Deuteronomy 10:2 Dinaa bind ci àlluwa yi, kàddu ya woon ca àlluwa yu jëkk, ya nga toj. Su ko defee nga yeb àlluwa yi ci gaal gi.»
Deuteronomy 10:3 Ma sàkk gaalu bantu séng, daldi yett ñaari àlluway doj yu mel ni yu jëkk ya. Ci kaw loolu ma yéeg ca kaw tund wa, maak ñaari àlluwa yi ci sama loxo.
Deuteronomy 10:4 Aji Sax ji nag bind ca àlluwa ya, la mu jëkkoona bind, muy fukki santaane ya mu leen waxoon ca kaw tund wa, ba mu àddoo fa digg sawara wa, keroog bésub ndaje ma. Ba loolu amee Aji Sax ji jox ma àlluwa yi.
Deuteronomy 10:5 Ma walbatiku, wàcc tund wa, yeb àlluwa ya ca gaal ga ma sàkk, àlluwa ya des ca biir, na ma ko Aji Sax ji waxe woon.
Deuteronomy 10:6 ¶ Gannaaw gi bànni Israyil bàyyikoo ca teeni Bene Yaakan, dem ba Mosera. Foofa la Aaróona faatoo, ñu denc ko fa, doomam Elasar doon sarxalkat, wuutu ko.
Deuteronomy 10:7 Foofa lañu bàyyikoo dem Gutgoda, bawooti Gutgoda, jàll ba Yotbata, réewum wali ndox ya.
Deuteronomy 10:8 ¶ Jant yooyu la Aji Sax ji ber giirug Lewi, ngir ñuy gàddu gaalu kóllëreg Aji Sax ji, di taxaw fi kanam Aji Sax ji, di ko liggéeyal, di taase barke ciw turam, te mooy seen péete ba tey jii.
Deuteronomy 10:9 Looloo waral Leween ñi amuñu wàll ci céru suuf su ñuy séddoo ak seeni bokk. Aji Sax ji mooy seenub cér, ni leen ko seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji waxe woon.
Deuteronomy 10:10 ¶ Man nag maa am ca kaw tund wa fan ya ma fa jëkkoona am, muy ñeent fukki bëccëg, ak ñeent fukki guddi. Aji Sax ji dellu ma nangul, boobu yoon itam, ba bëggatu leena sànk.
Deuteronomy 10:11 Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Doxal jiite yoonu mbooloo mi, ñu dem nanguji réew, ma ma giñaloon seeni maam, ne ñoom laa koy jox.»
Deuteronomy 10:12 ¶ Léegi nag yeen Israyil, ana lu leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji laaj, lu moy ngeen ragal seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, di doxe mboolemi yoonam, sopp ko, di jaamoo seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji seen léppi xol, ak seen léppi bakkan,
Deuteronomy 10:13 ngir di sàmm santaaney Aji Sax ji, ak dogali yoonam, yi ma leen dénk bésub tey ngir seen njariñal bopp?
Deuteronomy 10:14 Seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji déy mooy boroom asamaan, ak asamaani asamaan, ak suuf, ak mboolem li ci biiram.
Deuteronomy 10:15 Terewul seeni maam doŋŋ la Aji Sax ji taqool, ngir sopp leen, te yeen, ñi askanoo ci ñoom la taamu ci biir xeetoo xeet, niki bésub tey jii.
Deuteronomy 10:16 Kon nag nangeen dogoo seen xol te bañatee sajju loos.
Deuteronomy 10:17 Ndax kat seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji mooy Yàllay yàlla yi, te mooy Sangu sang yi. Mooy Yàlla ju màgg ji, jàmbaare te raglu. Ki gënalewul, jëlul ub ger.
Deuteronomy 10:18 Kiy aar jirim akub jëtun, sopp doxandéem, ngir leel ko, wodd ko.
Deuteronomy 10:19 Kon soppleen doxandéem, ndax ay doxandéem ngeen woon ca réewum Misra.
Deuteronomy 10:20 ¶ Seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moom ngeen di ragal, te moom ngeen di jaamu. Moom ngeen di ŋoyu, te aw turam ngeen di giñe.
Deuteronomy 10:21 Moo yelloo seeni kañ te mooy seen Yàlla, ji leen defal jaloore yeek kawtéef yooyu ngeen gisal seen bopp.
Deuteronomy 10:22 Juróom ñaar fukki bakkan la seeni maam doonoon ba ñuy wàccsi Misra. Tey seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji def leen ngeen day ni biddiiwi asamaan.
Deuteronomy 11:1 ¶ Soppleen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, te ngeen dénkoo ndénkaaneem, ak dogali yoonam, ak àttey yoonam, aki santaaneem, bés bu nekk.
Deuteronomy 11:2 Xamleen bésub tey ne seeni doom taxul may wax, ndax ñoom xamuñu, gisuñu seen njànglem Yàlla Aji Sax ji: màggaayam, ak dooley loxoom, ak kàttanam gu réy,
Deuteronomy 11:3 aki firndeem, ak jalooreem ja mu jëf ca digg Misra, ci kaw Firawna buuru Misra ak ci biir réewam mépp,
Deuteronomy 11:4 jëfe kook gàngooru Misra, ak seeni fas ak seen watiiri xare, ba mu leen mëddee ca géeju Barax ya, fekk ñu ne leen dann. Aji Sax jee leen sànk ba bésub tey jii,
Deuteronomy 11:5 ak la mu leen def ca màndiŋ ma, ba ngeen agsi bérab bii,
Deuteronomy 11:6 ak la mu def Datan ak Abiram, doomi Elyab Rubeneen ba, ba suuf ŋayee, wonn leen, ñook seen waa kër, ak seeni xayma, ak mboolem luy dund lu leen topp, ci digg Israyil gépp.
Deuteronomy 11:7 Seeni gët déy ngeen teg ci mboolem jaloore ju màgg jooju Aji Sax ji def.
Deuteronomy 11:8 ¶ Kon nag sàmmleen mboolem santaane bi ma leen di dénk tey, ndax ngeen am doole ba nanguji réew ma ngeen jàll jëm, ngir nanguji ko,
Deuteronomy 11:9 ndax itam ngeen gudd fan ca réew ma Aji Sax ji giñoona jox seeni maam, ñook seen askan; réew mu meew maak lem ja tuuroo.
Deuteronomy 11:10 Réew mooma ngeen jëm, di ko nanguji, déy, niroowul ak réewum Misra ga ngeen jóge, fa ngeen daan jiwe, ba noppi topp seenum jiwu, di ko suuxate dooley tànk ni mbeyum dër.
Deuteronomy 11:11 Réew mooma ngeen jàll jëm, ngir nanguji ko, réewum tund aki xur la, te ndoxum taw lay naan.
Deuteronomy 11:12 Réew la mu seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji yég, fu mu tollu seen gëti Yàlla Aji Sax jaa ngi ne ko jàkk, terutel at ba ndeetelam.
Deuteronomy 11:13 ¶ Su fekkee ne nag sàmm ngeen ba sàmm sama santaane yi ma leen dénk tey jii, ngir sopp seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, di ko jaamoo seen léppi xol, ak seen léppi bakkan,
Deuteronomy 11:14 su boobaa, Yàlla nee: «Maa leen di may seen tawub réew, saa yu jotee: lollib réew ma day taw, cooroonam taw, ngeen dajale seenum pepp, ak seen biiñ bu bees, ak seen diw gu yees.
Deuteronomy 11:15 Su boobaa maay mayem ñax ci seenub àll ngir seenug jur, yeen it ngeen di lekk ba regg.»
Deuteronomy 11:16 ¶ Wattuleen seen bopp nag, bala leen seen xel a nax, ngeen lajj, di jaamu yeneen yàlla, di leen sujjóotal,
Deuteronomy 11:17 ba sànjum Aji Sax ji tàkkal leen, mu ne ràpp asamaan, taw taxaw, suuf noppee meññal, ba ngeen gaawa sànkoo ca réew mu baax ma leen Aji Sax jiy jox.
Deuteronomy 11:18 ¶ Defleen sama kàddu yii ci seenum xel ak ci seen xol. Takkleen ko, muy firnde ci seen loxo, te na doon am mbandal ci seen diggantey gët.
Deuteronomy 11:19 Nangeen ko jàngal seeni doom, di ko waxe bu ngeen toogee seen biir néeg, ak bu ngeen di dox ciw yoon, ak bu ngeen tëddee, ak bu ngeen jógee.
Deuteronomy 11:20 Te itam bindleen ko ci seen kaw jëni buntu néeg, ak ci seen bunti dëkk,
Deuteronomy 11:21 ndax seeni fan, ak seen fani doom, baree ca réew ma Aji Sax ji giñaloon seeni maam, ni kemu fan yi asamaan tiim suuf.
Deuteronomy 11:22 ¶ Ndegam déy sàmm ngeen ba sàmm mboolem santaane bii ma leen dénk ngir di ko jëfe, ba sopp seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, di doxe mboolem ay yoonam te ŋoy ci moom,
Deuteronomy 11:23 su boobaa Aji Sax jee leen di dàqal mboolem xeet yooyu, te yeenay nangu réewi xeet yu leen ëpp, ëpp leen doole.
Deuteronomy 11:24 Fépp fu ngeen teg seen tànk, yeena koy moom. La ko dale ca màndiŋ ma ba ca Libaŋ, daleeti dexu Efraat ba ca géej ga ca sowu, lépp seen suuf lay doon.
Deuteronomy 11:25 Du kenn kuy taxaw fi seen kanam. Seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji mooy def na mu leen ko waxe woon, ba waa déndu réew mu ngeen teg seen tànk, ñoom ñépp, yeen lañuy tiit, yeen lañuy ragal.
Deuteronomy 11:26 ¶ Maa ngii nag di leen tegal bésub tey barke ak alkànde.
Deuteronomy 11:27 Barkee ngi, ndegam déggal ngeen seen santaaney Yàlla Aji Sax, ji ma leen di dénk tey.
Deuteronomy 11:28 Alkàndee ngi, ndegam déggaluleen seen santaaney Yàlla Aji Sax ji, xanaa wacc yoon wi ma leen di dénk bésub tey, ngir topp yeneen yàlla yu ngeen xamuloon.
Deuteronomy 11:29 ¶ Bu leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji yóbboo ca réew ma ngeen jëm, ngir nanguji ko, nangeen tudd barke bi ca kaw tundu Garisim, te ngeen tudd alkànde ji ca kaw tundu Ebal.
Deuteronomy 11:30 Ñaari tund yooyu, ña nga moos ca wàllaa dexu Yurdan, ca wàllaa yoonu sowu ba, ca réewum Kanaaneen, ña dëkke joor ga jàkkaarlook Gilgal, ca weti garabi More yu mag ya.
Deuteronomy 11:31 Léegi nag yeena ngi jàlli dexu Yurdan, ngir nanguji réew mi leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji jox. Bu ngeen ko nangoo ba dëkk fa nag,
Deuteronomy 11:32 sàmmooleena jëfe mboolem dogal yeek àttey yoon yi ma teg fi seen kanam, bésub tey jii.
Deuteronomy 12:1 ¶ Dogal yeek àttey yoon, yi ngeen di sàmmoo jëfe seen giiru dund ca suufas réew, ma leen seen Yàllay maam Aji Sax ji moomale, moo di yii:
Deuteronomy 12:2 tasleen tasar mboolem bérab, ya xeet ya ngeen di dàq, di jaamoo seeni tuur; muy kaw tund yu mag ya, di kaw tund yu ndaw ya, di ker garab yu naat ya.
Deuteronomy 12:3 Tojleen seeni sarxalukaay, rajaxe seen tuuri doj; seen xer yi ñuy jaamoo Asera tuur mi, ngeen lakk; seen jëmmi tuur, ngeen gor, ba far tukkal turi tuur yi ci yooyu bérab.
Deuteronomy 12:4 Buleen jaamoo noonu seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji nag.
Deuteronomy 12:5 Waaye seetleen bérab bu seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji di taamuji, ci mboolem seeni giir, ngir teg fa turam, dëël ko fa, te ngeen dem foofa.
Deuteronomy 12:6 Foofa ngeen di yóbbu seen saraxi dóomal, ak yeneen sarax, ak seen céri fukkeel, ak seenub jooxe, ak seen sarax yu ngeen xas, ak seen saraxi yéene, ak seen saraxi taawug jur gu gudd ak gu gàtt.
Deuteronomy 12:7 Foofa ngeen di lekke, yeen ak seeni njaboot fa seen kanam Yàlla Aji Sax ji, ngeen bége fa seen wépp ñaq wu leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji barkeelal.
Deuteronomy 12:8 ¶ Buleen jëfe mboolem nii nuy jëfe fii tey, lu neex waay rekk, def.
Deuteronomy 12:9 Ndax kat àggaguleen ba tey ca dal-lukaay ba, fa leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji sédde.
Deuteronomy 12:10 Waaye bu ngeen jàllee dexu Yurdan, ba dëkki ca réew ma leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji sédde, ba mu noppal leen ci mboolem noon yi leen séq, ngeen dëkke xel mu dal,
Deuteronomy 12:11 su boobaa bérab bu seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji taamu ngir dëël fa turam, foofa ngeen di yóbbu mboolem lu ma leen sant: seen saraxi dóomal, ak yeneen sarax, ak seen céri fukkeel, ak seenub jooxe, ak mboolem ngëneel yu ngeen di def saraxi xas yu ngeen xasoo ak Aji Sax ji.
Deuteronomy 12:12 Su ko defee ngeen bége fi seen kanam Yàlla Aji Sax ji, yeen ak seen doom yu góor ak yu jigéen, ak seen jaam yu góor ak yu jigéen, ak Leween ñi ci seen biiri dëkk te amuñu wàll, amuñu céru suuf ci seen biir.
Deuteronomy 12:13 ¶ Wattuleen seen bopp bala ngeena joxe seen saraxi dóomal fépp fu ngeen gis,
Deuteronomy 12:14 ndax bérab bu Aji Sax ji taamu ci genn ci seen giir yi, foofa ngeen di joxe seen saraxi dóomal, te foofa ngeen di def lépp lu ma leen sant.
Deuteronomy 12:15 Teewul saa yu leen soobee, sañ ngeena rendi, lekk ci lépp lu leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji barkeele, ak fépp fu ngeen dëkk. Ku sobewu ak ku set yépp sañ na caa lekk, mel ni bu doon kéwél mbaa kooba.
Deuteronomy 12:16 Waaye deret ja, buleen ko lekk. Ci suuf ngeen koy tuur nim ndox.
Deuteronomy 12:17 Seen céru fukkeelu pepp nag, ak bu biiñ bu bees, ak bu diw gu bees, ak seen taawug jur gu gudd ak gu gàtt, ak seen mboolem saraxi xas yu ngeen xasoo woon, ak seen saraxi yéene, ak ab jooxe bu ngeen sàkke ci seenu ñaq, sañuleen cee lekk lenn ci seen biiri dëkk,
Deuteronomy 12:18 ndare ngeen lekke ko fa seen kanam Yàlla Aji Sax ji. Lekkeleen ko fa seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji di taamuji, yeen ak seen doom yu góor, ak yu jigéen, ak seen jaam yu góor ak yu jigéen, ak Leween ñi ci seen biir dëkk. Su ko defee ngeen bége seen wépp ñaq, fi seen kanam Yàlla Aji Sax ji.
Deuteronomy 12:19 Wattuleen seen bopp nag, ngir baña sàggane Leween ñi, seen giiru dund ca seen suuf.
Deuteronomy 12:20 ¶ Bu seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji yokkee seen suuf noonee mu leen ko waxe woon, te ngeen namma lekk yàpp, saa yu leen neexee sañ ngeena lekk yàpp.
Deuteronomy 12:21 Bu fekkee ne fi seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji taamoo dëël turam dafa soreek yeen, man ngeena rendi ci seen jur gu gudd mbaa gu gàtt, ga leen Aji Sax ji jox, na ma leen ko waxe woon. Sañ ngeen caa lekke seen biir dëkk lu leen neex.
Deuteronomy 12:22 Ni ñuy lekke yàppu kéwél mbaa kooba rekk ngeen koy lekke. Ku sobewu ak ku set yépp sañ na caa lekk.
Deuteronomy 12:23 Moyuleen bu baax rekk ba baña lekk deret ji, ndax deret mooy bakkan te waruleen boole lekk bakkanu jur gi, aku suuxam.
Deuteronomy 12:24 Buleen lekk deret ji. Ci suuf ngeen koy tuur nim ndox.
Deuteronomy 12:25 Buleen ko lekk mukk, su boobaa dingeen baaxle, yeen ak seen doom yi leen di wuutu; ngir su boobaa yeena ngi jëfe li Aji Sax ji rafetlu.
Deuteronomy 12:26 ¶ Waaye seen yëf yu ñu sellal, ak seen sarax yi ngeen xasoo, jël-leen ko, yóbbu ca bérab ba Aji Sax ji di taamuji.
Deuteronomy 12:27 Te nangeen sarxe seen saraxi rendi-dóomal, yàpp wi ak deret ji, ci seen kaw sarxalukaayu Yàlla Aji Sax ji. Seen deretu yeneen sarax, tuurleen ko ca seen kaw sarxalukaayu Yàlla Aji Sax ji, yàpp wi ngeen lekk ko.
Deuteronomy 12:28 ¶ Sàmmooleena déggal mboolem kàddu yii ma leen di dénk, ngir ngeen baaxle ba fàww, yeen ak seen doom, yi leen di wuutu, ndax kon yeena ngi jëfe lu baax li seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji rafetlu.
Deuteronomy 12:29 ¶ Bu leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji sànkalee xeet yi ngeen jëm, ngir dàq leen, gannaaw bu ngeen leen dàqee ba dëkke seenum réew,
Deuteronomy 12:30 nangeen wattu seen bopp, ba gannaaw bu xeet yooyu sànkoo ci seen kanam, dungeen tàbbi cig fiir, di leen roy, naan: «Ana nu xeet yii di jaamoo seeni tuur, ngir nun it nu def ni ñoom?»
Deuteronomy 12:31 Buleen defe noonu ak seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, ndax mboolem lu seexluwu lu Aji Sax ji bañ, defal nañu ko seeni tuur. Seen doom yu góor ak yu jigéen sax, lakk nañu leen, defal leen seeni tuur sarax.
Deuteronomy 13:1 ¶ Mboolem kàddu gi ma leen dénk nag, sàmmooleen koo jëfe. Buleen ci yokk lenn, buleen ci wàññi lenn.
Deuteronomy 13:2 Gannaaw loolu su ab yonent feeñee ci seen biir, mbaa boroom gént, bu leen digee firnde mbaa kiraama,
Deuteronomy 13:3 ba firnde la mbaa kiraama ga mu leen waxoon dikk, su leen nee: «Nanu topp yeneen yàlla, jaamu leen,» yàlla yu ngeen xamul,
Deuteronomy 13:4 buleen déglu waxu yonent boobu, mbaa boroom gént boobu, ndax seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moo leen di nattu ngir xam ndax yeena ngi koy soppe seen léppi xol ak seen léppi bakkan.
Deuteronomy 13:5 Seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moom ngeen di topp, moom ngeen di ragal. Ay santaaneem ngeen di sàmm, baatam ngeen di déglu, moom ngeen di jaamu, te ci moom ngeen wara ŋoy.
Deuteronomy 13:6 Yonent boobu nag mbaa boroom gént boobu, dee mooy àtteem, ndax moo woote ag fippu ci seen kaw Yàlla Aji Sax, ji leen jële ca réewum Misra, jote leen kërug njaam ga. Mu nar leena féle ci yoon wi leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji sant ngeen doxe ko. Noonu ngeen di tenqee lu bon ci seen biir.
Deuteronomy 13:7 ¶ Seen mbokk mu ngeen bokkal jenn ndey, mbaa seen doom ju góor, mbaa ju jigéen, mbaa seen jabar ju ngeen xejjoo, mbaa seen xaritu benn bakkan, su leen dee xiirtal, naan leen ci kumpa: «Nanu jaamuji yeneen yàlla,» yàlla yu ngeen xamul, du yeen du seeni maam,
Deuteronomy 13:8 ci yàllay xeet yi leen séq, ñi leen jege, ak ñi leen sore, ci àddina sépp, cat ba cat,
Deuteronomy 13:9 su boobaa buleen ko nangul, buleen ko déglu, buleen ko xool bëti yërmande, buleen ko baal, buleen ko nëbbal.
Deuteronomy 13:10 Reyleen ko rekk. Yeen ñi mu doon jéema yóbbaale, na ko seen loxo jëkka dal, ngir rey ko, bala cee loxol mbooloo mépp topp.
Deuteronomy 13:11 Dóorleen koy doj ba mu dee, ndax moo leen doon fexee soreleek seen Yàlla Aji Sax, ji leen jële réewum Misra, kërug njaam ga.
Deuteronomy 13:12 Israyil gépp a koy dégg, daldi ragal ba deesatul def mbon gu ni mel ci seen biir.
Deuteronomy 13:13 ¶ Bu ngeen déggee, ci benn dëkk, ci dëkk yi leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji jox, ngir ngeen dëkke, ñu ne
Deuteronomy 13:14 ay nit ñu tekkiwul dara, te bokk ci yeen, ñoo jóg di waññi seen waa dëkk, naan leen: «Nanu jaamuji yeneen yàlla,» yàlla yu ngeen xamul,
Deuteronomy 13:15 su boobaa nangeen gëstu, seet te laajte bu baax, ba dëgg gu wér feeñe ca mbir ma, ne defees na moomu mbir mu jomblu ci seen biir,
Deuteronomy 13:16 ngeen daldi jam rekk waa dëkk boobu, leel leen ñawkay saamar, faagaagal dëkk ba, ak mboolem la ca biiram, jur ga it, ngeen leel leen ñawkay saamar.
Deuteronomy 13:17 Mboolem alalu sëxëtoo ju jóge ca dëkk ba, dajaleleen ko ca digg pénc ma, te ngeen lakk dëkk ba, booleek cëxëtoo ma, def ko dóomal bu mat sëkk, ñeel seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji. Day doon ab gent ba fàww, deesu ko tabaxaat.
Deuteronomy 13:18 Bu dara des ci seen loxo, lu bokk ci alal jooju ñu wara faagaagal. Su ko defee Aji Sax ji dëddu sànjam mu tàng, yërëm leen, ñeewante leen, yokk leen na mu ko giñale woon seeni maam,
Deuteronomy 13:19 ndegam yeena ngi dégg seen kàddug Yàlla Aji Sax ji, ngir sàmm mboolem santaaneem yi ma leen di dénk bésub tey, ngir di jëfe li seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji rafetlu.
Deuteronomy 14:1 ¶ Ay doom ngeen, ñeel seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji. Buleen ñaasu, buleen wat seen kawaru bopp fi féeteek jë bi, ngir di ko mititloo ku dee,
Deuteronomy 14:2 ndax askan wu sell ngeen, ñeel seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji. Yeen la Aji Sax ji taamu, ngir ngeen doon askan wi mu séddool boppam, ci mboolem askani kaw suuf.
Deuteronomy 14:3 ¶ Buleen lekk lenn lu seexluwu.
Deuteronomy 14:4 Lii moo di mala yi ngeen di lekk seen suux: nag ak xar ak bëy;
Deuteronomy 14:5 ak kooba ak kéwél, ak lu xeetook kooba, ak lu xeetook kéwél, ak bëyu àll, ak bëyu kaw tund.
Deuteronomy 14:6 Mboolem mala mu ci we wi xar, séddlikoo yaar, te muy duññ, moom ngeen di lekk aw suuxam.
Deuteronomy 14:7 Waaye yii, buleen lekk seen suux: lu ciy duññ doŋŋ, te we wi xarul, mbaa lu we wi xar, te duññul. Lu mel ni giléem ak njomboor ak daman, ndax dañuy duññ waaye seen we xarul. Yooyu daganul ci yeen.
Deuteronomy 14:8 Mbaam-xuux, moom, we wi xar na waaye du duññ. Kon daganul ci yeen. Aw suuxam, buleen ko lekk, te méddam, buleen ko laal.
Deuteronomy 14:9 ¶ Lii nag, sañ ngeen koo lekk, ci mboolem lu dëkke ndox: mboolem lu ci am ciiriir aki waasintóor, sañ ngeen koo lekk.
Deuteronomy 14:10 Waaye lu ci amul ciiriir aki waasintóor, buleen ko lekk, ndax daganul ci yeen.
Deuteronomy 14:11 ¶ Mboolem njanaaw lu set, sañ ngeen koo lekk.
Deuteronomy 14:12 Waaye lii ngeen dul lekk ci njanaaw yi: jaxaay ak tan, ba ca mu ñuul ma,
Deuteronomy 14:13 ak céeli bu xonq, ak céeli bu ñuul, ak maf, ak lu mu xeetool,
Deuteronomy 14:14 ak lépp luy baaxoñ ak lu mu xeetool,
Deuteronomy 14:15 ak bànjóoli ak looy, ak lu mu xeetool, ak kirigéej, ak mboolem xeeti liccin, ak yébb, ak lu xeetook xodd, ak musejubru ak njugub.
Deuteronomy 14:19 Mboolem boroomi laaf yu sew-sewaan, daganul ci yeen. Deesu ci lekk lenn,
Deuteronomy 14:20 xanaa boroomi laaf yi ci set. Yooyu, sañ ngeen koo lekk.
Deuteronomy 14:21 ¶ Buleen lekk lenn lu médd. Jaambur bu dal ak yeen, sañ ngeen koo jox lu médd, mu lekk, mbaa ngeen jaay ko ab doxandéem. Waaye yeen askan wu sell ngeen, ñeel seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji. Te buleen togg ab tef ci meewum yaayam.
Deuteronomy 14:22 ¶ Fexeleen bay génne benn céru fukkeel ci mboolem lu seeni tool meññ at mu nekk.
Deuteronomy 14:23 Seen cérub fukkeelu pepp, ak biiñ bu bees, ak diw gu bees, ak lu seen jur taawloo, muy nag, di gàtt, nangeen ko xéewloo fi seen kanam Yàlla Aji Sax ji, fi bérab bi mu taamoo dëël turam ëllëg. Su ko defee ngeen tàggatu ci ragal seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji fu ngeen tollu.
Deuteronomy 14:24 Su ngeen manula dox yoon wi, ndax seen Yàlla Aji Sax jee leen barkeele meññeef mu bare mu ngeen dul àttan, ci diggante bu sorewaatoo lool ak bérab bi seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji taamoo dëël turam,
Deuteronomy 14:25 su boobaa dangeen di wecci cérub fukkeel ba xaalis, jël xaalis ba te dem ba fa seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji taamu.
Deuteronomy 14:26 Su ko defee ngeen weccikoo fa xaalis bi lu leen neex, muy nag mbaa gàtt, mbaa biiñ, mbaa geneen naan gu diis, ak lu leen seen bakkan xiir, ngeen xéewloo fa seen kanam Yàlla Aji Sax ji, bànneexoo ko, yeen ak seen njaboot.
Deuteronomy 14:27 Leween gi ci seen biir dëkk nag, buleen leen fàtte, ndax amuñu wàll ci seen céru suuf.
Deuteronomy 14:28 ¶ Ñetti at yu mat yu nekk, nangeen génne mboolem seen céri fukkeeli meññeef ca at mooma, te ngeen denc ko ca seen biir dëkk,
Deuteronomy 14:29 ndax Leween, ñi amul wàll ci seen céru suuf, dikk, ñook doxandéem yi ak jirim yi ak jëtun, yi ngeen dëkkal, ngir ñu lekk ba regg. Su ko defee seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji barkeel mboolem seenu ñaq.
Deuteronomy 15:1 ¶ Juróom ñaari at yu mat yu nekk, nangeen amal njéggalug bor.
Deuteronomy 15:2 Mbirum njéggaleg bor gi, nii lay deme: mboolem ku lebaloon dëkkandoom, bumu ko ca feyeekooti. Na jéggale la mu lebaloon dëkkandoom, mbokkum bànni Israyilam, gannaaw bu ñu biralee njéggaleg bor, ñeel Aji Sax ji.
Deuteronomy 15:3 Jaambur bi bokkul ci bànni Israyil, sañ ngeen koo feyeeku, waaye la leen seen mbokkum bànni Israyil ameel, jéggaleleen ko.
Deuteronomy 15:4 ¶ Waaye ab ndóol du am ci seen biir, ndax seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moo leen di barkeel bu baax ca réew ma mu leen di jox, muy seen cér, ngeen jagoo,
Deuteronomy 15:5 ndegam déggal ngeen bu baax seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, di sàmmoo jëfe mboolem santaane bii ma leen di dénk tey.
Deuteronomy 15:6 Bu leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji barkeelee ni mu ko waxe déy, yeenay lebal xeet yu bare, waaye yeen dungeen leb. Te it yeenay yilif xeet yu bare, waaye yeen, deesu leen yilif.
Deuteronomy 15:7 ¶ Su amee ci seen biir ab ndóol, di kenn ci seen bokki bànni Israyil, ci benn ci seen dëkki réew, mi leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji di jox, buleen dëgër xol, di tëjal seen loxo, seen mbokkum ndóol moomu.
Deuteronomy 15:8 Nàddil-leen koo nàddil, abal koo abal dayob soxlaam.
Deuteronomy 15:9 Wattuleen seen bopp, bala leena jikko ju sew yóbbe ngeen naan ci seen xel: «Atum juróom ñaareel mi, atum njéggalug bor dëgmal na,» ba tax ngeen sajje xef, seen mbokkum ndóol, joxuleen ko dara. Da leen di booleek Aji Sax ji, ngeen gàddu bàkkaar.
Deuteronomy 15:10 Nangeen ko joxa jox te bu ngeen koy jox it, bu ci seen xol bon, ndax loolu mooy tax seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji barkeel mboolem seen liggéey, ak mboolem seenu ñaq.
Deuteronomy 15:11 Du ñàkk nag ab ndóol ci réew mi. Moo tax ma sant leen ne leen ngeen nàddila nàddil seen mbokkum ndóol, ak seen néew-ji-doole ji ci seenum réew.
Deuteronomy 15:12 ¶ Su fekkee ne seen mbokkum bànni Israyil, góor mbaa jigéen da leena jaay boppam, bu leen liggéeyalee juróom benni at, atum juróom ñaareel ma, yiwileen ko, mu moom boppam.
Deuteronomy 15:13 Te bu ngeen ko yiwee, mu moom boppam it, buleen ko yiwee loxoy neen.
Deuteronomy 15:14 Sàkkal-leen koo sàkkal ci seeni gàtt, ak seenum pepp, ak seen biiñ. Kemu alal ja leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji barkeele, moom ngeen koy jox.
Deuteronomy 15:15 Fàttlikuleen ne ay jaam ngeen woon ca réewum Misra, seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moo leen jot. Moo tax ma sant leen lii tey.
Deuteronomy 15:16 ¶ Ndegam nag seen jaam a leen ne: «Duma dem, ba la,» ndax cofeel gu mu am ci yeen ak seen waa kër, te bànneexam di nekk ak yeen,
Deuteronomy 15:17 su boobaa fableen puso, ngeen sësale noppu jaam bi seen lafu bunt, te ngeen bënne puso bi noppam, ba mu jam ci lafu bunt bi, mu daldi doon seen jaam ba fàww. Seen jaam bu jigéen it, noonu ngeen di def ak moom.
Deuteronomy 15:18 ¶ Buleen mititlu lu ngeen yiwi seenub jaam, mu moom boppam, ndax jariñ na leen lu fey ñaari yoon surga buy feyeeku, ci juróom benni at yi mu leen liggéeyal. Te seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji dina leen barkeel ci mboolem lu ngeen def.
Deuteronomy 15:19 ¶ Mboolem luy taaw ci seen jur gu gudd, ak gu gàtt, te di góor, defal leen ko seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji cér bu sell. Buleen liggéeyloo mukk seen yëkk wu dib taaw, te buleen wat seen gàtt bu dib taaw.
Deuteronomy 15:20 Fi seen kanam Yàlla Aji Sax ji ngeen ko wara xéewloo at mu jot, yeen ak seen njaboot, fi bérab bi Aji Sax ji taamu.
Deuteronomy 15:21 Jur gu ci am sikk nag, muy soox, mbaa mu gumba, mbaa mu am sikk su réy su mu mana doon, buleen ko sarxalal seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji.
Deuteronomy 15:22 Ci seen biir dëkk ngeen ko wara xéewloo, te ku sobewu ak ku set yépp man na caa lekk, mel ni bu doon kéwél mbaa kooba.
Deuteronomy 15:23 Waaye deretam, buleen ko lekk. Ci suuf ngeen koy sotti nim ndox.
Deuteronomy 16:1 ¶ Wormaal-leen weeru Abiib, te ngeen amal ci màggalu bésub Mucc, ñeel seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, ndax ci weeru Abiib la leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji génnee Misra, ag guddi.
Deuteronomy 16:2 Nangeen ci sarxalal seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, ab gàtt mbaa aw nag, ci bérab bi Aji Sax ji taamoo dëël turam ëllëg.
Deuteronomy 16:3 Buleen ko lekkaale lenn lu am lawiir. Daleleen caa lekk, ba diiru juróom ñaari fan, mburu mu amul lawiir, mburum njàqare, ndax ci biir gaawtu ngeen génne woon réewum Misra. Su ko defee ngeen baaxantal seen giiru dund, bés ba ngeen génnee réewum Misra.
Deuteronomy 16:4 Bu leen kenn gisal lawiir ci seen tund wépp, diiru juróom ñaari fan, te bu lenn fanaan ci yàppu jur gi ngeen sarxal, diggante ngoonu bés bu jëkk ba, ba ca suba sa.
Deuteronomy 16:5 ¶ Juru bésub Mucc bi, dungeen ko mana rendi fenn ci dëkk yi leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji jox,
Deuteronomy 16:6 fu moy bérab ba seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji taamoo dëël turam. Foofa ngeen di rendi juru bésub Mucc bi ci ngoon bu jant biy so, yemook waxtu wa ngeen bàyyikoo woon Misra.
Deuteronomy 16:7 Toggleen ko, te lekk ko ci bérab bi seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji di taamuji, ca suba sa ngeen xëy, dellu ca seeni xayma.
Deuteronomy 16:8 Juróom benni fan ngeen di lekk mburu mu amul lawiir, bésub juróom ñaareel di am ndaje, ñeel seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji. Buleen ci liggéey dara.
Deuteronomy 16:9 ¶ Juróom ñaari ayi bés nag, ngeen di waññ, te ci ndoortel ngóob ngeen di tàmbalee waññ juróom ñaari ayi bés yi,
Deuteronomy 16:10 ngeen doora amal màggalug Ayi bés, ñeel seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, te saraxu yéene ba ngeen cay joxe di kemu koom ga leen seen Yàlla barkeele.
Deuteronomy 16:11 Ngeen daldi bànneexu fa seen kanam Yàlla Aji Sax ji, yeen ak seeni doom, góor ak jigéen ak seeni jaam, góor ak jigéen, ak Leween ñi ci seen dëkk, ak doxandéem yeek jirim yeek jëtun ñi ci seen biir, ci bérab bi seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji taamoo dëël turam ëllëg.
Deuteronomy 16:12 Fàttlikuleen ne ay jaam ngeen woon ca Misra te ngeen sàmmoo jëfe dogali yoon yii.
Deuteronomy 16:13 ¶ Màggalu Mbaar yi it nangeen ko wormaal diiru juróom ñaari fan, gannaaw bu ngeen dajalee seenum pepp, ak seen ndoxum reseñ.
Deuteronomy 16:14 Ngeen daldi bànneexoo seenug màggal, yeen ak seeni doom, góor ak jigéen, ak seeni jaam, góor ak jigéen, ak Leween ñeek doxandéem yeek jirim yeek jëtun, ñi ci seen biir dëkk.
Deuteronomy 16:15 Juróom ñaari fan ngeen koy màggal ñeel seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji ci bérab bi Aji Sax ji di taamuji, ndax seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moo leen di barkeelal seen meññat mépp, ak seen mboolem ñaq, seen mbégte mat sëkk.
Deuteronomy 16:16 ¶ Kon ñetti yoon cim at la mboolem seeni góor di teew fi seen kanam Yàlla Aji Sax ji, ci bérab bi muy taamuji: fani màggalu Mburu mu amul lawiir, ak fani màggalug Ayi bés, ak fani màggalu Mbaar yi. Waaye deesul teewe loxoy neen fi kanam Aji Sax ji.
Deuteronomy 16:17 Ku nekk, na sarax ba muy indi, di kemu barke ba ko Yàlla jagleel.
Deuteronomy 16:18 ¶ Te itam ay àttekat aki kilifa ngeen di tabb ngir seeni giir, ci mboolem dëkk yi leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax jiy jox, ñuy àtte mbooloo mi àtteb dëgg.
Deuteronomy 16:19 Buleen jalgati yoon cib àtte, buleen jeng te buleen nangu alalu ger, ndax ab ger day muur bëti boroom xel, di xañ aji jub dëgg.
Deuteronomy 16:20 Dëgg doŋŋ ngeen wara topp, ndax ngeen dund, jagoo réew mi leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji di jox.
Deuteronomy 16:21 ¶ Buleen samp benn xeru bant, bu jóge ci genn garab, ngir di ko jaamoo Asera tuur mi, ci seen wetu sarxalukaay bi ngeen sàkk ngir seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji.
Deuteronomy 16:22 Te itam buleen yékkati lenn lu bokk ci doji jaamookaay yooyu seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji bañ.
Deuteronomy 17:1 ¶ Buleen sarxalal seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, aw nag mbaa ab gàtt bu am sikk, mbaa jenn laago, ndax seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji seexlu na loolu.
Deuteronomy 17:2 ¶ Bu nit feeñee ci seen biir, ci benn ci dëkk yi leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax jiy jox, muy góor mbaa jigéen juy def lu seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji ñaawlu, di fecci kóllëreem,
Deuteronomy 17:3 bay jaamuji yeneen yàlla, di leen sujjóotal, mbaa muy sujjóotal jant bi, mbaa weer wi, mbaa mboolem gàngooru asamaan, te santaanewuma ci lenn,
Deuteronomy 17:4 buñu leen ko yeggee ba ngeen dégg ko, seetleen mbir ma bu baax. Su dee dëgg gu wér, ne defees na lu jomblu loolu ci biir Israyil,
Deuteronomy 17:5 nangeen génne ba ca buntu dëkk ba, waa ji, mbaa ndaw si def jooju jëf ju bon, te ngeen dóor ay doj, waa jooju mbaa ndaw si, ba mu dee.
Deuteronomy 17:6 Kàddug ñaari seede ba ñett nag, ci lees di reye ki ñu wara rey, waaye deesu ko rey ci kàddug benn seede.
Deuteronomy 17:7 Loxoy seede yee koy jëkka dóor doj ngir rey ko, loxoy mbooloo mépp door koo dóor. Noonu ngeen di tenqee lu bon ci seen biir.
Deuteronomy 17:8 ¶ Su leen mbir jafee ba wees leen ci àtteb bakkan bu ñu faat, ak ay jote, ak loraangey yaram yu ñu teg nit, ak mboolem dëngoo bu laaj àtte ci seen biir dëkk, dangeen di dem ba ca bérab ba seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji di taamuji,
Deuteronomy 17:9 ngeen àgg ca sarxalkat ya, Leween ña, ak àttekat, ba mbir ma yemool jamono, te ngeen sàkku ñu biral leen àtteb mbir ma.
Deuteronomy 17:10 Nangeen jëfe nag kàddu ga ñu leen ca wax, ca bérab booba Aji Sax ji taamu, te ngeen sàmmoo koo jëfe mboolem noonee ñu leen ko digale.
Deuteronomy 17:11 Kàddug ndigal la ñu leen digal, ak àtte ba ñu leen ci wax, jëfeleen ko. Buleen lajje fenn kàddu ga ñu leen ca wax; du ndijoor, du càmmoñ.
Deuteronomy 17:12 Képp ku ci daŋŋiiral, baña déggal sarxalkat ba fa ayee liggéeyal seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, baña déggal àttekat ba, kooku dees koy rey. Noonu ngeen di tenqee lu bon ci Israyil.
Deuteronomy 17:13 Askan wépp a koy dégg, tiit, ba duñu daŋŋiiralati.
Deuteronomy 17:14 ¶ Bu ngeen demee nag ca réew ma leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji di jox, bu ngeen ko nangoo, dëkke, ba ne: «Nanu fal buur bu nu jiite ni mboolem xeet yi nu séq,»
Deuteronomy 17:15 su boobaa fexeleen ba ka ngeen di fal buur, di ka seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji taamu. Ci seen biiri bokk nag ngeen di fal seen buur. Dungeen mana fal buur ab jaambur bu dul seen mbokkum bànni Israyil.
Deuteronomy 17:16 Waaye bu buur bi barey fas, te bumu delloo askan wi Misra, ngir sàkku fas yu bare, te Aji Sax ji waxoon leen ne buleen dellooti woowu yoon.
Deuteronomy 17:17 Bumu barey jabar, balaa am xelam di lajj. Xaalis ak wurus it, bumu ko barele lool.
Deuteronomy 17:18 ¶ Bu buur bi toogee ci jalub nguuram, na bindlu ngir moom ci boppam, ab sottib téereb yoon wii cib taxañ, ci dégtalub sarxalkat yi, Leween ñi.
Deuteronomy 17:19 Na téere boobu ànd ak moom, mu di ci jàng giiru dundam, ndax mu tàggatu ci ragal Yàllaam Aji Sax ji, ngir di sàmm mboolem kàdduy yoon wii, ak dogali yoon yii, ngir di ko jëfe,
Deuteronomy 17:20 ba du xoggliku ci kawi bokkam, te du moye santaane bi fenn; du ndijoor, du càmmoñ, ndax mu gudd fan ci nguuram, moom ak askanam, ci digg Israyil.
Deuteronomy 18:1 ¶ Leween ñiy ay sarxalkat, ba ci giirug Leween gépp nag, wenn wàll mbaa céru suuf ñeelu leen ci seen bokki Israyil. Saraxi sawara yu Aji Sax ji, akub céram, moom lañuy dunde.
Deuteronomy 18:2 Ab cér du leen ñeel ci seen biiri bokk. Aji Sax ji mooy seenub cér, na mu leen ko waxe woon.
Deuteronomy 18:3 Lii mooy li lew sarxalkat yi, te bàyyikoo ci askan wi, ci ñiy rendi ay sarax, muy aw nag, di ab gàtt: nañu jox sarxalkat bi, mbagg mi ak lex yi, ak mbàq gi.
Deuteronomy 18:4 Te seen pepp mu jëkka ñor, ak seen biiñ bu bees, ak seen diw gu bees, ak kawar gi ngeen jëkka wate ca seeni xar, joxleen ko ko,
Deuteronomy 18:5 ndax seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji moo ko taamu, ci seen mboolemi giir, ngir mu taxaw, di liggéey ci turu Aji Sax ji, moom ak askanam, ba fàww.
Deuteronomy 18:6 ¶ Ab Leween bu dëkke benn ci seeni dëkk, ak fu mu mana doon ci Israyil, su fa jógee dem ci coobarey boppam, bérab bu Aji Sax ji taamu,
Deuteronomy 18:7 da fay liggéey ci turu Yàllaam Aji Sax ji ni mboolem bokki Leweenam, ña fa taxawe fa kanam Aji Sax ji,
Deuteronomy 18:8 njël lu yemook njëlal ña mu fa fekk it lew na ko, te limaaleesul lu ko dikke ci njaayum alalu baayam.
Deuteronomy 18:9 ¶ Bu ngeen demee ca réew ma leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji di jox, buleen roy jëf ju jomblu ju xeet yooyu.
Deuteronomy 18:10 Bu kenn fekk ci seen biir kuy sarxe doomam ju góor, ak ju jigéen, lakk ko; ak kuy luxus, ak kuy seet, ak kuy gisaane, ak kuy xërëm,
Deuteronomy 18:11 ak kuy liggéeyaate, ak kuy seete ab rawaan, ak kuy seete aw rab, mbaa kuy seete nit ñu dee,
Deuteronomy 18:12 ndax mboolem ñiy def yooyu, Aji Sax ji seexlu na leen. Jëf ju seexluwu jooju moo waral seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji di leen dàqal seeni boroom.
Deuteronomy 18:13 ¶ Muccleen sikk seen digganteek seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji,
