Song of Solomon 8:5 Ana ndaw suy jóge màndiŋ ma nii, wéeroo nijaayam?
Song of Solomon 8:6 Teg ma ci sa xol ni torlukaay, mbaa ci sa përëg ni lamu màndarga. Mbëggeel a bare doole ni ndee, fiiraange xér ni bàmmeel. Day jàpp jippét, di jum bu Aji Sax ji taal.
Song of Solomon 8:7 Ndox mu ne xéew du fey mbëggeel, ay dex du ko mëdd. Ku koy weccee sa alalu kër gépp it, ñu jéppi laa jéppi rekk.
Song of Solomon 8:8 Sunub jigéen lu ndaw la, ween sax amu ko. Lu nuy defal sunub jigéen bés bu ñu koy bëggsi?
Song of Solomon 8:9 Su doon am tata, nu tabaxal ko soorooru xaalis. Su doon bunt, nu aare ko xànqi seedar.
Song of Solomon 8:10 Maa dim tata, sama ween di sooroor ya; moo tax waa ji xam ne maa di jàmmam.
Song of Solomon 8:11 Suleymaan am na reseñ ca Baal Amon. Da koo dénk ay beykat. Ku nekk di ko fey meññeef ma junniy dogi xaalis.
Song of Solomon 8:12 Junniy dogi xaalis yi, Suleymaan, yaa ko moom; ñaar téeméer yi, beykat yi. Waaye sama toolub reseñ, maa ko moom.
Song of Solomon 8:13 Yaw mi tooge digg tool bi, samay xarit a ngi teewlu sa baat, waxal boog, ma dégg.
Song of Solomon 8:14 Nijaay, dawsil, melal ni kéwél, mbaa kooba gu ndaw ci kaw tund wi ci gàncax gu xeeñ gi.
Isaiah 1:1 ¶ Lii moo di peeñum Esayi doomu Amocc, di lu mu gis ci mbirum Yuda ak Yerusalem ci janti buuri Yuda yi ñuy wax Osiyas ak Yotam ak Axas ak Esekiya.
Isaiah 1:2 Asamaan, déglul; suuf, teewlul, Aji Sax jeey àddu: «Ay gone laa yar, màggloo leen, ñoom, ñu gàntal ma.
Isaiah 1:3 Aw yëkk xam na boroomam, mbaam-sëf xam gàmb, bi ko boroomam di xonte, waaye Israyil xamul, sama ñoñ ñii xàmmeewuñu.»
Isaiah 1:4 Wóoy wii xeetu moykat, wii askan wu diisu ñaawtéef, mii njurum defkati mbon, yii doomi yàqute! Ñoo wacc Aji Sax ji, ñoo teddadil Aji Sell ju Israyil, dëddu ko.
Isaiah 1:5 Xanaa dungeen wéye fippu, ñu gën leena duma, te bopp di góomi neen, xol jeex tàkk?
Isaiah 1:6 Bopp ba téstën, fenn jagul. Xanaa gaañu-gaañu aki dagg-dagg rekk, ak góom yuy nàcc, fajeesu ko, takkeesu ko, gajfaleesu kook ag diw.
Isaiah 1:7 Seenum réew gental, seeni dëkk xoyomu, seen suuf, doxandéem yi lekk fi seen kanam, muy gent bu doxandéem tas.
Isaiah 1:8 Siyoŋ, dëkk bu taaru baa ngi wéet ni mbaarum tóokër mbaa dalub toolu xaal. Mbete dëkk bu ñu gaw!
Isaiah 1:9 Bu nu Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi waccalul woon li nu deseek as néew, ni Sodom lanuy mel, Gomor lanuy neexool.
Isaiah 1:10 Dégluleen kàddug Aji Sax ji, yeen njiiti Sodom, teewluleen sunu yoonu Yàlla, yeen askanu Gomor.
Isaiah 1:11 «Lu may doye seen sarax yu bare?» la Aji Sax ji wax. «Damaa suur seen saraxi rendi-dóomali kuuy, suur nebbonu juru yar gi, deretu yëkk ak xar ak sikket it, safu ma.
Isaiah 1:12 Bu ngeen dikkee, teewsi fi sama kanam, ana ku leen sant ñu joggat-joggatee nii sama ëttu kër?
Isaiah 1:13 Buleen fi indeeti saraxi caaxaan, seen saraxu cuuraay, lu ma seexlu la. Terutel weer ak bésub Noflaay ak wooteb ndajee ci yem! Duma mana dékku ndajem diine mu rax njubadi.
Isaiah 1:14 Seeni Terutel weer ak seen bési màggal laa bañ ci sama xol; yooyu màggal a ma diis ba àttanatuma ko.
Isaiah 1:15 Bu ngeen ma tàllaleey loxo, ma fuuyu. Bu ngeen doon ñaan-ñaanee it, du maa leen di déglu: seeni loxo, deret la taq ripp.
Isaiah 1:16 Raxasuleen ba set wecc, jëleleen seeni jëf ju bon fi sama kanam, te ngeen ba lu bon.
Isaiah 1:17 Jàngleen di def lu baax, sàkku njub, waññi ab notkat, àtte dëgg, ab jirim, sàmm àqu jëtun.
Isaiah 1:18 «Kaayleen, nu waxtaan ba juboo,» la Aji Sax ji wax. «Li seeni bàkkaar di xonq lépp, tàll lay weexeji. Li muy xonq curr lépp, weex furr lay mujje.
Isaiah 1:19 Su ngeen ma nangoo déggal, ngëneelu réew mi ngeen di xéewloo.
Isaiah 1:20 Waaye su ngeen lànkee, fippu, saamar a leen di xéewloo.» Aji Sax ji déy a ko wax ci gémmiñam.
Isaiah 1:21 Ana nu biib dëkk yàqoo, mbeteb gànc, te nekkoon dëkkub kóllëre, njubte mate fa, njekk lal fa panaan, tey ñu diy bóomkat!
Isaiah 1:22 Sa xaalis doon na raxit, sa biiñ xormbet.
Isaiah 1:23 Seeni njiit të, xejjoo ay sàcc, ñoom ñépp sopp ger, di dàq ay neexal, ab jirim, sàmmuñu àtteem, àqu jëtun soxalu leen.
Isaiah 1:24 Moo tax, kàddug Boroom bee, Aji Sax ju gàngoor yi, Jàmbaaru Israyil: «Maay lijjanti samay bañ, ngalla ñoom! Maay fey samay noon!
Isaiah 1:25 Yerusalem, maa lay teg loxo, maay seeyal sa raxit ni xeme, ba dindi sa mbuubit mépp.
Isaiah 1:26 Maay waññi say àttekat, ñu mel na woon, say diglekat it dellu mel ni bu jëkkoon. Su boobaa ñu wooye la Dëkkub Njekk, ak Dëkkub Kóllëre.»
Isaiah 1:27 Siyoŋ dëppook yoon, mucc, ay tuubkatam wormaal njekk, raw;
Isaiah 1:28 moykat ak bàkkaarkat yàqoondoo, dëddukati Aji Sax ji sànkoondoo.
Isaiah 1:29 Yeenay rus moos ci garab yu mag, yi ngeen soppoona daje, di xërëmtu. Yeenay am gàcce ci tóokër, yi ngeen taamu woona daje, di bokkaale.
Isaiah 1:30 Yeenay meli ni garab gu mag gu xob ya lax, mbaa tóokër bu amul siitu ndox.
Isaiah 1:31 Boroom doole mel ni boob, la mu liggéey di ferñent, ànd ak moom ne jéppét, te kenn du fey sawara wa.
Isaiah 2:1 ¶ Mbir mii la Yàlla won Esayi doomu Amocc ci mbirum Yuda ak Yerusalem.
Isaiah 2:2 Fan yu mujj ya, dees na taxawal tundu kër Aji Sax ji, Aji Sax ji mooy gëna kawe ci tund yi, tiim tund yu ndaw yi, xeet yépp riirandoo, wutsi ko.
Isaiah 2:3 Ay askan yu bareey dikk, naan: «Dikkleen nu yéegi tundu Aji Sax ji, fa kër Yàllay Yanqóoba, mu xamal nuy yoonam, ba nu doxe yooyu ñallam.» Siyoŋ kat la ndigalu yoon di bawoo, Yerusalem googu la kàddug Aji Sax ji di jóge.
Isaiah 2:4 Mooy àtte diggante xeet yi, mooy dogalal ay askani askan, ñu tëgg seeni saamar ay illéer, def seeni xeej ay sàrt; aw xeet dootu xàccil moroom ma saamar, te dootuñu jàngati xare.
Isaiah 2:5 Yeen waa kër Yanqóoba, kaayleen nu doxe leeru Aji Sax ji!
Isaiah 2:6 Boroom bi, bàyyi nga waa kër Yanqóoba, sa ñoñ, ndax jëfi waa penku lañu feese, aki gisaanekat, ba mel ni waa Filisti, te ñooy tàppante pasook doomi doxandéem yi.
Isaiah 2:7 Seen réew maa ngi ne gàññ ak xaalis ak wurus, alal du jeex, fas ne xas, watiiri xare du jeex.
Isaiah 2:8 Seen réew maa ngi fees aki yàllantu; ñuy sujjóotal seen liggéeyu loxo yooyu, te ñoo ko sàkkal seen bopp.
Isaiah 2:9 Doom aadama torox na, ku ne detteelu, waaye bu leen yékkati!
Isaiah 2:10 Ayca ca xunti ma, làqujileen biiri pax, ba sore tiitaange ji Aji Sax ji sabab, sore darajay màggaayam.
Isaiah 2:11 Bésub keroog booba, ku bew bay regeju mooy detteelu, sagub nit sàggiku, Aji Sax ji doŋŋ mooy jagoo kawe.
Isaiah 2:12 Bés déy ñeel na Aji Sax ju gàngoor yi, ca lay xaare képp ku bew ak ku reew, ba kuy daŋŋiiral, detteelu.
Isaiah 2:13 Ca lay xaare garabi seedari Libaŋ yi ne coleet, ba kawe, ak garab yu mag ya fa Basan.
Isaiah 2:14 Ca lay xaare wépp tund wu mag wu ne coleet, ak bépp jànj bu kawe,
Isaiah 2:15 ak jépp tata ju gudd, ak bépp miir bu ñu dàbbli,
Isaiah 2:16 ak gaalu Tarsis gu mag gu mu doon, ak gépp gaal gu taaru.
Isaiah 2:17 Bésub keroog booba, kuy daŋŋiiral, detteelu, sagub nit sàggiku, Aji Sax ji doŋŋ mooy jagoo kawe.
Isaiah 2:18 Yàllantu yépp a naan mes,
Isaiah 2:19 nit ñi làquji biir xuntiy doj, ruuruji biiri pax, ba sore tiitaange ji Aji Sax ji sabab, sore darajay màggaayam, kera buy taxaw, ba suuf di lox.
Isaiah 2:20 Bésub keroog booba, yàllantuy xaalis ak wurus ya nit sàkkal boppam, di leen sujjóotal, ñoom lay sànni ca jaar yaak njugub ya,
Isaiah 2:21 ba mana làquji ca xunti ya ak xarantey doj ya, ba sore tiitaange ji Aji Sax ji sabab, sore darajay màggaayam, kera buy taxaw, ba suuf di lox.
Isaiah 2:22 Baleen nit, noowal bakkan kese la! Ana lees koy nawe?
Isaiah 3:1 Aji Sax ji Boroom bi, Aji Sax ju gàngoor yi kat, mu ngi nii di jële Yerusalem ak Yuda, lu doon wéeruwaay, di cëslaay, muy dugub ju ñu yaakaaroon, di ndox mu ñu yaakaaroon,
Isaiah 3:2 ak jàmbaar ak ñeyu xare, akub àttekat akub yonent, ak gisaanekat ak magum pénc,
Isaiah 3:3 ak njiitu juróom fukki dag, akub kàngam, ak diglekatu buur, ak ndaanaanu liggéeykat, ak jatkat bu xareñ.
Isaiah 3:4 «Maay def ay gone jiite leen, di ñu yaroo seen sago, yilif leen.
Isaiah 3:5 Nit ñiy soxorante, ku nekk ak moroomam, ku nekk ak dëkkandoom, ndaw di ñàkke mag kersa, sagaru nit sofental boroom daraja.
Isaiah 3:6 Nit dina ne nikk mbokk ma, ca biir kër baayam, ne ko: “Yaw mi dese mbubb, jiite nu, ba lu bokk ci sunu gent bii, di sa kilifteef.”
Isaiah 3:7 Keroog kooka àddu ne ko: “Duma leen mana fajal dara! Du dugub, du mbubb fa sama kër, dungeen ma def njiit!”»
Isaiah 3:8 Yerusalem day téqtalu, Yuda fëlëñu. Ñooy wax ak a jëf lu neexul Aji Sax ji, di gàntal leeram gi teew.
Isaiah 3:9 Seen dëgër bët tuumaal na leen, ñuy bàkkaar ni waa Sodom, làquwuñu sax. Wóoy, ngalla ñoom! nde ñoo lor seen bopp.
Isaiah 3:10 Neleen aji jub ji mooy baaxle, mooy yooloo añam.
Isaiah 3:11 Waaye wóoy ku bon, nde mooy bonle; la mu def rekk lees koy def.
Isaiah 3:12 Bokk yi, ñu xalele ñoo leen di not, ay jigéen yilif leen. Bokk yi, seeni njiit a ngi leen di sànk, lëndëmal nañu seeni yoon.
Isaiah 3:13 Aji Sax jaa ngi ci jataayu layoo, moo jóg di àtte ay xeet.
Isaiah 3:14 Aji Sax jeey yékkati kàddug sikkaange, jëme ci magi ñoñam ak seeni kàngam. «Yeena sëxëtoo tóokëru reseñ bi, la ñu foqatee ci néew-ji-doolee nga seeni kër.
Isaiah 3:15 Lu waral ngeen di dëggaate sama ñoñ, nappaaje néew-doole yi?» Kàddug Boroom bee, Aji Sax ju gàngoor yi.
Isaiah 3:16 Aji Sax ji da ne: «Jigéeni Siyoŋ a ngi daŋŋiiral, di goŋeet-goŋeeti, di regejook a rékk-rékkal, samp um ndaag, keleŋal lami wëq.»
Isaiah 3:17 Moo tax Boroom beey wat jigéeni Siyoŋ nel, Aji Sax jeey muri seen jë.
Isaiah 3:18 ¶ Bésub keroog Boroom bi xañ leen gànjari tànk, ak takkaay yu bindoo ni jant, ak yu bindoo ni weer wu feeñ;
Isaiah 3:19 aki loŋ-loŋ aki caq aki muuraay.
Isaiah 3:20 Moo leen di xañ ay tañlaay ak lami përëg aki ngañaay ak téere yu xeeñ aki gàllaaj,
Isaiah 3:21 xañ leen jaaroy torlu ak jaaroy bakkan,
Isaiah 3:22 ak mbubbi xew, aki mëlfë, ak séri càngaay, ak saagi loxo,
Isaiah 3:23 ba ci yérey sooy ak yérey lẽe aki musóor aki kol.
Isaiah 3:24 Su boobaa lu xasaw wuutu lu xeeñ, buum wuutu ngañaay, nel bu set wuutuy létt, yérey saaku wuutu ndoket bu rafet, toroxte wuutub taar.
Isaiah 3:25 Yerusalem, say góor ay fàddoo saamar, say jàmbaar des xare.
Isaiah 3:26 Su boobaa sa bunti dëkk sax di ñaawlook a jooy, mel ni ndaw su ñu futti, mu ne dett fi suuf.
Isaiah 4:1 Su bés baa juróom yaari jigéen ŋoyaalu genn góor, ne ko: «Sunub dund, nun a, sunu koddaay, nun a! Jox nu sag buum rekk, teggil nu gàcce.»
Isaiah 4:2 Su bés baa njebbitum Aji Sax ji doon lu yànj, darajawu, meññeefum réew mi di teraanga, dib sag, ñeel ñi dese bakkan fi Israyil.
Isaiah 4:3 Su boobaa ku mucc fa Siyoŋ ak ku des fa Yerusalem, ku sell ki lees lay wooye, muy képp ku ñu bind turam, te mu wara dese bakkan ci Yerusalem.
Isaiah 4:4 Boroom beey wal noowal mbugal, noo guy lakk, sellal, fóote ko jonkani jigéeni Siyoŋ, fetee ko deret ji ci Yerusalem, ba mu set.
Isaiah 4:5 Su boobaa tundu Siyoŋ bépp, fépp fu ñuy dajee, Aji Sax ji sàkk fa niiru saxar bëccëg, guddi mu def tàkk-tàkk bu ne ràññ; leeru Aji Sax ji di kiiraay, tiim lépp,
Isaiah 4:6 di mbaar mu ñuy serloo tàngooru bëccëg, di ko seeloob taw ak waame.
Isaiah 5:1 Naa woy sama soppe woyu cofeel wu solowoo tóokëram. Sama soppee fi amoon tóokër, kaw tund wu suuf sa nangu lool.
Isaiah 5:2 Mu gàbb ko, dindi doj ya, jëmbat ca ngëneeli reseñ, tabax tóojub doj fa digg ba, ba yett ca mbalkam nalukaayu reseñ, tey yaakaar reseñ ju neex, mu meññ, wex.
Isaiah 5:3 Léegi yeen waa Yerusalem ak yeen waa Yuda, ngalla àtteleen maak sama tóokër.
Isaiah 5:4 Lu may defalati sama tóokër bi, lu ma ca defuloon? Lu waral ma di ko yaakaare reseñ ju neex, mu meññ, wex xàtt?
Isaiah 5:5 Ma xamal leen nag li ma naral sama tóokër bi. Ñàggib ñagam, mu dim parlu; màbb miiram, ñu dëggaate ko, jàll.
Isaiah 5:6 Dama koy gental, mu saxi dég aki dagg, deesu ko tenqi, deesu ko bey; niir yeet, ma sant leen ñu bañ koo tawal.
Isaiah 5:7 Tóokëru Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi kat, mooy waa kër Israyil. Niti Yuda it ñooy njëmbat li mu safoo. Mu di ko yaakaare njub, njubadi ne jaas. Mu yaakaar njekk, yuuxi njekkar ne jaas.
Isaiah 5:8 Wóoy ngalla ñii di dajale kër ak kër, tool akub tool, aakimoo fépp, ba des ñoomu neen ci réew mi.
Isaiah 5:9 Maa dégg Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, mu ne: «Giñ naa ne kër yu bareey gental déy, kër yu yaa, rafet, kenn dëkku ca.
Isaiah 5:10 Tóokërub ñetti egtaar déy du meññ juróom fukki liitari biiñ, te jiwum téeméeri kiloy bele it, fukki kilo doŋŋ a cay génne.»
Isaiah 5:11 Wóoy ngalla ñiy teela xëy, daw wutiw ñoll, gonloo biiñ ba tàng jérr.
Isaiah 5:12 Xalam yaak tabala yaak toxoro ya jolli, biiñ xelli ca xawaare ja. Seetluwuñu sax li Aji Sax ji def, xooluñu li mu jo loxoom.
Isaiah 5:13 Moo tax ñoñi Aji Sax ji di duggi ngàllo ndax ñàkk xam-xam. Seen kàngam ay deeye xiif, seen baadoolo deeye mar.
Isaiah 5:14 Moo tax njaniiw di yàkkli ag bóli, gémmiñ ga ne ŋafeet, amul kersa, boroom darajaak baadoolay Yerusalem doon xaxaloo, far tàbbi ca.
Isaiah 5:15 Doom aadama torox na, nit detteelu na, ku doon regeju, detteelu.
Isaiah 5:16 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, ab àtteem lay fésale màggaayam, Yàlla ju sell ji, ag njekkam lay firndeele sellngaam.
Isaiah 5:17 Am xar a nara fore biir dëkk bi, mbetem parlu, màngaan lekke gentub boroom alal.
Isaiah 5:18 Wóoy ngalla ñiy ràngooy buum, di diri ñaawtéefi neen, ràngooy goj di diri seeni tooñ.
Isaiah 5:19 Ña nga naa: «Na Aji Sax ji gaaw! Na baral liggéeyam, nu gis. Na Aji Sell ju Israyil sottal mébétam, mu sotti, nu xam.»
Isaiah 5:20 Wóoy ngalla ñiy gis lu bon, ne lu baax la; gis lu baax, ne lu bon la; lëndëm, ñu tudde leer, leer, ñu tudde lëndëm; lu wex, ñu ne neex na lu neex, ñu ne wex na.
Isaiah 5:21 Wóoy ngalla ñii defe ne ñoo xam, yaakaar ne ñoo muus.
Isaiah 5:22 Wóoy ngalla ñiy jàmbaari naan biiñ, diy ndaanaan ci njafaanu ñoll,
Isaiah 5:23 di dëggal ku sikk ndax ab ger, tey xañ boroom njekk, ag njekkam.
Isaiah 5:24 Moo tax ni boob di jeexe ci sawara, ngooñ xoyomoo ko cib taal, ni la seenub reen di seeye ni lu maxe, seeni tóor-tóor naaw ni pënd. Ñoo gàntal yoonu Aji Sax ji ci gàngoor yi, ñoo sofental kàddug Aji Sell ju Israyil.
Isaiah 5:25 Moo tax merum Aji Sax ji tàkkal ñoñam, mu xàcci loxoom, duma leen, ba tund yi jaayu, seeni néew wetar ni mbalit fi mbedd yi. Loolu yépp taxul mu meddi, loxoom baa ngi mu xàcci ba tey.
Isaiah 5:26 Aji Sax jeey yékkatil raaya, xeet wu sore, wal ug liit, wooye leen fa cati àddina, ñu jekki ne jaas, dikkal leen.
Isaiah 5:27 Kenn sonnu ci, kenn tërëfu ci, kenn dajjantul mbaa muy nelaw; ngañaay yolomul, waruw dàll dogul.
Isaiah 5:28 Seeni fitt ñaw na, seen xala yépp noppi na, seen wewi tànki fas ni xeer. Bu tànki watiir ya dawee, nga defe ne callweer a.
Isaiah 5:29 Dañuy ŋar ni gaynde, ŋarati ni gaynde gu mat; yëmmu, ŋank um rëbbam, yóbbu te kenn du wallu.
Isaiah 5:30 Bésub keroog ñu ŋaral Yuda, ŋar yu mel ni géej gu sàmbaraax! Foo geesu ci réew mi, xool, doo gis lu moy lëndëm ak njàqare, xàmbaar maase, ba leer giim.
Isaiah 6:1 ¶ At ma Buur Osiyas saayee, damaa gis Boroom bi toog kaw ngàngune mu kawee kawe, lafi mbubbam fees néeg bu sell bi.
Isaiah 6:2 Ay malaakay seraf ñoo taxaw, tiim ko, ku ci nekk am juróom benni laaf: ñaar yu muur seen kanam, ñaar yu muur seeni tànk, ak ñaar yu ñuy naawe.
Isaiah 6:3 Ku ci nekk di àddu, naan moroom ma: «Kee sell te sell te sell, keey Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoori xare yi, àddina sépp a feese ag leeram!»
Isaiah 6:4 ¶ Ku ci àddu, kenuy bunt yay riir, néeg Aji Sax ji fees ak saxar.
Isaiah 6:5 Ma ne: «Wóoy man, sànku naa! Man miy nit ku làmmiñam sobewu, xeetoo ci ñu seen làmmiñ sobewu, te samay gët tegu ci kaw Buur Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoori xare yi.»
Isaiah 6:6 ¶ Kenn ci malaakay seraf ya naaw wutsi ma, yor aw xal wu mu keppe ag ñiim, jële ko fa sarxalukaay ba.
Isaiah 6:7 Mu laalale xal wi sama gémmiñ, ne ma: «Mu ngoog, ndegam lii laal na sa gémmiñ, sag tooñ wàcc na, sa bàkkaar faru na.»
Isaiah 6:8 ¶ Ma dégg baatu Boroom bi, mu naan: «Ana ku may yebal, ana ku nuy demal boog?» Ma ne: «Xanaa man, yebal ma!»
Isaiah 6:9 Mu neeti: «Demal, wax askan wii, ne leen: “Dégluleena déglu te buleen dégg, xool-leena xool te buleen gis.”
Isaiah 6:10 Nanga dërkiisal xoli askan wii, fatt seeni nopp, taf seeni gët; lu ko moy seeni gët gis, seeni nopp dégg, seen xol yég, ñu dëpp, wér.»
Isaiah 6:11 ¶ Ma ne: «Boroom bi, foo àppal loolu?» Mu ne: «Xanaa fii ba seeni dëkk gental, ba kenn dëkkatu ca, ba nit dootu nekk biir kër ya, suuf sa yàqu yaxeet, di ndànd-foyfoy.
Isaiah 6:12 Aji Sax jeey yebal waa réew mi fu sore, tool yu bare booy.
Isaiah 6:13 Bu ca fukkeelu nit ña desoon, ñoom it dees na leen dellu taal. Waaye dañuy mel ni wenn ci xeeti garab yu mag yi ñuy gor, ëkk ba dellu jebbi, ëkku xeet wii, jiwu mu sell lay doon.»
Isaiah 7:1 ¶ Janti buurub Yuda, Axas doomu Yotam miy doomu Osiyas, Reccin buurub Siri moo dal ci kaw Yerusalem, ànd ak buurub Israyil, Peka doomu Remalya. Waaye manalu leen dara.
Isaiah 7:2 Ba ñu yégalee Buur Axas sëtub Daawuda, ak waa këram, ne ko waa Siri, Efrayim lañu lëngool, mbir ma yëngal na Buur Axas ak waa réew ma, ba mel ni garabi gott bu ngelaw li gësëm.
Isaiah 7:3 Aji Sax ji wax Esayi ne ko: «Génnal gaaw, dajeek Axas, yaak sa doom Seyar Yasub, ma nga ca catal solomu mbànd ma féete kaw, ca yoonu toolu fóotkat ya.
Isaiah 7:4 Nga wax ko ne ko: “Defal ndànk te ne cell. Bul tiit, bul xàddi ndax merum Reccin ak Siri, ak doomu Remalya ji. Duñu dara lu moy ñaari gil yuy saxar!
Isaiah 7:5 Waa Siri ñoo ànd ak Efrayim ak doomu Remalya, di la fexeel naan:
Isaiah 7:6 ‘Nan songi Yuda, tiital leen, nangu ko, fal fa doomu Tabeel buur.’
Isaiah 7:7 Waaye Boroom bi Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: ‘Loolu du sotti, du am.
Isaiah 7:8 Damaas a yilif Siri, te Reccin yiliful lu moy Damaas. Fii ak juróom benn fukki at ak juróom Efrayim tas, ba xeet wa réer.’
Isaiah 7:9 Samaree yilif Efrayim, te doomu Remalya ji yiliful lu moy Samari. Dungeen mana saxoo dëgër nag, ndare ngeen sax ci Aji Sax ji.”»
Isaiah 7:10 ¶ Aji Sax ji teg ca ne Axas:
Isaiah 7:11 «Ñaanal sa Yàlla Aji Sax ji firnde. Ñaan ko ko, ak fu mu mana bawoo, fa suufa suuf, mbaa fa kawa kaw.»
Isaiah 7:12 Axas ne: «Duma ko ñaan, ndax duma nattu Aji Sax ji.»
Isaiah 7:13 Esayi nag ne: «Yeen waa kër Daawuda, dégluleen! Tàyyiloo ngeen nit, di tàyyiloo sama Yàlla itam.
Isaiah 7:14 Kon nag Boroom bi ci boppam moo leen di jox firnde: janq bi mooy ëmb, jur doom ju góor, tudde ko Emanuwel (mu firi Yàllaa ngeek nun).
Isaiah 7:15 Soow ak lem lay lekk, ba keroog muy mana taamu lu baax, ba lu bon.
Isaiah 7:16 Bala xale bee ràññee lu baax ak lu bon, dees na gental réew mii nga ragal seen ñaari buur.
Isaiah 7:17 Aji Sax jee lay dikke, yaak saw xeet ak sa waa kër baay, ay bés yu tar yu masula am, ba Efrayim dëddoo Yuda ba tey, te buurub Asiri la koy sababe.»
Isaiah 7:18 Bésub keroog Aji Sax ji ootal weñ, ya fa catal wali ndoxi Misra, ak yamb ya fa réewum Asiri,
Isaiah 7:19 ñu dikk, bokk tagesi mbartali xunti yi, ba ci xar-xari doj yi, ak gajjoo gajj, ak déegoo déeg.
Isaiah 7:20 Bésub keroog saatu la Boroom biy wate, te saatu ba moo di buurub Asiri, mu àbbe ko ca wàllaa dex, wat la nel, wat say yeel, xuuf sab sikkim.
Isaiah 7:21 Bésub keroog nit du fa dundle lu dul wenn nag ak ñaari gàtt,
Isaiah 7:22 meew ne gàññ, ndax nit ñu néew, di dunde am soow, nde soow ak lem la képp ku des ci réew ma di dundeji.
Isaiah 7:23 Fu junniy reseñ taxaw tey, di jar junniy donji xaalisu lëmm, bésub keroog ay dég aki dagg nangu ko.
Isaiah 7:24 Xalaaku fitt lees fay deme, ndaxi dég aki dagg yu fees réew mi.
Isaiah 7:25 Mépp mbartal mu ñu daan gàbb, deesu fa demati, ndax ragali dég aki dagg, aw nag a cay fore, am xar curpee ca.
Isaiah 8:1 ¶ Gannaaw gi Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Jëlal àlluwa ju mag, ak xalima gu jàppandi, nga bind ci lii: “Maxer Salal Xas Bas”, (mu firi Sëxëtoo këfit foqet).»
Isaiah 8:2 Ma wut ci seede, won àlluwa ja ñaar ñu mat seede: ñuy Uri sarxalkat ba, ak Sàkkaryaa doomu Yeberekiya.
Isaiah 8:3 Ba loolu weesee ma jaxasoo ak sama soxna, yonent bu jigéen ba, mu ëmb, gannaaw gi mu am ca doom ju góor. Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Tudde ko “Maxer Salal Xas Bas.”
Isaiah 8:4 Bala xale bee man ne “Baay” mbaa “Yaay” déy, dees na yóbbul buurub Asiri alal ju ñu foqatee Damaas, ak lël ju ñu këfe Samari, nangu ko.»
Isaiah 8:5 Aji Sax ji dellu ne ma:
Isaiah 8:6 «Gannaaw askan wee teddadil ndoxum Silowe, mi ci wal mu teey mi, di bége Reccin ak doomu Remalya,
Isaiah 8:7 Boroom baa ngii di leen sottisi dexu Efraat gi ne xéew ak dooleem, te mooy buurub Asiri ak mboolem darajaam. Dex gi mooy génn xuram, fees fépp fu dig tàkkam,
Isaiah 8:8 wal-wali jàll Yuda, mbënn ma wal, taañaañal, yéeg ba tollu ko ci put, firiku niy laaf ba dajal sam réew, yaw Emanuwel.»
Isaiah 8:9 Yeen xeet yi, xaaculeen, dees na leen rajaxe. Yeen waa cati àddina, teewluleen! Gañoo gañu, ñu rajaxe leen! Ma ne: Gañoo gañu, ñu rajaxe leen!
Isaiah 8:10 Ngeen mébét, dara! Ngeen diisoo, diisoo, tus! Yàllaa ànd ak nun!
Isaiah 8:11 Aji Sax ji moo wax ak man, ba mu ma nee nikk, àrtu ma, ngir ma baña roy askan wii. Mu ne ma:
Isaiah 8:12 «Bul tudde wor, lenn lu askan wii tudde wor; lu ñu ragal it, bu ko ragal, bu ko tiit.
Isaiah 8:13 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi daal ngay sellal, moom ngay ragal, moom ngay tiit.
Isaiah 8:14 Mu doon seen bérab bu sell, di doj wuy fakktale, xeer wuy féle, ci ñaari këri Israyil, te dim yeer, dig fiir, ñeel ku dëkk Yerusalem.
Isaiah 8:15 Ñu baree cay tërëf, daanoo njaaxaanaay, damm, mbaa ñu sërëx, keppu.»
Isaiah 8:16 Dencal seede bii, jëlal lii ndigal, tay cib tayu, dénk ko samay dongo.
Isaiah 8:17 Maa ngi séentu Aji Sax ji, mu ngi won waa kër Yanqóoba gannaaw, waaye maa ngi koy yaakaar.
Isaiah 8:18 Man de, maa ngii, maak xale yi ma Aji Sax ji may, nu diy firnde fi Israyil te diy tegtal yu bàyyikoo fa Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, ki dëkke tundu Siyoŋ.
Isaiah 8:19 Am na ñu naan: «Laajleen ñiy gisaanee nit ñu dee, ak boroom rawaan yiy kebetook a ŋun-ŋuni. Aw xeet sañ nañoo gisaanee seeni tuur, tey diis ñi dee mbiri ñiy dund.»
Isaiah 8:20 Kon waxleen ne leen: «Ayca, ca ndigali yoon ya, ak seedey kàdduy waxyu ya. Kuy wax googu kàddu, ag leer fenkalu la.»
Isaiah 8:21 Nit ñi dinañu taxawaalu ci réew mi, boole njàqareek ub xiif, te bu ñu xiifee, ñéññ, téen, xool kaw, saaga seen buur, saaga Yàlla,
Isaiah 8:22 dellu xool fi suuf, yem ciw tiis, ak lëndëmu njàqare, sóoboo guddi gu fatt taraj.
Isaiah 8:23 Waaye lëndëm googu du sax ci réew mii jàq tey. Démb Aji Sax ji torxal na réewum Sabulon ak mu Neftali, waaye ëllëg mu teral waa foofa, dale ko diiwaanu tefesu géej, ba ca wàllaa dexu Yurdan, boole ca sax Galile ga ca doxandéem ya.
Isaiah 9:1 Askan wiy doxe lëndëm nii, ñooy gis leer gu mag. Ñooñu dëkke réewum ndee mu ne këruus, ñoom la leer di fenkal.
Isaiah 9:2 Aji Sax ji, yaay yokk xeet wi, fulal leen bànneex, ñuy bége fi sa kanam, mbégtem ngóob, mel ni ñuy bànneexoo fa ñuy séddoo alalu xare.
Isaiah 9:3 Yaa leen di sippil seen sëf, damm bant ba ñu leen gàlloon, ak yetu ña leen notoon, na nga leen defaloon rekk ca xareb Majan.
Isaiah 9:4 Mboolem dàll wu ab noon dukkate ba dikk, ak turki bu màndi deretu xare, sawara lees koy leel.
Isaiah 9:5 Nde gonee juddu, ñeel nu, di doom ju góor ju ñu nu may, mu yenu kilifteef gi, ñu di ko wooye Diglekat bu yéeme bi, ak Yàlla jàmbaar ji, ak Baay bi sax dàkk, ak Buuru jàmm bi.
Isaiah 9:6 Dooley kilifteefam ak jàmm ja du am kemu, fa jalub Daawuda ak nguuram, ga muy samp, saxale ko njekk ak yoon, tey jii, ba fàww. Lii la Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi def ci xéraangeem.
Isaiah 9:7 Boroom bee yónnee kàddu gu dal Israyil, askanu Yanqóoba,
Isaiah 9:8 xeet wépp jot ca, ba ca Efrayim ak waa Samari, ñay damook a sagu naan:
Isaiah 9:9 «Ay móol màbb, nu yett ponkali doj, tabaxaat, xànqi garab yu ndaw daanoo ca, nu wuutal ca garabi seedar yu mag.»
Isaiah 9:10 Aji Sax ji yékkati nooni Buur Reccin, fi seen kaw, gemb seeni bañ,
Isaiah 9:11 Siri songe penku; Filisteen ña, sowu, ñu sëxëtoo Israyil, wonn. Teewul Aji Sax ji xàcci loxoom, meddiwul ba tey.
Isaiah 9:12 Waaye xeet wi delluwuñu ca ka leen duma, sàkkuwuñu Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi.
Isaiah 9:13 Moo tax Aji Sax ji doge Israyil bopp ak geen, boole tiir ak barax fóom ci benn bés.
Isaiah 9:14 Mag meek kàngam li ñooy bopp bi, yonent bi mokkal naaféq dib geen.
Isaiah 9:15 Ñi jiite askan wii ñoo leen di sànk, ña ñuy jiite loru.
Isaiah 9:16 Moo tax Boroom bi du bége seeni xale yu góor, du yërëm seeni jirim ak seeni jëtun. Ñoom ñépp a gëmadi, di def lu bon, ku ci nekk di wax lu amul bopp. Teewul Aji Sax ji xàcci loxoom, meddiwul ba tey.
Isaiah 9:17 Mbon a ngi tàkk moos ni sawara, xoyom dég aki dagg, jafal gajji gott bi, mu ne jippét, saxar, naaw.
Isaiah 9:18 Merum Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi taal na réew mi, xoyom waa réew mi, kenn yërëmul sa mbokk.
Isaiah 9:19 Nit ñaa ngi màtte ndijoor, te doyaluñu, di xàmpe càmmoñ te suuruñu, ku nekk di yàpp sa mbokk:
Isaiah 9:20 Manase song Efrayim, Efrayim song Manase, ñu mànkoo, noonoo Yuda. Teewul Aji Sax ji xàcci loxoom, meddiwul ba tey.
Isaiah 10:1 Wóoy ngalla boroom dogal yiy dogal njubadi, bind ko, te muy jur coono,
Isaiah 10:2 di ko àttee ñàkkal ku ñàkk, di xañ àq sama néew-ji-dooley ñoñ, bay lekk ab jëtun, di sëxëtoo ab jirim.
Isaiah 10:3 Ana nu ngeen di def keroog bésub mbugal ba, keroog ba safaan di bawoo fu sore? Ana ku ngeen di daw wuti wallam? Ana fu ngeen di denci seen teraanga?
Isaiah 10:4 Xanaa ànd ak ña ñu jàpp, ne yogg; mbaa tëddandook ña ñu bóom, ne lareet. Teewul Aji Sax ji xàcci loxoom, meddiwul ba tey.
Isaiah 10:5 Wóoy ngalla Asiri miy sama yetu mer, bolde bi ñu ŋàbb di samam sànj,
Isaiah 10:6 ma xabtal ko fi kaw xeet wu gëmadi, yebal ko ca askan woowu ma merloo, ngir ñu sëxëtoo leen, nangu seen alal, note leen ni banu mbedd.
Isaiah 10:7 Waaye Asiri gisewu ko noonu, xalaatewul noonu; bóome la xintewoo, ba fàkkas xeeti xeet.
Isaiah 10:8 Mu ngi naan: «Xanaa du sama jawriñ yépp a diy buur?
Isaiah 10:9 Kalne daa gën Karkemis gee ma nangu? Am Amat daa gën Arpàdd? Am Samari daa gën Damaas?
Isaiah 10:10 Maa duma réew yu seeni yàllantu, seeni tuur sut tuuri Yerusalem ak Samari.
Isaiah 10:11 Na ma tege loxo Samari aki yàllantoom, duma ni tege loxo Yerusalem aki tuuram?»
Isaiah 10:12 Boroom bi nee: «Bu ma sottalee liggéey fa kaw tundu Siyoŋ ak fa Yerusalem, maay mbugale buurub Asiri réy-réyloom gi, ak gëti xeebaateem.»
Isaiah 10:13 Moom moo ne: «Sama dooley përëg laa defe lii, maa xelu, ràññee; ba randal kemi suufi xeet yi, foqati seeni alal, dañ boroom jal ya niw yëkk, wàcce leen.
Isaiah 10:14 Maa teg alali xeet yi loxo, ni ku gis am tàgg. Maa tonneendoo réewi àddina ni ku for ay nen, tonni lépp, laaf tëf-tëfluwul, sàll newul ciib!»
Isaiah 10:15 Sémmiñ dina diir mbagg ka koy gore? Am dogukaay dina réy-réylu ba sut ka koy doge? Mbete yet wuy xàcci ka ko ŋàbb; mbaa bolde bu walbatiku ŋàbb boroom!
Isaiah 10:16 Moo tax Boroom bi, Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoori xare yi, di yebal woppi ràgg fi kaw mbuxreem yi, seen daraja tàkk, sawara xoyom ko.
Isaiah 10:17 Aji Sax ji, leeru Israyil mooy doon sawara, ku Sellam kooku mooy doon tàkk-tàkku sawara, xoyom taxasi Asiri aki dégam ci benn bés.
Isaiah 10:18 Gott bu naat ak tool bu meññ, mu ne faraas fóom, ba mu mel ni ku wopp, yaram way seey,
Isaiah 10:19 gott ba dese garab yu néew yu gone mana lim, bind ko.
Isaiah 10:20 Keroog bés booba li des fi Israyil ak li rëcce kër Yanqóoba duñu wéerooti ña leen duma. Aji Sax ji lañuy wóolu, wéeroo ko, Aji Sell ju Israyil.
Isaiah 10:21 Aw ndes ay délsi, di ndesu askanu Yanqóoba, ñeel Yàlla Jàmbaar ji.
Isaiah 10:22 Seen xeet wi ni feppi suufas géej lay tollu, te as ndes a ciy délsi. Àtteb sànkute mooy taxaw, yoon toppe ba mat sëkk.
Isaiah 10:23 Sànkute déy mooy taxaw, Boroom bi, Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi di ko sottal fi réew mi mépp.
Isaiah 10:24 Moo tax Boroom bi, Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: «Yeen sama ñoñ ñi dëkke Siyoŋ, buleen ragal waa Asiri yi leen di dóor yet, ŋàbbal leen bolde ni waa Misra daa def ak yeen.
Isaiah 10:25 Waaye fi leek lu néewa néew mbugal jeex fi seen biir, am sànj sippil Asiri seen sànkute.»
Isaiah 10:26 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yee leen di ŋàbbal kàccri, na mu defoon waa Majan fa doju Oreb. Mooy xàcciw yetam, mu dal géej, na mu defoon fa Misra.
Isaiah 10:27 Bésub keroog sëf bu ñu leen sëfoon wàcc leen, ngeen tàggook yet wu ñu leen tënke woon, nde seen yaram ay naat, ba yet wa damm.
Isaiah 10:28 Noon yeey songsi Ayat, jéggi Migron, dem ba Migmas, teg fa seeni jumtukaay,
Isaiah 10:29 jaare ca xunti ma te naan: «Geba lanuy fanaani!» Waa Raama tiit, waa Gibeya gu Sóol daw.
Isaiah 10:30 Yeen waa Galim, yuuxuleen, yeen waa Laysa, dégluleen, yeen waa Anatot, feeluleen.
Isaiah 10:31 Waa Madmena ñooy fëlxoo, waa Gebim wuti rawtu.
Isaiah 10:32 Tey jii noon yaa ngay taxaw fa Noob, di sànni loxo waa tundu Siyoŋ, di ko tëkkoo waa Yerusalem googu.
Isaiah 10:33 Boroom baa ngoog, Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, mu ngi gor garab yi, di rajaxe car yi, njobbaxtal ya gëna kawe dog, la ca gënoona siggi, wàcc.
Isaiah 10:34 Mooy jël sémmiñ, goraale gajji gott bi, Libaŋ loroo loxol boroom doole, ba jóoru.
Isaiah 11:1 Aw njebbit mooy saxe fa ëkkub Yese, ab car soqeekoo fa reen ya,
Isaiah 11:2 xelum Aji Sax ji tegu fi kawam, xelum rafet xalaat ak ràññee, xelum digle ak njàmbaar, xelum xam Aji Sax ji, ragal ko.
Isaiah 11:3 Ragal Aji Sax ji lay safoo, du lu ko bëtam may rekk lay àttee, du lu ko noppam may rekk lay dogale,
Isaiah 11:4 xanaa di àtte ku ñàkk ci njekk, di dogalal njub, néew-ji-dooley àddina. Mooy dóore àddina, bantub kàddoom, mooy reye ñu bon ñi, ngelawal gémmiñam.
Isaiah 11:5 Njekk lay gañoo, takkoo kóllëre.
Isaiah 11:6 Till ay bokk ak mbote ab dal, segg bokk akub tef ab tëraay, wëllu ànd ak gaynde gu mat, ak juru yar, tuut-tànk jiite leen.
Isaiah 11:7 Nag ak rab wu aay di forandoo, seeni doom goorandoo, gaynde di lekk um ngooñ niw yëkk,
Isaiah 11:8 luy nàmp di foye paxum ndox-suuf, perantal di laal tostanum ñàngóor.
Isaiah 11:9 Deesatul gaañe mbaa di lore, fi mboolem sama kaw tund wu sell wi, ndax ni ndox di feese ba muur géej, ni la àddina di feese nit ñu xam Aji Sax ji.
Isaiah 11:10 Bésub keroog car bawoo ca Yese, reen ba, taxaw di raaya buy gindi xeet yi, xeet yi di ko sàkku, dal-lukaayam ba jagoo teddnga.
Isaiah 11:11 Bésub keroog Boroom bi jooti loxoom ñaareel bi yoon, ngir jotaat ndesu ñoñam, wa des Asiri ak Misra, ak Pattros ak réewum Kuus, ak Elam ak Sineyaar, ak Amat ak biir duni géej ya.
Isaiah 11:12 Mooy yékkatil xeet yi raaya, dajale góor ña ñu dàqe Israyil, ak jigéen ña ñu jële Yuda, tasaare leen, ñu jóge ñeenti weti àddina, booloo.
Isaiah 11:13 Fiiraangey Efrayim day jeex, njéefoy Yuda dakk, Efrayim dootu fiire Yuda, Yuda dootu jéppi Efrayim.
Isaiah 11:14 Xanaa ñu ne coww ba sowu, ne jàyy cëppandoo fa kaw waggi Filisteen ña, waa penku, ñu sëxëtoondoo; Edom ak Mowab, ñu teg loxo; Amoneen ña nangul leen.
Isaiah 11:15 Aji Sax jeey wowal walum ndox, ma séle géeji Misra. Mooy tàllal loxoom, tiimale dexu Efraat, wal kook doole, dóor ko, mu séddlikoo juróom yaari wal, mu jaarale ca nit ñu caraxu,
Isaiah 11:16 def kow yoon, ñeel ndesu ñoñam, ña dese fa Asiri, mu mel ni yoon wa ñeeloon Israyil, bésub keroog ba ñuy génn réewum Misra.
Isaiah 12:1 Bésub keroog dees na ne: «Aji Sax ji, sant naa la; yaa ma mere woon, meddi, dëfal ma.»
Isaiah 12:2 Ma ne: «Yàllaa may wallu, ma dal-lu, duma tiit. Sama dooleek sama kaaraange mooy Ki sax, di Aji Sax ji, te mooy sama wall.»
Isaiah 12:3 Mbégte ngeen di rooteji fa wali mucc ya.
Isaiah 12:4 Bésub keroog ngeen ne: «Santleen Aji Sax ji, tudd turam, xamley jalooreem ci biir xeet yi, fàttli màggaayu turam.
Isaiah 12:5 Woyleen Aji Sax ji, moo kawey jëf! Na lii siiw biir àddina sépp.
Isaiah 12:6 Yeen waa Siyoŋ, serleen te sarxolleel ku màgg ki fi seen biir, Aji Sell ju Israyil.»
Isaiah 13:1 Yéeneb bii ñeel na Babilon, muy peeñum Esayi doomu Amocc.
Isaiah 13:2 Yéegeleen ab raaya kaw tund wu ne duŋŋ, joorleen ñii, tàllal-leen loxo, ñu jàlle bunti kàngam yi.
Isaiah 13:3 Maa jox ndigal ñi ma beral sama bopp, maa woo sama jàmbaar ñiy réy-réylu, ne leen ñu sottal mbugal mi samam sànj laaj.
Isaiah 13:4 Coowal mbooloo ngoog ca tund ya, mel ni ñu baree bare! Riirum nguuri nguur yu daje, di xeeti xeet! Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi mooy dajale gàngooru xare.
Isaiah 13:5 Mooy bawoo fu sore, fa asamaan digalook suuf. Aji Sax ji laak gàngoor gi muy mbugale, ngir yàqtesi réew mi mépp.
Isaiah 13:6 Yuuxuleen! Bésub Aji Sax ji moo dëgmal, te ni sànkute gu bawoo fa ci Aji Man ji lay dikke.
Isaiah 13:7 Moo tax yoxoo yoxo yoqi, xoloo xol jeex,
Isaiah 13:8 ñu tiita tiit, yaram di fuddook a metti, ñuy baddaañu ni kuy matu; ku ne jàq, di xulli sa moroom, kanam ya sël-sëleendoo.
Isaiah 13:9 Bésub Aji Sax jaa ngii di ñëw, bés bu néeg, bésub mer ak sànj muy tàkk, nara gental suuf, te bàkkaarkat ya la fay fàkkas.
Isaiah 13:10 Biddiiw mbaa dëllooñ dootu leeral; jant ay fenke lëndëm, weer dakkal leeram.
Isaiah 13:11 Maay delloo àddina mbonam, yool ku bon tooñam, maay sàggi sagub ku reew, detteel puukarey ku néeg.
Isaiah 13:12 Maay def nit gëna jafee gis wurus, ba doom aadama raw wurusu Ofir.
Isaiah 13:13 Moo tax maay gësëm asamaan, suuf yëngoo fa mu tege ndax sànjum Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoori xare yi, keroog ba meram di tàkk.
Isaiah 13:14 Ku nekk ay fekkiy bokkam, rawi cam réewam, mbete kéwél gu ñuy rëbb, mbaa xar mu amul sàmm.
Isaiah 13:15 Ku ñu ci gis, jam la, ku ñu jàpp, saamar rey la;
Isaiah 13:16 seeni doom, ñu moxoñe fi seen kanam, seeni kër, ñu sëxëtoo, seeni jabar, ñu tëdde.
Isaiah 13:17 Maa ngii di xabtal fi seen kaw waa Medd, ñi xintewoowul xaalis, faalewuñu wurus.
Isaiah 13:18 Seeni fitt lañuy rajaxee xalelu góor, duñu ñeewante gone, duñu xool tuut-tànk gëti yërmande.
Isaiah 13:19 Babilon nag, mooy gànjaru réew yi ko wër, di teraanga ji Kaldeen ñiy sagoo, waaye Yàllaa koy tas, mu ne tasar ni Sodom ak Gomor.
Isaiah 13:20 Deesatu fa dëkk, xanaa gental ba fàww. Màngaan dootu fa samp xayma, sàmm dootu fa gooral.
Isaiah 13:21 Ay rabi àll a fay goore, kër ya fees aki looy, bànjóoli dëkke fa, kéwél di fa curpee.
Isaiah 13:22 Bukki mooy sabe fa tata ya, till nangu kër yu bakkane ya. Àppu Babilon jege na, ay fanam du fi wees.
Isaiah 14:1 ¶ Aji Sax ji kay mooy yërëm askanu Yanqóoba, dellu taamu xeetu Israyil wii. Moo leen di sancaatal fa seen suuf, doxandéem yi fekki leen; boole seen bopp ci askanu Yanqóoba.
Isaiah 14:2 Yeneen xeet yeey delloo bànni Israyil ba seen réew, mooma Aji Sax ji séddoo, bànni Israyil jàpp ca ñoom njaam, góor ak jigéen, ba teg loxo ña leen tegoon loxo, moom ña leen moomoon.
Isaiah 14:3 Bés bu leen Aji Sax ji teggilee seeni coonook seeni fitna, ba ngeen tàggook njaam gu metti, gi ñu leen doon jaamloo,
Isaiah 14:4 su boobaa nangeen woyal buuru Babilon léeb wii, ne ko: «Moo nu ki daan note mujje? Nu mu mujjeek reewandeem?
Isaiah 14:5 Aji Sax jee damm bant, bi ñu bon ñi daan dóoree! Moo damm seen yetu nguur,
Isaiah 14:6 wi ñu daan xadaruy dóor askan yi, dóor yu dakkul, di joggatee xeet yi xol bu tàng, topp leen, tëë ba.
Isaiah 14:7 Àddina yépp a féex, am jàmm, sarxolle jolleendoo.
Isaiah 14:8 Garab yi dul ruus, ak seedari Libaŋ sax di bége sab jéll, naan: “Ba nga daanoo ba tey, ab gorkat jógalu nu.”
Isaiah 14:9 Njaniiw ga fa suufa suuf yàkkamti na la, di la waaja gatandu, ba yeel la ndem-si-yàlla yi doon njiiti àddina yépp. Moo yékkatee buuri xeet yépp seeni jal,
Isaiah 14:10 ñoom ñépp àddu, ne la: “Yaw it mujj nga néew doole ni nun a? yaak nun de a mujj yem kepp!”
Isaiah 14:11 Sa puukare gee tàbbisi nii njaniiw, yaak sa buumi xalam? Ay duusu di sa laltan, ay sax di sa càngaay!
Isaiah 14:12 Moo yaw biddiiwu njël, bi noon ràññ, tey nga xàwwikoo asamaan ba fii! Yaw mi daa daan xeet yi, tey ñu gor la, nga goor.
Isaiah 14:13 Xanaa du yaa doon wax ci sam xel, naa: “Maay yéeg kaw asamaan, maay aj sama jal kaw biddiiwi Yàlla, maay toogi kaw tundu ndaje ma, fa catal bëj-gànnaar.
Isaiah 14:14 Maay yéeg fa kaw niir ya, ba mel ni Yàlla Aji Kawe ji!”
Isaiah 14:15 Teewul nga tàbbi njaniiw, àkki ba ca xóotey pax ma.
Isaiah 14:16 Ku la gis ne la jàkk, xel ma ne ci yaw, mu naa: “Xanaa du kii a doon loxloo àddina, yëngal réewi réew,
Isaiah 14:17 def àddina wërngal këpp ndànd-foyfoy, tas dëkk ya, te du jàpp nit ba yiwi ko?”
Isaiah 14:18 Buuri àddina yépp, ba ñu daj, ñépp a tëdd tëraayu teraanga, ku ci nekk ak bàmmeelam.
Isaiah 14:19 Yaw, ñu xañ la bàmmeel, sànni la, nga mel ni car bu ñu foñ. Yaa ngi ne lareet ci biir néew yu saamar bóom, ñu tàbbal leen ci xeeri biir kàmb. Yaa ngi mel ni médd mu ñuy joggati.
Isaiah 14:20 Deesu la robaaleek yooyu buur, yaa yàq sam réew, faagaagal saw xeet. «Deesul tuddati mukk askanu lorkat wii.
Isaiah 14:21 Waajal-leen fi ñuy rendi doom yi, feye leen seen ñaawtéefi baay, bala ñoo jógati, teg àddina loxo, ba tabax fu ne ay dëkk.»
Isaiah 14:22 «Maa leen di jógal.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee, Boroom gàngoor yi. Mu ne: «Maay tenqi turu Babilon, tenqim ndesam ba ca seeni doom ak seen askan.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Isaiah 14:23 Mu ne: «Maa koy def kërug siññéel, def ko ab tan, ba buube ko buubub rajaxe.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee, Boroom gàngoor yi.
Isaiah 14:24 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yee giñ ne: «Lu ma nar déy mooy am, lii ma mébét, mooy sotti.
Isaiah 14:25 Maay joggati Asiri fi samam réew, dëggaate leen fi sama kaw tund yi, ba sama ràngi ñoñ rengiku, seenub sëf sippiku.»
Isaiah 14:26 Mii mébét lañu mébétal àddina sépp, bii loxo lañu xàccil xeet yépp.
Isaiah 14:27 Bu Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoori xare yi dogalee déy, ana ku koy dogale? Bu xàccee loxoom, ana ku koy fommal?
Isaiah 14:28 At ma Buur Axas saayee, bii yéene jib na:
Isaiah 14:29 Filistee, seen yetu gannaaw wi damm, bu ko kenn ci yeen bége, nde ci ëkku jaan ji, la ñàngóor di génne, am tostanam mujj di céebi.
Isaiah 14:30 Su boobaa ñi gëna walaakaana am lu ñu for, néew-doole ya goor, ànd ak dal. Waaye yeen, maa leen di xiifal, ngeen dee ba raaf, xiif ba fàkkas ñi ngeen dese.
Isaiah 14:31 Yeen magi pénc mi, ñaawluleen! Yeen waa dëkk bee, yuuxuleen! Na Filisti gépp ne yàcc! Bëj-gànnaar déy la saxar jollee, kenn du wuute gàngooru noon ya.
Isaiah 14:32 Lees di tontu xeet wi yónnee di laaj, xanaa ne leen Aji Sax jee sanc Siyoŋ, te fa la baadooloy ñoñam di rawe.
Isaiah 15:1 Yéene bii ñeel na Mowab: Genn guddi déy la Ar Mowab, dëkk ba tas, ne mes! Genn guddi déy la Kir Mowab tas, ne mes!
Isaiah 15:2 Nit ñaa ngi yéeg jëm kërug jaamookaay ga ca Dibon, ngir jooyi ca bérabi jaamookaay ya, Mowab a ngay yuuxoo kaw tundu Nebo ak Medeba, boppoo bopp dib nel, sikkimoo sikkim xuufu,
Isaiah 15:3 nit ña sol saaku, di ñaawlu fa mbedd ya, ak kaw taax yaak pénc ya, ku ne di jooy ba say rongooñ wale.
Isaiah 15:4 Waa Esbon ak Elalee ngi yuuxu, seen baat àkki ba Yaxacc, xarekati Mowab dégg ca, yuuxoo, ne yàcc ne yasar!
Isaiah 15:5 Maay jooy Mowab jooyi xol, nit ñaa nga fay dawe ba Sowar, àkki ba Eglat Selisiya. Ña ngay yéeg jëm Luwit, di jooyoo, awe yoonu Oronayim, di jalu.
Isaiah 15:6 Dexu Nimrim wow na, ñax wow, gàncax lax, dara naatatul.
Isaiah 15:7 Jël nañu lu ñu deseek lu ñu dencoon, yóbbu, jàll ca wàllaa xuru Garab ya.
Isaiah 15:8 Yuux déy maase na réewum Mowab, jooyoo ya ba Eglayim, jooyoo ya ba Beer Elim.
Isaiah 15:9 Dexu Dimon déy fees na ak deret, te ma nara wàcceel Dimon lu ko raw, ba ku rëcce Mowab, ak ku des ci réew mi, ma booleek gaynde!
Isaiah 16:1 Waa Mowab a nga naa: «Yónneeleen boroom réew mi yóbbalu kuuy yu ndaw, jële ko Sela, jaare màndiŋ ma, yóti ko buurub Yuda fa tundu Siyoŋ mu taaru.»
Isaiah 16:2 Jigéeni Mowab a nga ca jéggikaayu dexu Arnon, mel ni picc yu tasaaroo fa seeni tàgg, di fët-fëtluy, naaw.
Isaiah 16:3 Ña nga naa njiiti Yuda: «Xelal-leen nu, àtte nu, lalal nu bëccëg ndarakàmm ker gu mel ni guddi, yiire ko daw-làqu, yi nu doon; buleen nu wor te nuy wuta raw!
Isaiah 16:4 Mayleen nu nun ñi rëcce Mowab, nu dal ak yeen, te ngeen làq nu bóomkat.» Kiy note déy day jeexal, sëxëtoo dakk, kiy lore ci réew mi jóge fi,
Isaiah 16:5 ab jal sampe fi ci ngor, ki ci tooge jikko ju dëggu di askanu Daawuda te di njiit luy sàkku yoon, yàkkamti njekk.
Isaiah 16:6 Noo dégg ni Mowab réye, réya réy, reew te bew, seeni kañu di waxi neen.
Isaiah 16:7 Moo tax Mowab di jooy ba ñéppi Mowab jooyoo, ndax namm reseñ ja woon ca Kir Eres, ba ne yàcc, di binni.
Isaiah 16:8 Tool ya fa Esbon day wow, njiiti xeet yee dëggaate ngëneelu reseñ gu Sibma, te cabb ya laloon ba Yaser, ba àkki déndu màndiŋ ma, car ya law ba wàllaa géej.
Isaiah 16:9 Jooyi waa Yaser laay jooy reseñ ga fa Sibma, yeen waa Esbon ak Elale, ma sange leeni rongooñ, nde fa ngeen di dajaleek fa ngeen di góobe, coowal mbégtee fay dakke.
Isaiah 16:10 Mbégteek bànneex ay toxoo seeni tool, ay woy aki sarxolle noppee jibe seeni tóokër, te nalkatu reseñ naltil fa mbànd ya! Aji Sax jee dakkal coow li.
Isaiah 16:11 Maa ngi yërëm Mowab, bay binni ni buumu riiti, sama yaram daw ci Kir Eres.
Isaiah 16:12 Mowab a ngoog ak coonoom, ba muy deme fa bérab yu kawe ya, dugg jaamookaayam di ñaan te du am.
Isaiah 16:13 Lii la Aji Sax ji waxoon bu yàgg ci mbirum Mowab,
Isaiah 16:14 tey Aji Sax ji wax ne: «Fileek ñetti at yu surga bu ñu bind waññ, dees na sàggi sagub Mowab, te li ñuy bare tey lépp, seenum ndes ay néew lool te tekkeedi.»
Isaiah 17:1 Yéene bii ñeel na Damaas: Damaas a ngii, léegi mu noppee doon ab dëkk, xanaa ab jalu tojit;
Isaiah 17:2 dëkki Arower gental, gàtt yi jagoo, goore fa, kenn du leen dàq.
Isaiah 17:3 Tata dina tukkee diiwaanu Efrayim, nguur foqe dëkk ba ñuy wooye Damaas, te ndesu Siri du ëpp bànni Israyil daraja. Kàddug Aji Sax jee, Boroom gàngoori xare yi.
Isaiah 17:4 Bésub keroog sagub Yanqóoba sàggiku, yaram wa réer ko, mu jeex tàkk.
Isaiah 17:5 Day mel nim ngóob mu loxol góobkat bay dal, di dajale gub ya. Day mel ni ngóob ma ca xuru Refayeen,
Isaiah 17:6 fa dara dul des lu moy am poraat; mu mel ni wittum oliw, bu noppee ñaari doom ak ñett ay des ca kaw, mbaa ñeent ba juróom ci car yi meññ. Kàddug Aji Sax jee, Yàllay Israyil.
Isaiah 17:7 Bésub keroog nit sàkku Ki ko sàkk, ba ne jàkk Aji Sell ju Israyil.
Isaiah 17:8 Dootu sàkkooti lenn ci sarxalukaay yi mu sàkkal boppam. Dootu sàkkooti yooyu mu defare loxoom, du xer yi ñuy jaamoo Asera, du yeneen sarxalukaayi cuuraay.
Isaiah 17:9 Bésub keroog seen dëkk yi tata wër, dees na leen won gannaaw ni dëkki Eween ñaak Amoreen ña, ba leen bànni Israyil dàqee, lépp ay doon ab gent.
Isaiah 17:10 Yeena fàtte Yàlla ji leen di musal, bawuleen xel seen cëslaay jiy seen rawtu, xanaa di jëmbatal seeni tuur ay tooli ngëneel, di ji jiwu mu bawoo feneen.
Isaiah 17:11 Bés ba ngeen ko jëmbatee, ngeen gis mu sax, ëllëg ba bët setee, mu tóor, te ngóob réer bésub wopp, ci biir mitit wu amul paj.
Isaiah 17:12 Ndeysaan, mii riirum gàngoor yu mag! Xeet yu bareey riir ni riirum géej, ànd ŋarandoo ni géej gu sàmbaraax, gannax ya ŋarandoo.
Isaiah 17:13 Xeet yaa ngi ŋarandoo ni ndox mu baawaan, Yàlla gëdd leen, ñu daw ba sore; ngelaw yëngu, ñu naaw, ni boob, ba ca kaw tund ya, mbete pënd bu ngëlén wal, mu def callweer.
Isaiah 17:14 Ngoon a ngay jot, tiitaange ne jaas, balaa bët a set lépp jeex. Lii mooy añub ñuy sëxëtoo, lii mooy deminu ñiy nangu sunu alal.
Isaiah 18:1 Wóoy ngalla réew ma gunóor yay riire, ca tàkkal dexi réewum Kuus.
Isaiah 18:2 Yeen ñiy yónni biir géej, ay ndaw, ci gaali barax yu war mbeex mi; yeen ndaw yu gaaw yi, demleen, fekki xeet wu siggi, rattax yaram, askan wu ñu ragale fu jegeek fu sore, xeet wu am doole, di falaxee, te seenum réew defi wal.
Isaiah 18:3 Yeen waa àddina wërngal këpp, yeen ñi dëkke suuf si, séentuleen raaya ba sampe fa tund ya, dégluleen liit ga ñuy wali.
Isaiah 18:4 Aji Sax ji kat da maa wax ne: «Maa ngi fi ma tollu di xool, ne tekk, ni tàngooru jant bu ne ràññ, mbaa lay bu defu niir ci tàngooru ngóob.»
Isaiah 18:5 Bala ngóob di jot, te fekk lépp tóor, ba tóor-tóor def reseñ ju xaay, mu jël ab sàrt, dog car yu ndaw yi, tenqi car yu mag ya, sànni;
Isaiah 18:6 ñu boole waccal njanaawi tund ya ak rabi àll yi, tan yi nawetoo ko, rabi àll yépp nooroo ko.
Isaiah 18:7 Su boobaa ñu indil Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, galag bu bawoo ci xeet wu siggi, rattax yaram, askan wu ñu ragale fu jegeek fu sore, xeet wu am doole, di falaxee, te seenum réew defi wal, galag ba agsi ba tundu Siyoŋ, fa Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoori xare yi dëël turam.
Isaiah 19:1 Yéene bii ñeel na Misra: Aji Sax jaa ngii war niir wu gaaw, jëm réewum Misra. Yàllantuy Misra yég ko, di lox, fitu waa Misra rëcc.
Isaiah 19:2 Maay xiir Misra ci kaw Misra, kii song mbokkam, kii song xaritam, ab dëkk jógal ab dëkk, diiwaan jógal diiwaan.
Isaiah 19:3 Waa Misra jànnaxe, ma dëpp seen pexe. Ñu seeti yàllantu yeek njuuma yi, ak gisaanekat yeek boroom rawaan yi.
Isaiah 19:4 Maay teg Misra ci loxol sang bu néeg, buur bu dëgër xol jiite ko. Kàddug Boroom bee, Aji Sax ji ci gàngoor yi.
Isaiah 19:5 Ndoxum Niil ma day fer; dex gaay ŋiis, wow koŋŋ,
Isaiah 19:6 solom ya xasaw, wali Misra diib ba far ŋiis, barax ak lu mu xeetool lax,
Isaiah 19:7 gàncax ga leru dexu Niil ak ga saxe fa dex ga dabe géej, ak lu ñu jiwoon ca wet ga, lépp ay wow, naaw, ba jeex.
Isaiah 19:8 Nappkat di jàmbat, kuy sànnib oos dexu Niil di jooy, kuy mbaal waaru,
Isaiah 19:9 kuy liggéey lẽe am mbetteel, kuy jàrt ak a ràbb poqe jommi.
Isaiah 19:10 Ñi yor réew mi dañuy sëngéem, kuy liggéey di feyu am naqaru xol.
Isaiah 19:11 Kàngam ya fa Cowan dañuy teqlikook seen sago, diglekati Firawna yu xelu ya di digle ag ndof. Ma ne: «Yeen diglekat yi, nu ngeen mana waxe Firawna naan: “Nun ay boroom xel lanu, sosoo ca buur ya woon”?»
Isaiah 19:12 Firawnaa, ana say boroom xel? Nañ la waxal boog, ba xamle li Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi naral Misra.
Isaiah 19:13 Kàngami Cowan a ngi def yëfi dof, kàngam ya fa Memfis, ñu nax leen, te njiiti giiri Misra lajjal seen waa réew.
Isaiah 19:14 Aji Sax jee miirloo Misra, gëlëmal ko ci lépp lu muy def, ni màndikat buy jang ba tarxiis cim waccoom.
Isaiah 19:15 Du lenn lu kenn manatee defal Misra, bopp akub geen du ci am pexe, te bantub tiir ak barax a ci yem.
Isaiah 19:16 Su bés baa waa Misra mel niy jigéen, di lox ndax tiit loxo bi jóg, te Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi xàccil-leen ko.
Isaiah 19:17 Yuday doon tiitaangey waa Misra, ba ku ñu ci tudd Yuda, nga tiit, ngir la leen Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi naral.
Isaiah 19:18 Su keroogee mu am juróomi dëkki réewum Misra yu nit ñay waxe làmmiñu ebrë, di fa giñe Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, benn dëkk ba lañuy wooye Ir Ayeres, dëkkub yàqute.
Isaiah 19:19 Bésub keroog ab sarxalukaay ñeel Aji Sax ji, fa digg réewum Misra, aw xer it ñeel Aji Sax ji fa kemu réew ma,
Isaiah 19:20 loolu di firnde, ñeel Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, di lu ko seedeel fa biir réewum Misra. Bu ñu leen sonalee ba ñu woo Aji Sax ji, mu yónnee leen ku leen wallu, taxawu leen ba xettli leen.
Isaiah 19:21 Bésub keroog Aji Sax ji ci boppam mooy xamal Misra mooy kan, ba waa Misra xam Aji Sax ji, di jaamoo Aji Sax ji saraxi gàtt ak saraxi pepp, digook moom tey wàccook seeni dige.
Isaiah 19:22 Aji Sax jeey duma Misra duma yu ànd akum paj, ñu walbatiku ci Aji Sax ji, mu nangul leen, faj leen.
Isaiah 19:23 Su keroogee mbedd bawoo Misra ba Asiri, waa Asiri di dikk ba Misra, waa Misra di dem ba Asiri te Misra di jaamoondook Asiri.
Isaiah 19:24 Bésub keroog Israyil ñetteel Misraak Asiri, di barke fi digg àddina.
Isaiah 19:25 Aji Sax ji barkeel leen, ne: «Barke ñeel na Misra, sama ñoñ, ak Asiri mi ma sàkke samay loxo, ak Israyil sama séddoo.»
Isaiah 20:1 ¶ At ma bummib Asiri demee ca ndigalal Sargon buurub Asiri, ba songi dëkk ba ñuy wax Asdodd ca Filisti, ba mujj ko nangu,
Isaiah 20:2 fekk na Aji Sax ji wax, Esayi doomu Amocc jottli. Mu ne ko: «Demal summi tubéyu saaku ji nga sol, te summi say dàll.» Mu def noona, di doxe yaramu neen, tànki neen.
Isaiah 20:3 Gannaaw gi Aji Sax ji ne: «Esayi sama jaam bi def na yaramu neen, tànki neen lu mat ñetti at, muy firnde, di tegtal ci mbirum Misra ak réewum Kuus.
Isaiah 20:4 Te noonu la buurub Asiri di yóbboo ngàllo Misra, toxal waa Kuus, ñuy ay ndaw aki màggat. Yaramu neen, tànki neen lañuy def, seen taat ne fàŋŋ, muy gàcceg Misra.
Isaiah 20:5 Dañuy boole njàqareek gàcce ndax réewum Kuus mi ñu yaakaaroon, ak Misra gi ñu doon sagoo.»
Isaiah 20:6 Bu keroogee ku dëkke tefes googu dina ne: «Xanaa kay du ñii lanu yaakaaroon! Te nu dawoon di wuti ndimbal ci ñoom, ngir rëcc buurub Asiri! Léegi nag nu nuy mucce?»
Isaiah 21:1 Yéene bii moo wàccal màndiŋ ma feggook géej ga: Ni ag ngëlén di riddee jaare Negew ni la noon di bawoo màndiŋ ma, jóge réew mu raglu.
Isaiah 21:2 Peeñu mu ñàng lañu ma ci wax. Workat biy wor, yàqkat biy yàq. Yeen waa Elam, songleen; yeen waa Medd, gawleen leen. Dakkal naa mboolem onk yu ñu sabab.
Isaiah 21:3 Lii a waral sama njàqareg xol, mitit jàpp ma, mel ni mititu mat, ma jaaxle ba déggatuma, jàq ba gisatuma.
Isaiah 21:4 Bopp ubu, tiitaange jàpp ma; sama ngoonug bànneex soppiku guddi gu raglu.
Isaiah 21:5 Ndab taaje, laltan lale, ñuy lekk ak a naan. Ñu jekki ne: «Yeen kilifa yi, jógleen! Diwleen pakk yi!»
Isaiah 21:6 Boroom bi kat da maa wax, ne ma: «Doxal taxawal ab jongrukat, lu mu gis, wax ko.
Isaiah 21:7 Bu gisee gawar ci watiiru ñaari fas, ak ñu wari mbaam ak ñu wari giléem, na teewloo teewlu bu baax.»
Isaiah 21:8 Jongrukat ba àddu ca kaw ne: «Sang bi, maa ngii yendoo séentu, fanaane wattu fii ma taxaw.
Isaiah 21:9 Ma ne gawar a ngii, war watiiru ñaari fas. Nee: “Daanu nañoo, Babilon daanu na, jëmmi tuuram yépp tasaaroo fi suuf!”»
Isaiah 21:10 Yeen bokk yi ñu bàcc ni pepp ca sama dàgga ja, la ma dégge ci Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil Boroom gàngoor yi, wax naa leen ko.
Isaiah 21:11 Yéene bii moo wàccal Duuma: Nit a ngi may wooye tundu Seyir, naan: Jongrukat bi, lu des ci guddi gi? Éy jongrukat bi, lu desati ci guddi gi?
Isaiah 21:12 jongrukat bi ne: «Bët set, mu guddeeti rekk, Boo amee looy laaj, délsil laajaat ko.»
Isaiah 21:13 Yéene bii moo wàccal Arabi: yeen cëggi askanu Dedan, mbooyum Arabi ngeen di fanaane.
Isaiah 21:14 Yeen waa Tema, dajejileen ak ña mar, yóbbul leen am ndox. Dogileen ñay daw, may leen ñu lekk.
Isaiah 21:15 Ay saamar de lañuy daw; saamar bu ñu leen xàccil ak fitt gu ñu leen diir ak tàngooru xare.
Isaiah 21:16 ¶ Aji Sax ji de da maa wax ne ma: «Fileek menn at mu surga bu ñu bind waññ, sagub dëkk bii di Kedar dina sàggiku,
Isaiah 21:17 li des ci jàmbaari fittkati Kedar di lu néew.» Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil wax na ko.
Isaiah 22:1 Yéene bii ñeel na xuru Peeñu ma: Ana lu ngeen di yéege, yeen ñépp seen kawi taax?
Isaiah 22:2 Lu waral coow li ak xaxaloo bi, ba dëkk biy riir? Ñi ngeen deele, saamar reyu leen, bóomuñu leen ci xare.
Isaiah 22:3 Seen njiiti xare yépp a bokk daw, ñu jàpp leen te taluñoo fitte. Seen njiit yi ñu gis yépp lañu jàpp, te ñu dawoon ba sore.
Isaiah 22:4 Moo ma tax ne: «Buleen ma xool, damay naqarlu, jooy. Tàyyileen maa dëfal ci sama bokk yi sànku.»
Isaiah 22:5 Lii kat bésub njommite laak coonook toroxte, bésu Boroom bi Aji Sax ji ci gàngoor yi, ci biir xuru Peeñu mi. Tata ja, ñu rëkka rëkk, mu màbb, yuux jolli, àkki tund ya.
Isaiah 22:6 Waa Elam gàllooy fitt, ñenn ña war watiir, gawar ya war, waa Kir ŋàbb pakk ya.
Isaiah 22:7 Seen xur yu nangu yaa fees aki watiir, gawar taxaw temm buntu Yerusalem,
Isaiah 22:8 te Yuda ne duŋŋ, dara wëru ko. Su keroogee ngeen yaakaar ngànnaay, ya ca kër ga ñuy wooye Gott ba,
Isaiah 22:9 far gis ni ñu bëtt-bëttee tatay Yerusalem, ji wër gox bi ñu naan Kër Daawuda. Ngeen rooti ndox ca solom bu suufe ba, denc ko,
Isaiah 22:10 boole ca waññ këri Yerusalem, màbb lenn, sàkk ca lu ngeen aare tata ya.
Isaiah 22:11 Da leen di fekk sàkk mbànd diggante ñaari tata yi, ngir denc ca ndoxum déeg bu yàgg ba. Waaye xooluleen ki dogal lii, xalaatuleen ki nasoon lii bu yàgg.
Isaiah 22:12 Bésub keroog Boroom bi, Aji Sax ji ci gàngoor yi moo leen di woo ci jooyoo ak ñaawlu ak wateefu nel, ak colu saaku ngir ñaawlu.
Isaiah 22:13 Te yeena ngii ci mbég ak bànneex, di rendi nag ak xar, di yàpp ak a naan, naan: «Nan lekk, naan, nde ëllëg, nu dee!»
Isaiah 22:14 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi dégtal na ma lii: «Gii ñaawtéef déy deesu leen ko jéggal, ba keroog ngeen di dee.» Boroom bee ko giñ, moom Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi.
Isaiah 22:15 Boroom bi Aji Sax ji ci gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: «Ayca, demal ba ca Sebna, bëkk-néegu buur sii, nga ne ko:
Isaiah 22:16 Ana loo fi am, ak koo fi am? Nga di fi yettlu bàmmeel, yett ko ca kawte ya, di gaslu kër gooy mujje?
Isaiah 22:17 Jàmbaar, dama ne Aji Sax jee lay xalab; da la naa nikk,
Isaiah 22:18 fodonk la, rattax, nga xalangoo àll bu ne màww. Fa ngay dee, te fa la watiir yi ngay puukarewoo di des, muy sa gàccey waa kër sang.»
Isaiah 22:19 Aji Sax ji nee: «Maa lay jële sa liggéey, foqatee la sa péete mu kawe.
Isaiah 22:20 ¶ «Bésub keroog ma woo sama jaam bi, Elyakim doomu Ilkiya,
Isaiah 22:21 solal ko sa mbubb, dooleele ko sa ngañaay, teg kilifteefu réew mi ci loxoom, ba mu féete wàllu baay, waa Yerusalem, ak waa kër Yuda.
Isaiah 22:22 Maa koy ràng caabiy kër Daawuda, muy ubbi te kenn du tëj; di tëj te kenn du ubbi.
Isaiah 22:23 Maa koy samp fu dëgër ni ab wékkukaay, mu doon sagu kër baayam.
Isaiah 22:24 Waa kër baayam ak seen daraja, ñépp ay wékku ci moom, car yaak caraat ya. Ndab yu ndaw yépp ca la, kopp ya ba ca njaq ya.
Isaiah 22:25 Bésub keroog,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, Boroom gàngoor yi, mu ne: «bant ba sampe woon fu wóor day simpiku. Dees koy gor, mu fàq, la ca sëfe woon dog.» Aji Sax ji déy wax na ko.
Isaiah 23:1 ¶ Yéene bii ñeel na dëkk ba ñuy wax Tir: Yeen waa gaali Tarsis ñi deele, jooyleen! Lépp a yàqu! Du kër, du teeruwaay. Fa dunu Sippar lañu leen ko waxe.
Isaiah 23:2 Yeen waa tefes, yaw Sidon laa ne, na say jula ñaawlu, yaw miy yónni nit ñu jaare géej,
Isaiah 23:3 war ndox ya ne xéew, peppum Sixor di sa tono, ak ngóobum Niil, ma xeet yi daan jula.
Isaiah 23:4 Yaw Sidon, gàcce ñeel na la, géej moo wax, tatay géej a ne: «Masumaa matu, masumaa jur, yaruma gone gu góor, yarumab janq.»
Isaiah 23:5 Bu xibaar ba àggee Misra de, ñu naqarlu deminu Tir.
Isaiah 23:6 Jàllal ba Tarsis, yeen waa tefes ga fa ne, jooyleen jooyi dëj.
Isaiah 23:7 Xanaa lii du seen dëkk bu xumb ba, te cosaanam di janti démb, nit ña di fa jógey sancaani fu sore?
Isaiah 23:8 Ana ku fexeel lii Tir ma daan fale, ay julaam diy kàngam, di jaaykat yi àddina teral?
Isaiah 23:9 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yee ko fexe, ngir sàggi sagub képp ku fiy damu, ba teddadil képp ku àddina teral.
Isaiah 23:10 Yeen waa Tir, defleen ni dexu Niil, walal seen réew; kenn tereetu leen.
Isaiah 23:11 Aji Sax ji tàllal na loxoom, tiimale géej, yëngal réew yi, ba santaane ñu màbb tatay Kanaan.
Isaiah 23:12 Nee yeen waa Sidon ñi mel ni janq bu ñu tëdde, dootuleen xaxaloo. Ayca, dawleen jàlli ba dunu Sippar, te du tax ngeen am fa noflaay.
Isaiah 23:13 Xool-leen li dal réewum Kaldeen ñi. Dootuñu sax aw xeet. Asiri wacce na leen rabi màndiŋ mi. Tabax nañu, gaw ko, màbb këri buur ya, gental ko.
Isaiah 23:14 Yeen boroom gaali Tarsis, yuuxuleen ni ñu deele, seen tata màbb na!
Isaiah 23:15 ¶ Bu keroogee ñu fàtte Tir juróom ñaar fukki at, ni àppu benn buur. Bu juróom ñaar fukki at yi matee, Tir xewle la ñu woyal gànc ba, ne ko:
Isaiah 23:16 «Yaw gànc bi ñu wacc, fabal sa xalam, wër dëkk bi, xalamala xalam te gëna woy, ndax ñu geesu la.»
Isaiah 23:17 ¶ Bu juróom ñaar fukki at yi matee, Aji Sax ji dikkal Tir, ñu delluy liggéey, di feyu, di gànctook mboolem réewi àddina fi kaw suuf
Isaiah 23:18 Waaye seen ñaq ak seen peyoor, dees koy sellalal Aji Sax ji, deesu ko dajaleek a denc. Ñi dëkk fi kanam Aji Sax jeey jagoo njariñ la, mu di leen dundal ba ñu regg, di leen solal col gu jekk.
Isaiah 24:1 Aji Sax jaa ngii di tas àddina, tasaare ko, salfaañe li fi dénd bi, wasaare ñi ko dëkke:
Isaiah 24:2 sarxalkat beek baadoolo bi, sang akub jaam, njaatige lu jigéen ak ab janqam, jaaykat ak jëndkat, ablekat ak àbbkat, leblekat ak lebkat.
Isaiah 24:3 Àddinaa ne duŋŋ duŋŋaaral, dees koo futti ba mu ne furaas! Aji Sax ji kat wax na kàddu gii!
Isaiah 24:4 Suuf a ngi wowa wow, ne sereŋ, àddina ne làcc, ne sereŋ, kàngami xeeti àddina ne làcc.
Isaiah 24:5 Suuf si la ñi ko dëkke sobeel, ñoo wàcc yoon yi, xëtt ndigal, fecci kóllëre gi sax dàkk.
Isaiah 24:6 Moo tax alkànde yàq suuf, ñi ko dëkke gàddu àq ji. Moo tax waa àddina raaf, ba ñi des di lu néew.
Isaiah 24:7 Biiñ ñàkk na, garabu reseñ lax, bépp xol bu tooyoon, binni.
Isaiah 24:8 Tabala ju xumb selaw na, ña daa xaxaloo dal, mbégtem buumi xalam dakk.
Isaiah 24:9 Kenn naanatul, di woy, ñoll wex na ka koy naan.
Isaiah 24:10 Dëkk bu gental tasaaroo na, kër yépp tëje, kenn duggul.
Isaiah 24:11 Mbedd maa ngi soowaloo, ndax biiñ bu ñàkk, gépp mbégte fey, bànneexu àddina dëddu.
Isaiah 24:12 Tojiti neen a des ci dëkk bi, bunt ba rajaxoo.
Isaiah 24:13 Noonu lay deme ci àddina, ci biir xeet yi, mbete benn-benni doomi oliw gu ñu gësëm, mbaa doomi reseñ yu des ca ndey ja, gannaaw bu ñu wittee ba sottal.
Isaiah 24:14 Ña ngay xaacu di sarxolle, waa sowu di sàbbaal ci màggug Aji Sax ji.
Isaiah 24:15 Yeen waa penku, sargal-leen Aji Sax ji boog, yeen waa duni géej, teral-leen Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil.
Isaiah 24:16 Cati àddina lay woy di jibe, nu dégg ñu naa: «Teddnga ñeel na Aji Jub ji!»
Isaiah 24:17 Yeen waa àddina, kat-kat, pax akub caax dëgmal na leen.
Isaiah 24:18 Nga déggi yuux, daw, tàbbi biir pax, génne pax, laawoob caax. Mbàndi kaw kat ubbi na, kenug àddina di reng-rengi.
Isaiah 24:19 Suuf daa loroo loru, fetta fett, salfaañoo salfaañu.
Isaiah 24:20 Suuf a ngi janga jang ni màndikat, ba joy ni mbaar, moyam diis ko gann, mu daanu te du jógati.
Isaiah 24:21 Bu bésub keroogee Aji Sax ji dikke mbugal gàngoor ya fa kawa kaw, ak buuri àddina yi fi suuf.
Isaiah 24:22 Dees leen di boole denc cim pax, ne leen ràpp tëj, ba mu am ay fani fan, ñu mbugal leen.
Isaiah 24:23 Kersa la weer wiy am, gàcce ñeel jant bi; Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi daal, mooy nguuru Yerusalem, kaw tundu Siyoŋ, leeram ga jollee fa kanam magi ñoñam.
Isaiah 25:1 Aji Sax ji, yaay sama Yàlla, dama lay teral, di la sant. Yaa defi jaloore, muy dogal yu yàgg, wér te wóor.
Isaiah 25:2 Yaa def dëkk bi jali doj, dëkk bii ñu dàbbli nga gental; taaxu doxandéem yi noppee doon péey ba fàww, te deesu ko tabaxaat.
Isaiah 25:3 Moo tax xeet wu am doole di la màggal, waa péeyu xeet yu néeg di la wormaal.
Isaiah 25:4 Yaa di rawtub néew-ji-doole, di rawtub aji ñàkk, biir njàqare, yaay mbaar mu ñuy yiiroo waame, di ker gu ñuy serloo ci tàngoor, nde merum kilifa gu néeg mooy waame wu ne yureet ci kaw miir.
Isaiah 25:5 Doxandéem yii diy noon, ni ngay dàqe tàngoor fi bérab bu ne sereŋ, ni ngay dakkale seen coowal xare. Ni aw tàngoor di dakke ndax aw niir, ni la woyu ñu néeg ñi di selawe.
Isaiah 25:6 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, mooy berndeel xeet yépp fi kaw tund wii, bernde ju niin ak ngëneelu biiñ, yàpp wa duuf, yuq ja ne xéew, ak tànnéefu biiñ bu teey.
Isaiah 25:7 Fi kaw tund wii lay tukkile càngaay, li sàng askanoo askan, ak séru rabal bi ñu ràbbal xeetoo xeet.
Isaiah 25:8 Mooy mëdd ndee ba fàww! Boroom bi, Aji Sax jeey fompe gépp kanam rongooñi boroom. Buumi gàccey ñoñam it, moo koy doge fépp ci àddina. Aji Sax ji kat wax na ko.
Isaiah 25:9 Bésub keroog dees na ne: «Sunu Yàllaa ngii nag! Moom mii lanu yaakaaroon te moo nuy wallu. Aji Sax jii lanu yaakaaroon, nan bég te bànneexoo wallam.»
Isaiah 25:10 Aji Sax ji kat teg na tund wii loxo, te ni ñuy dëggaatee boobum leeñ, ni lees fiy dëggaatee Mowab.
Isaiah 25:11 Mowab dina féqoo féqu, mel ni kuy jéema féey, waaye Aji Sax jee leen di torxal, ñook seen manoore.
Isaiah 25:12 Seen tata yu kawe, mu fél, màbb; rattax fi suuf, maasale.
Isaiah 26:1 Bésub keroog dees na woy wii woy fi réewum Yuda: «Dëkk bu dëgër lanu am, Yàllaa nu may kaarangey tata, biir ak biti!
Isaiah 26:2 Ubbileen bunt yi, ba xeet wi jub te sàmm ngëm duggsi!
Isaiah 26:3 Yaw Aji Sax ji, ku dogu, pastéefu, wóolu la, nga may ko jàmm ju mat, nde moo la wóolu.
Isaiah 26:4 Wóoluleen Aji Sax ji tey ak ëllëg; Yàlla Aji Sax ji déy, moo mat cëslaay ba fàww.
Isaiah 26:5 Moo wàcce ñi dëkke woon fa kaw, moo detteel waa dëkk ba aju woon, daaneel leen, ñu xalangu, ba mëq suuf,
Isaiah 26:6 baadoola joggi, dëggaate, néew-ji-doole note leen.»
Isaiah 26:7 Ku dëggu, yoonam day maase; ku dëggu, Aji Jub ji jubal xàllam.
Isaiah 26:8 Aji Sax ji, nu ngi lay xaar, fi sa kaw yoonu santaane yi, di la sàkku, ba la xel, lii déy, mooy sunu nammeelu xol.
Isaiah 26:9 Xol laa lay sàkkoo guddi, sama jëmm jépp di la laaj. Bu say àtte teewee fi kaw suuf, waa àddina xame ca njekk.
Isaiah 26:10 Ku bon, boo ko yërëmee, du xam njekk. Biir réew mu nit ñay jubal lay xal di luubale, du faale kawewaayu Aji Sax ji.
Isaiah 26:11 Aji Sax ji, yaa xàcci sa loxo, waaye yéguñu ko. Won leen ni nga nabe ci sa ñoñ, ñu rus, te sawaraay xoyom sa noon yooyu.
Isaiah 26:12 Aji Sax ji, yaa nuy defal jàmm, te lépp lu nu def, yaa nu ko sottalal.
Isaiah 26:13 Aji Sax ji sunu Yàlla, yeneen sang yu la moy moom nañu nu, waaye saw tur rekk lanuy màggal.
Isaiah 26:14 Yooyu sang dee nañu, nekkatuñu, wuute nañu, jógatuñu. Yaa def nii, faagaagal leen, ba far sax seen tur.
Isaiah 26:15 Aji Sax ji, yaa yokk xeet wi, yaw mii yaa yokk xeet wi, yaa fésal sa teddnga, yaa yokk mboolem kemi réew mi!
Isaiah 26:16 Éy Aji Sax ji, ci biir njàqare lañu la sàkkoo; ba ñu tegoo sa mbugal, lañu la déey seenug ñaan.
Isaiah 26:17 Éy Aji Sax ji, ni kuy matu lanu meloon fi sa kanam, di wañaarook a yuuxu.
Isaiah 26:18 Danoo ëmb bay matu te jurunu lu moy ngelaw. Indiwunu genn mucc ci àddina, mayunu ci kenn lu ko taxa dund.
Isaiah 26:19 Waaye yaw askan wi, ñi nga deele ñooy dellu dundaat, seeni néew ay dekki, ku doon nelaw sa biir bàmmeel, yewwu, sarxolle. Aji Sax jeey yebal lay bu ànd aki leer, suuf délloosi ña dëddu.
Isaiah 26:20 Yeen samaw askan, ayca duggleen seeni néeg, tëju ca biir. Làquleen as lëf, ba sànj mi jàll.
Isaiah 26:21 Aji Sax ji kat a ngii di génne bérabam ba, nara dikke waa àddina mbugalu ñaawtéef, ba suuf wone deret ji ñu tuur fi kawam, te dootu sàng ñi ñu bóom.
Isaiah 27:1 Bésub keroog Aji Sax ji dikke saamaram bu jàmbaare, ñàng te réy, ba dal ci kaw Lewiyatan, jaan ja ca xél wa, Lewiyatan jaan jay wañaaruy dem, ninki-nànkay géej jooju lay rey.
Isaiah 27:2 Bésub keroog, tóokëru reseñ ju neex am, nangeen ko woy,
Isaiah 27:3 te man Aji Sax ji maa koy topptoo, di ko suuxat saa su ne, di ko wattu guddeek bëccëg, bala koo kenn a song.
Isaiah 27:4 Mereetuma tóokër bii, waaye lu ciy dég aki dagg, ma dox wuti ko, xareek moom, boole lépp xoyom.
Isaiah 27:5 Xanaa ku langaamoo sama kiiraay te jàmmook man, ba jàmmook man.
Isaiah 27:6 Ay bés a ngi ñëw Yanqóoba saxi reen, Israyil moomooy tóor, law, ba feesal déndu àddinaak meññeef.
Isaiah 27:7 Defe ngeen ne Aji Sax ji duma na Israyil, na mu dumaa ña leen duma woon? Am bóomal na leen lu tollook la seeni bóomkat bóomoon?
Isaiah 27:8 Ndànk-ndànk la jëflanteek ñoom, ba mu leen toxalee, dàqe leen noowam gu mag, bésu ngelawal penku.
Isaiah 27:9 Nii la Yanqóoba jotoo ñaawtéefam, nii la mujje am njéggalu bàkkaaram: Day boole doji sarxalukaay bi yépp, rajaxe ni doji kew, xer wu ñuy jaamoo Asera dootu fa sampe, mbaa sarxalukaayi suurukaay.
Isaiah 27:10 Dëkk bu ñu dàbbli mooy wéet, gental, ne wëyëŋ! Fa la nag di fore, fa lay goor, di lekk cari garab ya,
Isaiah 27:11 car ya wow, damm, jigéen ñi dikk, xambe. Dañu di xeet wu dul dégg, ba tax ki leen sàkk yërëmu leen, moo leen bind te ñeewantewu leen.
Isaiah 27:12 Bésub keroog Aji Sax ji bàcc, dale ca dexu Efraat ba ca walum Misra, te yeen bànni Israyil, dees na leen for kenn-kenn, ba ngeen daj.
Isaiah 27:13 Bésub keroog liit gu mag jib, ña laŋoon réewum Asiri délsi, ànd ak ña ñu tasaare woon biir réewum Misra, ba sujjóotalsi Aji Sax ji fa Yerusalem, fa kaw tund wu sell wa.
Isaiah 28:1 Wóoy ngalla Efrayim, kaala gu yànj ga ay màndikatam di sagoo! Taaram bu yéeme baa koy réer, ni tóor-tóor yu wow, te ma nga toŋ ca coll, wa ña biiñ man dëkke, fa tiim xur wu nangu wa.
Isaiah 28:2 Dégluleen, jàmbaar ju am doolee ngi dikkal Boroom bi, di tawub doji yuur, ngëlén luy sànke, riddee riddi, sotti waame wu wale! Loxoom la koy rattaxe fi suuf.
Isaiah 28:3 Dees na joggati kaala gii màndikati Efrayim di sagoo.
Isaiah 28:4 Te tóor mu lax mi muy gànjaroo, mu tege ca coll ya tiim xur wu nangu wa, day mel ni figg ju ñor te jotul; ka ko gis a koy gaaw witt, wonn.
Isaiah 28:5 Bésub keroog Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi di kaala gu yànj, gànjar gu yéeme, ñeel ndesu ñoñam,
Isaiah 28:6 mooy sol noowug dëgg kuy toog di àtte, di jàmbaaral ñiy waññi noon yi song dëkk bi, xare.
Isaiah 28:7 Ñii itam ay naan biiñ bay tërëf, màndiw ñoll, di jang: sarxalkat akub yonent la aw ñoll di tërëfloo, biiñ jànnaxe leen, ñu màndiw ñoll, di jang, bu ñu amee am peeñu, di tërëf.
Isaiah 28:8 Seen taabal yépp a ngi taq ripp, fépp di waccu ak mbalit.
Isaiah 28:9 Ñu naa: «Ana ku Esayi mii di jàngal? Ana ku muy àgge xibaar? Xanaa ku yàggula fer, di doora bàyyi ween?
Isaiah 28:10 Ca rëdd wii, ca rëdd wee, nàngam sii, nàngam see, as tuut fii, as tuut fee.»
Isaiah 28:11 Xanaa boog nit ñu seen wax leerul, ñu diy làkk-kat, la Aji Sax jiy waxeek askan wii?
Isaiah 28:12 Moo leen waxoon ne leen: «Fii moo di nopplukaay bi, noppal-leen ku sonn. Fii a di dal-lukaay bi!» Waaye nanguwuñoo dégg.
Isaiah 28:13 Moo tax seen kàddug Aji Sax mujj di: «Ca rëdd wii, ca rëdd wee, nàngam sii, nàngam see, as tuut fii, as tuut fee.» Moo tax ñuy tërëf, daanoo njaaxaanaay ba damm, di sërëx ak a keppu.
Isaiah 28:14 Kon nag yeen kókkalikat yi yilif askanu Yerusalem wii, dégluleen kàddug Aji Sax ji!
Isaiah 28:15 Yeena naay: «Danoo wóllëranteek ndee, njaniiw lanu digool, ba du nu moom, ba bu yaru musiba dikkeek diisaayam, du nu laal? Noo def ay fen sunu rawtu, ay wor di sunu làquwaay.»
Isaiah 28:16 Moo tax Boroom bi Aji Sax ji wax ne: «Maa ngii di dëj fi Siyoŋ aw doju coll, muy doju collu tànnéef wu gànjare ngir kenu gi, te ku ko wéeroo doo gaawa daw.
Isaiah 28:17 Dëgg laay def nattukaay, njekk di sama buumu beteex, tawub doji yuur buub rawtub fen, wal ma mëdd làquwaay,
Isaiah 28:18 seen wóllëranteek ndee neen, seen digook njaniiw toxu, yaru musiba dikk ak diisaayam, wulli leen ba ngeen nooy.
Isaiah 28:19 Saa yu dikkee ne leen céex, suba su ne mu ne jaas, guddeek bëccëg, mu teew, te bu jibee sax fit rëcc.»
Isaiah 28:20 Lal a gàtt ba deesu ci tàlli, malaan cëkk ba matul càngaay.
Isaiah 28:21 Aji Sax jeey jóg na woon fa tundu Perasim, xadaru na woon ca xuru Gabawon ngir jëf jëfam, jëfam ju yéeme ja! Moo nara liggéey liggéeyam booba, liggéeyam bu tumurànke ba!
Isaiah 28:22 Tee ngeena baña kókkalee bala ñoo teeŋal seeni jéng? Sànkute kat moo di dogal bi ma dégg, mu bawoo fa Boroom bi, Aji Sax ji ci gàngoor yi, di luy dikkal réew mi mépp.
Isaiah 28:23 Teeyluleen te déglu sama kàddu, teewluleen ba dégg samay wax.
Isaiah 28:24 Xool-leen ci lii: Ndax beykat bi day dëkke gàbb, di rëdd ak a gàbbaat?
Isaiah 28:25 Bu gàbbee ba toolam maase, du day sànni jiwum nisel, wasaare jiwum kumin, daldi def bele bi ay saawo, sànni lors ba fa mu ko rëddal, doora suy bele bu dëgër ba ca wet ya?
Isaiah 28:26 Dees koo xamal yoon wa, te Yàllaam a ko ko jàngal.
Isaiah 28:27 Mbàccum nisel watiir amu ca yoon, te deesul bàcc kumin itam, ba joggi ca tànki watiir. Mbàccum nisel, yet a koy def; mbàccum kumin, bant bu yem.
Isaiah 28:28 Gubi bele, dees na ca jaare watiir, waaye deesu ci dëkk; watiir ngay takk, bàcce ko pepp, waaye doo ko bàcc ba mu far mokk!
Isaiah 28:29 Xel moomu it fa Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi la bawoo. Ndigalam a ni yéemee, pexeem màgge ni!
Isaiah 29:1 Wóoy ngalla Aryelee, Aryel, dëkk ba Daawuda dale. Dundleen at ak at, amal-leen ci màggal ci kaw màggal.
Isaiah 29:2 Du tee ma wàcceel Aryel musiba, ñuy yuuxook a jooyoo. Yerusalem ay mel ci man ni Aryel, taalub sarxalukaay.
Isaiah 29:3 Maay dal ub dal, wër la, gawe la ay tata, jali jal, fuuge la.
Isaiah 29:4 Dinga suufe ba mel ni kuy àddoo biir suuf, sa baat di ndéey lu dégtoo xóote ya pëndub suuf lale, mel ni njuuma lu waxam bawoo biir suuf, baatam yeloo xóote ya pëndub suuf lale.
Isaiah 29:5 Say noon ay def gàngoor ni feppi suuf, di naaxu nit ñu néeg, ñu ngelaw liy wal nib cox. Loolooy jekki am, ca saa sa.
Isaiah 29:6 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoori xare yi moo lay dikke dënook suuf su yëngu ak riir mu réy, ngelaw riddi, di ngëlén, ànd ak sawara wuy xoyome.
Isaiah 29:7 Mboolem xeet yu bare yiy xareek Aryel, di song dëkk beeki tataam, nar leena torxal, ñoom ñépp ay mel ni gént mbaa njeneeru guddi!
Isaiah 29:8 Su boobaa mu mel ni ku xiif, géntul lu moy di lekk, yewwu rekk, biir ba wéet; mbaa ku mar, géntul lu moy di naan, yewwu rekk, loof, put ga wow koŋŋ. Noonu la gàngooru xeet yépp di nekke, mboolem xeet yooyuy xaareji fa Siyoŋ!
Isaiah 29:9 Tendeefal, jommi rekk! Gëmm, gumba rekk. Ñiika màndi te du biiñ, ñuy jang te duw ñoll!
Isaiah 29:10 Aji Sax ji déy yeen la wal ngelawal nelaw yu xóot, taf seeni gët, te ngeen di yonent yi; muur seeni bopp te ngeen di boroom peeñu yi.
Isaiah 29:11 Peeñum xew-xew yii yépp ump na leen, ni leen kàdduy téere bu ñu tay umpe. Boo ko joxee ku jàng, ne ko mu jàng ko, mu ne la manu ko, nde dees koo tay;
Isaiah 29:12 nga jox ko ku jàngul, ne ko mu jàng, mu ne la manula jàng.
Isaiah 29:13 Boroom bi nee: «Askan wii, làmmiñ lañu ma jegee, lori neen lañu may wormaale, te seen xol sore ma. Seen ragal ak man it, njàngum tari kepp la.
Isaiah 29:14 Moo tax maa ngii di dellu wéyeek askan wii, ay kéemtaan aki kiraama yuy tiiñ boroom xel ak xelam, réer xamkat ak xam-xamam.»
Isaiah 29:15 Wóoy ngalla ñiy làqu Aji Sax ji, di loqal seen mébét, ba lëndëm muur seen jëf, ñu naan: «Ana ku nu gis? Ana ku nu yég?»
Isaiah 29:16 Yeenaka juunum xel! Dees na jaawale tabaxkatu njaq beek ban bi? Ndax li ñu sàkk dina ne ki ko sàkk: «Kii sàkku ma»? Am njaq leey waxtaane tabaxkat bi naa: «Kii manula tabax»?
Isaiah 29:17 Xamuleen ne fi leek lu néewa néew, àllub Libaŋ sopplikub tóokër, tóokër bi walbatiku meññ, ba ñu ne ab gott la?
Isaiah 29:18 Su bés baa ab tëx dégg kàdduy téere, silmaxa tàggook lëndëm, di gis,
Isaiah 29:19 néew-doole yi dellu bége Aji Sax ji, ñi gëna ñàkk di bànneexoo Aji Sell ju Israyil.
Isaiah 29:20 Ku néeg déy dina neen, kuy ñaawle sànku, te képp kuy yeeru nu mu defe lu bon, dees na la dagg.
Isaiah 29:21 Mooy ñiy tuumaal nit, di fiir ab àttekat ca pénc ma, di àtte ñàkkal nit ku jub ci dara.
Isaiah 29:22 Moo tax Aji Sax, ji jotoon Ibraayma, wax ak waa kër Yanqóoba, ne leen: «Léegi Yanqóoba du rusati, du amati yaraanga.»
Isaiah 29:23 Bu am meññeefam gisee li sama loxo def fi seen biir, dinañu sellal sama tur, sellal ma, man Aji Sell ju Yanqóoba. Dinañu ma wormaal, man Yàllay Israyil,
Isaiah 29:24 ba ñi réeroon, mujj xam; ñurumtukat yi dégg ndigal.
Isaiah 30:1 Wóoy ngalla doom yii diy fippukat! Kàddug Aji Sax jee. Ñu ngi nas mébét yu ma diglewul, di digoo digoo yu ma leen xelalul, di tegle bàkkaar ci kaw bàkkaar.
Isaiah 30:2 Ñoo dox wuti Misra te laajuñu ma, xanaa di sàkku rawtub Firawna, di keppaaroo keppaarug Misra.
Isaiah 30:3 Rawtub Firawnaay mujj di seen gàcce, keppaarug Misra di seen toroxte.
Isaiah 30:4 Seeni jawriñ a nga xaat ba Cowan, seeni ndaw àgg ba Anes,
Isaiah 30:5 waaye ñoom ñépp kersa lañuy ame Misra, googu leen dul amal njariñ. Du ndimbal, du njariñ, xanaa gàcceek toroxte.
Isaiah 30:6 Yéeneb waxyu bii ñeel na malay àllub Negew: Réewum tiis laak njàqare, kërug gayndeeki segg, ak saamaan ak céebi, mbaam lañu sëf seen alal, jaare fa, giléem lañu sëf seeni denc, jëme xeet wu leen dul jariñ.
Isaiah 30:7 Ndimbalu Misra, cóolóolu neen! Moo tax ma tudde ko: Raxab, ponkal mi ne yàcc.
Isaiah 30:8 Aji Sax ji nee: «Ayca, bind ko ci àlluwa, ñu gis! Rëdd ko cib téere, ngir ëllëg ak sibbir, mu dib seede ba fàww.»
Isaiah 30:9 Wii xeet kat ay fippukat lañu, yii doom a diy fen-kat te nanguwuñoo sàmm yoonu Aji Sax ji!
Isaiah 30:10 Boroom ngis, ñu ne ko: «Bul gis,» boroom peeñu, ñu ne ko: «Bu ñu firil peeñuy dëgg. Wax nu lu neex, gisal nu ay nax.»
Isaiah 30:11 Moyal yoon wi; lajj, wàcc xàll wi, te may nu jàmm ak Aji Sell ju Israyil.
Isaiah 30:12 Moo tax Aji Sell ju Israyil wax ne: «Gannaaw yeena xalab kàddu gii, yaakaaruleen lu moy doole ak pexey njubadi yu ngeen wéeroo,
Isaiah 30:13 googu ñaawtéef ay mujj doon seen xar-xaru tata ju kawe, funki, tata ja jekki jóoru.
Isaiah 30:14 Da naan tasar ni njaqal xandeer lu ñu naan rajax te ñéebluweesu ko, ba deesul gis ca tojit ya, dog bu tibb xal, mbaa mu as ndoxum déeg.»
Isaiah 30:15 Ndax Boroom bi Aji Sax ji, Aji Sell ju Israyil dafa wax ne: «Délsi, dal-lu moo leen di musal. Ne tekk te wóolu maa leen di dooleel. Waaye yeena buggul!
Isaiah 30:16 Yeena ne: “Déedéet, danuy war fas, daw!” Dingeen daw moos! Ngeen ne: “Daamar yu gaaw lanuy war.” Ñi leen di dàq it di war daamar yu gaaw!
Isaiah 30:17 Junneey daw fu leen kenn gëdde, juróom gëdd, ngeen daw yeen ñépp, ba ña des mel ni bantub raaya ci kaw tund, ne cundum ni raaya bu wéet ca coll wa.»
Isaiah 30:18 Aji Sax ji déy a leen namma baaxe, moo ko tax di jóg moos ngir yërëm leen, nde Aji Sax jeey Yàllay njubte. Ndokklee képp ku ko yaakaar!
Isaiah 30:19 Yeen waa Siyoŋ, yeen waa Yerusalem, dootuleen jooy mukk! Bu ngeen jooyee, mu yërëm leen moos; bu leen di dégg, di leen nangul.
Isaiah 30:20 Boroom bee leen di leel njàqare, nàndal leen coono, waaye moo leen di jàngal, dootu leen làqu; dingeen gis ki leen di jàngal,
Isaiah 30:21 di dégg kàddu guy jibe seen gannaaw, naa leen: «Yoon waa ngii, jaareleen fi;» bu ngeen awee ndijoor, mbaa càmmoñ.
Isaiah 30:22 Su boobaa ngeen sobeel seen jëmmi tuur yi ñu xoob xaalis; ak wurus wu xoob seen tuur yi ñu móol, ba boole lépp sànni ni sagar yu sobewu, ne ko: «Sore nu!»
Isaiah 30:23 Su boobaa Aji Sax ji tawal lu ngeen ji, may leen pepp mu suuf meññ, sakkan te nangu, seen juri keroog di fore parlu yu yaa,
Isaiah 30:24 Nag yeek mbaam yiy rijji sax, di xontoo cox bu ñu xorom, jóge ci mbàccum roq ak ngaska.
Isaiah 30:25 Te tundoo tund wu kawe, wu mag ak wu ndaw, wali ndox a cay wale, keroog bés ba deret di tuuroo tuuru, tata ya jóoru.
Isaiah 30:26 Weer day leer ni jant, jant gënatee leer, mel ni juróom yaari bëccëg, bésub keroog ba Aji Sax jiy takk damm-dammu ñoñam, fajal leen góom yi ay dóoram sabab.
Isaiah 30:27 Aji Sax jaa ngii, jóge fu sore; mer ma réy, mu jógaale kàddug àrtu gu diis, di waxe xadar ju mat sëkk, baat ba mel ni sawara wuy xoyome,
Isaiah 30:28 noo ga di wal mu baawaan, tollu ci put; mu nara segge xeet yi ab seggukaayu alkànde, wewal xeet yi ag laab gu leen di réeral.
Isaiah 30:29 Teewul, bokk yi, seen woy yay jib; mel ni guddig màggal, ànd ak mbégte ni kuy toxoro, yéeg jëm kaw tundu Aji Sax ji, cëslaayal Israyil.
Isaiah 30:30 Aji Sax jeey yékkati kàddoom gu màgg, wone diisaayu loxoom, ànd ak tàngooru meram, ak sawara wuy xoyome, ak waameek ngëlén, ak tawub doji yuur.
Isaiah 30:31 Kàddug Aji Sax jeey jib, Asiri tiit bay lox, yetu Aji Sax ja dal,
Isaiah 30:32 te saa yu yet wa Aji Sax ji féetale Asiri dalee, ngeen jibal am tëgg aki xalam. Aji Sax jeey xàcci loxoom, xareek Asiri.
Isaiah 30:33 Xambees na démb ab taal bu ñuy wax Tofet, te buur ba lees ko waajalal; dees koo xóotal, yaatal ko, sawara way tàkk, matt ma ne gàññ, noowal Aji Sax ji nar caa tàkke, di sël-sëli ni walum tamarax.
Isaiah 31:1 Wóoy ngalla ña wàcci Misra, di wuti wall; di sukkandikoo ay fas, tey yaakaari watiir ndax bare ga, aki gawar ndax lim bu takku ba te xooluñu ci Aji Sell ju Israyil, sàkkuwñu kooku di Aji Sax ji.
Isaiah 31:2 ¶ Moona moom it xareñ na, mane na safaan, te du fommi digeem. Kuy def lu bon, mu dal ci waa këram; kuy def lu ñaaw, mu song ay wallam.
Isaiah 31:3 Waa Misra, niti neen, duñu Yàlla; seeni fas it, suuxu neen, duñu leneen. Aji Sax jeey xàcci loxoom, kiy walloo mooy tërëf, ki ñuy wallu daanu, ñoom ñépp bokk sànku.
Isaiah 31:4 Aji Sax ji déy da maa wax ne ma: «Gaynde gu mag ak gu ndaw, bu jàppee bay xiiru, boo ko wooloon gàngooru sàmm it, duñu soowaloo ba xëbal ko, duñu ñolñoli ba mu dellu gannaaw. Noonu la Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yiy wàcce, xaresi fi kaw tundu Siyoŋ ak waa tund wa.»
Isaiah 31:5 Ni picc di daayaarloo, aar am tàggam, ni la Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yiy yiire Yerusalem. Mooy aar, di xettli, mooy musal, di yiwi.
Isaiah 31:6 ¶ Éy bokki Israyil, fippu ngeen Aji Sax ji ba sës, waaye walbatikuleen!
Isaiah 31:7 Bésub keroog ku ne sànni yàllantuy xaalisam, ak yàllantuy wurusam yi mu sàkke woon loxoy bàkkaaram.
Isaiah 31:8 Asiri nag day daanu, te saamaru nit du ko daaneel, saamar bu doom aadama moomul a koy alag, mu daw, won saamar gannaaw, ay gone yu góoram dugg liggéeyu sañul-bañ.
Isaiah 31:9 Ñi ñu yaakaar dañuy tiit, ne wëqet, seeni kilifa jàq, ba daw wacc raaya ba. Kàddug Aji Sax jee, Boroom sawara wi ci Siyoŋ, Boroom taal bi ci Yerusalem!
Isaiah 32:1 Buur a ngii, njekk lay nguuroo, jawriñ ñi it, yoon lañuy yilifee;
Isaiah 32:2 ku ci nekk mel ni seelukaayu ngelaw, di kiiraay ci ngëlén, mel ni wali ndox ci suuf su ne sereŋ, mbaa keppaaru doj wu mag ci àll bu mar.
Isaiah 32:3 Su boobaa gëti njàccaar yi dootuñu gëmm, te noppi ñiy dégg dañuy teewlu,
Isaiah 32:4 ku yàkkamti di ràññee, ba mana xam, làmmiñu ku dër gaawa wax lu leer.
Isaiah 32:5 Booba deesatul wooye ab dof, gor si, te njublaŋ dootu dégg «ku tedd ki.»
Isaiah 32:6 Ab dof, waxi dof lay wax, xel ma di nas ñaawtéef, mu nar jëf ju teddadi. Lu ñaaw lay wax, jëme ci Aji Sax ji, di xiifal ku xiif, di xañ ku mar lu mu naan.
Isaiah 32:7 Ab njublaŋ, ay pexeem musiba la. Njekkar lay nas, ba bu néew-ji-doole sàkkoo dëgg it, mu fen ba lor ko.
Isaiah 32:8 Waaye gor si, ngor lay mébét, te ngor lay wéye.
Isaiah 32:9 Yeen jigéen ñi dal xel, taxawleen temm, déglu ma; yeen janq ji féex, teewluleen ma.
Isaiah 32:10 Yeen jigéen ñi dal xel, fi leek at aki fan ngeen jàq; witt mi du baax, ngóob du taxaw.
Isaiah 32:11 Jigéen ñi dal xel, ragal-leen; yeen ñi féex laa ne, tiitleen! Futtikuleen, ba ne duŋŋ; gembooy saaku, ñaawloo.
Isaiah 32:12 Fëggleen seen dënn, jooy tooli bànneex ya, jooyleen reseñ ju nangu ja,
Isaiah 32:13 ak sama suufas bokk, ya ay dég aki dagg nangu. Jooyleen kay kër ya ca mbégte ma, ak dëkk bu xumb ba.
Isaiah 32:14 Kër gu rafet sax, dees koy wacc, dëkk baak riiram, dees koy dëddu; tund ak tóoju doon ay xunti ba fàww, mbaamu àll ne ca finaax, jur ga di ca fore,
Isaiah 32:15 ba keroog leeru xel sóobale nu fa kaw, màndiŋ mi sopplikub tóokër, tóokër meññ, ba ñu ne ab gott la.
Isaiah 32:16 Su boobaa yoon dëkke màndiŋ mi, njekk tooge tóokër bi.
Isaiah 32:17 Su booba njekk ay jur jàmm, njekk ay dalal, di aare ba fàww,
Isaiah 32:18 ba sama bokk yi dëkke sancub jàmm, ci dëkkuwaay yu wóor, dal-lukaay yu dal xel.
Isaiah 32:19 Gott bi day daanu ci tawub doji yuur, dëkk bi detteelu ba ne dett.
Isaiah 32:20 Waaye ndokklee yeen ñi tala ji fépp fuy ndox te saña afal nag ak mbaam.
Isaiah 33:1 Wóoy ngalla yaw bóomkat bi kenn bóomul, yaw workat bi kenn worul. Boo noppee bóome, ñu bóom la, te boo noppee wore, ñu wor la.
Isaiah 33:2 Éy Aji Sax ji, ngalla baaxe nu; yaw lanu yaakaar! Xëyeel a dooleel wii xeet, wallu nu ci biir njàqare.
Isaiah 33:3 Sam riir jib, xeet yi fëx; nga jóg, waaso yi fëlxoo.
Isaiah 33:4 Dees na sëxëtoo sa alal sëxëtoob soccet. Dees na ko sam ni njéeréer di samee!
Isaiah 33:5 Aji Sax jee kawe, moo dëkke fa kawa kaw, te mooy dajal fi Siyoŋ njekk ak yoon.
Isaiah 33:6 Liy dalal seen jamono mooy koomu ndam; xel ak xam-xam, te ragal Aji Sax ji, loolooy seen alal.
Isaiah 33:7 Xool-leen seen jàmbaar ñiy yuuxoo ci mbedd mi, ndawi jàmm yaa ngii, di jooyoo jooy yu metti.
Isaiah 33:8 Yoon yaa ngi wéet, kenn jaareetul ci ñall wi! Kóllëre fecciku na, xeebees na ay seede, te kenn faaleetul doom aadama.
Isaiah 33:9 Suuf a ngi maral, wow koŋŋ, gottub Libaŋ am gàcce, lax, àllub Saron doon joor gu wow, garabi Basan ak Karmel yëngu, di ruus.
Isaiah 33:10 Aji Sax ji nee: «Xaaral rekk ma jóg, xaaral rekk ma ne ñokket, xaaral rekk ma teewal samag kawe.
Isaiah 33:11 Seeni mébét di boob, bu sottee dim ngooñ; seen noowug bopp mooy xamb sawara, wi leen di xoyom.
Isaiah 33:12 Xeet yeey sànku ni doj yu lakk ba doon kew, mbaa taxas yu ñu buub, sànni ci sawara, mu tàkk.
Isaiah 33:13 Yeen ñi sore, dégluleen li ma def; yeen ñi jege, xamleen ne maa am doole.»
Isaiah 33:14 Bàkkaarkati Siyoŋ tiit nañu, way-gëmadi yaa ngay lox. Ana kan ci nun moo mana dal ak sawara suy xoyome? Ana kan ci nun moo mana dal ak taal yu yànj ya dul fey?
Isaiah 33:15 Xanaa kiy doxe njekk, di wax njub, bañ alalu foqati; loxo bay jalax ab ger, noppam di tanqamlu waxi bóome, bëtam di gëmm, ba du gis lu bon.
Isaiah 33:16 Ku ni mel, bérab bu kawe lay dëkke, doj yu ñu dàbbli di rawtoom, dundam doy, te ndoxam du ñàkk.
Isaiah 33:17 Yaw mi mel nii, buur bi ci taar bi ngay teg bët; yaay gis réew mi ne màww.
Isaiah 33:18 Sam xel dem ca sa tiitaange ja woon, nga ne: «Moo, ana ka doon waññ? Ana ka doon natt diisaayu galag? Ana ka doon waññiy tata?»
Isaiah 33:19 Su boobaa dootoo gis xeet wii di jaay doole, xeet wii diisu làkk ba déggeesu ko, taqu làmmiñ ba xameesul lu ñuy wax.
