Isaiah 64:8 Éy Aji Sax ji, bul mer lool, bul ba xel fàww ci ñaawtéef. Ngalla seetal ne nooy sa ñoñ, nun ñépp.
Isaiah 64:9 Sa dëkk yu sell doon nañu màndiŋ, Siyoŋ ca la, doon na màndiŋ. Yerusalem laa ne, gental na!
Isaiah 64:10 Sunu kërug jaamookaay gu sell ga te tedd, fa la sunuy maam daa màggale, sawara xoyom na ko, mboolem lu nu soppoon yàqu yaxeet.
Isaiah 64:11 Éy Aji Sax ji, lii lépp xanaa doo ci téye sa loxo? Xanaa doo ci seleŋlu, teg nu gàcce gu réy?
Isaiah 65:1 Maa may ay nit tont te laajuñu ma. Maa leen may, ñu gis ma te seetuñu ma woon. Maa ne leen: Maa ngii, maa ngii! te ñuy xeet wu dul tudd sama tur.
Isaiah 65:2 Samay loxo laa yendoo tàllal askanu fippukat, nit ñuy doxe yoon wu baaxul, topp seen xelum bopp.
Isaiah 65:3 Ñoo di xeet wu ma ne jàkk, dëkke maa naqaral, di sarxalali tuur ci biiri tool, di leen taalal cuuraay ci kaw sarxalukaay bu ñu tabax,
Isaiah 65:4 di tooge diggi bàmmeel, di fanaan bérab yu làqu; di lekk yàppu mbaam, seeni cin def ñam yu sobewu,
Isaiah 65:5 te ñu naan: «Dellul gannaaw, bul ma jege, maa la gëna sell!» Lii déy daa mel ni saxar ci samay wakkan, mel ni sawara su yendoo boy.
Isaiah 65:6 Ma ne dogal a ngii binde, fi sama kanam: «Duma noppi déy, maa leen di fey, maa leen di fey ba mu mat sëkk.»
Isaiah 65:7 Aji Sax ji nee: «Muy seeni ñaawtéef, di seen ñaawtéefi maam, ya daan taalali tuur cuuraay ca tund yu mag ya, di ma kókkali ca kaw tund yu ndaw ya, lépp laa leen di fey ba mu mat sëkk, muy seen añu jëf ja woon.»
Isaiah 65:8 Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Ni nit di gise cabbu reseñ ju fees dell, ne: “Buleen ko yàq, ngëneel a ngi ci,” noonu laay def ngir sama jaam ñi, baña boole lépp yàq.
Isaiah 65:9 Fi Yanqóoba laay soqee aw askan, fi Yuda laa ne, fi laay jële lu séddoo samay tund. Samay tànnéef a koy séddoo, sama jaam ñi kay a fay dëkke.
Isaiah 65:10 Joorug Saron ay dellu di parlub gàtt gi, xuru Akor di goorukaayu nag yi, ñeel sama ñoñ ñi may sàkkuji.
Isaiah 65:11 «Waaye yeen ñi wacc Aji Sax ji, yeen ñi fàtte sama tund wu sell wi, di taajal ndab, Gàdd tuur mi, di xellil biiñu njafaan, Meni tuur mi,
Isaiah 65:12 maa leen di dogalal saamar, ngeen bokk sukk, ñu rendi leen, ngir maa woote, wuyuwuleen, ma wax, dégguleen, xanaa di def li ma ñaawlu, taamu li ma buggul.»
Isaiah 65:13 Moo tax Boroom bi Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Ma ne sama jaam ñeey lekk, yeen ngeen nekke xiif. Ma ne sama jaam ñeey naan, yeen ngeen nekke mar. Sama jaam ñeey bànneexuji, yeen, ngeen nekke gàcce.
Isaiah 65:14 Sama jaam ñeey sarxolleji ndax xol bu neex, yeen ngeen di yuuxu ndax naqaru xol, di jooyoo ndax xol bu jeex.
Isaiah 65:15 Seen tur wi ngeen bàyyi gannaaw la samay tànnéef di móoloo, naan: “Yal na la Boroom bi Aji Sax ji rey ni diw ak diw,” waaye ñoom sama jaam ñi, tur wu yees lees leen di wooye,
Isaiah 65:16 ba képp ku namma barkeel fi kaw suuf, ci Yàlla jiy dëgg la koy ñaane, te kuy giñ fi kaw suuf it, ci Yàlla jiy dëgg la koy giñe. Day fekk njàqare ya jiitu di lu ñu fàtte, te di lu làqu saay gët.
Isaiah 65:17 «Maa ngii di sàkksi asamaan su yees ak suuf su yees. Deesul fàttlikooti yëf ya jiitu, xel dootu ci dem.
Isaiah 65:18 Bégleen kay, te saxoo di bànneexoo li ma sàkk: Maa ngii di sàkk Yerusalemu mbégte, waa dëkk ba nekke bànneex.
Isaiah 65:19 Maay bége Yerusalem, bànneexoo sama ñoñ. Deesu fi déggati ay jooy, mbaa coowal njàqare.
Isaiah 65:20 Deesu fi gisati tuut-tànk bu dund fan yu néew, mbaa mag mu dee te ay fanam matul, ba ku am téeméeri at dee sax, di ku gàtt fan, te ku àggul téeméer, ñu ne alku nga.
Isaiah 65:21 «Ñooy tabax ay kër, dëkke, jëmbati tóokër, lekk ca meññeef ma.
Isaiah 65:22 Duñu tabax moos, keneen dëkke; duñu jëmbat moos, keneen xéewloo. Sama ñoñ ay tollook garab yi fan, sama xejj yeey jagoo seenu ñaq.
Isaiah 65:23 Duñu liggéeyati mukk ci neen te dootuñu jural mbas. Ñooñooy askanu ñi Aji Sax ji barkeel, seeni doom nekk ak ñoom.
Isaiah 65:24 Su boobaa balees woote, man, maay wuyu; balaa ñoo daane seen kàddu, ma nangul leen.
Isaiah 65:25 Bukki ak mboteey bokk di for, gaynde niw nag, di for um ñax, jaan di dunde pënd. Deesatul gaañe mbaa di lore, fi mboolem sama kaw tund wu sell wi.» Aji Sax jee ko wax.
Isaiah 66:1 Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Asamaan sama ngàngunee, suuf di sama ndëggastal. Ana kër gu ngeen may tabaxal man? Ana ban bérab ay sama dal-lukaay?
Isaiah 66:2 Mboolem yooyu, sama loxoo ko sàkk; nii la lépp ame.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Ku mel nii laay niir: néew-ji-doole ji xolam jeex, te muy déglu sama kàddu bay lox.
Isaiah 66:3 Kee moom mu ngi rendiw yëkk, sarxal, te teewu koo bóome. Kee rendiw xar, sarxal, te teewu koo damm loosu xaj, sarxal. Kee ngi joxe saraxu pepp, te teewu koo tuur deretu mbaam-xuux. Kee di taal saraxu baaxantalu cuuraay, tey jaamu ay tuur. Ñoo taamu seen yoonu bopp, safoo seeni jëf ju seexluwu.
Isaiah 66:4 Man it maa leen di taamoo jox seeni mbugal, dikke leen tiitaange yi ñu yelloo, ngir maa woote, kenn wuyuwul, ma àddu, dégluwuñu ma. Xanaa di def lu bon lu ma ñaawlu, li ma buggul, ñu taamu ko.»
Isaiah 66:5 Dégluleen kàddug Aji Sax ji, yeen ñiy déglu kàddoom, di lox. Lii de mooy seen kàddug bokk, yi leen jéppi, di leen dàq ngir samaw tur. Ñu ngi naan: «Na Aji Sax ji darajaal boppam, ba nu teewe seen mbégte, yeen ñii!» Waaye ñoom de ñooy rus.
Isaiah 66:6 Coowal xaree ngoog bawoo dëkk ba, coow laa nga jóge kërug Yàlla ga, coowal Aji Sax jee, mooy yool ay noonam.
Isaiah 66:7 Kii balaa matu, wasin na, bala moo am mititu mat, jur na doom ju góor.
Isaiah 66:8 Ku masa dégg lu mel nii? Ku masa gis lu mel nii? Am réew dina sosu ci benn bés a? Am aw xeet dina jekki sosu ci wenn fan? Siyoŋ de, moo tàmbali matu rekk, jur doomam yu góor.
Isaiah 66:9 Aji Sax ji nee: «Man miy jàpple jigéen ba ëmbam mat, dinaa ko xañ wasin? Man miy wasinloo nit, dinaa fatt njurukaayam?» Sa Yàllaa ko wax.
Isaiah 66:10 Yeen soppey Yerusalem yépp, bégandooleen ak moom, te di ko bànneexoo. Mboolem yeen ñi doon ñaawlu tiisu Yerusalem, bokkleen ak moom xolam bu sedd.
Isaiah 66:11 Su ko defee ngeen nàmp ba suur weenam wiy naxtaane, su ko defee ngeen nàmp bay tàqamtiku soowum weenam mi ne xéew.
Isaiah 66:12 Aji Sax ji déy dafa wax ne: «Maa ngii di yóbbu Yerusalem ci jàmm ju mel ni géej, ak waamey koom muy wal, bawoo ci xeet yi. Yeenay tooge luppu Yerusalem, di nàmp, uufu ciy óom, mu di leen raay.
Isaiah 66:13 Man maa leen di naxtaan ba ngeen dal, ni doom ju ndeyam di naxtaan ba mu dal, ngeen am xel mu dal fi Yerusalem.
Isaiah 66:14 Yeenay teewe lii, seen xol tooy, seen yaram leqliku ni ñax mu yég nawet. Dooley Aji Sax ji la ay jaamam di xam, te am sànjam la ay noonam di xam.
Isaiah 66:15 «Aji Sax ji déy a ngii dikke sawara, ay watiiram mel ni ngëlén, mu nara sànju, sotti meram, gëdde sawara wuy sëlsëli.
Isaiah 66:16 Sawara déy la Aji Sax ji di mbugale, saamaram ba dal mboolem doom aadama, ñi Aji Sax ji bóom ne xas.
Isaiah 66:17 «Ñii di sellalu ak a sangu-set bala ñoo duggi tool ya ñuy tuuroo, di fa toppi ca gannaaw ka ca digg ba, ñooñooy lekk yàppu mbaam, ak yeneen yu seexluwu ni janax, te ñooy bokk sànku.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Isaiah 66:18 «Man maa xam seeni jëf ak seeni xalaat. Bés bii taxaw lees di dajale xeetoo xeet aki làkk, ñu dikk ba niir samag leer.
Isaiah 66:19 Maay teg firnde fi seen digg, ba jël ñenn ca ña dese bakkan ca ñoom, yebal leen ci xeet yi, yebal leen Tarsis, ak Pul ak Ludd, ñooña di ñu mane fitt, ma yebal leen ca waa Tubal ak Yawaan, waa duni géej yu sore ya, ñooñu masula dégg sama jaloore, te masuñoo gis sama teddnga, sama ndaw ñaa leen di xamal sama teddnga.
Isaiah 66:20 Xeet yooyooy indi seen bokk yi bokk ak yeen ñépp, jële leen ci mboolem xeet yi, ñu doon sarax bu ñeel Aji Sax ji, wari fas aki watiir, ba ci watiir yu ñu mbaar, aki berkelleeki giléem, ba agsi sama tund wu sell, wi ci Yerusalem.» Aji Sax jee ko wax. «Day mel ni noonu bànni Israyil di yóbboo sarax, yeb ko ci ndab lu sell, yóbbu kër Aji Sax ji.
Isaiah 66:21 Te ñenn ci yooyu xeet, maa leen di jël, def leen ay sarxalkat aki Leween.» Aji Sax jee ko wax.
Isaiah 66:22 «Asamaan su yees sii, ak suuf su yees sii may waaja sàkk déy, ni seen taxawaay di yàgge fi sama kanam, yeen, ni la seen askan ak seen tur di yàgge fi sama kanam.
Isaiah 66:23 Su ko defee Terutel weer ba Terutel weer, bésub Noflaay ba bésub Noflaay, mboolem doom aadama di ma sujjóotalsi.» Aji Sax jee ko wax.
Isaiah 66:24 «Te bu ñu génnee, gis néewi ñi doon fippu fi sama kaw, seeni sax duñu dee mukk, seen sawara du fey mukk, te boroom suux bu leen gis, yaram wa daw.»
Jeremiah 1:1 ¶ Muy kàddug Yeremi, góor gi baayam Ilkiya bokk ci sarxalkat yi dëkk Anatot, ca diiwaanu Beñamin.
Jeremiah 1:2 Kàddug Aji Sax ji dikkal ko ci jamonoy buuru réewum Yuda, Yosya doomu Amon. Mu yemook fukkeelu atu nguuram ak ñett.
Jeremiah 1:3 Kàddug Aji Sax ji dikkal na ko ba tey ci janti buurub Yuda, Yowakim doomu Yosya, di ko dikkal, ba keroog nguurug Cedesyas, jeneen doomu Yosya ja di jeex. Mu yemook fukkeelu atu nguuram ak benn, ca juróomeelu weer wa. Booba lañu jàpp waa Yerusalem njaam, yóbbu leen.
Jeremiah 1:4 ¶ Kàddug Aji Sax ji dikkal na ma, ne ma:
Jeremiah 1:5 «Laata ma lay sos ci sa biiru ndey, xam naa la; laata ngay juddoo ci sa ndey, séddoo naa la, def la ngay yonent ñeel xeet yi.»
Jeremiah 1:6 Ma ne: «Éy Boroom bi Aji Sax ji, da di manumaa wax, gone doŋŋ laa.»
Jeremiah 1:7 Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Bul ne: “Gone laa.” Képp ku ma la yebal, dem ca; lépp lu ma la sant, wax ko.
Jeremiah 1:8 Bu leen ragal, ngir yaw laay àndal, di la xettli.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 1:9 Aji Sax ji tàllal loxoom, laal sama gémmiñ. Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Mu ngoog, sexal naa la samay kàddu.
Jeremiah 1:10 Ma ne, tabb naa la bés niki tey, ci kaw xeet yeek réew yi, ngay buddat, di fàqat, di yàqte ak a daaneel, di defar ak a jëmbat.»
Jeremiah 1:11 ¶ Kàddug Aji Sax ji dikkal ma, ne ma: «Yeremi, loo gis?» Ma ne ko: «Caru garabu saal laa gis.»
Jeremiah 1:12 Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Yaa ko gis, maa sàlloo def sama kàddu, ngir sottal ko.»
Jeremiah 1:13 ¶ Kàddug Aji Sax ji dikkalaat ma ñaareel bi yoon, ne ma: «Loo gis?» Ma ne: «Cin luy bax laa gis. Mu ngi joye bëj-gànnaar, jublook nun.»
Jeremiah 1:14 Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Bëj-gànnaar la safaan bay fettaxe, dal ci kaw waa réew mi mépp.
Jeremiah 1:15 Maa ngii déy, di woo mboolem waasoy réewi bëj-gànnaar ak seeni buur.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Dañuy dikk, ku ne dëj ngànguneem fi janook bunti Yerusalem, jànkoonteek tataam yépp, ak dëkki Yuda yépp.
Jeremiah 1:16 Maay biral samay àtteek ñoom ci seen mbon gi gépp: Dañu maa wacc, di taalal cuuraay yeneen yàlla, di sujjóotal lu ñu sàkke seeni loxo.
Jeremiah 1:17 «Yaw nag takkul te wax leen lépp lu ma la sant. Bul am tiitaange fi seen kanam, lu ko moy ma tiital la fi seen kanam.
Jeremiah 1:18 «Maa ngii def la bésub tey nga mel ni dëkk bu mag bu tata wër, mel ni xeru weñ mbaa tatay xànjar, jàkkaarlook réew mi mépp, muy buuri Yuda aki kàngamam, di sarxalkati réew mi ak baadoolo yi.
Jeremiah 1:19 Dañu lay xeex te duñu la man, yaw laay àndal, di la xettli.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 2:1 ¶ Kàddug Aji Sax ji dikkal ma, ne ma:
Jeremiah 2:2 «Demal yéeneji lii, Yerusalem di dégg, nga ne: “Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: Maa ngi fàttliku sa ngor ba ngay ndaw, ak sa cofeel ba nga deeb séet, ba ngay topp sama gannaaw ca màndiŋ ma, ba ngay jaare fa dara dul sax.
Jeremiah 2:3 Mooy ba Israyil dee lu ñu sellalal Aji Sax ji, di ndoortel meññeefam. Képp ku ko sex, toppees ko ko, musiba dikkal ko.”» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 2:4 Dégluleen kàddug Aji Sax ji, yeen waa kër Yanqóoba, ba ci mboolem làngi kër Israyil.
Jeremiah 2:5 Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Ana sikk bu ma seeni maam gisal, ba tax ñu sore ma, di topp xërëmi neen, ba far neen?
Jeremiah 2:6 Newuñu: “Ana Aji Sax, ji nu génne woon réewum Misra, jiite nu ca biir màndiŋ ma, ca joor gu wow gaak xur ya, réewum maral ma lëndëm këruus, jaareesu fa, dëkkeesu fa?”
Jeremiah 2:7 Ma indi leen suuf su nangu, ngir leel leeni meññeefam aki ngëneelam. Ngeen dikk sobeel sama suuf sii, ba sama céru suuf si siblu.
Jeremiah 2:8 «Sarxalkat yi newuñu: “Ana Aji Sax ji?” Ñi ŋank yoon wi faaleetuñu ma, njiit yi gàntal ma, yonent yiy waxe waxyuy Baal, tuur mi, di topp lu leen dul jariñ.
Jeremiah 2:9 Moo ma tax di layooteek yeen, ba layook seeni sët.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 2:10 «Jàll-leen ba ca duni Kitim fa sowu, te xool; yónneeleen Kedar fa penku, seetlu bu baaxa baax ndegam dingeen gis lu mel nii!
Jeremiah 2:11 Fu aw xeet masa weccee yàllaam? Moonte duñuy yàlla sax! Moona xeet wi ma séddoo weccoo séen darajay Yàlla te du leen jariñ dara.
Jeremiah 2:12 Asamaanee, waarul ci lii! Jommil, ba jommaaral!» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 2:13 «Ñaari yoon la xeet wi ma séddoo bàkkaar: ma di bëtu ndox muy dund, ñu wacc ma, man, di gasal seen bopp kàmbi dencukaayi ndox, te kàmb yi fett, di senn.
Jeremiah 2:14 «Israyil da dib jaam a? Am daa juddoo kërug njaam? Ana lu tax ñu doon alalu sëxëtoo?
Jeremiah 2:15 Gaynde yaa ngi ŋar ci seen kaw, di leen xiiru! Gaynde yee gental seenum réew, ba seeni dëkk di gent yu kenn dëkkul.
Jeremiah 2:16 Te it niti Memfisoo niti Tapanes ñooy dikk wat leen nel.
Jeremiah 2:17 Xanaa du yeena def seen bopp lii, di wacc seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, ba mu leen di jiite ca yoon wa?
Jeremiah 2:18 Léegi lu ngeen wuti Misra? Dangeen di naani ca ndoxum Niil ma ca Misraa? Lu ngeen wuti Asiri? Dangeen di naani ca dexu Efraat ca Babilon a?
Jeremiah 2:19 Seenug mbon a leen di mbugal, seen ñàkk kóllëre yar leen. Ñamleen ba gis ni ngeen ma dëddoo, wormaalatuleen ma, man seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, muy loraange ju leen wex.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee, Boroom gàngoor yi.
Jeremiah 2:20 «Yàgg ngeena yiwiku, dog seeni jéng, ba ne dungeen ma jaamu. Kaw tundoo tund, ker garaboo garab gu naat, gànctu ngeen fa.
Jeremiah 2:21 Moona maa leen jëmbat, ngeen di ngëneelu reseñ, di jiwu mu mucc ayib. Nu ngeen walbatikoo di baadooloy reseñu àll?
Jeremiah 2:22 Bu ngeen raggoo woon saabu, ba raggooteek xeme it, seen ñaawtéef gàkk, may gis.» Kàddug Boroom bi Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 2:23 «Nu ngeen ñemee naa: “Sobeelunu sunu bopp te toppunu tuuri Baal?” Seetleen li ngeen nekke ci xur wi, xool-leen li ngeen di def, mel ni giléem gu ndaw, di wodd-woddi, fu ne mu daw jëm fa,
Jeremiah 2:24 mbaa mbaamu àll mu miin màndiŋ mi, xabtaloo bakkanam, di xañtu ngelaw li. Bu bëggee tëbu, ku ko mana téye? Kuuy mu koy sàkku du sonn, bu ci tolloo rekk, mu jot ko.
Jeremiah 2:25 Ma ne, buleen daw ba mujje tànki neen ak put gu wow. Ngeen naa: “Bul sonn, sopp nanu yàllay doxandéem yi, te ñoom lañuy topp!”»
Jeremiah 2:26 «Gàcceg sàcc bu ñu jàpp dees na ko gàcceel waa kër Israyil, ñook seeni buur ak seeni kàngam ak seeni sarxalkat ak seeni yonent,
Jeremiah 2:27 ñoom ñii naa bii bant: “Yaay sunu baay,” naan wee doj: “Yaa nu sukk, jur.” Wonuñu ma kanam, xanaa gannaaw, te bu leen musiba dikkalee, ñu naa: “Wallu nu boog!”
Jeremiah 2:28 Waaw, ana seen yàlla yi ngeen sàkkal seen bopp? Bu leen musiba dikkalee, nañ leen wallu, bu ñu ko manee! Gannaaw yeen waa Yuda, ni seeni dëkk tollu la seeni yàlla tollu!
Jeremiah 2:29 Ana lu ngeen di layook man? Yeen ñépp a ma gàntal!» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 2:30 «Mbugal naa seeni doom, jariñul dara. Dégguñu yar, bóom ngeen seeni yonent, mbete gaynde yuy fàdde.
Jeremiah 2:31 Éey niti Israyili tey, teewluleen kàddug Aji Sax ji! «Ni màndiŋ mi aaye, ndax mas naa nee aaye ci Israyil? Mbaa ma mel ni réewum lëndëm aki loraangeem? Lu waral sama ñoñ naa: “Noo moom sunu bopp, dootunu délsi fi yaw”?
Jeremiah 2:32 Ab janq dina fàtte takkaayam? Am ab séet dina fàtte mbubbum xewam? Moona sama ñoñ fàtte nañu ma fan yu dul jeex.
Jeremiah 2:33 Yeen aka mokkal gànctu! Jeeg ju bon ji sax di jànge ci yeen.
Jeremiah 2:34 Te seeni pendal sax taq na dereti néew-ji-doole yu deful dara, fekkuleen leen it ñuy dàjji kër jaambur. Loolu yépp terewul,
Jeremiah 2:35 ngeen naan: “Nun de defunu dara, merum Yàlla won na nu gannaaw moos.” Gannaaw nee ngeen bàkkaaruleen, maa ngii di leen àtte.
Jeremiah 2:36 Yeen aka yomba soppi doxalin! Waaye Misraa leen di bett, na leen Asiri bette woon,
Jeremiah 2:37 ngeen jóge ca yenu seeni loxo. Aji Sax jee wacc ñi ngeen yaakaar, ba dungeen baaxlee ci ñoom.»
Jeremiah 3:1 Mu ne: «Su waay fasee jabaram, mu dem doon jabaru keneen, Su waa ja jëlaatee ndaw sa ëllëg, Loolu du sobeela sobeel réew mii? Moona yeen gànctu ngeen aki fari far, Ana nu ngeen mana délsee fi man?» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 3:2 «Téenleen, séentu tund ya ne faraas! Ana fu ñu leen fi tëddewul? Ci yoon yi ngeen di yeeroo ni màngaan muy dogalee ci màndiŋ mi. Sobeel ngeen réew meek seen gànctook seenug mbon.
Jeremiah 3:3 Moo tax waame aje, taw yiy mujje dikkul. Teewul ngeen dëgër bët nib gànc, ñàkk gàcce!
Jeremiah 3:4 Léegi ngeen di ma woo wall naa: “Baay, yaay sama xejj ca ba may ndaw.
Jeremiah 3:5 Xanaa deesul mer ba fàww? Xanaa xadar du sax?” Ma ne: “Israyiloo, yeena ko wax, waaye bon ngeen lu ngeen man.”»
Jeremiah 3:6 ¶ Aji Sax ji nag wax ma ci jamonoy buur Yosya ne ma: «Gis nga li Israyil Woyof-Kumba-si def? Di dem kaw tundoo tund ak ker garaboo garab gu naat, di fa gànctu.
Jeremiah 3:7 Ma noon su ma defee loolu lépp ba noppi, dina délsi, te délsiwul. Te doomu ndeyam Yuda workat bi gis na ci.
Jeremiah 3:8 Gis naa ne it Israyil Woyof-Kumba-si gànctu na ba ma yebal ko, jox ko kayitu pase, mu dem, te taxul doomu ndeyam Yuda workat bi ragal. Moom it daa dem di gànctu.
Jeremiah 3:9 Ni gànctu yombe Israyil tax na réew mi sobewu. Njaaloo naak yàllay doj, njaalook yàllay bant.
Jeremiah 3:10 Loolu yépp itam taxul Yuda workat bi, doomu ndeyu Israyil, délsee léppi xolam fi man, xanaa di jinigal rekk.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 3:11 Aji Sax ji nag ne ma: «Li Israyil di woyof kumba lépp sax moo tane Yuda workat bi.
Jeremiah 3:12 Demal yéeneji kàddu yii fa bëj-gànnaar. Nga ne: “Israyiloo, Woyof-Kumba, délsil.” Kàddug Aji Sax jee. “Duma la fasal kanam. Man Boroom ngor laa, te duma jàpp mer ba fàww.” Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 3:13 “Nangul ne ñaaw nga rekk, te man sa Yàlla Aji Sax ji nga tooñ, di wër di foye sa bopp ak yàllay doxandéem yi ci ker garaboo garab gu naat, te dégluwoo ma.”» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 3:14 «Yeen doom yu woyof kumba yi, délsileen.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Maay seen boroom kër, maay jële kenn ci bii dëkk, ñaar ca bee gox, boole indi Siyoŋ,
Jeremiah 3:15 tànnal leen sàmm yu ma doy, ñu sàmme leen xam-xam akug muus.
Jeremiah 3:16 Janti keroog bu ngeen baree ba giir ci réew mi, deesul waxe gaalu kóllërey Aji Sax ji; xel dootu ci dem, deesu ko fàttliku sax, te deesu ko namm, deesu ko sàkkati sax.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 3:17 «Janti keroog Yerusalem, ngànguney Aji Sax ji lees koy wooye, xeetoo xeet di fi daje, ngir Aji Sax, ji turam ñeel Yerusalem, te dootuñu të ticc ci seen mébét yu bon.
Jeremiah 3:18 Janti keroog waa kër Yuda ànd ak waa kër Israyil, bawoondoo réewum bëj-gànnaar, wuti réew ma ma séddoon seeni maam.
Jeremiah 3:19 «Maa leen naroona teral ni doom yu góor, may leen suuf su xemmemlu, ngeen gënle xeet yépp suuf. Ma noon dingeen ma wooye baay te dungeen ma dëddu mukk.
Jeremiah 3:20 Teewul, yeen waa kër Israyiloo, ngeen wor ma, ni as ndaw di wore faram.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 3:21 «Coow dégtu na kaw tund ya ne faraas, bànni Israyil ay jooy ak a tinu. Ñoo lajj seenu yoon, fàtte seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji.
Jeremiah 3:22 Yeen doom yu woyof kumba yi, waññikuleen, ma fajtal seen woyof kumba.»
Jeremiah 3:23 Naxi neen kay lañu jële ca xërëmi tund yu ndaw ya ak coowal kaw tund yu mag ya. Muccu Israyil kay, fi sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji.
Jeremiah 3:24 Ba ñuy gone ba tey, tuur mu ruslu maa ngi neenal ñaqu maam yi, seen jur gu gudd ak gu gàtt, ba ci seeni doom, góor ak jigéen.
Jeremiah 3:25 Nan gapproo sunu gàcce, sàngoo sunu toroxte. Nook sunuy maam déy, ba ñuy gone ba tey jii, nu ngi tooñ sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji, te déggalunu sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji.
Jeremiah 4:1 «Yaw Israyil, sooy waññiku, waññikul fi man.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Soo jëlee fi sama kanam sa jëf ju siblu, te jenguloo,
Jeremiah 4:2 xanaa di waate Aji Sax jiy dund, ci dëgg ak njub ak ngor, kon xeet yi di barkeeloo Aji Sax ji, di ko sagoo.»
Jeremiah 4:3 Aji Sax ji déy dafa wax waa Yudak Yerusalem, ne leen: «Ruujleen seen tool, buleen ji ciy dég.
Jeremiah 4:4 Yeen waa Yudak Yerusalem, deeleen xaraf ngir Aji Sax ji, dogleen seen mbuñukay xol, balaa sama xadar ne jippét ni sawara, di tàkk te deesu ko fey ndax seen jëf ju bon.
Jeremiah 4:5 «Nangeen yégle lii fa Yuda, dégtale ko fa Yerusalem, yéenee koog liit fi biir réew mi te xaacu seen kem kàttan ne leen: “Dajeleen, nu dem ca dëkk ya tata wër.”
Jeremiah 4:6 Yékkatileen raaya, jubale Siyoŋ, làqujileen, buleen taxaw, musiba déy laay jële bëj-gànnaar, muy safaan bu réy.
Jeremiah 4:7 «Gayndee fëlle geeram, fàkkaskatu xeet yee jóg, génne këram, nara gental seeni dëkk, ba ñu di gent yu kenn dëkkul.
Jeremiah 4:8 Kon nag sol-leeni saaku, ñaawloo te yuuxu ne: “Merum Aji Sax ji tàng na kat te moyu nu.”
Jeremiah 4:9 Bésub keroog,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «xolu buur jeex, kàngam ne yàcc, sarxalkat waaru, yonent jommi.»
Jeremiah 4:10 Ma ne, «Éy Boroom bi Aji Sax ji, yaa naxlu askan wii nax yu metti, ba nga nee: “Yerusalem jàmm lay am,” te saamar tege ci putam.»
Jeremiah 4:11 Janti keroog dees na wax askanu Yerusalem wii, ne leen: «Jaas bu tàng a uppe kaw tund ya ne faraas ca màndiŋ ma, wuti sama ñoñ. Du doon ngelaw lees di bàcceek a beese.
Jeremiah 4:12 Ngelaw lu ko ëpp doole laay indi. Léegi maa leen di biral sama kàddug mbugal.»
Jeremiah 4:13 «Noon baa ngii, di jóg niy niir, watiiri xareem ni ngëlén, fasam ya gëna gaawi jaxaay. Wóoy ngalla nun, yàqu nan!»
Jeremiah 4:14 «Éey Yerusalem, fóotal sa xol, jële ci lu bon, ndax nga mucc. Foo àppal sa mébéti xol yu bon?
Jeremiah 4:15 Kàddug yéenee ngi jibe Dan, musiba dégtu na, bawoo tundu Efrayim.
Jeremiah 4:16 Jottlileen ko xeet yi, neleen Yerusalem: “Songkat yaa ngii riire réew mu sore ma, xaacoondoo fi kaw dëkki Yuda.”
Jeremiah 4:17 Ñooy gaw Yerusalem ni wattukati tool, ndax man la gàntal.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 4:18 «Sa jëfin ak say jëf a la yóbbe lii, sa musibaa ngook, wex la xàtt, di dagg sa xol.»
Jeremiah 4:19 Maaka jàqa jàq bay jal-jali, sama xol biy fuddu! Éy wii mititu xol! Duma mana noppi, maa dégg wooteb liit ak yuuxi xare.
Jeremiah 4:20 Yéenees na rajaxoo ci kaw rajaxoo, réew mi mépp ne tasar kay! Jekki-jekki samay xayma tasaaroo. Xef-xippi ndimoy xayma ya xotatoo!
Jeremiah 4:21 Xanaa duma gis ba fàww raayab noon, liitu xare di ko feelu?
Jeremiah 4:22 «Dofe la sama ñoñ def. Man, xamuñu maay kan, mbetey gone yu dul xalaat dara; dég-dég, tus; seen xel mépp, lu bon rekk, lu baax, xamuñu ci dara.»
Jeremiah 4:23 Maa xool suuf, ndeke ma nga ne maraas, ne wëyëŋ; ma xool asamaan, leer amatu ca.
Jeremiah 4:24 Ma xool tund yu mag yi, ndeke ñu ngi yëngu, tund yu ndaw yépp di jaayu.
Jeremiah 4:25 Ma xoolaat, gisuma nit, njanaaw yépp daw.
Jeremiah 4:26 Ma xool, gis suuf su nangu sa di ndànd-foyfoy, dëkk yépp raaf ndax Aji Sax jeek tàngaayu sànjam.
Jeremiah 4:27 Aji Sax ji déy dafa wax ne: «Duma tas lépp tasar, waaye réew mi mépp ay gental.
Jeremiah 4:28 Loolooy tax suuf di ñaawlu, asamaan di lëndëm. Maa ko wax, maa ko dogu; duma dëpp, duma deltu gannaaw.»
Jeremiah 4:29 Gawar ak fittkat riir, waa dëkk yépp fëx, ñii tàbbiy gajj, ñee ñalgu ci kawi doj, ñu won dëkkoo dëkk gannaaw, kenn desatu ca.
Jeremiah 4:30 Yaw Yerusalem mu tas mi, ana looy def nii, di solu ba yànj, gànjaroo wurus, tusngalu, yàkkleey gët? Yaa ngi caaxoñu ci neen: say xéddkat wacc nañu la, sa bakkan lañuy wut.
Jeremiah 4:31 Baatu ndaw su jagadi laa dégg, ma nga jàq, di matub taawam. Baatub Siyoŋ, dëkk bu taaru baa! Ma ngay àppaat, tàllal yoxo ya, naan: «Wóoy, ngalla man; ne yàcc ci loxol bóomkat yi!»
Jeremiah 5:1 «Wërleen mbeddi Yerusalem, xool-leen, seet ciy péncam rekk ba xam ndegam dingeen gis kenn, kenn kepp kuy def njub, di sàmm worma, ma daldi leen baal.
Jeremiah 5:2 Bu ñu nee sax: “Giñ naa ko ci Aji Sax jiy dund,” ay fen lañuy giñ.»
Jeremiah 5:3 Aji Sax ji, xanaa du worma ngay sàkku? Dóor nga leen, safu leen; nga làbbli, ñu tanqamlu, wowle ba raw doj, baña dëpp.
Jeremiah 5:4 Man nag, ma noon: «Ñii de ay baadoolo rekk lañu, di def jëfi dof, xamuñu yoonu Aji Sax ji, xamuñu lu seen àtteb Yàlla laaj.
Jeremiah 5:5 Kon naa dem seeti kàngam yi, wax ak ñoom. Xanaa ñoom dinañu xam yoonu Aji Sax ji, xam lu seen àtteb Yàlla laaj.» Waaye ñoo bokk daggook Yàlla, dogook moom.
Jeremiah 5:6 Moo tax gaynde di génne ci gott bi, fàdd leen, bukkiy màndiŋ mi di leen yàpp, segg di tëru seeni dëkk, ku ca génne, dees na la xotat. Seeni moy a bare, te seen ñàkk worma réy.
Jeremiah 5:7 «Yerusalem, ana lu tax ma di la baal, te say doom wacc ma, di giñe lu dul Yàlla. Ma reggal leen, teewul ñuy njaaloo, riixle, jëm kër gànc ya!
Jeremiah 5:8 Mbete fas yu suur, tukkal, ku ne ŋexal, jëm sa jabaru moroom.
Jeremiah 5:9 Lii, duma leen ko dumaa?» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. Mu ne: «Wii xeet, duma ko fey yoolam?»
Jeremiah 5:10 «Yéegleen seeni tata, yàqte waaye buleen leen jeexal tàkk. Tenqileen lawit yi, ñooñoo bokkul ci Aji Sax ji.
Jeremiah 5:11 Waa kër Israyil ak waa kër Yuda kat, ñoo ma wora wor!» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 5:12 Mu ne: «Ñoo fenal Aji Sax ji, naan: “Moom du def dara, musiba du nu dal, saamaroo, xiifoo, dunu ci gis dara.
Jeremiah 5:13 Yonent yi daal, ngelawal neen! Kàddug waxyu newul ci ñoom; li ñuy wax, na leen yenu!”»
Jeremiah 5:14 Moo tax Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: «Gannaaw wax jii lañu wax, maa ngii di def samay wax di sawara ci sa gémmiñ, askan wii di matt, mu xoyom leen.
Jeremiah 5:15 Éey waa kër Israyil,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «maa ngii di indi fi seen kaw xeet wu bawoo fu sore. Xeet wu am kàttan lañu, xeet wu yàgga yàgg, wu ngeen xamul seen làmmiñ, te dégguleen seeni wax.
Jeremiah 5:16 Seen mbari fitt ŋafal paxum bàmmeel, ñoom ñépp di ñeyi xare.
Jeremiah 5:17 Ñooy dikk, warax seen meññeef ak seen ñam, jeexal seeni doom, góor ak jigéen, lekk seen jur gu gudd ak gu gàtt, saax-saaxee seeni reseñ ak seeni figg; te dëkk yi ngeen yaakaare seeni tata, dooley saamar a koy tas.
Jeremiah 5:18 Waaye bési keroog it,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «duma leen jeexal tàkk.
Jeremiah 5:19 Bu ñu nee: “Ana lu waral sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji teg nu lii lépp?” ne leen: “Yàlla nee: Ni ngeen ma dëddoo, di jaamu yàllay jaambur ci seenum réew, ni ngeen di jaamujee ay jaambur biir réew mu ngeen moomul.”»
Jeremiah 5:20 «Jottlileen lii waa kër Yanqóoba, biral-leen ko fa Yuda, ne leen:
Jeremiah 5:21 Ngalla dégluleen lii, xeet wu dofe, ñàkk xel wi ngeen doon, ami gët te dungeen gis, ami nopp te dungeen dégg!
Jeremiah 5:22 Man daal, dungeen ma ragal, am tiituleen ma?» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Man mi teg gannuus, yemalee ko géej, dogalal ko ko dàkk te du ko jàll, lu mu wañax wañax du ko man; gannax ya day riir, te du jàll!
Jeremiah 5:23 Waaye wii xeet a dëgër bopp te déggadi. Dëddu nañu ma ba wéy.
Jeremiah 5:24 Seen xel demul sax ba ne: “Tee noo ragal sunu Yàlla Aji Sax, jiy jot, mu tawal nu, taw yu jëkk ak yu mujj yi, àppal nu ayi bési ngóob, sédde nu?”
Jeremiah 5:25 Yooyii seeni ñaawtéef a ko waññi, seen bàkkaar a leen xañ ngëneel.
Jeremiah 5:26 «Waaw! Daa am ñu bon ci sama ñoñ, ñuy tërook a fiire mbete nappkati picc.
Jeremiah 5:27 Ni kaaf di feeseeki picc, ni la seeni kër di feese alali càcc, ba tax ñu yokku ba woomle,
Jeremiah 5:28 yaflu, di nes-nesi. Seenug mbon it amul kem: duñu defal jirim njub, duñu àtte néew-ji-doole dëgg.
Jeremiah 5:29 Lii, duma leen ko dumaa?» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Xeet wu mel nii duma ko fey yoolam?
Jeremiah 5:30 Lu siblu te yées am na ci réew mi:
Jeremiah 5:31 Yonent yiy wax waxyuy fen, sarxalkat yiy jiitee seen coobare, te sama ñoñ soppe ko ni! Moo bu muj ga taxawee, nu ngeen di def?»
Jeremiah 6:1 «Yeen askanu Beñamin, fëxleen, génn Yerusalem. Wal-leen liit gi fa Tekowa, jafaleleen jum yi Bet Kerem, artoo ko, musiba kat a ngi yëre bëj-gànnaar, di safaan bu réy.
Jeremiah 6:2 Yaw Siyoŋ, dëkk bu taaru bi te xejj, dama lay dammat.
Jeremiah 6:3 Ay sàmm ak seeni gétt ci sa kaw, ñu samp seeni xayma, wër la, di foral, ku nekk ak pàccam.
Jeremiah 6:4 Ñii ne: “Waajal-leen xare baak ñoom, nu songi leen digg bëccëg. Waaye wóoy nun, jant a ngi lang, keru ngoon di law!”
Jeremiah 6:5 Ñee ne: “Nan song congum guddi boog, ba rajaxe seen kër yu yànj.”»
Jeremiah 6:6 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi déy da ne: «Gorleeni bant, sëkke Yerusalem, gaw ko! Dëkk bii dees koy mbugal, àqu noteel la fees dell.
Jeremiah 6:7 Ni bëtu ndox di dawe, ni lañuy dawale seenug coxor. Fitnaak salfaañooy riir ci dëkk bi, gisuma lu moy jagadeek loraange!»
Jeremiah 6:8 «Yeen waa Yerusalem, deeleen dégg bala ma leena dëddu, ba gental réew mi gent bu kenn dëkkul.»
Jeremiah 6:9 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: «Nañu witta witt ndesu Israyil, ni ñuy witte reseñ, ba nga dawalaat say loxo ca car ya.»
Jeremiah 6:10 Moo kan laay waxal, àrtu ko ba mu déglu, yii boroom noppi paaxee tëë teewlu! Kàddug Aji Sax jaa ngii, mel ni lu ñu rus, lu ñu safoowul!
Jeremiah 6:11 Maa ngi meral Aji Sax ji ba fees ba manatuma koo dékku. Aji Sax ji nee: «Sippi ko tuut-tànk yi ci mbedd mi, sippiwaale ko waxambaane yi daje, mu laawaale jëkkër ak jabar, mag ak màggat,
Jeremiah 6:12 seeni kër doon alali jaambur, ak seeni tool it ak seeni jabar. Maay xàcci sama loxo déy, dal ci kaw waa réew mi.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 6:13 «Ndax ki gëna tuut ba ki gëna mag, ñépp a ngi lewal lu lewul. Yonent akub sarxalkat, ñépp a ngi wor.
Jeremiah 6:14 Sofental nañu sama pajum ñoñ ñi dammtoo, naan: “Jàmm, lépp jàmm!” te jàmm amul.
Jeremiah 6:15 Ñu wara am gàcce ci seen jëf ju siblu, te gàcce gàcceelu leen. Xamuñu sax luy kersa! Moo tax ñuy fëlëñoondook ñiy fëlëñu. Kera ba ma leen di dikkal, ñooy tërëf.» Aji Sax jee ko wax.
Jeremiah 6:16 Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Taxawleen ca selebe yoon wa, xool, te laajte yoon ya woon, ne: “Ana yoonu mbaax?” Ngeen awe ca, am noflaayu bakkan.» Ñu lànk ne: «Awunu ca.»
Jeremiah 6:17 «Ma tabbal leeni wattukat ne: “Teewluleen liit gu jib.”» Ñu lànk ne: «Teewluwnu.»
Jeremiah 6:18 «Moo tax yeen xeet yi, dégluleen; yeen waaso yi, seedeleen liy xaar ñii.
Jeremiah 6:19 Yeen waa àddina, dégluleen! Maa ngii di indil askan wii musiba, seeni pexe jural leen. Ñoo faalewul samay kàddu, gàntal sama yoon.
Jeremiah 6:20 Lu may doye lii? Ndàbb lu jóge Saba, diw gu xeeñ, bawoo réew mu sore? Seeni saraxi rendi-dóomal safu ma; seen saraxi jur, bugguma.»
Jeremiah 6:21 Moo tax Aji Sax ji wax ne: «Maa ngii di tegal askan wii ay pakk, ñu fakkastaloondoo, baay ak doom, dëkkandook ub xarit, ñépp sànku.»
Jeremiah 6:22 Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Aw askan a ngii bàyyikoo réewum bëj-gànnaar, xeet wu mag lañuy doon, sàqee fa cati àddina.
Jeremiah 6:23 Fitt aku xeej lañuy ŋëb, néeg lool, duñu yërëm; seen coow ni riirum géej, ñu war seeni fas, rëpptal, làng-déral leen, yeen waa Siyoŋ, dëkk bu taaru bi.»
Jeremiah 6:24 «Danoo dégg riir mi, sunuy yoxo yoqi, njàqare ne nu taral, ni mititu mat.
Jeremiah 6:25 Kii naa: “Bul génn ci àll bi!” Kee naa: “Bul jaar ci yoon wi!” Saamar kay a nga ca loxol noon ba, tiitaange dajal fépp!»
Jeremiah 6:26 Éey bokk yi, sol-leeni saaku, diwoo dóom, ñaawloo ko. Ñaawluleen ni kuy dëj benn bàjjo te jooy jooy yu metti, nde yàqkat bi day jekki, ne sunu kaw dàll!
Jeremiah 6:27 «Maa la def sama nattukatu ñoñ, nga di leen nattu ni ñuy nattoo xaalis, te war leena seetlu, nemmiku seen jikko.»
Jeremiah 6:28 Ñoom ñépp a di fippukat yu fétteeral, wër di sos, dëgërle ni xànjar ak weñ gu ñuul. Ñoom ñépp di yàqkat.
Jeremiah 6:29 Tëgg wal taalam, mu yànj; sawara seeyal beteex. Xellees na koo xelli ci neen, taxul li ci bon génn.
Jeremiah 6:30 Dees na leen wooye mbuubitum xaalis, nde Aji Sax ji buub na leen, sànni.
Jeremiah 7:1 ¶ Kàddu gii dikkal na Yeremi, bawoo fa Aji Sax ji. Mu ne ko:
Jeremiah 7:2 «Taxawil fa bunti kër Aji Sax ji, nga yéene fa kàddu gii, ne leen: “Mboolem yeen waa Yuda ñiy jàlle bunt yii, di jaamusi Aji Sax ji, dégluleen kàddug Aji Sax ji.
Jeremiah 7:3 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, Yàllay Israyil dafa wax ne: Jekkal-leen seeni jikkook seeni jëf, ma dëël leen bii bérab.
Jeremiah 7:4 Buleen naxe seen bopp kàdduy caaxaan, naan: ‘Kër Aji Sax jaa ngi, kër Aji Sax jaa ngi fii, kër Aji Sax jee!’
Jeremiah 7:5 Su ngeen jekkalee jekkal seeni jikko ak seeni jëf déy, di defa def yoon seen digg ak seen moroom,
Jeremiah 7:6 te notuleen doxandéem, ab jirim akub jëtun, tuuruleen deretu jaamburu Yàlla, fi bii bérab, toppuleen yeneen yàlla bay loru,
Jeremiah 7:7 su boobaa, ma dëël leen bii bérab, réew mi ma joxoon seeni maam, bu yàgg, ba fàww.
Jeremiah 7:8 Yeena ngii di naxe seen bopp waxi caaxaan yu amul njariñ.
Jeremiah 7:9 Yeen, nu ngeen mane di sàcc, di bóome, di jaaloo, di giñi fen, di taalal Baal, tuur mi cuuraay, di topp yeneen yàlla yu ngeen xamul,
Jeremiah 7:10 tey dikk taxaw fi sama kanam, biir kër gii ñu ma tudde, te naan: ‘Nun kay raw nanu,’ ba tax ngeen di def mboolem lu siblu lii?
Jeremiah 7:11 rawtub sàcc daal ngeen def kër gii ñu ma tudde? Man de lii laa gis!” Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 7:12 ¶ «“Demleen rekk kay ca sama bérab ba ca Silo, fa ma jëkkoona dëël sama tur, ngeen xool na ma ko def ngir mbonug Israyil, sama ñoñ.
Jeremiah 7:13 ¶ «“Gannaaw def ngeen jëf jii jépp nag,” kàddug Aji Sax jee, “te ma waxoon leena wax ay yooni yoon, dégluwleen; woo leen, wuyuwleen,
Jeremiah 7:14 kër gii ñu ma tudde, ngeen yaakaar ko, bérab bii ma leen joxoon, yeen ak seeni maam, na ma def Silo laa koy def.
Jeremiah 7:15 Dama leen di dàq, ngeen sore ma, na ma dàqe woon seen bokk yépp, askanu Efrayim gépp.”
Jeremiah 7:16 ¶ «Waaye yaw bul ñaanal askan wii, bu leen yékkatil kàddug ñaan, bu leen tinul fi man. Du maa lay déglu moos!
Jeremiah 7:17 ¶ «Xanaa gisoo li ñu nekke fi dëkki Yuda ak ci mbeddi Yerusalem?
Jeremiah 7:18 Doom a ngi taxan, baay di taal, jigéen di not lu mu nàkkal ki ñuy wooye Lingeeru asamaan, di tuural ay naan yeneen yàlla, di ma ko naqarale!
Jeremiah 7:19 Du man lañuy naqaral moos!» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. Mu ne: «Xanaa kay ñoo ciy rus!»
Jeremiah 7:20 ¶ Moo tax Aji Sax ji Boroom bi dafa wax ne: «Sama xadar a ngii di sottiku fi bii bérab, fi kaw nit ak mala, garab ak lu suuf meññ, lépp ne jippét, te deesu ko fey.»
Jeremiah 7:21 ¶ Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, Yàllay Israyil dafa ne: «Seen juru saraxu rendi-dóomal, dollileen ko ci seen yeneen sarax, te lekk yàpp wi.
Jeremiah 7:22 Bés ba may génne seeni maam Misra déy, waxuma leen woon mbaa di leen sant mbirum saraxu rendi-dóomal ak yeneen sarax.
Jeremiah 7:23 Mbir mii déy laa leen santoon ne leen: “Déggal-leen ma, ma doon seen Yàlla; yeen ngeen doon sama ñoñ. Doxeleen wépp yoon wu ma leen sant, su ko defee ngeen baaxle.”
Jeremiah 7:24 Waaye déggluwñu ma, teewluwñu ma, xanaa di jëfe seen xel ak seen dëgër bopp ak seen bon xol, ba tax ñu dellu gannaaw, jëmuñu kanam.
Jeremiah 7:25 La dale bés ba seeni maam génnee réewum Misra ba bésub tey jii, yónnee naa leen bés bu nekk mboolem sama jaam ñi, yonent yi.
Jeremiah 7:26 Waaye dégluwñu, teewluwñu ma, xanaa sajju loos, di bon, ba yées seeni maam.
Jeremiah 7:27 ¶ «Dinga leen wax kàddu yii yépp, te duñu la déglu, nga woo leen, duñu la wuyu.
Jeremiah 7:28 Su ko defee nga ne leen: “Xeet a ngii wu dul déglu kàddug Yàllaam Aji Sax ji, nanguwñu yar, worma tumurànkeel leen, ba daggook seen làmmiñ.”
Jeremiah 7:29 «Waa Yerusalemee, seen njañ li ngeen séddoo Yàlla, xuufleen ko, sànni, ñaawloo ko, xaaculeen fa kaw tund ya ne faraas, nde Aji Sax ji xalab na, wacc na seen maas gii sabab sànjam.
Jeremiah 7:30 Waa Yuda déy, ñoo def lu ma ñaawlu.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Ñoo yeb yëf yu siblu fi biir kër gi ñu ma tudde, di ko sobeel.
Jeremiah 7:31 Ñoo tabax ay jaamookaay ca Tofet fa xuru Ben Inom, di fa sarxe seeni doom, góor ak jigéen, lakk leen, te santaanewma ko, jaarul sax sama xel.
Jeremiah 7:32 Moo tax ay bés a ngii di ñëw,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «deesatul tudd Tofet mbaa xuru Ben Inom, xanaa xuru Bóomukaay.» Dees na rob ca Tofet ndax ñàkk suuf.
Jeremiah 7:33 Néewi xeet wii mujj di lekku njanaaw ak rabu àll, te kenn du leen mana dàq.
Jeremiah 7:34 Maay dakkal fi dëkki Yuda, dakkal fi mbeddi Yerusalem coowal mbégteek bànneex, dakkal kàddug boroom séet, dakkal kàddug séet, ndax réew mu tumurànke.
Jeremiah 8:1 «Su boobaa déy,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «noon yeey sulli yaxi buuri Yuda ak yaxi kàngam yi ak yaxi sarxalkat yi ak yaxi yonent yi ak yaxi waa Yerusalem, fa seeni bàmmeel,
Jeremiah 8:2 weer leen ci naaj week weer wi ak mboolem biddiiw yi ñu soppoon, di leen jaamu, di leen topp ak a sàkku, di leen sukkal. Deesu ko dajale, deesu ko suul; day mel niy jonkan fi kaw suuf si.
Jeremiah 8:3 Dee mooy gënal dund mboolem ku des ci njaboot gu bon gii, ak mboolem fu ñu dese fa ma leen tasaare woon.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee, Boroom gàngoor yi.
Jeremiah 8:4 «Nanga leen wax ne leen: Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: Ku daanu, da dul jógaat? Am ku lajj, du délsi?
Jeremiah 8:5 Lu tax xeet wii dëddu? Lu tax Yerusalem gii lajj, baña délsi? Ñu ngi langaamoo naxi neen, baña délsi.
Jeremiah 8:6 Teewlu naa, déglu naa; du lu jaadu lañu wax. Kenn tuubu ci mbonam, ba ne: “Lu ma def nii?” Ku nekk a topp yoonam, ni fas wu màmm cib xare.
Jeremiah 8:7 Ag xodd sax xam na bésub demam, pitax, wetwet ak mbelaar it dem, tey sàmm seen bésub délsi. Waaye sama ñoñ faalewuñu àtteb Aji Sax ji.
Jeremiah 8:8 Nu ngeen man ne: “Am nan xel, nungeek yoonu Aji Sax ji,” te xalimay yoonalkat soppi ko fen?»
Jeremiah 8:9 Dees na gàcceel boroom xel yi, ñu jàq, tarsu. Kàddug Aji Sax jaa ngii ñu dëddu, kon ana seenum xel?
Jeremiah 8:10 «Maay joxe seeni jabar, jox seeni tool ay foqatikat, ndax ki gëna tuut ba ki gëna mag, ñépp a ngi lewal lu lewul. Ab yonent akub sarxalkat, ñépp a ngi wor!
Jeremiah 8:11 Sofental nañu sama pajum ñoñ ñi dammtoo, naan: “Jàmm, lépp jàmm!” te jàmm amul.
Jeremiah 8:12 Ñu wara am gàcce ci seen jëf ju siblu, te gàcce gàcceelu leen. Xamuñu sax luy kersa! Moo tax ñuy fëlëñoondook ñiy fëlëñu. Kera ba ma leen di dikkal, ñooy tërëf.» Aji Sax jee ko wax.
Jeremiah 8:13 «Maa leen di witta witt.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Garabu reseñ du dese doom, figg du dese doom,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «xob ya sax day wow. Lu ma leen joxoon, rëcc na leen.»
Jeremiah 8:14 «Ana lu nuy toog? Fabuleen, nu dem ca dëkk ya tata wër, deeyi fa. Sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji nar na sunu dee; moo nu nàndal tookey mbugal, nde noo tooñ Aji Sax ji.
Jeremiah 8:15 Nuy yaakaar jàmm, dara baaxul; nuy séentum paj, tiitaange ne jaas!
Jeremiah 8:16 Seen noowi fas yaa dégtoo bëj-gànnaar fa Dan, seen naari góor di ŋexal, suuf sépp yëngu. Ñu dikk, tas réew mi tasar, booleek li ci biiram, ak dëkk beek ñi ci biiram.»
Jeremiah 8:17 «Maa ngii déy di leen yónnee jaani ñàngóor yu déggul jat, ñu di leen màtt.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 8:18 Ndaw naqar wu tiis, ndaw xol bu diis!
Jeremiah 8:19 Sama bokk yaa ngooguy yuuxu yuux yu àkki fu sore, naan: «Moo Aji Sax ji daa newul Siyoŋ a? Moo Buurub Siyoŋ da fee nekkatul a?»
Jeremiah 8:20 Ngóob wéy na, jamonoom wees, te nun de muccagunu.
Jeremiah 8:21 Sama bokk yi seen xol jeex tax na sama xol jeex, may tiislu, tancoo njàqare!
Jeremiah 8:22 Moo diwu pajtal amul Galàdd a? Am fajkat a fi amul? Ana lu waral bokk yi taneeguñu?
Jeremiah 8:23 Éy ku may duyal sama bopp ndox, saay gët di xelliy rongooñ yu ma jooye guddeek bëccëg bokk yi ñu bóom?
Jeremiah 9:1 Éy ku ma mayoon ci màndiŋ mi dalu panaanum njëggaan, ba ma teqlikook bokk yi, wacc leen, dem, bàyyi leen? Ñoom ñépp ay bokkaale, di gàngooru workat.
Jeremiah 9:2 «Ñu ngi tàwwi ni fittkat seen làmmiñu workat, seen doole ci réew mi doxaluñu ci yoon. Ñu ngii di def lu bon ci kaw lu bon, te man faalewñu ma.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 9:3 «Na ku ne moytu dëkkandoom te baña wóolu menn mbokk. Kuy mbokk déy lal nga pexem wuruj, di wuruj; kuy dëkkandoo, sos ngay wéye.
Jeremiah 9:4 Ku ne sa dëkkandoo ngay nax, te dëgg, doo ko wax. Dañoo tàmmi fen, di def njekkar ba sonn.
Jeremiah 9:5 Yeena ngi dëkke njublaŋ, njublaŋ rekk, faaleetuleen ma.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 9:6 Moo tax Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi wax ne: «Maa ngii di leen segg, nattu leen ni weñ gu sawara seeyal, xelli! Ana nu may def neneen ak sama ñoñ?
Jeremiah 9:7 Seen làmmiñ di fitt guy bóome, seeni wax dig njublaŋ. Nit di wax moroomam jàmm, te di ko tëru cim xelam.
Jeremiah 9:8 Lii duma leen ko dumaa?» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. Mu ne: «Xeet wu mel nii duma ko fey yoolam?»
Jeremiah 9:9 Tund ya laay jooy, di yuuxu, di jooy parluy màndiŋ ma, fa lépp lakk, ba jaareesu fa, déggeesul baatu jur; njanaaw ak mala, lépp daw, ne mes.
Jeremiah 9:10 «Maay def Yerusalem jali doj, till yi dëkke; ma def dëkki Yuda gent bu kenn dëkkul.»
Jeremiah 9:11 Ana ku muus, ba xam lu waral lii? Ku Aji Sax ji waxal, mu wax nu lu waral réew mi sànku, gental ni màndiŋ mi, kenn jaaru fi?
Jeremiah 9:12 Aji Sax ji neeti: «Ñoo wacc sama yoon wi ma leen tegaloon, sàmmuñu sama kàddu, jëfewuñu ko,
Jeremiah 9:13 xanaa toppoo dëgër bopp, topp tuuri Baal yi leen seeni maam miinaloon.»
Jeremiah 9:14 Moo tax Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, Yàllay Israyil dafa wax ne: «Maa ngii di leelsi xeet wii njàqarey xeme, nàndal leen tookey mbugal.
Jeremiah 9:15 Maa leen di wasaare fi biir xeet yu ñu xamuloon, du ñoom, du seeni maam. Maa leen di tofal saamar, ba raafal leen.»
Jeremiah 9:16 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: «Ne leen: Waajleena wooyi jigéeni jooykati dëj yi, ñu dikk; yónneeleen ca ña gëna man, ñu dikk.»
Jeremiah 9:17 Nañu gaaw dëbbeel nuy jooy, gët taa, rongooñ wal.
Jeremiah 9:18 Yuux a ngoog, jibe Siyoŋ. Ñu naa: «Nooka rajaxoo, torox ba ne tott, noon màbb sunuy dëkkuwaay, nu génn réew mi.»
Jeremiah 9:19 Yeen jigéen ñi, ngalla dégluleen kàddug Aji Sax ji, taataan waxam, ba jàngal seeni janq jooyi dëj, jigéen ju ne jàngal moroomam yuuxi dëj.
Jeremiah 9:20 Ndee déy moo ñalgoo sunuy palanteer, dugg sunuy kër yu yànj, ngir fàdd gone yi ci mbedd mi, ak xale yu góor yi ci pénc yi.
Jeremiah 9:21 «Ne leen: Kàddug Aji Sax jee. Néew yeey wetaroo ci àll bi, mel niy jonkan, ni gub yu góobkat won gannaaw, kenn forul.»
Jeremiah 9:22 Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Ku xelu, bumu damoom xelam; ku jàmbaare, bumu damoo njàmbaaram; ku woomle, bumu damoom koomam.
Jeremiah 9:23 Kuy damu kay, na damoom xelam mu ko may mu xam ma, xam ne maay Aji Sax, jiy jëfe ngor ak dëgg ak njekk fi kaw suuf. Loolu déy mooy sama bànneex.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 9:24 «Ay bés a ngii di ñëw,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «maay dikkal képp ku xarafam yem ci yaram,
Jeremiah 9:25 muy waa Misra, di waa Yuda, di Edomeen ñeek Amoneen ñi, di Mowabeen ñeek mboolem ñiy wat seen peggu kawaru bopp te dëkke màndiŋ mi, nde xeet yooyu, kenn xarafu ci dëgg, waaye bànni Israyil gépp it xarafuñu xarafu xol.»
Jeremiah 10:1 Yeen bànni Israyil, dégluleen kàddu, gi leen Aji Sax ji dégtal.
Jeremiah 10:2 Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Jikkoy xeeti yéefar yi, buleen ko roy; màndargam asamaan, buleen ko tiit; na ko yéefar yi tiit.
Jeremiah 10:3 Aaday xeet yi kat neen la. Garab lañuy dagge ca gott ba, ab yettkat yette ko sémmiñ,
Jeremiah 10:4 rafetale xaalis ak wurus, daaj koy pont, dëgëral, ba du yëngu;
Jeremiah 10:5 muy saf kuñeental ci biir tóokërub xaal. Du wax, du séqi jéego, ñu di ko gaŋar-gaŋaree. Buleen ko ragal, du lore, du jariñe.»
Jeremiah 10:6 Aji Sax ji, kenn melul ni yaw, yaaka màgg, jàmbaare, màggu tur.
Jeremiah 10:7 Yaw Buuru xeet yi, ana ku la dul ragal? Yaw déy yaa yelloo ragal. Mboolem ñi xelu ci xeet yi ak mboolem seeni buur, kenn melul ni yaw.
Jeremiah 10:8 Ñoom ñépp a bokk dofe, ñàkk bopp: xam-xamu kasara, bant kese!
Jeremiah 10:9 Xaalis lañuy jële Tarsis, xoobe ko bant, wurus wu jóge Ufas, ñu boole ca, ndaanaan liggéey ko, tëggu gànjar yett ko, ñu solal ko ndimo lu yolet ak lu xonq curr, lépp di liggéeyu ràbb yu xareñ.
Jeremiah 10:10 Waaye Aji Sax jeey Yàlla dëgg. Mooy Yàlla jiy dund, di buur ba fàww, xadaram gësëm àddina, meram man xeet yi.
Jeremiah 10:11 Lii nag, nangeen ko siiwal: «Seen yàlla, yi sàkkul asamaan, sàkkuñu suuf, ñooy sànku, jóge fi suuf ak fi asamaan tiim.»
Jeremiah 10:12 Suuf, Aji Sax jee sàkke kàttanam; dun bi, mu sampem xelam; asamaan, mu lale xam-xamam.
Jeremiah 10:13 Bu àddoo, ndoxum asamaan riir; mu yéegey niir fa cati àddina, yebbee ngelaw fa dencam ya, daldi melax, taw.
Jeremiah 10:14 Nitoo nit dim sannax, sore xam-xam: te képp kuy tëgg sa jëmmu tuur, yaa añe gàcce. Sa jëmmi weñ ji nga xelli, di neenug neen, noog bakkan, tus!
Jeremiah 10:15 Cóolóolu neen, liggéeyu caaxaan; bu bésam taxawee, mu sànku.
Jeremiah 10:16 Ki séddoo Yanqóoba déy wuute naak yii caaxaan. Kookoo bind lépp, te Israyil di giir gi mu séddoo. Kookooy Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoori xare yi!
Jeremiah 10:17 Yerusalemee, yeen ñi ñu gaw, forleen seen ëmb.
Jeremiah 10:18 Aji Sax ji déy dafa wax ne: «Maa ngii naa xërr waa réew mi bii yoon, teg leen njàqare, ba ñu yég ko.»
Jeremiah 10:19 «Wóoy man, yàqu naa! Ndaw góom bu metti! Dama noon lii jàngoro doŋŋ a, naa muñ!
Jeremiah 10:20 Xayma xotatoo, buumi xayma xëttandoo, samay doom wacc ma, ne mes; kenn sampatul sama xayma, firi ko.»
Jeremiah 10:21 Sàmmi xeet weeka dofe: Aji Sax ji, sàkkuwñu ko. Moo leen taxa bonle, seen jur gépp tasaaroo.
Jeremiah 10:22 Xibaar a ngoog, di ñëw, riir mu réy a yëngoo réewum bëj-gànnaar, nara gental dëkki Yuda yu mag yi, till yi dëkke.
Jeremiah 10:23 Aji Sax ji, maa xam ne nit moomul yoonam, kuy dox moomuli jéegoom.
Jeremiah 10:24 Aji Sax ji, yar ma lu yem, te bañ maa yare mer, di ma semmal.
Jeremiah 10:25 Xëppal sa xadar yéefar yi la yégul, ak làng yi la tuddul. Ñoo bóom giirug Yanqóoba, bóom leen ba fàkkas leen, gental seen dëkkuwaay.
Jeremiah 11:1 ¶ Kàddu gii dikkal na Yeremi, bawoo fa Aji Sax ji:
Jeremiah 11:2 «Dégluleen sàrti kóllëre gii. Te yaw Yeremi, nga àgge ko képp kuy waa Yuda ak waa Yerusalem.
Jeremiah 11:3 Nga ne leen: “Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil dafa wax ne: Alkànde ñeel na képp ku sàmmul sàrti kóllëre
Jeremiah 11:4 gii ma santoon seeni maam bés ba ma leen génnee réewum Misra, taalu xellikaayu weñ gu ñuul ba. Ma noon leen ngeen déggal ma te jëfe sàrti kóllëre gi ni ma leen ko sase, ba doon sama ñoñ, man ma doon seen Yàlla.
Jeremiah 11:5 Su ko defee ma wàccook ngiñ, la ma giñaloon seeni maam ne dinaa leen may réew mu meew maak lem ja tuuroo, muy fii tey.”» Ma ne ko: «Tigi, Aji Sax ji.»
Jeremiah 11:6 ¶ Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Yéeneel mboolem kàddu yii ci biir dëkki Yuda yu mag yi ak ci mbeddi Yerusalem, nga ne: “Dégluleen sàrti kóllëre gii te jëfe ko.
Jeremiah 11:7 Artu naa àrtu seeni maam, dale ko ba ma leen génnee réewum Misra, ba tey jii ma jàppoo di leen àrtu, naan leen ngeen déggal ma.
Jeremiah 11:8 Waaye dégluwñu, teewluwñu, xanaa ku nekk di wéye dëgër bopp, topp ag bon xolam. Moo tax ma wàcce ci seen kaw mboolem sàrti kóllëre gii ma leen santoon ñu war koo jëfe te jëfewuñu ko.”»
Jeremiah 11:9 ¶ Aji Sax ji dellu ne ma: «Pexem fippu feeñ na ca Yuda gépp ak ca waa Yerusalem.
Jeremiah 11:10 Dellu nañu ca seen ñaawtéefi maam, ya bañoona sàmm samay kàddu. Ñoom it topp nañu yeneen yàlla, di leen jaamu. Waa kër Israyil ak waa kër Yuda fecci nañu kóllëre ga ma fasoon ak seeni maam.»
Jeremiah 11:11 ¶ Moo tax Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Maa ngii di leen wàcceel musiba mu ñu dul mana rëcc. Dinañu ma ne wóoy te duma leen déglu.
Jeremiah 11:12 Su ko defee waa dëkki Yuda yu mag yeek waa Yerusalem dem jooytuji ca yàlla, ya ñuy taalal cuuraay, te duñu leen mana wallu mukk ci seen jamonoy musiba.
Jeremiah 11:13 ¶ «Yaw Yuda, ni sa dëkk yu mag tollu, ni la say tuur tollu. Ni mbeddi Yerusalem tollu it, ni la sarxalukaay yi ñu fa saam tollu, ñu di fa taalal cuuraay Baal, tuur mu seexluwu mi.»
Jeremiah 11:14 ¶ «Yaw nag Yeremi, bul ñaanal askan wii. Bu leen tinul, bu leen dagaanal. Ndax kat keroog bu ñu nekkee ci seen musiba, ba naan ma wóoy, du maay déglu.»
Jeremiah 11:15 «Ana lu samay soppe di defati sama kër? Ñu bare ci ñoom a ngi def lu bon. Ndax seeni sarax man naa far seen jëf ju ñaaw, ba tax bu ñuy def lu bon, di ko bége?»
Jeremiah 11:16 Oliw naat, jekki doom; nii la leen Aji Sax ji tudde woon, waaye riir mu réy lay jibal, jafal ko, mu tàkk, taar réer car ya, meŋŋ.
Jeremiah 11:17 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor bi leen jëmbatoon, moo leen tuddal lu bon. Nee: «Waa kër Israyil ak Yuda ñoo def lu bon, di taalal Baal cuuraay ba merloo ma.»
Jeremiah 11:18 Aji Sax jee ma xamal, ma xam, ba gis seeni jëf.
Jeremiah 11:19 Ndax damaa naagu woon ni xar mu ñu jëme rendikaay ba. Xawma woon ne man lañuy lalal ay pexe, naan: «Nan gor garab ak doomam, dagge ko fi réewum boroom bakkan, ba deesul fàttlikooti turam.»
Jeremiah 11:20 Ma ñaan Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, kiy àtte dëgg, di nattu xel ak xol, ne ko: «Yaw laa diis sama mbir, won ma séen mbugal.»
Jeremiah 11:21 ¶ Moo tax Aji Sax ji wax lii ci mbirum waa Anatot, ñiy wut sama bakkan, naan ma: «Baal di waxe waxyu ci turu Aji Sax ji, lu ko moy nu rey la.»
Jeremiah 11:22 Moo tax kay Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi wax ne: «Maa ngii di wàccesi mbugal fi seen kaw; seen xale yu góor fàddoo saamar, seeni doom, góor ak jigéen, deeye xiif.
Jeremiah 11:23 Aw nit, duñu ko dese; maay wàcceel waa Anatot safaan, bu seen atu mbugal taxawee.»
Jeremiah 12:1 Aji Sax ji, dëggu nga def, li may tawatsi fi yaw lépp. Teewul ma di la diis mbir: lu tax ku bon di baaxle, bépp workat bu bon di féex?
Jeremiah 12:2 Yaa leen jëmbat, ñu sampi reen, law ba meññ; jegeñal la seen làmmiñ, te fekk nga sore seen xol.
Jeremiah 12:3 Waaye yaw Aji Sax ji, xam nga ma; gis nga ma, seetlu sama xol ci yaw. Diri leen niy xar yu ñuy rendi, beral leen bésub rendi.
Jeremiah 12:4 Ba kañ la réew mi naa sereŋ, gàncaxu tooloo tool di lax? Rabu àll ak njanaaw a ngi sànku ngir mbonug ñi fi dëkk te naan: «Moom xoolul sunu muj!»
Jeremiah 12:5 «Ndegam boroom ñaari tànk ngay rawanteel, xoox, nooy rawanteeki fas? Soo wóoluwul lu moy àll bu ne yàmblaŋ, nooy def ak gottub Yurdan?
Jeremiah 12:6 Say bokk ak sa waa kër baay sax, ñoom it wor nañu la, ñoom it xaacu nañu, sam la; te bu ñu lay wax jàmm it, bu leen gëm.»
Jeremiah 12:7 «Dëddu naa sama kër, maa wacc sama séddoo, wacce sama soppey xol loxol noonam.
Jeremiah 12:8 Sama séddoo ngi may niru léegi gaynde ci gott bi, di ma xiiru, ba tax ma jéppi ko.
Jeremiah 12:9 Sama séddoo baa ngi may saf tan mu todde mu moroomi tanam gaw. Doxleen dajaleji rabi àll yépp, indi leen ci bernde ji.
Jeremiah 12:10 Gàngooru sàmm a sëxëtoo sama tóokëru reseñ, joggati sama waar, def waar wi ma neex màndiŋ mu ne maraas.
Jeremiah 12:11 Def nañu ko gent buy jooy fi sama kaw, réew mi mépp gentala gental, te saful kenn.
Jeremiah 12:12 Tundoo tund wu ne faraas fi màndiŋ mi, ay yàqkat a ngi ciy bawoo, doon saamaru Aji Sax ji, di faagaagal réew mépp, cat ba cat, jàmm réer luy dund!
Jeremiah 12:13 Jiwum pepp, góob ay dég; sonn, ñàkk yool, xanaa mbetteel ci meññeef mii sababoo ci merum Aji Sax ji.»
Jeremiah 12:14 ¶ Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Mboolem sama dëkkandoo yu bon, yi laal céru suuf bi ma sédd Israyil sama ñoñ, maa ngii di leen déjjatee seen réew, te waa kër Yuda, maa leen di seppee fi seen digg.
Jeremiah 12:15 Waaye bu ma déjjatee yooyu xeet ba noppi, dinaa leen dellu yërëm, ku nekk, ma delloo ko céram, ku nekk ak suufam.
Jeremiah 12:16 Waaye bu ñu royee ba roy sama ñoñ, di jëfe ni sama ñoñ wara jëfe, di giñe sama tur naan: “Giñ naa ko ci Aji Sax jiy dund,” na ñu daan royloo sama ñoñ, ba ñuy giñe Baal, tuur mi, su boobaa ñu sampu fi sama digg ñoñ.
Jeremiah 12:17 Waaye xeet wu ma ci déggalul, xeet woowu dama koy déjjati, déjjat, sànk leen.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 13:1 ¶ Aji Sax ji da maa wax ne ma: «Demal jëndi njiitlaayu lẽe, nga woddoo ko, te bu ko ndox laal.»
Jeremiah 13:2 Ma jënd njiitlaay, woddu, muy la Aji Sax ji wax.
Jeremiah 13:3 Aji Sax ji dikkal ma ñaareel bi yoon, ne ma:
Jeremiah 13:4 «Jëlal njiitlaay li nga woddoo, te daldi dem ba Fara, nga làqi ko fa ca xar-xaru doj ya.»
Jeremiah 13:5 Ma dem làqi ko Fara, muy la ma Aji Sax ji sant.
Jeremiah 13:6 Ñu dem ba mu mat ay fan yu takku, Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Demal Fara, jëli njiitlaay la ma la santoon nga làqi ko fa.»
Jeremiah 13:7 Ma dem fa ma làqoon njiitlaay la, sulli ko. Ndeke njiitlaay la yàqu na, ba amatul njariñ!
Jeremiah 13:8 ¶ Kàddug Aji Sax ji dellu dikkal ma, ne ma:
Jeremiah 13:9 «Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: Ni lii yàqoo, ni laay sàggee sagub Yuda ak sagu Yerusalem bu réy bi.
Jeremiah 13:10 Askan wu bon wii bañ maa déggal, të ticc di wéye seen coobare, di topp yeneen yàlla, di leen jaamook a sujjóotal, nañu mel ni njiitlaay lii amul benn njariñ.
Jeremiah 13:11 Ndax ni njiitlaay di taqe ci luppu nit, noonu laa jële woon waa kër Israyil ak waa kër Yuda, taqoo leen.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. Mu ne: «Maa ko def ngir ñu doon sama ñoñ, teral sama tur, di sama ndam, di sama sag. Waaye déggaluñu ma.»
Jeremiah 13:12 ¶ «Nga wax leen kàddu gii: “Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil dafa wax ne: Njaqal biiñ, duy, mu fees. Bu ñu la nee: ‘Dañoo xamul xéll ne njaqal biiñ, duy, mu fees?’
Jeremiah 13:13 nga ne leen: ‘Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: Muy buur yi toogal Daawuda cib jalam, di sarxalkat yi, di yonent yi, di mboolem waa Yerusalem, maa ngii di duysi mboolem waa réew mii, ba ñu fees ak màndite.
Jeremiah 13:14 Su ko defee ma fenqe ku nekk ak mbokkam, fenqe waajur ak doom, ñoom ñépp.’ ”» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. Mu ne: «Duma ñéeblu, duma yërëm, duma leen ñeewantee faagaagal.»
Jeremiah 13:15 Dégluleen te teewlu, buleen fétteeral. Aji Sax ji kat wax na!
Jeremiah 13:16 Teral-leen seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji, bala moo lëndëmal, ngeen tërëfe tundi timis, di séentu leer, mu lëndëmal ba mu ne këruus, fatt taraj
Jeremiah 13:17 Bu ngeen déggul de, ma làqu, jooy seen reewande, sama rongooñ tuuroo tuuru, ma jooya jooy, nde dees na jàpp géttu Aji Sax ji, yóbbu.
Jeremiah 13:18 Waxal Buur, wax Lingeer yaayu Buur ne leen: «Dëjuleen fi suuf, seen mbaxanam nguur mu yànj foq na.
Jeremiah 13:19 Dëkki Negew yu mag yi tëje na, te kenn du ko tijji. Yuda gépp ca ngàllo ga, Yuda ba mu daj, ngàllo ga.»
Jeremiah 13:20 Yerusalemee, séentul, xool ñiy jóge bëj-gànnaar. Moo ana gétt gi ñu la dénkoon, sa gàtt yu rafet ya?
Jeremiah 13:21 Sa xejj yi nga miinal sa bopp, bu ñu walbatikoo tiim la, ana looy wax nag? Kon mitit du la jàpp, nga mel ni kuy matu?
Jeremiah 13:22 Soo nee ci sam xel: «Lu tax lii dal ma?» xamal ne sa ñaawtéef gu réy a waral ñu ñori la, saaysaaye la.
Jeremiah 13:23 Ana ab Kuuseen bu mana soppi deram, mbaa am segg mu mana fari tipp-tippam? Kon nga mana def lu baax te tàmma def lu bon!
Jeremiah 13:24 «Maa lay tasaare ni boob muy naaw mu ngelawal màndiŋ mi wal.
Jeremiah 13:25 Loolooy sa wàll, sa cér bi ma la nattal.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. Mu ne: «Yaa ma fàtte, di yaakaari caaxaan.
Jeremiah 13:26 Man it maay ëñ sa pendal, muure sa kanam, saw taat ne duŋŋ.
Jeremiah 13:27 Sag njaalook sa ŋexali caga, sa gànctu gu ruslu ci kaw tundi àll bi! Maa gis sa jëf ju siblu jooju! Musibaa yaw Yerusalem! Foo àppal sa jëfi sobe ji?»
Jeremiah 14:1 ¶ Kàddug Aji Sax jii dikkaloon na Yeremi, jëm ca maral ma. Mu ne:
Jeremiah 14:2 «Waa Yudaa ngi ñaawlu, doole dëddu dëkk yi, ñu ne yogg, ne lasar fi suuf, yuux jollee Yerusalem.
Jeremiah 14:3 Kàngam ya yebal seeni surga, ñu rooti; ñu dem, gisuñu ndox ca mbalka ya, délseek seen xotti ndab, jàq, yaakaar tas, ñu muuru di tiislu.
Jeremiah 14:4 Réew mi tawluwul, suuf si fett, yaakaaru beykat tas, mu muuru, di tiislu.
Jeremiah 14:5 Kéwél sax jur ci àll bi, sànni ndax ñàkk um ñax.
Jeremiah 14:6 Mbaamu àll taxaw ci tund yi ne faraas, di àppaat niw till, ñàkk parlu, gët ya giim.»
Jeremiah 14:7 Dëgg la sunuy ñaawtéef a nu tuumaal, waaye éy Aji Sax ji, jógal te saw tur tax, doonte dëddu nanu la ay yooni yoon, moy la.
Jeremiah 14:8 Éy yaw, yaakaaru Israyil, mi nuy wallu bésu njàqare, bul ñooru ni doxandéem ci réew mi, mbaa ku nekk ciw yoon, jàdd fi, fanaan.
Jeremiah 14:9 Ngalla bul mel ni ku waaru, mbaa jàmbaar ju manul walloo. Yaw Aji Sax ji, yaa ngi sunu biir, ñu di nu tudde saw tur. Bu nu wacc!
Jeremiah 14:10 ¶ Aji Sax ji dafa wax ci askan wii ne: «Ñeeka bëgg ub taxawaalu, baña téye seen tànk. Moo tax man Aji Sax ji bégewuma leen. Léegi ma bàyyi xel seenug mbon, ba mbugale leen seeni moy.»
Jeremiah 14:11 ¶ Aji Sax ji nag ne ma: «Bul ñaanal askan wii.
Jeremiah 14:12 Su ñu ci boole woon koor sax, duma déglu seeni dagaan. Su ñu ma doon sarxalal saraxu rendi-dóomal ak saraxu pepp it, du maa leen di nangul. Xanaa saamar akub xiif ak mbas kay laa leen di faagaagale.»
Jeremiah 14:13 ¶ Ma ne ko: «Éy Boroom bi Aji Sax ji, yonent yaa ngii di leen wax ne duñu dajeek saamar, duñu xiif te jàmm ju ne ñoyy nga leen di defal fi bii bérab.»
Jeremiah 14:14 ¶ Aji Sax ji ne ma: «Waxyuy fen la yonent yiy waxe ci sama tur. Yebaluma leen, santuma leen ko, waxumaak ñoom. Peeñuy fen ak ngisaaney neen ak nax yu ñu fental seen bopp lañu leen di jottlee waxyu.»
Jeremiah 14:15 Moo tax Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Yonent yi ma yebalul te ñuy waxe waxyu ci sama tur naan: “Saamar akub xiif du am ci miim réew,” saamar akub xiif ay mujje yooyu yonent.
Jeremiah 14:16 Ñi ñu doon jottli ay waxyu it, xiif ak saamar a leen di rey, ñu sànni seeni néew ci mbeddi Yerusalem, te duñu am ku leen rob, ñook seeni jabar ak seeni doom, góor ak jigéen. Dinaa leen xëpp seen ay.
Jeremiah 14:17 Nanga leen yégal saw tiis, ne leen: “Naa tuur rongooñ guddeek bëccëg, te du fer; sama bokki bopp yi damm ba dammtoo, ndaw góom bu metti!
Jeremiah 14:18 Ma dem, xool àll, gisuma lu moy ñu saamar bóom, ma dugg biir dëkk, gisuma lu moy ñu ne làcc akub xiif, yonent ak sarxalkat di wër réew mi, xam-xam réer leen.”»
Jeremiah 14:19 Aji Sax ji, wacc ngaa wacc Yuda nii? Am Siyoŋ a la génnliku? Lu tax nga di nu dumaa musiba mu amul paj? Nuy yaakaar jàmm, dara baaxul, nuy séentum paj, tiitaange ne jaas!
Jeremiah 14:20 Aji Sax ji, xam nanu sunug mbon, xam sunu ñaawtéefi maam; moy nanu la moos.
Jeremiah 14:21 Waaye xoolal ci yaw te bul xalab, bul teddadil sa jal bu tedd. Bàyyil xel te baña fecci sa kóllëreek nun.
Jeremiah 14:22 Xërëmi neen yi yéefar yiy jaamu, ana ku ci mana taw? Am asamaan ay sóobal boppam ay waame? Du yaw la Aji Sax ji sunu Yàlla? Yaw lanu yaakaar, te loolu lépp, yaw a.
Jeremiah 15:1 ¶ Aji Sax ji nag ne ma: «Musaa ak Samiyel sax, bu ñu taxawoon fi sama kanam, du tax ma faale askan wii. Dàqal, ñu sore ma, te wéy.
Jeremiah 15:2 Bu ñu la laajee ne la: “Fu nu jëm?” nga wax leen ne leen: “Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: Kiy wopp dee, wopp dee; kiy deeye saamar, deeye saamar; kiy deeye xiif, deeye xiif; kiy duggi ngàllo, duggi ngàllo.”
Jeremiah 15:3 ¶ «Te dinaa wàcce fi seen kaw ñeenti xeeti duma.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Saamar di bóom; xaj diri yóbbu, njanaaw ak rabu àll for, mu jeex.
Jeremiah 15:4 Dama leen di def, waa réewi àddina yépp, ku leen ci xool rasu. Te li ko waral di Buurub Yuda, Manase miy doomu Esekiya, ak li mu def ci digg Yerusalem.»
Jeremiah 15:5 «Yerusalemee, ku lay yërëm? Ku lay jooy? Moo, ku lay geesu ne la: “Jàmm nga am?”
Jeremiah 15:6 Yaw yaa ma wacc,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «dellu gannaaw, ma duma la, sànk la. Muñ naa ba sonn.
Jeremiah 15:7 Maa leen bees ni ñuy beesem pepp ci pénci réew mi. Maa sànk sama ñoñ, faat seeni doom, ndax tuubuñu seeni jëfin.
Jeremiah 15:8 Seeni jëtun laa ful, ba ñu ëpp suufas géej, ma indil leen pàddum njolloor, mu reyal yaay doomi waxambaaneem, këpp ko tiitaangeek njàqare.
Jeremiah 15:9 Yaayu juróom yaari góor loof, di àppaat, jantam sowe bëccëg ndarakàmm, yaakaar tas, mu jàq, seenu ndes, ma leel saamaru noon.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 15:10 Wóoy saa ndey, loo ma doon jure! Man mi réew mépp di xulook a layool, leblewma, lebuma; te ñépp di ma móolu.
Jeremiah 15:11 Ndaxam Aji Sax ji nee: «Maa lay xettli déy, ngir sottal lu baax; maa la defal sa noon di la tinu déy, ci janti safaan ak njàqare.»
Jeremiah 15:12 «Ku mana toj weñ gu ñuul, rawatina yetu weñu bëj-gànnaar, mbaa xànjar?
Jeremiah 15:13 Yeen waa Yuda, seen alal ak seeni denc laay jox ñu ko sëxëtoo te feyuñu ndax seen gépp moy ci seen réew mépp.
Jeremiah 15:14 Maa leen di def seen jaami noon réew mu ngeen xamul, sama mer jippét, tàkkal leen.»
Jeremiah 15:15 Yaw déy Aji Sax ji, xam nga! Ngalla bàyyi ma xel, geesu ma; feyul ma ñi ma sam. Bu leen muñal ba sànk ma! Xamal ne yaa ma tax di dékku saaga.
Jeremiah 15:16 Sa kàddu laa gis, di ko dunde, sa kàddu di ma bégal, bànneexal sama xol. Yaw Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, déy, sa tur lañu ma tudde.
Jeremiah 15:17 Masumaa toogandook ñiy mbumbaay bay xawaare. Yaa ma jiite, ma beru, toog ndax mer mi nga ma sol, ba ma fees.
Jeremiah 15:18 Moo sama tiis wi du dakk a? Bii góom bu metti, tëë wér! Yaw kay yaay waltan muy wal, di ŋiis, di tas sama yaakaar.
Jeremiah 15:19 Moo tax Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Soo délsee, ma délloosi la, nga dellu di ma liggéeyal. Soo dee wax ngëneel lu soreeki caaxaan, dinga mel ni yaay sama làmmiñ, te nit ñeey délsi ànd ak yaw, waaye du yaay délsi ànd ak ñoom.
Jeremiah 15:20 Maa lay def nga mel ak askan wii ni tatay xànjar ju ñu dàbbli, ñu di la song te duñu la man. Maay ànd ak yaw, di la wallu, di la xettli.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 15:21 «Ab soxor jàpp la, ma àtte; ab néeg ne la céex, ma foqati.»
Jeremiah 16:1 ¶ Kàddug Aji Sax ji dikkalati ma, ne ma:
Jeremiah 16:2 «Bul jël jabar, bul am doom ju góor mbaa ju jigéen ci bii bérab.»
Jeremiah 16:3 Aji Sax ji kat dafa wax ci gone yu góor yeek gone yu jigéen yi juddoo ci bii bérab, wax ci seen ndey yi leen jur wax ci seen baay yi leen meññ ci mii réew,
Jeremiah 16:4 mu ne: «Jàngoroy ndee a leen di rey. Deesu leen jooy, deesu leen rob. Seeni néew ay tosal suuf. Saamar akub xiif a leen di sànk, seeni néew leel njanaaw ak rabi àll.»
Jeremiah 16:5 Te Aji Sax ji kat dafa wax ne: «Bul dugg kërug dëj, bu fa dem di ñaawlook a jaale. Maa xañ askan wii sama jàmm,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «xañ leen sama ngor ak sama yërmande.
Jeremiah 16:6 Ku mag ak ku ndaw ay dee ci réew mii, te deesu leen rob, deesu leen jooy. Kenn du dagg yaramam mbaa muy nelu, di ko ñaawloo.
Jeremiah 16:7 Kenn du leen sédd aw ñam wu ñuy dëfale ku deele, kenn du leen jox ub kaas, dëfale leen, doonte baay a dee mbaa ndey.
Jeremiah 16:8 Kërug bernde it, bu fa dugg, di toogandoo, di lekk ak a naan.»
Jeremiah 16:9 Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil Boroom gàngoor yi kat dafa wax ne: «Maa ngii di dakkal ci bii bérab, ngeen teewe, fekke lépp luy coowal mbégteek bànneex, boroom séet ak séetam selaw.
Jeremiah 16:10 ¶ «Su ko defee, boo waxee askan wii kàddu yooyu yépp, ñu ne la: “Ana lu waral Aji Sax ji dogalal nu musiba mu réy mii mépp? Ana fu nu tooñe ak fu nu moye sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji?”
Jeremiah 16:11 Nga wax leen nag ne leen: “Seeni maam a ma wacc,” kàddug Aji Sax jee, “di topp yeneen yàlla, di leen jaamook a sujjóotal. Man nag, ñu dëddu ma; sama yoon it, ñu bañ koo sàmm.
Jeremiah 16:12 Yeen nag, ngeen di bon, ba raw seeni maam. Yeena ngii, ku nekk të ticc, topp xolam bu bon, bañ maa déggal.
Jeremiah 16:13 Maa leen di dàqe ci réew mii, jëme réew mu ngeen xamul, seeni maam xamuñu ko, ngeen di fa jaamu guddeek bëccëg yeneen yàlla, ndax dootuma leen baaxe.”»
Jeremiah 16:14 ¶ «Waaw ay bés a ngi ñëw déy,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «deesatul wax ne: “Giñ naa ko ci Aji Sax jiy dund te génnee bànni Israyil réewum Misra.”
Jeremiah 16:15 Waaye dañu naan: “Giñ naa ko ci Aji Sax jiy dund, ki jële bànni Israyil réewum bëj-gànnaar, te jële leen mboolem réew ya mu leen sànke woon.” Maa leen di délloosi seen réew ma ma joxoon seeni maam.»
Jeremiah 16:16 ¶ «Maa ngii di woolu nappkat yu bare.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Ñu napp ñii ba noppi ma woo rëbb yu bare, ñu rëbb leen ci kaw mboolem tund wu mag ak wu ndaw, ba ci bépp xar-xaru doj.
Jeremiah 16:17 Samay bët a ngi ne jàkk déy ci seeni jëf. Dara umpu ma ci. Seeni ñaawtéef, dara rëccu ma ci.
Jeremiah 16:18 Dama leen di jëkka fey ñaari yoon seeni moy, ndax ñoo sobeel sama réew meek seen méddi tuur yu bon yi, feesal suuf sii ma séddoo seen yëf yu siblu yooyu.»
Jeremiah 16:19 Yaw Aji Sax ji may dooleel, di ma feg, di ma làq bésub njàqare, yaw la xeet yiy bawoo cati àddina, fekksi la, naan: «Caaxaani neen kay la sunuy maam baaxoo woon, xërëmi neen yu amul njariñ.
Jeremiah 16:20 Nit man naa sàkkal boppam ay yàlla? Te duñuy yàlla sax!»
Jeremiah 16:21 «Moo tax maa ngii di leen xamal bii yoon, ba ñu xam sama diisaayu loxook sama doole, xam ne maay Aji Sax ji.»
Jeremiah 17:1 «Bàkkaaru Yuda lañu binde xaccug weñ gu cat la di doj wu dëgër. Dees koo ñaas ci seen àlluway xol, ñaas ko ci seen béjjéni sarxalukaay.
Jeremiah 17:2 Seeni doom sax di bàyyi xel seeni sarxalukaay ak seen xer yi ñuy màggale tuurum Asera fi ker garab yu naat yeek kaw tund yu mag yi
Jeremiah 17:3 ak kaw tund yi ci àll bi. Seen alal ak seen denc yépp laay joxe, ñu lël ko, booleek seen jaamookaay ndax seen moy yi dajal réew mi.
Jeremiah 17:4 Dingeen xañ seen bopp cér bi ma leen séddoon, ma def leen seen jaami noon ci réew mu ngeen xamul, ndax merloo ngeen ma mer mu dul fey mukk.»
Jeremiah 17:5 Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Alkànde ñeel na ku yaakaar doom aadama ak képp kuy doolewoo nit, dëddu Aji Sax ji.
Jeremiah 17:6 Day mel ni gajjub ndànd-foyfoy, du gis ngëneel luy dikk! Day dëkke màndiŋ mu wow koŋŋ, suufas xorom su kenn dëkkul.
Jeremiah 17:7 Waaye barke ñeel na ku wóolu Aji Sax ji, yaakaar Aji Sax ji.
Jeremiah 17:8 Day mel ni garab gu saxe wetu ndox, lawal ay reenam ca wal ma, ragalul tàngoor wu dikk, xob ya di naat. Du tiit atum maral, du ñàkk meññeef.»
Jeremiah 17:9 «Dara gënula dëng xelum nit, laago la ci moom. Ana ku ko mana xam?
Jeremiah 17:10 Maay Aji Sax jiy seetlu xel, natt ub xol, di yool ku nekk jëfinam, la yellook añam.
Jeremiah 17:11 Kuy jagoo alal ju lewul, mooy picc mu toj lu mu nenul. Kookooy tollu digg dooleem, alal ja dëddu, mu mujje dof.»
Jeremiah 17:12 Sunu bérab bu sell bi, mooy ngànguney daraja, daa masa kawe.
Jeremiah 17:13 Yaw Aji Sax ji yaakaaru Israyil, ku la wacc, torox; ku la dëddu daa repp. Moo wacc Aji Sax ji, bëtu ndox miy dund.
Jeremiah 17:14 Éy Aji Sax ji, faj ma, ma faju; musal ma, ma mucc, samag cant, yaw a.
Jeremiah 17:15 Ñu ngii naa ma: «Ana la Aji Sax ji waxoon? Na dikk boog!»
Jeremiah 17:16 Man de, bañuma laa sàmmal, topp la; bésub tiis it dagaanuma ko. Yaw de xam nga ko. Li ma wax it fi sa kanam la.
Jeremiah 17:17 Bu ma teg tiitaange, yaay sama rawtu bésub safaan.
Jeremiah 17:18 Ngalla gàcceelal ñi ma topp, te bu ma gàcceel; yal nañu tiit, ñoom, te man, ma baña tiit. Rikk dikke leen bésub safaan, rajaxe leen ñaari yoon.
Jeremiah 17:19 ¶ Aji Sax ji da maa wax ne ma: «Demal taxawi ca buntu Doomi réew mi, fa buurub Yuda di duggeek a génne. Te nga taxaw itam ca mboolem bunti Yerusalem ya ca des.
Jeremiah 17:20 Nga ne leen: “Dégluleen kàddug Aji Sax ji, yeen buuri Yuda ak yeen waa Yuda gépp ak képp ku dëkk Yerusalem, di jaare bunt yii.
Jeremiah 17:21 Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: Moytuleen seen bopp ba baña gàddu lenn bésub Noflaay, di ko jaarale bunti Yerusalem.
Jeremiah 17:22 Buleen génne seeni kër lenn bésub Noflaay te buleen ci liggéey lenn. Waaye nangeen sellal bésub Noflaay, muy la ma santoon seeni maam.
Jeremiah 17:23 Ndaxam dégluwñu ma, teewluwñu ma, xanaa të ticc, baña dégg, di gàntal ndigal.
Jeremiah 17:24 Waaye su ngeen ma dégloo ba déglu ma, kàddug Aji Sax jee, baña gàddu lenn di jaare bunti dëkk bii bésub Noflaay, xanaa di sellal bésub Noflaay, bañ cee liggéey lenn,
Jeremiah 17:25 su boobaa buur yiy tooge jalub Daawuda, tey dawal watiir aki fas, ñook seeni kàngam, duñu noppee jaare bunti dëkk bii, feggook seeni kàngam. Waa Yudak waa Yerusalem it di jaare ci bunt yii, dëkk bi sax dàkk.
Jeremiah 17:26 Dees na bàyyikoo dëkki Yuda ak li wër Yerusalem ak diiwaanu Beñamin, ca suufu tundu waak kaw tund ya, ak ca diiwaanu Negew. Ñuy indi ci kër Aji Sax ji ay saraxi rendi-dóomal ak yeneen saraxi jur ak saraxu pepp ak cuuraay. Ñii di indi kër Aji Sax ji saraxi cant.
Jeremiah 17:27 Waaye su ngeen ma déggalul, baña sellal bésub Noflaay, baña moytoo gàddu lenn, di jaare bunti Yerusalem bésub Noflaay, su boobaa dinaa taal dëkk bi taal buy xoyom këri Yerusalem yu yànj, te du fey.”»
Jeremiah 18:1 ¶ Kàddu gii dikkal na Yeremi, bawoo fa Aji Sax ji. Mu ne ko:
Jeremiah 18:2 «Dalal di dem ca tabaxkatu njaq ba. Foofa laa lay dégtale sama kàddu.»
Jeremiah 18:3 Ma daldi dem ba ca kër tabaxkatu njaq ba. Ma fekk ko muy liggéey ca tabaxukaayu njaqam.
Jeremiah 18:4 Leeleeg ndab li tabaxkat biy tabaxe ban, yàqu ci loxoom, mu dellu defaraat ba mu baax ci moom.
Jeremiah 18:5 Kàddug Aji Sax ji nag dikkal ma ne ma:
Jeremiah 18:6 «Ni tabaxkatu njaq bii di def, dama koo manula def ak yeen, bànni Israyil?» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Ban bii déy, ni mu mel ci loxol tabaxkatu njaq bi, ni ngeen mel ci sama loxo, yeen bànni Israyil.
Jeremiah 18:7 Leeg-leeg ma wax lu jëm ci aw xeet mbaa am réew, ne dinaa ko déjjati, daaneel ko, tas ko,
Jeremiah 18:8 xeet woowu tuub mbonam gi ma leen doon artoo, ma fomm musiba mi ma naroona wàcce ci seen kaw.
Jeremiah 18:9 Leeleeg it ma wax lu jëm ci aw xeet mbaa am réew, ne dinaa ko tabax, jëmbat ko,
Jeremiah 18:10 ba noppi ñu def lu ma ñaawlu, baña dégg sama kàddu. Su ko defee ma fomm lu baax la ma leen naroona baaxe.
Jeremiah 18:11 Kon waxal boog waa Yuda ak waa Yerusalem ne leen: “Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: Maa ngi nii di leen tabaxal musiba ci pexe mu ma leen di fexeel. Kon na ku nekk dëpp yoonam wu bon te jubbanti jikkoom aki jëfam.”
Jeremiah 18:12 Dañu naan: “Jaru ko, sunu xalaatu bopp lanuy topp, ku nekk të ticc di jëfe sa xel mu dëng.”»
Jeremiah 18:13 Moo tax Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Laajteleen rekk ci xeet yi! Ku ci masa dégg lu mel nii? Lu ñaawa ñaaw la Israyil, janq ba, def!
Jeremiah 18:14 Ku masa gis fu tawub yuur gedde mbartali Libaŋ, mbaa wal mu sedd ma cay wale fu sore ŋiis?
Jeremiah 18:15 Moona sama ñoñ fàtte nañu ma; tuuri caaxaan, ñu taalal cuuraay, te tuur yi di leen fakktal ci seeni yoon, seen jaaruwaay ya woon, di leen jaarale ñall yu kenn xàllul,
Jeremiah 18:16 ba seenum réew gental, di lu ñuy muslu fàww, ku fa romb waaru, wëcc bopp.
Jeremiah 18:17 Maay mel ni ngelawal penku, tasaare leen, ñu daw seeni noon. Gannaaw laa leen di won, waaye du doon kanam, keroog seen bésu ay.»
Jeremiah 18:18 ¶ Ba mu ko defee, mu am ñu ne: «Aywaleen, nu lalal Yeremi pexe. Ndax kat soxlawunu ko ba di ci ñàkk dara: du njànglem sarxalkat, du digley boroom xel te du waxyu bu yonent biral. Nanu ko duural ba sànk ko te baña faale lenn ciy waxam.»
Jeremiah 18:19 Waaye yaw Aji Sax ji, teewlu ma te déglu kàddug noon yi.
Jeremiah 18:20 Lu baax dees na ko feye lu bon a? Moona gasal nañu ma am yeer, di ma tëru. Bàyyil xel ba may taxaw fi sa kanam, di leen tinul ngir nga moyale leen sa mer.
Jeremiah 18:21 Kon nag bàyyil seeni doom ñu xiif ba dee, jañax leen ci ñawkay saamar, seeni jabar suul doom, suul jëkkër, seeni góor loroo mbas, seeni waxambaane daanoo xare.
Jeremiah 18:22 Boo jekkee yebal gàngoor, yal na yuux jibe seeni kër. Ñoo gas um yeer, di ma rëbb, làqal may fiir.
Jeremiah 18:23 Waaye yaw Aji Sax ji, xam nga mépp pexe mu ñu may fexee bóome. Bu leen jéggal seen ñaawtéef, bul far seeni moy, yal nañu nërmeelu fi sa kanam, jëflanteel ak ñoom bi ngay mer.
Jeremiah 19:1 ¶ Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Demal ca tabaxkatu njaq ba, nga jëndi fa njaqu ban lu ndaw te ànd ak ñenn ci magi askan wi ak ñenn ci magi sarxalkat yi,
Jeremiah 19:2 te nga dem ba ca xuru Ben Inom, ca buntu Tojitu njaq ya, daldi fay yéene kàddu yi ma lay wax.
Jeremiah 19:3 Danga naan: “Yeen buuri Yuda, yeen waa Yerusalem, dégluleen kàddug Aji Sax ji. Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil Boroom gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: Maa ngii di wàcce fi bii bérab, musiba muy buur noppi képp ku ci dégg.”
Jeremiah 19:4 Li ko waral mooy dañu maa wacc, teddadil bérab bii, di fi taalal cuuraay yeneen yàlla yu ñu xamuloon, du ñoom, du seeni maam, du buuri Yuda. Te feesal nañu bérab bii deretu nit ñu deful dara.
Jeremiah 19:5 Yékkatil nañu fi Baal tuur mi bérabi jaamookaay, di ci lakk seeni doom ngir Baal, defal ko ko saraxi rendi-dóomal, te santaanewma ko, waxuma ko, jaarul sax sama xel.
Jeremiah 19:6 ¶ «Moo tax ay bés a ngii di ñëw,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «su boobaa deesatul wooye bérab bii Tofet mbaa xuru Ben Inom, xanaa xuru Bóomukaay.
Jeremiah 19:7 Maay neenale fii pexem Yudak Yerusalem. Maa leen di tërale seen saamaru noon, ñi leen di tëru, tër leen; seeni néew, ma leele njanaaw ak rabi àll.
Jeremiah 19:8 Maay def dëkk bi ab gent bu ñuy muslu, ku fi jaare waaru, di muslu ci seen mbugal yépp.
Jeremiah 19:9 Maa leen di yàpploo seen doom yu góor ak yu jigéen, ku nekk di yàpp sa moroom ci biir njàqare, ndax gaw bu metti, bu leen seen noon yi leen di tëru di gaw.
Jeremiah 19:10 ¶ «Gannaaw loolu nanga toj njaq lu ndaw li fi kanam ñi nga àndal,
Jeremiah 19:11 te nga ne leen: “Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: Askan wii ak dëkk bii, ni ñuy toje njaq, ba deesatu ko mana defaraat, ni laa koy tojate. Tofet gii dees na fi rob ndax ñàkk fu ñu robe.
Jeremiah 19:12 Noonu laay def bérab bii,” kàddug Aji Sax jee, “ak ñi fi dëkk. Maay def dëkk bii ni Tofet.
Jeremiah 19:13 Këri Yerusalem ak këri buuri Yuda dina fees ak sobe ni bérab bii di Tofet. Mooy mboolem kër yu ñu doon taalal cuuraay ca kaw taax ya ñeel biddiiw yépp, ak di fa tuural yeneen yàlla.”»
Jeremiah 19:14 ¶ Gannaaw ba Yeremi walbatikoo Tofet, ga ko Aji Sax ji yebaloon mu waxi fa waxyu, dafa taxawi ca ëtti kër Aji Sax ji, daldi wax ak mbooloo ma mépp. Mu ne leen:
Jeremiah 19:15 «Aji Sax ji, Yàllay Israyil Boroom gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: “Maa ngii di wàcce ci kaw dëkk bii ak mboolem li ko wër, lépp luy musiba mu ma dige woon, ndax dangeena të ticc, baña dégg sama kàddu.”»
Jeremiah 20:1 ¶ Ci kaw loolu, doomu Imer, Pasur, sarxalkat ba jiite woon saytub kër Yàlla ga, dégg Yeremi muy biral kàdduy waxyu yooyu.
Jeremiah 20:2 Ba mu ko defee Pasur dóorlu Yonent Yàlla Yeremi, jéng ko ca buntu kër Aji Sax ja féete kaw, te ñu dippee ko Beñamin.
Jeremiah 20:3 Ca suba sa Pasur yiwee ko ca jéng ba. Yeremi ne ko: «Aji Sax ji tuddeetu la Pasur; Magor-Misabib (mu firi Tiitaange lu dajal) la la tudde.
Jeremiah 20:4 Ndax Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: “Maa ngii di la wàcceel tiitaange, yaak sa soppe yépp, seen saamaru noon daaneel leen, ngay gis; te Yuda gépp laay teg ci loxol buuru Babilon, ñii mu yóbbu leen ngàllo, ñee mu jam leen, ñu dee.
Jeremiah 20:5 Maay joxe lépp luy alalu dëkk bii. Mboolem lu fiy njariñ, mboolem gànjar, mboolem denci buuri Yuda, dinaa ko teg ci seen loxol noon yi, ñu sëxëtoo, jël, yóbbu Babilon.
Jeremiah 20:6 Yaw Pasur, yaak sa waa kër yépp ay duggi njaam ca Babilon. Babilon nga jëm te fa ngay dee, ñu rob la fa, yaak mboolem sa soppe ya nga daan wax ay waxyuy fen.”»
Jeremiah 20:7 Éy Aji Sax ji, naxtaan nga ma, ma naagu, nga nax ma, jaay ma doole, ba man ma. Ñu ngi may kekku bés bu ne, ku ne di ma kókkali.
Jeremiah 20:8 Saa yu ma waxee, damay xaacu, fitnaak salfaañoo ma tax di yuuxu. Kàddug Aji Sax jee may yóbbey xas aki saaga bés bu ne.
Jeremiah 20:9 Su ma nee: «Xaaral ma fàtte ko, dootuma biral waxyu ci turam,» sama xol bi mel nib taal bu tàkk, tàbbi sama biir yax yi; may jéema muutuwaale sa kàddu, te duma ko man.
Jeremiah 20:10 Dégg naa ñaawlaate yu bare, ñu naan: «Éey, Tiitaange-lu-dajal! Booleleen ko, boole rekk!» Ñi ma séqal jàmm sax, di yeeru ma fakkastalu, naan: «Jombul mu juum, nu jekku ko, ba mana feyu.»
Jeremiah 20:11 Waaye Aji Sax jeek man, di ñeyi xare. Moo tax ñi may tëru di tërëf, ba duñu daan, xanaa rus lool, ndax duñu baaxle; gàcce gu yàgg lay doon te du fey.
Jeremiah 20:12 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, yaw miy nattu ku jub, di gis xel ak xol, may ma, ma gis ni nga leen di feye; yaw de laa diis sama mbir.
Jeremiah 20:13 Woyleen Aji Sax ji, màggal-leen Aji Sax ji! Mooy xettli néew-ji-doole ci dooley ku bon.
Jeremiah 20:14 Alkute ñeel na bés ba ma juddoo, bés ba ma saa ndey juree, yàlla bumu barkeel.
Jeremiah 20:15 Alkute ñeel na ka ko yegge baay, ne ko: «Sa soxna am na doom ju góor,» ba tax baay béga bég.
Jeremiah 20:16 Yal na kooku mel ni dëkk, yi Aji Sax ji tas te yërëmu leen! Yal na dégg yuuxi suba teel ak xaacuy xarey njolloor.
Jeremiah 20:17 Moo ma reyul ci sama biiru ndey, ma bàmmeeloo sama ndey, te du wasin mukk.
Jeremiah 20:18 Ana lu ma doon génne ca biiram, di daj coonooku tiis, mujje gàcce?
Jeremiah 21:1 ¶ Kàddu dikkaloon na Yeremi, bàyyikoo fa Aji Sax ji. Mooy ba buur Cedesyas yebalee ca moom, Pasur doomu Malkiya, mook sarxalkat ba ñuy wax Cefaña doomu Maaseya. Mu ne ko:
Jeremiah 21:2 «Ngalla seetal nu ci Aji Sax ji, ndax Nabukodonosor buuru Babilon mu ngi nuy song xare. Jombul Aji Sax ji defaatal nu lenn ciy kéemaanam ba mu dellu gannaaw.»
Jeremiah 21:3 Yeremi nag ne leen: «Waxleen Cedesyas ne ko:
Jeremiah 21:4 “Aji Sax ji, Yàllay Israyil dafa wax ne: Seen dooley xare ji ngeen yor, di xeexeek ñi ci biti, di buuru Babilon ak waa Babilon ñi leen gaw, maa ngii di ko walbati, dajale ko ci biir dëkk bii.
Jeremiah 21:5 Man mii maay xareek yeen, won leen sama doole ak sama diisaayu loxo, xadaru, dikke leen mer mu réya réy.
Jeremiah 21:6 Maay fàdd lu dëkk ci dëkk bii, nit ak mala bokk loroo mbas mu réy.
Jeremiah 21:7 Gannaaw loolu nag,” kàddug Aji Sax jee, “Cedesyas buurub Yuda, aki jawriñam ak askan week ñi des ci dëkk bii te rëcce ci mbas meek xare beek xiif bi, maa leen di teg ci loxol Nabukodonosor buuru Babilon, ak seen loxol noon, ak loxol ñi leen di wuta rey. Dina leen leel ñawkay saamar. Du leen baal, du ñéeblu, du yërëm.”
Jeremiah 21:8 ¶ «Te itam nga wax askan wii ne leen: “Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: Maa ngii di teg fi seen kanam yoonu dund ak yoonu ndee.
Jeremiah 21:9 Ku toog ci dëkk bii, dinga deeye xare mbaa xiif mbaa mbas. Ku génn jébbal boppam waa Babilon ñi leen gaw nag dinga dund, bakkanam di yoolu xareem.
Jeremiah 21:10 Jógal naa dëkk bii déy, te loraange laa leen naral waaye du jàmm.” Kàddug Aji Sax jee. “Ci loxol buuru Babilon laa koy teg, mu jafal ko, lakk.”»
Jeremiah 21:11 ¶ «Te it waxal waa kër buurub Yuda ne leen: “Dégluleen kàddug Aji Sax ji!
Jeremiah 21:12 Yeen waa kër Daawuda, Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: Àtte yoon, deeleen ko xëye, di xettli ki ñu xañ dëgg ci ki koy néewal doole, balaa sama mer ne jippét, di tàkk te deesu ko mana fey ndax seen jëf ju bon.
Jeremiah 21:13 Yeen ñi jataayoo xur wi, yeen ñi ci kaw doj wu tell wi, maa ngii fi seen kaw.” Kàddug Aji Sax jee. “Yeen ñi naa: ‘Ku nu manal dara? Ku jote sunu biiri rawtu?’
Jeremiah 21:14 maa leen di dikke seen añu jëf.” Kàddug Aji Sax jee. “Maay jafal sawara, lakk seen gott bi, mu xoyom lépp lu leen wër.”»
Jeremiah 22:1 ¶ Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Demal kër buurub Yuda, nga jottli fa kàddu gii.
Jeremiah 22:2 Danga naan: “Dégluleen kàddug Aji Sax ji, yaw buurub Yuda mi toog ci jalub Daawuda, yaak say jawriñ ak sa nit ñiy jaare yii bunt.
Jeremiah 22:3 Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: Deeleen jëfe dëgg ak yoon, di xettli ku ñu xañ dëgg ci ki koy néewal doole. Ab doxandéem, ab jirim akub jëtun, buleen leen lor, buleen leen fitnaal. Deretu jaambur bu deful dara it, buleen ko tuur ci bii bérab.
Jeremiah 22:4 Su ngeen jëfee ba jëfe santaane bii déy, buur du noppee dugge yii bunt, di toogal Buur Daawuda fi jalam, di dawal watiir aki fas, ànd ak seeni jawriñ ak seeni nit.
Jeremiah 22:5 Waaye su ngeen dégluwul sama santaane yii, giñ naa ko ci man mii,” kàddug Aji Sax jee, “ab gent rekk la gii kër di doon!”»
Jeremiah 22:6 ¶ Aji Sax ji déy dafa wax ci mbirum kër buurub Yuda ne: «Yaay sama àllub Galàdd, sama collu tundu Libaŋ, waaye déy, maa lay def ni màndiŋ, ngay dëkk yu kenn dëkkul.
Jeremiah 22:7 Maa lay beralal yàqkat yu fàggu seeni gànnaay, dàjji sa tànnéefi banti seedar, sànni ca sawara sa.
Jeremiah 22:8 ¶ «Doxandéem yu bare dinañu jaare dëkk bii, di laajte ci seen biir naan: “Ana lu waral Aji Sax ji def nii bii dëkk bu mag?”
Jeremiah 22:9 Su ko defee ñu ne leen: “Xanaa li ñu fecci seen kóllërey Yàlla Aji Sax ji, di sujjóotal yeneen yàlla, di leen jaamu.”»
Jeremiah 22:10 Buleen jooy buur Yosya mi dee, buleen ko ñaawlul, jooyleena jooy buur Salum miy dem, te du délseeti, ba gis réewum juddoom.
Jeremiah 22:11 ¶ Aji Sax ji kat dafa wax ci mbirum buurub Yuda, Salum mi wuutu baayam Yosya te bàyyikoo fii. Mu ne: «Du fi délseeti mukk.
Jeremiah 22:12 Waaye fa ñu ko yóbbu ngàllo, fa lay deeye. Réew mii, du ko gisati mukk.»
Jeremiah 22:13 Wóoy ngalla kiy tabax këram te seetu ci njekk, di teg taaxi kawam te seetu ci yoon, liggéeyloo moroomam ci dara, feyu kow ñaqam.
Jeremiah 22:14 Mu ngi naan: «Maay tabax kër gu yaa, taaxi kaw ya yàmblaŋ. Ma bënn ay palanteer, tafal kër gi banti seedar, diw ko ba mu xonq curr.
Jeremiah 22:15 «Ëpplante banti seedar da laa def buur? Sa baay daawul lekk ak a naan? Teewu koo jëfe dëgg ak yoon, muy njiglaayam.
Jeremiah 22:16 Da daan sàmm àqu ku ñàkk ak ku néew doole, muy njiglaay. Du looloo di xam maay kan?» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 22:17 «Yaw xooloo, xalaatoo lu moy loo jariñoo, ak noo tuure deretu jaamburu Yàlla, di fitnaale ak a lore?»
Jeremiah 22:18 Moo tax Aji Sax ji wax ci mbirum buurub Yuda, Yowakim doomu Yosya, ne: «Kenn du ko jooy ca mbokkam mu góor mbaa mu jigéen, naan: “Wóoy ngalla nun, bokk yi!” Kenn du ko jooy, naan: “Wóoy, sang ba, wóoy kilifa ga!”
