Jeremiah 43:1 ¶ Gannaaw ba Yeremi waxeek mbooloo mépp, ba sottal mboolem kàddu yooyu ko seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji santoon mu yegge leen ko,
Jeremiah 43:2 Asaryaa doomu Osaya ak Yowanan doomu Kareya ak nit ñu bew ñooñu ñépp jël kàddu gi. Ñu ne Yeremi: «Dangay fen! Sunu Yàlla Aji Sax ji santu la nga fommloo nu sunu yoonu Misra ga nu bëgga toogi.
Jeremiah 43:3 Xanaa Barug doomu Nerya kay moo lay xiirtal ci sunu kaw, ngir teg nu ci loxol waa Babilon, ñu rey nu, mbaa ñu yóbbu nu ngàllo ca Babilon.»
Jeremiah 43:4 ¶ Ci kaw loolu Yowanan doomu Kareya ak yeneen njiiti xare ya yépp ak mbooloo ma mépp gàntal Aji Sax ji, baña des réewum Yuda.
Jeremiah 43:5 Ba loolu amee Yowanan ak njiiti xare yépp yóbbu ña desoon ca Yuda ñépp, di mboolem ña ñu jëkkoona sànni ca biir xeet ya leen séq yépp, te ñu ñibbsi woon réewum Yuda,
Jeremiah 43:6 góor ñaak jigéen ñaak gone yaak doomi buur yu jigéen ya. Yóbbu nañu mboolem ña Nebusaradan njiitu dag ya tegoon ci loxol Gedalya doomu Ayikam doomu Safan; ñu yóbbaale Yonent Yàlla Yeremi ak Barug doomu Nerya.
Jeremiah 43:7 Ñu dikk Misra, baña déggal Aji Sax ji, daldi àgg dëkk ba ñuy wax Tapanes.
Jeremiah 43:8 ¶ Gannaaw loolu kàddug Aji Sax ji dikkal Yeremi ca Tapanes, ne ko:
Jeremiah 43:9 «Jëlal ñaari doj yu mag yooy suuli ca dëru ban ba ca bunt kër Firawna gi ci biir dëkk bi, te na ko waa Yuda fekke.
Jeremiah 43:10 Nga wax leen ne leen: “Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil Boroom gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: Maa ngi nii di yónnee, jëli Nabukodonosor buuru Babilon, mi ci samag curga, ba teg ngànguneem ci kaw doj yii ma fi suul, mu firi fi xaymaam.
Jeremiah 43:11 Bu dikkee dina tas réewum Misra: ku wara médd, médd; kuy dugg njaam, duggi njaam; kuy fàddoo saamar, fàddoo saamar.
Jeremiah 43:12 Nabukodonosor dina jafal kër tuuri Misra yi, lakk tuur yi, mbaa mu yóbbu leen. Ni ab sàmm di teeñe mbubbam, ni lay teeñe réewum Misra ba mu set wecc, daldi daagu, dem yoonam.
Jeremiah 43:13 Dina rajaxe tuuri doj ya sampe ca Bet Semes ci biir Misra te dina lakk këri tuur yi ci Misra.”»
Jeremiah 44:1 ¶ Gannaaw gi kàddu dikkal na Yeremi, jëm ci mboolem Yudeen ñi sancsi réewum Misra, te dëkke Migadol ak Tapanes ak Memfis ak diiwaanu Pattros. Mu ne:
Jeremiah 44:2 «Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil Boroom gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: Yeena gis mboolem musiba mi ma wàcceel Yerusalem ak dëkki Yuda yépp. Ñu ngi nii tey jii gental, kenn dëkku ca.
Jeremiah 44:3 Li ko waral di lu bon li ñu def, di ma merloo; di taalal cuuraay ak a jaamu yeneen yàlla yu ñu xamul woon, du ñoom, du seeni maam.
Jeremiah 44:4 Yónnee naa leen ay yooni yoon mboolem yonent yi, sama jaam ñi, ne leen: “Rikk buleen def jëf ju siblu jii ma bañ.”
Jeremiah 44:5 Waaye dégluwñu, teewluwñu, ba dëddu seenug mbon, baña taalal yeneen yàlla cuuraay,
Jeremiah 44:6 ba ma boole sama mer ak sama xadar, yuri, mu jafal dëkki Yudak mbeddi Yerusalem, ba ñu mujj tey jii di gent yu tumurànke.
Jeremiah 44:7 ¶ «Léegi nag, Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil Boroom gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: Ana lu jar ngeen di teg seen bopp loraange ju réye nii, ba nar fee dagge réewum Yuda, góor ak jigéen, xale ba ci perantal, ba dungeen dese kenn?
Jeremiah 44:8 Yeena ngi may merloo ndax li ngeen di def, di taalal yeneen yàlla cuuraay fii ci Misra gi ngeen toogaansi. Seen bopp ngeen dagg, sànni te dingeen mujj ñu di leen móolook a sewal ci digg xeeti àddina yépp.
Jeremiah 44:9 Dangeena fàtte seen mbonug maam ya ak mbonu buuri Yudak seen mboni jabar yaak seen mbonu bopp ak seen mbonu jabari bopp ga ñu nekke woon ca réewum Yuda ak mbeddi Yerusalem?
Jeremiah 44:10 Kenn ci yeen réccuwul ba tey jii. Kenn wormaalu ma mbaa mu jëfe sama yoon ak sama dogal yi ma leen tegal, tegal ko seeni maam.
Jeremiah 44:11 ¶ «Moo tax Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil Boroom gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: Maa ngii di jàkkaarlook yeen, ngir musibaal leen, ba dagge fi mboolem Yuda.
Jeremiah 44:12 Maay tonni ndesi Yuda gi dogu woon ba dikk réewum Misra, toogaansi fi. Dañuy dee. Ñoom ñépp réewum Misra gii lañuy daanoo. Saamar akub xiif lañuy fàddoo, ki gëna tuut ba ki gën di mag. Saamar akub xiif lañuy fàddoo, te dinañu gental gentu alkànde, ñu di leen móolook a sewal.
Jeremiah 44:13 Maay dikkal ñi sancsi réewum Misra ni ma dikkale Yerusalem, dikkaale saamar akub xiif ak mbas.
Jeremiah 44:14 Du kuy rëcc mbaa kuy dese bakkan ci ndesu Yuda gi toogaansi fii ci réewum Misra. Te it duñu ñibbi réewum Yuda ga ñu namma ñibbi, lu moy ñu néew.»
Jeremiah 44:15 ¶ Ñu baree nga fa woon, di mboolem ña xamoon ne seeni jabar dañuy taalal cuuraay yeneen yàlla ak mboolem jigéen ña teew. Ñuy mbooloo mu réy, ñépp ña sanci Misra, ba ca diiwaanu Pattros. Ñu daldi ne Yeremi:
Jeremiah 44:16 «Li nga nuy wax ci turu Aji Sax ji, dunu ko déglu.
Jeremiah 44:17 Nooy def ba defaatoo mboolem lu nu digoo woon, di taalal cuuraay Lingeeru asamaan, tuur mi, di ko tuural ay naan, na nu ko daan defe naka jekk, nook sunuy maam ak sunuy buur ak sunuy kàngam ci dëkki Yudak mbeddi Yerusalem. Teewul dañu daan doyal dugub, di woomle, te gisunu loraange.
Jeremiah 44:18 Ba nu bàyyee taalal cuuraay Lingeeru asamaan, tuur mi, ak di ko tuural, ca lanu ñàkk lépp, teg ci saamar akub xiif di nu sànk.»
Jeremiah 44:19 Jigéen ña teg ca ne: «Te sax ba nuy taalal cuuraay Lingeeru asamaan, di ko tuural, sunuy jëkkër dañu koo yégul? Xam nañu xéll ne nu ngi defal Lingeeru asamaan ay nàkk yu koy jëmmal, di ko tuural ay naan.»
Jeremiah 44:20 ¶ Ba mu ko defee Yeremi wax ak mboolem góor ñaak jigéen ña ko tontu loolu, ne leen:
Jeremiah 44:21 «Saraxi cuuraay yi ngeen di taal, yeen ak seeni maam ak seeni buur ak seeni kàngam, ak baadoolo yi ci biir dëkki Yudak mbeddi Yerusalem, defe ngeen ne Aji Sax ji yégu ko, am da koo fàtte?
Jeremiah 44:22 Aji Sax ji manatula dékku seen jëf ju bon ak seen jëf ju siblu ji waral seenum réew mel nii mu mel tey, di ndànd-foyfoy bu gental bu ñuy móoloo, te kenn dëkku ci,
Jeremiah 44:23 ndax yeena def saraxi bokkaale, moy Aji Sax ji, dégluwleen Aji Sax ji, te it kàddug yoonam ak dogali yoonam ak seedey yoonam, jëfewleen ci lenn. Moo waral musiba mi leen dikkal nii tey.»
Jeremiah 44:24 ¶ Yeremi teg ca wax ak ñépp, rawatina jigéen ña ñépp, ne leen: «Mboolem yeen Yudeen ñi ci réewum Misra, dégluleen kàddug Aji Sax ji.
Jeremiah 44:25 Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil Boroom gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: “Yeen ak seeni jabar yeena wax ci seen làmmiñ, àggalee ko seeni jëf. Ngeen ne dingeen def ba defaatoo dige yi ngeen digee taalal cuuraay Lingeeru asamaan, tuural koy naan. Dëggal-leena dëggal seeni dige te jëfee jëfe seeni dige.
Jeremiah 44:26 Kon nag, yeen mboolem Yudeen ñi sanc Misra, dégluleen kàddug Aji Sax ji. Maa giñ ci sama tur wu màgg.” Aji Sax jee ko wax. “Ma ne: Sama tur, gémmiñug benn Yudeen dootu ko tudd fi mboolem réewum Misra naan: ‘Giñ naa ko ci Aji Sax jiy dund.’
Jeremiah 44:27 Maa ngi nii di leen teewloo seen musiba, waaye du seen jàmm laa leen di teewloo. Te mboolem waa Yuda ñi ci réewum Misra dinañu sànkoo saamar akub xiif, ba keroog ñuy jeex tàkk.
Jeremiah 44:28 Ñu néew ay rëcci saamar, walbatikoo réewum Misra, ñibbi réewum Yuda. Waaye mboolem ndesu Yuda, ga dikkoon toogaansi Misra, dinañu xam kan la kàddoom di sotti, man am ñoom.
Jeremiah 44:29 Te lii nangeen ko def ab takk.” Kàddug Aji Sax jee. “Maa ngii di leen dikke mbugal ci bii bérab, ba ngeen xam ne samay kàddooy sotti ba mat sëkk, di seen loraange.”»
Jeremiah 44:30 Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Maa ngii di waaja teg Firawna Ofra buuru Misra ci loxol noonam yiy wut bakkanam, na ma tege woon Cedesyas buurub Yuda ci loxol noonam Nabukodonosor buuru Babilon ma doon wut bakkanam.»
Jeremiah 45:1 ¶ Kàddu gii Yeremi waxoon na ko Barug doomu Nerya, gannaaw ba Barug tënkee ci taxañu mbind, kàddu ya ko Yeremi dégtal ca ñeenteelu atu nguurug doomu Yosya, Yowakim buurub Yuda.
Jeremiah 45:2 «Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil dafa wax ci yaw, Barug.
Jeremiah 45:3 Nga ne: “Wóoy ngalla man! Aji Sax ji yokk na maw naqar. Onk naa ba tàyyi te awma noflaay.”
Jeremiah 45:4 Aji Sax ji da maa sant ma wax la ne la: “Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: La ma tabaxoon a ngii, maa ngi koy daaneel, la ma jëmbatoon a ngii, maa ngi koy buddat, ba réew mépp daj.
Jeremiah 45:5 Looy sàkku ku la beral loxo? Jaru ko! Maa ngii di wàcceel musiba képp kuy noyyi.” Kàddug Aji Sax jee! “Waaye may naa la sa bakkan di sa yoolu xare, fépp foo jëm.”»
Jeremiah 46:1 ¶ Kàddug Aji Sax jii dikkal na Yonent Yàlla Yeremi, jëm ci xeet yi.
Jeremiah 46:2 ¶ Firawna buuru Misra, bi ñuy wax Neko, ba ko Nabukodonosor buuru Babilon di duma, ma nga woon ca Karkemis ca tàkkal dexu Efraat. Mu yemook ñeenteelu atu nguurug doomu Yosya Yowakim buurub Yuda. Kàddug waxyu gii moo jëm ci Misra ci wàllu diggante ba seen mbooloom xare ma tollu woon.
Jeremiah 46:3 «Ŋàbbleen pakkoo pakk te xareji.
Jeremiah 46:4 Takkleen fas yi, war naari góor yi, ba làng-déraale seen mbaxanay xare, nàmmaat xeej, sol yérey xare!»
Jeremiah 46:5 «Ana lu ma gis? Waa Misraa jaaxle bay dellu gannaaw, seeni jàmbaar falaxoo, ne wëqet, geesuwñu, tiitaange ubale.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee!
Jeremiah 46:6 «Bu nit gaaw ba raw mbaa mu jàmbaare ba mucc. Bëj-gànnaar lañu féete, feggook dexu Efraat, di tërëf, di daanu.
Jeremiah 46:7 «Kii ku mu, muy fuddu ni dexu Niil, di fuur ni wali ndox?
Jeremiah 46:8 Misraa, mooy fuddu ni dexu Niil, di fuur ni wali ndox. Mu naan: “Maay fuddu, mëdd àddina, sànk ab dëkk ak ña ca biir.”
Jeremiah 46:9 Na fas buur, watiir fiddi, jàmbaar sàqi: waa Kuusoo waa Puut ak seeni pakk, ak waa Ludd ak seeni xala.
Jeremiah 46:10 Waaye bésub keroog déy, Boroom bi Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yee ko moom, muy bésub feyu bu muy feyey noonam. Saamar suur suux, màndee deret. Boroom bi Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi mooy rendee réewum bëj-gànnaar ab sarax, feggook dexu Efraat.
Jeremiah 46:11 Yaw Misra mu taaru mi, demal ba Galàdd wuti diw, dàmpoo. Faju, fajooti; dara du la wéral!
Jeremiah 46:12 Xeet yeey dégg sa toroxte, sa yuux dajal àddina. Jàmbaar téqtaloo jàmbaar, ñu ànd ne fëlëñ!»
Jeremiah 46:13 ¶ Kàddu gii dikkaloon na Yonent Yàlla Yeremi, ba Nabukodonosor buuru Babilon dikkee, di duma waa réewum Misra. Mu ne:
Jeremiah 46:14 «Yégleel lii Misra, yéene ko fa ca Migadol, yéene ko fa ca Memfis ak Tapanes. Neleen: “Dërleen, taxaw temm! Saamar kat a ngi lekk li leen wër.”
Jeremiah 46:15 Lu Apis di daw? Lu tee seen yàllay yëkk jooju taxaw? Xanaa Aji Sax jee ko bëmëx!
Jeremiah 46:16 Moo bëmëx ñu bare, ku nekk naan moroom ma: “Jógal nu dellu ca sunuy bokk, ca sunu réewum cosaan, ba mucc saamaru noon.”
Jeremiah 46:17 Dees na fa woyal Firawna buuru Misra, naan ko: “Coowal neen te bés wees.”
Jeremiah 46:18 «Giñ naa ko ci man miy dund,» kàddug Buur Aji Sax jee, Boroom gàngoor yi di turam: «noon ay dikk, mel ni tundu Tabor ci digg tund yi, mbete tundu Karmel wi feggook géej.
Jeremiah 46:19 Yaw mi dëkke Misra mu taaru mi, ëmbal sa ëmb, jëm ngàllo; Memfis dëkk bii kat ci gental la jëm, di ndànd-foyfoy lu kenn dëkkul.
Jeremiah 46:20 Misra daa mel ni jeegu nag bu yànj, weñ ne waa, waa, bawoo bëj-gànnaar.
Jeremiah 46:21 Seen xarekat yi ñu bind sax ñu ngi mel ni sëllu yu yaflu, ñoom it ànd ne wërëñ, wëqet, kenn taxawul! Bésu safaan a leen dikkal, seen mbugal taxaw,
Jeremiah 46:22 ñu daw di faraas-faraasiy wéy ni jaan. Doole la noon songe Misra, dikke leeni sémmiñ ni gorkati garab.
Jeremiah 46:23 Lu gott fatt fatt, ñu gor.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Ñoo gëna barey njéeréer, ba maneesu leena lim.
Jeremiah 46:24 Gàcceel nañu Misra mu taaru mi, teg ko ci loxoy xeeti bëj-gànnaar.»
Jeremiah 46:25 ¶ Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil, Boroom gàngoori xare yi wax na ne: «Maa ngii di dikke mbugal Amon, tuuru dëkk bii di Teeb, ak Firawnaak waa Misraak seeni tuur ak seeni kàngam, boole ci ñi yaakaar Firawna.
Jeremiah 46:26 Maa leen di teg ci loxoy ñiy wut seen bakkan, di Nabukodonosor buuru Babilon aki jawriñam. Gannaaw loolu dees na dëkkewaat Misra na woon.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee!
Jeremiah 46:27 «Yaw Yanqóoba sama jaam bi nag, bul tiit; yaw Israyil, ma ne bul ragal. Maa ngii di la wallusi, jële la fu sore, jële sa askan fa seen réewu njaam ga, Yanqóoba délsi, dal, aaru, du tiitati.
Jeremiah 46:28 Yaw Yanqóoba sama jaam bi, bul tiit.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Yaw laa àndal. Maay fàkkas mboolem xeet yi ma leen sànni woon, waaye yeen, duma leen fàkkas. Duma leen ñàkka duma moos, waaye dinaa leen yar lu yem.»
Jeremiah 47:1 ¶ Kàddug Aji Sax ji dikkaloon na Yonent Yàlla Yeremi jëm ci Filisteen ñi, balaa Firawna di song dëkkub Filisteen ba ñuy wax Gasa.
Jeremiah 47:2 Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Ndox a ngay fuddoo bëj-gànnaar, diy waame, walsi, walal réew meek li ci biiram akub dëkk ak ku ci biiram; doom aadama yuuxu, waa réew mépp serandoo.
Jeremiah 47:3 Booba fas yaa ràmbal, watiir ya riir, mbegey watiir ya kar-kareendoo, yoxo yoqi, ba baay geesuwul doom,
Jeremiah 47:4 bésub sànkute dikkal képp kuy Filisteen, ba dagge dëkk yii di Tir ak Sidon ndimbal lu ñu dese woon. Aji Sax jaa ngay sànk Filisteen, ña des te cosaanoo dunu Keret.
Jeremiah 47:5 Watu nel, ñaawloo, dikkal na Gasa, te wedamloo nañu Askalon. Yeen ñi dese joor gi, fu ngeen àppal seen yaram, wi ngeen di daggat, di ko ñaawloo?
Jeremiah 47:6 Ngeen naa: “Wóoy saamaru Aji Sax jii, xanaa doo selaŋlu? Dellul sa mbar, boog, dal-lu, ne tekk!”
Jeremiah 47:7 Waaye yaw saamar, noo mana selaŋloo te Aji Sax ji yebal la ci kaw Askalon ak waa tefesu géej, fa mu ko dogale?»
Jeremiah 48:1 ¶ Lu jëm ci Mowab, Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil, Boroom gàngoori xare yi dafa wax ne: «Ngalla waa Nebo, seen dëkk ba yàqu na! Kiryaatayim, ñu torxal, nangu ko; tata ja daanu, tasaaroo.
Jeremiah 48:2 Mowab amatul woy, fa Esbon la leen noon ya fexeel lu bon, ne: “Aycaleen nu raafal wii xeet!” Yeen waa Madmen it, ñu wedamal; saamar topp leen.
Jeremiah 48:3 Yuux jibe na Oronayim, ndaw salfaañook rajaxoo ju réy!
Jeremiah 48:4 Mowab tas, ay fereem serandoo.
Jeremiah 48:5 Ñay yéeg jëm Luwit, di jooyoo. Ña ngay yéeg, di jooyoo. Ñay wàcci Oronayim di dégg aji jàq jiy yuuxoo.
Jeremiah 48:6 Ñu naan: “Dawleen, rawale seen bakkan, ba tumurànkeji ni gajju màndiŋ!”
Jeremiah 48:7 Mowab, yeena yaakaar dooleek alal, yeen it, dees na leen jàpp; Kemos, seen tuur mi duggi ngàllo, mooki sarxalkatam aki kàngamam.
Jeremiah 48:8 Dëkkoo dëkk ay yàqtoo, benn dëkk du mucc! Waa xur wii sànku, waa déndu doj wu tell wee yàqtoo.» Muy la Aji Sax ji wax.
Jeremiah 48:9 «Gasal-leen Mowab, day sànku moos, ay dëkkam gental, kenn du fa des!
Jeremiah 48:10 Alkànde ñeel na kuy sàggane liggéeyu Aji Sax ji. Alkànde ñeel na kuy xañ deret saamaru Aji Sax ji.
Jeremiah 48:11 «Mowab a dale féex cag ndawam, kenn jàppu ko njaam, yóbbu, wàllanteesu ko ndab ak ndab, xanaa mu ne degg ni biiñ bu taaje, di saf, di xeeñ ba tey.
Jeremiah 48:12 Moo tax ay bés a ngii di ñëw,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «maa leen di yónnee ay nit ñu sotti diw gi, ndab, soteet; njaq, rajax.
Jeremiah 48:13 Yaakaaru Mowab ci Kemos tuur mi, tas, ni yaakaaru waa kër Israyil ci Betel ma ñu wóolu, tase woon.
Jeremiah 48:14 «Mowabee, du yaay kañu, naan jàmbaar ngeen, diy ñeyi xare?
Jeremiah 48:15 Song nañu la, yàqte say dëkk; la man ci say ndaw daanu, fàddu.» Kàddug Buur Aji Sax jee, Boroom gàngoori xare yi.
Jeremiah 48:16 «Musibay Mowab a ngi jegesi, safaanam làbbleeti, wuti ko.
Jeremiah 48:17 Mboolem yeen ñi wër xeet wii, jooyleen leen; yeen ñi dégg seen tur ñépp, jooyleen leen. Neleen: “Moo, nu gii nguur mana foqe, ba foqaale jii daraja?”
Jeremiah 48:18 «Yeen waa Dibon, dëkk bu taaru bi, wàccleen seen teddnga lu kawe te tooge digg maral; kiy yàqtesi Mowab kat song na leen, di màbbsi seeni tata.
Jeremiah 48:19 Yeen waa Arower, taxawleen fi yoon wi te teewlu; góor gu fi jaare mbaa ndaw su rëcc, di daw, ngeen laaj ko ne ko: “Lu xew?”
Jeremiah 48:20 Ñu ne: “Gàcce ñeel na Mowab gii tas!” Yuuxooleen, ne wóoy! Yéeneleen fa tàkkal dexu Arnon, ne Mowab tas na!
Jeremiah 48:21 Mbugal dikkal déndu doj wu tell wi, dikkal dëkk yii di Olon, Yaxacc ak Mefat
Jeremiah 48:22 ak Dibon ak Nebo ak Bet Diblatayim
Jeremiah 48:23 ak Kiryaatayim ak Bet Gamul ak Bet Mewon
Jeremiah 48:24 ak Keryot ak Boccra, mboolem dëkki Mowab daal, fu jegeek fu sore.
Jeremiah 48:25 Sidditu Mowab day dog, loxoom damm.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee!
Jeremiah 48:26 «Du Mowab a doon diir Aji Sax ji mbagg? Nañu leen màndal sànjum Aji Sax ji, ba ñu waccu, di ca xuus, ba ñoom it, ñu di leen ree.
Jeremiah 48:27 Mowabee, du yeena doon ree Israyil? Dangeen leena fekk ci biiri sàcc, ba fu ngeen leen tudde, wëcc bopp?
Jeremiah 48:28 Yeen waa Mowab, baleen dëkk yi, dëkke paxi doj. Defleen niy xati, tàgge peggi xunti.
Jeremiah 48:29 «Noo dégg ni Mowab bewe, bew lool, réy, reew, di damu; ne daŋŋ-daŋŋiiral.
Jeremiah 48:30 Maa xam seen reewande,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «seeni kañu neen la, seeni jëf di neen.
Jeremiah 48:31 Moo tax may jooy Mowab, di wooteel wall Mowab gépp, di yuuxul waa Kir Eres.
Jeremiah 48:32 Yaw reseñu Sibma gi, ma jooyal la lu raw la ma jooyal Yaser. Yaw la say car jàlloon géej, àkki géeju Yaser, sa figg jeek sa reseñ, noon yàqte.
Jeremiah 48:33 Tukkal nañu mbégteek bànneex fi tóokëri réewum Mowab. Maa ŋacc mbàndi biiñ ya, kenn nalatu fa reseñ, di soowoo coowal mbégte, xanaa ay yuux.
Jeremiah 48:34 Yuux jibe na Esbon, ba Elale, àkki ba Yaxacc ak Sowar ba Oronayim ak Eglat Selisiya. Ndoxi Nimrim sax ŋiis na.
Jeremiah 48:35 Maay bóome biir Mowab.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Maay bóom kuy joxe sarax ci jaamookaay, di taalal am tuuram cuuraay.
Jeremiah 48:36 Naa jooy Mowab jooyi xol, yu toxoro di jooye ab dëj, na toxoro di jooye dëju waa Kir Eres. Lu ñu dajale woon sànku na!
Jeremiah 48:37 Ñoom ñépp a nelu, wat seeni sikkim, daggat seeni loxo, sol ay saaku, di ko ñaawloo.
Jeremiah 48:38 Kaw taaxi Mowab yépp aki péncam, fépp ay yuuxoo di jib. Maa toj Mowab ni ndab lu kenn soxlaatul.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 48:39 «Yuuxooleen, ne leen: “Céy gii yàqtoo! Mowab gii wone gannaaw! Mowab rus na.” Ñi ko wër ñépp a koy reetaan, seen yaram di daw ci ñoom.»
Jeremiah 48:40 Aji Sax ji déy dafa wax ne: «Lu mel ni jaxaay a ngii naa jàyy, firiy laafam, këfsi Mowab.
Jeremiah 48:41 Dees na teg Keryot ga ca Mowab loxo, ne tata ya taral; su keroogee fitu jàmbaar ne tërit, mu mel ni kuy matu.
Jeremiah 48:42 Mowab day sànku, ba xeetam fey. Ñoo doon diir Aji Sax ji mbagg.
Jeremiah 48:43 Yeen waa Mowab, pat-pati rekk, di tàbbiy pax aki yeer.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 48:44 «Pat-patiy daw, tàbbim pax; génn um pax, tàbbim yeer. Maay yen Mowab, maa leen di yen moos, seen atum mbugal.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 48:45 «Fa keppaaru Esbon lañuy daw taxawi, doole dëddu. Booba sawaraa tàkke Esbon, di law; sël-sëlee foofa ca péeyu Buur Siwon, ba dajal réewum Mowab, nitu coow ña, boole jë akum kaaŋ xoyom.
Jeremiah 48:46 Wóoy, waa Mowab, ngalla yeen! Yeen ñiy jaamu Kemos, sànku ngeen! Dees na jàpp seen doom yu góor njaam; jigéen ñi it, njaam.
Jeremiah 48:47 «Du tee fan yu mujj ya, ma tijji wërsëgu Mowab.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. Fii la àtteb Mowab yem.
Jeremiah 49:1 Lu jëm ci Amoneen ñi, Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Israyil daa amuli doom? Am daa amul dono? Lu tax Milkom tuur mi donloo suufas Gàdd, ba ay jaamukatam sanc dëkki Gàdd?
Jeremiah 49:2 Moo tax ay bés a ngii di ñëw,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «maay dégtal Raba, dëkku Amoneen ñi, coowal xare ci seen biir, tund wa gental, dëkk-dëkkaan ya tàkk ba jeex, ba keroog Israyil futti ñooña ko futti woon.» Aji Sax jee ko wax.
Jeremiah 49:3 «Éy waa Esbon, Ayi seen dëkk bi tas na, yuuxuleen! Yeen waa dëkk yi séq Raba, sol-leeni saaku, ñaawloo, jaab diggante tata yi, tiisloo. Milkom seen tuur mi déy duggi na ngàllo, ànd aki sarxalkatam aki kàngamam.
Jeremiah 49:4 Céy Raba, bii dëkk bu taaru, toogadi, yeena doon damoo xur yi, ba ci seen xur wu naat wii? Yeena yaakaaroon seeni denc, naan: “Ku ñemee dal sunu kaw?”
Jeremiah 49:5 Maa ngii di leen wàcceel njàqare,» kàddug Boroom bi Aji Sax jee, Boroom gàngoor yi, «njàqare luy bawoo fi leen wër fépp, dàq leen, ku ne jubal yoonam, du kenn ku leen di dajaleeti.
Jeremiah 49:6 Waaye bu loolu weesee, ma tijji wërsëgu Amoneen ñi.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 49:7 ¶ Lu jëm ci Edomeen ñi, Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: «Xanaa boroom xel amatul fi Teman? Xanaa ndigal a réer xamkat yi? Am seen bopp a yàqu?
Jeremiah 49:8 Yeen waa Dedan, walbatikuleen daw, ruuroo seeni pax. Maa ngi wàcceel askanu Esawu safaan, seen mbugal taxaw na!
Jeremiah 49:9 Su leen wittkati reseñ dikkalee, xanaa dinañu ca wacc ay doom? Su leen ay sàcci guddi dikkalee, du la leen doy lañuy sëxëtoo?
Jeremiah 49:10 Waaye yeen askanu Esawu, man maa leen di ñori, ba ngeen ne duŋŋ. Maay siiwal seeni rawtu, ba dootuleen mana làqu; seeni goneek seeni bokk, ñépp ay sànku, seeni dëkkandoo sax, kenn du ca des ku naan:
Jeremiah 49:11 “Jirim yi ngeen bàyyi, maa leen di dundal, te seeni jëtun man nañu maa yaakaar.”
Jeremiah 49:12 Ndegam ñi yeyoowul mbugal ñooy jolu kaasu mbugal, nees leen di ñàkka toppe, yeen? Dees na leen topp moos, ngeen jolu kaasu mbugal.
Jeremiah 49:13 Giñ naa ko ci man mii, déy,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «Boccra, dëkk bii day mujj di gent bu ñu doyadal, ndànd-foyfoy bu ñuy móoloo, dëkk-dëkkaanam yépp gental ba fàww.»
Jeremiah 49:14 Ab dégtal laa dégg, mu bawoo fa Aji Sax ji, ndaw la yebal ci biir xeet yi, ne leen: «Dajeleen waajal xare te song Edom xare!
Jeremiah 49:15 Yeen Edom, tuutal leen laay def ci biir xeet yi, ñu xeeblu ngeen di doon ci biir doom aadama yi.
Jeremiah 49:16 Seen ragluwaay ak seen reewande sànk na leen, yeen ñi dëkke xuntiy doj, féetewoo colli tund yi. Waaye su ngeen ajee seenum tàgg ni jaxaay it, fa laa leen di àjjee.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 49:17 «Edom day mujj gental, ku fa jaare waaru, di muslu ci mboolem li ko dal.
Jeremiah 49:18 Edom day tas ni Sodom ak Gomor ak la ko wër.» Aji Sax jee ko wax. «Nit du ca dëkk, doom aadama du fa dal.
Jeremiah 49:19 Maa ngii di fëlle gottub Yurdan ni gaynde, wuti mbooy gu naat. Xef ak xippi déy, ma fëxale fa ñépp, ba tabb fa ki ma taamu. Ana moos ku mel ni man? Ku am sañ-sañ ci man? Ana njiit luy taxaw fi sama kanam?
Jeremiah 49:20 Kon dégluleen pexe mi Aji Sax ji waajal Edom, mébét yi mu mébétal waa Teman ñooñu! Ndegam deesu leen wommat ni seen gàtt yu ndaw, yóbbu, ba yàq seen parlu yaxeet.
Jeremiah 49:21 Seen jéll day réy ba riiral suuf, seeni yuux àkki géeju Barax ya.
Jeremiah 49:22 Lu mel ni jaxaay a ngii, naa fëyy, firiy laafam, këfsi Boccra. Bésub keroog fitu jàmbaari Edom ne tërit, mel ni kuy matu.»
Jeremiah 49:23 Lu jëm ci Damaas: «Dëkk yu mag ya ko wër, di Amat ak Arpàdd, jàq nañu; dég-dég bu tiis ba ñu dégg la. Dañu ne yàcc, jaxasoo, mbete géej gu sàmbaraax, deesu ko dalal.
Jeremiah 49:24 Damaas a ne yasar, ne wërëñ, di daw; tiitaange ne leen nuus, njàqareeku mitit ne leen taral ni kuy matu.
Jeremiah 49:25 Lu tee ñu gental bii dëkk bu siiw, taax yii ma saf?
Jeremiah 49:26 Su bés baa kay, seeni waxambaane fëlëñoo pénc yi, seeni xarekat wedam.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee, Boroom gàngoor yi.
Jeremiah 49:27 «Maay taal ca tatay Damaas sawara wu xoyom këri Buur Ben Addàd.»
Jeremiah 49:28 ¶ Lu jëm ci Kedar ak nguuri Àccor yi Nabukodonosor buuru Babilon nangu woon, Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Ñokket ci kaw Kedar, ba tas waa penku yooyu,
Jeremiah 49:29 nangu xaymaaki jur, ak kiiraay ak luy jumtukaay, yóbbu seeni giléem, te biral leen, ne leen: “Musiba ubale na!”
Jeremiah 49:30 Yeen waa Àccor, fëxleen te dawa daw, ruurooji seeni pax.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. Mu ne: «Nabukodonosor buuru Babilon déy, lalal na leen pexe, mébal leen.
Jeremiah 49:31 «Ayca ci kaw xeet wii ne finaax, dëkke xel mu dal!» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Du bunt, du galanu weñ gu ñu fegoo, te ñoom rekk a dëkk.
Jeremiah 49:32 Dees na nangu seeni giléem, tonni seen juroo jur, ma tasaare ñooñuy wat seen peggu kawaru bopp, ngelaw lu jóg, buub leen, yóbbu, ma yéewe leen seen musiba, wetoo wet.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 49:33 «Àccor day doon dëkkub till, gental ba fàww; nit du fa dëkk, doom aadama du fa dal.»
Jeremiah 49:34 ¶ Kàddug Aji Sax ji dikkaloon na Yonent Yàlla Yeremi, jëm ci Elameen ñi, ci njàlbéenu nguurug Cedesyas buurub Yuda. Mu ne:
Jeremiah 49:35 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoori xare yi dafa wax ne: «Damay damm fittu Elam, seen ngëneelu ngànnaay.
Jeremiah 49:36 Maay ngelawe ñeenti weti asamaan, dal fi kaw Elam, tasaare leen fépp fu ngelaw jublu, ba du am xeet wu daw-làquy Elam dul fekki.
Jeremiah 49:37 Maa leen di xoqtal fi seen kanami noon, yiy wut seen bakkan, alage leen sama tàngooru mer.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Maa leen di toppe saamar, ba raafal leen.
Jeremiah 49:38 Maay déjjatee Elam buur ak bummi, samp fa samab jal.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 49:39 «Waaye fan yu mujj ya, maay tijji wërsëgu Elam.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 50:1 ¶ Kàddu gii la Aji Sax ji wax ci mbirum réewum Babilon, réewum Kaldeen ña, te Yonent Yàlla Yeremi jottli ko.
Jeremiah 50:2 «Waxleen xeet yi, yéeneleen, woneleen misaal te yéene, waxleen lii, bañ cee làq dara. Neleen: “Dees na nangu Babilon, torxal Bel mbaa Mardug, tuur mi, tas ko, gàcceel gàllaaj yi, tas kasaray tuur yi.”
Jeremiah 50:3 Aw xeet kay ay bawoo bëj-gànnaar, dal fi seen kaw. Ñooñooy gentalsi seenum réew, ba kenn dootu fi dëkk, nit ak mala, ne mott, ne mes.
Jeremiah 50:4 Su bés baa, ci yooyu fan,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «bànni Israyil ay ànd ak Yudeen ñi, dikk di jooy, di sàkku seen Yàlla Aji Sax ji.
Jeremiah 50:5 Dinañu laaj yoonu Siyoŋ, jublu fa te naan: “Ayca nu dajeji fa Aji Sax ji, ci biir kóllëre gu sax gu kenn dul fàtte.”
Jeremiah 50:6 «Sama ñoñ ñi réer niy xar, seeni sàmm a leen lajjal, sànk leen fi kaw tund yi, ba tundoo tund, ñu yéegi fa, fàtte seen goorukaay.
Jeremiah 50:7 Noon bu taseek ñoom warax leen te naan: “Nun defunu dara. Ñoom ñoo moy Aji Sax ji, te mooy dalukaayu njekk, ba seeni maam yaakaaroon.”
Jeremiah 50:8 «Yeen gan ñi, fëxeleen Babilon, ba sore réewum Kaldeen ñooñu. Defleen niy sikket, daw jiitu jur gi.
Jeremiah 50:9 Maa ngii déy di xabtal fi kaw Babilon, kurélu xeet yu mag, bawoo réewum bëj-gànnaar, làng-déralsi Babilon! Seeni fitt di ñeyi xare, du moy, du sooy.
Jeremiah 50:10 Réewum Babilon a doon alalu sëxëtoo, bu ñuy sëxëtoo ba doyal.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 50:11 «Ãa yeen waa Babilon, yeena sëxëtoo xeet wi ma séddoo, di ko bégeek a bànneexoo, di bajantu ni nag wuy bàcc pepp, di ŋexal ni naaru góor?
Jeremiah 50:12 Ndaw gàcce gu réy ci seen ndey, ndaw toroxte ci ki leen sukk jur! Réew maa ngii di geenu réew yi, di ndànd-foyfoy, gu wow koŋŋ.
Jeremiah 50:13 Kenn du fi des ndax merum Aji Sax ji, lépp ay gental, ba képp ku jaare Babilon, day waaru, di muslu ci mboolem mbugal ya fa dal.
Jeremiah 50:14 Yeen fittkat yépp, làng-déral-leen Babilon, gaw ko, soqeendoo, baña yaxanal! Ñoo moy Aji Sax ji!
Jeremiah 50:15 Xaaculeen fi kawam, wër ko, Babilon daanu na, ba joxe ndodd, tata ya màbb, dàbbli ya rajaxoo! Aji Sax jeey feyu, feyuleen! Na mu defoon, defleen ko ko.
Jeremiah 50:16 Daggeleen Babilon kuy ji ak kuy góob, ku fay gan, na daw saamaru noon, fëx jëm réewam, dellu cay bokkam.
Jeremiah 50:17 «Israyil diy gàtt yu tasaaroo, yu ay gaynde dàq, buurub Asiri di gaynde gi jëkka lekk, Nabukodonosor buuru Babilon topp ca, seeñu yax ya.»
Jeremiah 50:18 Moo tax Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil Boroom gàngoor yi ne: «Maa ngii di dikkal buuru Babilon ak waa réewam, na ma dikkale woon buurub Asiri.
Jeremiah 50:19 Maa ngii di delloo Israyil parloom, mu dellu di fore àllub Karmel ak Basan, di regge tundi Efrayim ak Galàdd.
Jeremiah 50:20 Su bés baa, ci yooyu fan,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «dees na seet fi Israyil lu ñaaw, du fi am; fi Yuda it, deesu fi gis bàkkaar. Maay jéggal moos ndes wi ma fi saxal.
Jeremiah 50:21 «Songleen réewum Meratayim ak waa Pekodd, jam leen, faagaagal seen gannaaw.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Defleen mboolem li ma leen sant.
Jeremiah 50:22 Coowal xaree ngi fi réew mi, ak rajaxoo ju réy.
Jeremiah 50:23 Babilon, réew mi daan wàkk mboolem àddina, tey mu dammtoo ba rajaxoo nii, dib gent ci biir xeet yi!
Jeremiah 50:24 Babilon, maa la fiir, nga tancu te yéguloo! Dañu laa gis, ne la taral, yaa dëkk Aji Sax ji,
Jeremiah 50:25 Aji Sax ji ubbi na waxandey xareem, mer, génney gànnaayam. Liggéeyu Boroom bee, Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, foofa ca réewum Babilon.
Jeremiah 50:26 Songeleen ko fu ne, dàjji ay sàqam, jal-jalee. Fàkkasleen lépp, ba du dese dara.
Jeremiah 50:27 Jamleen seen jàmbaari yëkk yépp, nañu dem ca rendikaay ba. Wóoy, ngalla ñoom! Seen bés taxaw na moos, di seen àppu mbugal.
Jeremiah 50:28 Baatu daw-làqu yu rëcc a ngoog, bawoo réewum Babilon, di yeggesi waa Siyoŋ mbugalum Aji Sax ji sunu Yàlla, mbugal mi këram waral.
Jeremiah 50:29 Wooleen fittkatoo fittkat fi kaw Babilon, mboolem kuy tàwwi xala. Gawleen ko, bu kenn rëcc. Feyleen koy jëfam; def ko ni mu def moroomam. Babilon a jaay reewande Aji Sax ji, ku Sell ku Israyil ki.
Jeremiah 50:30 Moo tax bésub keroog goneem yu góor di daanooy péncam, niti xareem di wedamandoo.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 50:31 «Babilon mu reewee, maa ngii fi sa kaw.» Kàddug Boroom bi, Aji Sax jee, Boroom gàngoori xare yi. «Sa bés déy taxaw na, di àpp bi ma la wara mbugale.
Jeremiah 50:32 Ku reew keey tërëf, fëlëñu, te du am ku ko yékkati. Maay jafal ay dëkkam, sawara wa xoyom lépp lu ko wër.»
Jeremiah 50:33 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: «Bànni Israyil ak Yuda, ñépp lañu notandoo. Ñi leen jàpp ñépp téyee leen doole, bañ leena ba.
Jeremiah 50:34 Waaye seen jotkat a am doole, te mooy Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi. Moo leen di layool seen layoo, ngir jàqal réewum Babilon, jàmmal waa àddina yi ci des.
Jeremiah 50:35 Saamar ci kaw waa Babilon!» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Saamar ci kaw waa Babilon aki kàngamam aki kaaŋam.
Jeremiah 50:36 Saamar ci kaw kebatukati diine yi, ba seenug ndof feeñ. Saamar ci kawi jàmbaaram, ñu ne yàcc.
Jeremiah 50:37 Saamar ci kaw fas ak watiiram, ak mboolem niti njaxasaan ñi mu fat, ba ñu mel niy jigéen. Saamar ci kawi dencam, ñu sëxëtoo.
Jeremiah 50:38 Maral ci kawi waltanam, mu ŋiis; mii réew mu nit ñiy jaamoo jëmmi tuur, ñooy say ndax seen yu ñàng yooyu
Jeremiah 50:39 Moo tax ay dundooti màndiŋ ak rabi àll a koy këroo, bànjóoli dëkke ko, kenn dootu fa desati, kenn dootu fa dëkk mukk ba fàww.
Jeremiah 50:40 Mu mel ni ba Yàlla tasee Sodom ak Gomor, tasaale la ko wër.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee. «Nit du fa dëkkati, doom aadama du fa dalati.»
Jeremiah 50:41 «Aw askan a ngii, bàyyikoo bëj-gànnaar, xeet wu mag lañuy doon, buur yu bare, sàqee fa cati àddina.
Jeremiah 50:42 Yeen waa Babilon, réew mu taaru mi, fitt aku xeej la ñooñuy ŋàbb, néeg lool, duñu yërëm, seen coow ni riirum géej, ñu war seeni fas, làng-déral leen ni benn bopp ngir xare.
Jeremiah 50:43 Buuru Babilon dégg riir ma, yoxo ya yoqi, njàqare ne ko taral, mu jàq ni kuy matu.
Jeremiah 50:44 Maa ngii, di fëlle gottub Yurdan ni gaynde, wuti mbooy gu naat. Xef ak xippi déy, ma fëxale fa lépp, ba tabb fa ki ma taamu. Ana moos ku mel ni man, ku am sañ-sañ ci man? Ana njiit luy taxaw fi sama kanam?
Jeremiah 50:45 Kon dégluleen pexe mi Aji Sax ji waajal Babilon, mébét yi mu mébétal réewum Kaldeen ñooñu! Ndegam deesul wommat seen gàtt yu ndaw, yóbbu, ba yàq parlu ma yaxeet.
Jeremiah 50:46 Bu ñuy nangu Babilon, riir ma day jolli ba riiral suuf, seeni yuux àkki fa biir xeeti jaambur ya.»
Jeremiah 51:1 Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Maa ngii di yebal fi kaw Babilon, waa Lew Kamay gii, ngelawal yàqkat.
Jeremiah 51:2 Maay yónnee Babilon ay beeskat yu ko bees, tonni réew ma, ba mu set. Keroog bésu safaan ba déy, fu ne lañu koy songe.
Jeremiah 51:3 Buleen leen may fu ñu taxaweek seen kiiraay, di fitte; buleen ñéeblu seeni waxambaane, fàkkasleen seen gàngoor gépp.
Jeremiah 51:4 Ñii dee, ne wetar réewum Babilon; ñee gaañu, ne lasar ca mbedd ya.
Jeremiah 51:5 Israyil ak Yuda ñàkkuñu seen Yàlla, Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi, te réewum Babilon fees naaki moy yu ñu moy Yàlla Aji Sell ji séddoo Israyil.
Jeremiah 51:6 «Yeen gan ñi, génnleen Babilon, ku ne rawaleji sa bakkan. Buleen ñaawtéefu jaambur sànkaale; lii àppu mbugal la bu Aji Sax ji matal; seen añ la, bu mu leen añale.
Jeremiah 51:7 Aji Sax jee yor Babilon ci loxoom, muy kaasu wurus bu def xadaru xeet ya, di màndal mboolem àddina; xeet ya naan ca, ba tax ñuy say.
Jeremiah 51:8 Teewul Babilon jekki daanu, tasaaroo. Jooyleen ko, dàmp ko, seral mititam, jombul mu wér.»
Jeremiah 51:9 «Bu nu sañoon faj Babilon, mu wér, waaye wérul. Nan ko ba te dem, ku ne ñibbim réewam. Àtteb Babilon kat àgg na asamaan, àkki na fa kaw niir ya.»
Jeremiah 51:10 «Aji Sax ji jox na nu dëgg. Nanu yeggeji waa Siyoŋ jaloorey Aji Sax ji, sunu Yàlla.»
Jeremiah 51:11 «Nàmmleen fitt yi, feesale mbar yi! Aji Sax ji xabtal na buuri Medd fi kaw Babilon, nar koo tas. Lii mbugalu Aji Sax jee, mbugal mi këram waral.
Jeremiah 51:12 Yékkatil-leen tatay Babilon raayab xare, yokkleen wattukat yi, taxawal leen fa ñuy wattoo, te waajal tërukat yi. Aji Sax ji def na li mu waxoon ne dina ko def waa Babilon.
Jeremiah 51:13 Yeen ñi dëkke weti ndox yu ne xéew, seen alal ne xéew, seen muj taxaw na, seen buumu bakkan dog na.
Jeremiah 51:14 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi giñ na ci boppam. Mu ne: “Maa leen di same ay nit niy njéeréer, ñu xaacu, song leen.”»
Jeremiah 51:15 Suuf, Aji Sax ji sàkke kàttanam; dun bi, mu sampem xelam; asamaan, mu lale xam-xamam.
Jeremiah 51:16 Bu àddoo ndoxum asamaan riir, mu yéegey niir fa cati àddina, riddee ngelaw fa dencam ya, daldi melax, taw.
Jeremiah 51:17 Nitoo nit dim sannax, sore xam-xam, te képp kuy tëgg sa jëmmu tuur, yaa añe gàcce. Sa jëmmi weñ ji nga xelli, di neenug neen, noowug bakkan, tus!
Jeremiah 51:18 Cóolóolu neen, liggéeyu caaxaan; bu bésam taxawee, mu sànku.
Jeremiah 51:19 Séddoob Yanqóoba déy wuute naak yii caaxaan. Kee bind lépp, bind giir gi mu séddoo. Kookooy Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoori xare yi!
Jeremiah 51:20 «Yaw Babilon, yaa doon sama wàkku, di sama ngànnaay, ma di la wàkke xeet yi, rajaxee la réew yi,
Jeremiah 51:21 wàkke la fas ak gawaram, wàkke la watiir ak dawalkatam,
Jeremiah 51:22 wàkke la góor ak jigéen, wàkke la mag ak ndaw, wàkke la waxambaaneek ub janq,
Jeremiah 51:23 wàkke la sàmm ak géttam, wàkke la beykat ak lëkkeb nagam, wàkke la kàngam ak jawriñ.
Jeremiah 51:24 Waaye mboolem lu Babilon ak waa réew mépp def ci Siyoŋ, maa leen koy fey, ngeen di gis, yeen Yudeen ñi.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 51:25 «Maa ngii déy, fi sa kaw, yaw Babilon, ponkalum yàqkat bi,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «yaw miy yàq àddina sépp. Maay tàllal sama loxo fi sa kaw, taxañe la fa kaw doj ya, def la ponkalum jalu dóom.
Jeremiah 51:26 Deesul seppee fi yaw doju tabax wu ñuy lëkklee, mbaa doju tabax wu bokk ci kenu, nde gent ngay doon ba fàww.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 51:27 «Yékkatileen ub raaya fi réew mi te walal liit gi xeet yi. Dajaleleen xeet yi fi kaw Babilon, te xabtal fi kawam réew yii: Araraat ak Minni ak Askenas. Tabbal-leen ko njiitu xare mu ko song, indil koy fas yu saf ndiiraani njéeréer.
Jeremiah 51:28 Dajaleleen xeet yi fi kaw Babilon, wooleen buuri Medd ak kàngam ya ak jawriñ ñaak mboolem réew mu ñu moom.
Jeremiah 51:29 Suuf a fuddu, wañaaru, mébéti Aji Sax jeey sottalal Babilon, ngir réew ma dib gent bu kenn nekkul.
Jeremiah 51:30 Jàmbaari Babilon xareetuñu, ña nga des ca seeni tata, doole ŋiis, ñu mel niy jigéen. Bunti dëkk bi dàjjiku, kër ya jàpp.
Jeremiah 51:31 Xélukat dab xélukat; ndaw jottli ndaw xibaar bu ñu yeggeji buuru Babilon, ne ko nangu nañu dëkkam ba wetoo wet,
Jeremiah 51:32 nangu jàllukaayi dex ya, taal barax ya, xarekat ya raj-rajloo.»
Jeremiah 51:33 Aji Sax ji Yàllay Israyil Boroom gàngoori xare yi déy dafa wax ne: «Ñu ngi dëggaate Babilon mu taaru mi, ni ñuy dëggaatee dàgga ju ñuy bàccesi. Balaa yàgg ngóobu Babilon taxaw.»
Jeremiah 51:34 «Buuru Babilon warax na ma. Da maa muucu, ñiit ma, ba ma set ni ndab. Da maa modd ni ninki-nànka, sole kollam li gën ci man, yàbbi la ca des.»
Jeremiah 51:35 Siyoŋ ne: «Yal na sama yàpp ak sama coono topp Babilon.» Yerusalem ne: «Yal na sama deret topp waa Babilon!»
Jeremiah 51:36 Aji Sax ji nag dafa wax ne: «Maa ngii di leen layool seen layoo, ba feyul leen. Maay ŋeeral géejam, ŋiisal am walam,
Jeremiah 51:37 Babilon def jali doj, di paxum till, di gent bu ñuy muslu, kenn du ko dëkke.
Jeremiah 51:38 Ñu ngi ŋarandoo niy gaynde, di xiiroo ni gaynde yu ndaw.
Jeremiah 51:39 Ñu tàng bay bëgga dee, ma may leen ñu naana naan, màndal leen, ñu mana xawaare, tëdd nelaw nelawi fàww, duñu yewwooti.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 51:40 Aji Sax ji nee: «Maa leen di wommat niy xar ba ca rendikaay ba, ñu mel ni kuuyi xar aki sikket.
Jeremiah 51:41 «Ãa! Ana nees mana nangoo Sesag? Nees mana tege loxo ki àddina sépp di kañ? Ana nu Babilon mana gente fi digg xeet yi?
Jeremiah 51:42 Géej ay mëdd Babilon, mu sàngoo gannaxam yu jallaañoo,
Jeremiah 51:43 ay dëkkam gental, réew mi ne sereŋ, di ndànd-foyfoy, kenn du ko dëkke, doom aadama du fa jaare.
Jeremiah 51:44 Maay dikke mbugal Bel, tuur mi ci Babilon, yàbbiloo kob lancam. Xeet yi noppee def um wal, wuti ko, tatay Babilon it màbb.
Jeremiah 51:45 Yeen sama ñoñ, génnleen fi seen biir, na ku ne rawale sa bakkan, ba mucc tàngooru sànjum Aji Sax ji.
Jeremiah 51:46 Bu seen fit rëcc, ngeen di tiit xibaar yi ñuy yéene ci réew mi: ren yéene jib, déwén yéene jibati, fitna law ci réew mi, njiit ne njiit dann.
Jeremiah 51:47 Kon ay bés a ngii di ñëw, yu may dikke mbugal tuuri Babilon, réew mépp torox, ña ñu bóom ñépp wetaroo fa biir.
Jeremiah 51:48 Su boobaa asamaan ak suuf ak mboolem li ci biiram sarxollendoo, di bége li dal Babilon. Bëj-gànnaar kay la yàqkat yay bawoo.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 51:49 Waa Babilon it dinañu daanu ngir waa Israyil ñi ñu bóom, ba ñu yem ak mboolem waa àddina yi ñu bóom, te ñu daanu ndax Babilon.
Jeremiah 51:50 Ée yeen ñi rëcc saamar, buleen taxaw, demleen, di fàttlikoo Aji Sax ji fu sore, tey bàyyi xel Yerusalem.
Jeremiah 51:51 «Nooka rus ci saaga yi nu dégg, ak gàcce gi nu sëlmoo ndax doxandéem yi dugg ci biir bérab bu sell bi ci kër Aji Sax ji.»
Jeremiah 51:52 «Moo tax, bés a ngii di ñëw,» kàddug Aji Sax jee, «maay dikke mbugal seen jëmmi tuur yi, ñoom, ñi ñu jam di binnee fi réew mi mépp.
Jeremiah 51:53 Su Babilon yéegoon asamaan, dàbbli fa tata ju ne kekk sax, du tee ay yàqkat bawoo fi man, dal ci kawam.» Kàddug Aji Sax jee.
Jeremiah 51:54 Yuuxi njàqare fa Babilon, réewum Kaldeen ñooñaa toj ba tojatoo.
Jeremiah 51:55 Aji Sax jee niy yàqtee Babilon, tukkal fa riir mu réy. Gàngoori noon yaa ngay buur ni gannaxi géej, seen riirum kàddu jolli.
Jeremiah 51:56 Yàqkat déy dikkal na Babilon, jàpp ay jàmbaaram, dammatey fittam. Aji Sax ji déy mooy Yàlla jiy yoole, di fey pey gu mat sëkk.
Jeremiah 51:57 Mu ne: «Maay màndal seeni kilifaak seeni kaaŋ ak seeni kàngam ak seeni jawriñ ak seeni jàmbaar, ñu tëdd nelaw nelawi fàww, duñu yewwooti.» Kàddug Buur a, Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi.
Jeremiah 51:58 Aji Sax ji Boroom gàngoor yi dafa wax ne: «Tatay Babilon yu mag yi dees koy màbba màbb; bunt yu kawe ya lakk ba jeex. Xeet yee ñaq ci neen, waaso yee sonnal sawara.»
Jeremiah 51:59 ¶ Bëkk-néegu Buur Cedesyas moo doon Seraya doomu Nerya doomu Maaseya. Ba Cedesyas tolloo ca ñeenteelu atu nguuram, la Seraya ànd ak moom Babilon.
Jeremiah 51:60 Fekk na Yeremi bind cib taxañ mboolem safaan yiy dikkal Babilon, di mboolem mbir yooyu jëm ci Babilon.
Jeremiah 51:61 Yeremi sant Seraya, ne ko: «Boo àggee Babilon, fexeel ba biral kàddu yii yépp.
Jeremiah 51:62 Te nga wax ne: “Aji Sax ji, yaw déy, yaa xamle ne dëkk bii dina tas, dara du ci dëkkati, du doom aadama, du rab. Ab gent lay doon ba fàww.”
Jeremiah 51:63 Boo jàngee taxañu mbind mii ba noppi, nanga ci takk aw xeer, sànni ko ci biir dexu Efraat.
Jeremiah 51:64 Su ko defee nga ne: “Nii la Babilon di diige te du jógati ndax safaan bi may wàcce fi seen kaw, ba ñu sonn.”» Fii la kàdduy Yeremi yem.
Jeremiah 52:1 ¶ Ñaar fukki at ak benn la Cedekiya amoon ba muy falu buur, te fukki at ak benn la nguuru fa Yerusalem. Yaayam mooy Amutal doomu Yeremi ma cosaanoo Libna.
Jeremiah 52:2 Muy def li Aji Sax ji ñaawlu, mboolem noonee ko Yowakim defe woon.
Jeremiah 52:3 Merum Aji Sax ji nag dikkal Yerusalem ak Yuda, ba mu mujj xalab leen. Gannaaw gi Cedesyas fippu buuru Babilon.
Jeremiah 52:4 ¶ Ba Cedesyas tolloo ci juróom ñeenteelu atu nguuram, fukki fan ca fukkeelu weeram, ca la Nabukodonosor buuru Babilon ànd ak mbooloom xareem mépp ci kaw Yerusalem. Ñu dal fa janook Yerusalem, yékkati gawukaay, wërale ko.
Jeremiah 52:5 Dëkk ba gawe, ba keroog Cedesyas tollu ci fukkeelu atu nguuram ak benn.
Jeremiah 52:6 Keroog juróom ñeenti fan ca ñeenteelu weer wa, xiif ba tar lool ca biir dëkk ba, ba waa réew ma amatuñu ab dund.
Jeremiah 52:7 Xarekati Yuda ya génn guddi daw. Fekk na waa Babilon gaw dëkk ba. Teewul ñu rëcc, jaare ca bunt ba ca diggante ñaari tata ya, ca wetu toolu buur. Ñu daldi wuti xuru Yurdan.
Jeremiah 52:8 Waa Babilon nag topp Buur Cedesyas, ba dab ko ca jooru Yeriko. Fekk mbooloom xareem mépp tasaaroo, wacc ko.
Jeremiah 52:9 Ñu jàpp ko, yóbbu ca buuru Babilon ca dëkk ba ñuy wax Ribla ca réewum Amat. Nabukodonosor dogal fa àtteem.
Jeremiah 52:10 Buuru Babilon daa rendi doomi Cedesyas yu góor, muy gis, mu rendiwaale mboolem kàngami Yuda, ca Ribla.
Jeremiah 52:11 Gannaaw loolu mu tuur bëti Cedesyas, ba noppi jénge ko jéngi xànjar, yóbbu ko Babilon, tëj ko fa, ba keroog bés ba mu deeyee.
Jeremiah 52:12 ¶ Ba Nabukodonosor buuru Babilon tolloo ci fukkeelu atu nguuram ak juróom ñeent, ba am fukki fan ca juróomeelu weeru at ma, ca la bëkk-néegu buuru Babilon, Nebusaradan njiitu dag ya, dugg Yerusalem.
Jeremiah 52:13 Mu taal kër Aji Sax ji, taal kër buur, ak këri Yerusalem gépp, boole ca këri boroom barke ya.
Jeremiah 52:14 Gàngooru Babilon gépp daldi ànd ak njiital dagi buur, ñu màbb tata ya wër Yerusalem.
Jeremiah 52:15 Gannaaw gi ñenn ci baadoolo yi, ak ña nekkoon ca dëkk ba, ba booba, ak ña jébbaloon seen bopp buuru Babilon, ak ña desoon ca liggéeykat ya, Nebusaradan njiital dagi buur boole leen yóbbu ngàllo.
Jeremiah 52:16 Ñenn ca baadooloy réew ma nag, Nebusaradan njiital dag ya bàyyi leen fa, ñuy liggéey tóokëri reseñ yaak tool ya.
Jeremiah 52:17 Ci biir loolu kenuy xànjar ya bokkoon ca kër Aji Sax ji, ak rootukaay yaak mbalkam xànjar ma woon ca kër Aji Sax ji, waa Babilon toj lépp, boole xànjar jépp yóbbu Babilon.
Jeremiah 52:18 Ñu yóbbaale mboolem ndabi xànjar yi ñuy liggéeye ci kër Aji Sax ji: ndab yiy def dóom, ak ñiitukaay yi ak ñiimi feyukaayi làmp yi, ak ndab yiy def deretu sarax yi, ak and yu ndaw yi, ak mboolem jumtukaayi xànjar yi ñuy sarxalee.
Jeremiah 52:19 Njiital dag ya yóbbaale ndab yu ndaw yaak and yaak ndab yiy def deretu sarax, ak ndab yiy def dóom, ak tegukaayi làmp yaak and yu ndaw yaak këlli tuurukaay ya. Lu ciy wurus, mu ber, lu ciy xaalis, mu ber.
Jeremiah 52:20 ¶ Ñaari kenu yooyu ak mbalka maak fukki nag ak ñaar ya ko yenu, ak rootukaay ya, lépp di xànjar bu Buur Suleymaan defaraloon kër Aji Sax ji, maneesula takk diisaay ba.
Jeremiah 52:21 Kenu yi, gu ci nekk am na taxawaayu fukki xasab ak juróom ñett te fukki xasab ak ñaar a koy ub. Mu def pax ca biir te dëllaayu weñ ga di juróom ñeenti baaraam.
Jeremiah 52:22 Kenu gu ci nekk ponku xànjar a ca tege, taxawaayu ponk bi di juróomi xasab, ab caaxub xànjar wodd ko, ànd ak doomi gërënaati xànjar. Ñaari kenu yépp noonu, ànd aki gërënaat.
Jeremiah 52:23 Gërënaat yi juróom ñeent fukk laak juróom benn, wet gu nekk, boo ci boolee ya ca cat ya, muy téeméer, yu ub caax ba.
Jeremiah 52:24 ¶ Ci kaw loolu njiital dag ya jàpp Seraya sarxalkat bu mag ba, ak Cefaña sarxalkat ba ca topp, ak ñetti dagi bunt kër Aji Sax ja.
Jeremiah 52:25 Biir dëkk ba nag, mu jële fa benn njiitu xare, ak juróom ñaari niti dëkk ba ñu sës ci Buur, ak bindkatub njiital xare ba sasoo bind xarekat yi, ak juróom benn fukki Yudeen ñu mu fekk ca biir dëkk ba.
Jeremiah 52:26 Ba mu ko defee Nebusaradan, njiital dagi buur, boole leen yóbbu ca buuru Babilon ca Ribla.
Jeremiah 52:27 Buuru Babilon nag bóom leen foofa ca Ribla, ca réewum Amat. Noonu la waa Yuda génne seen réew, dem ngàllo.
Jeremiah 52:28 ¶ Lii mooy limu nit ñi Nabukodonosor toxal: Ñetti junniy Yudeen ak ñaar fukk ak ñett (3 023), loolu yemook juróom ñaareelu atu nguuram,
Jeremiah 52:29 ak juróom ñetti téeméer ak fanweer ak ñaar (832), loolu yemook fukkeelu atu nguuram ak juróom ñett,
Jeremiah 52:30 Ak juróom ñaar téeméer ak ñeent fukk ak juróom (745) yu Nebusaradan njiital dag ya, toxal. Loolu yemook ñaar fukkeelu at maak ñett ci nguurug Nabukodonosor. Ñi ñu toxal ñépp di ñeenti junni ak juróom benni téeméer (4 600).
Jeremiah 52:31 ¶ Yóbbu nañu Yowakin buurub Yuda ngàllo ba mu am fanweeri at ak juróom ñaar, Ewil Merodag doora falu buur ca Babilon. At mooma, fukkeelu weer waak ñaar, ñaar fukki fan ak juróom ca weer wa, ca la Ewil Merodag siggil Yowakin buurub Yuda, daldi koy tijji.
Jeremiah 52:32 Ci biir loolu mu wax ak moom lu rafet, jox ko cér bu sut cér ba mu jox yeneen buur, ya mu bokkal curga ca Babilon.
Jeremiah 52:33 Yowakin nag teqlikook yérey kaso ya, ba noppi ñu may ko muy bokk ak Buur ndab giiru dundam.
Jeremiah 52:34 Ci biir loolu ñu dogal ko njëlam lu sax dàkk, di bàyyikoo ci buuru Babilon bés bu jot, giiru dundam, ba keroog muy dee.
Lamentations 1:1 Ndeysaan! Dëkk beeka wéet tey! Te ñoñam noon gàññ démb. Ndeysaan! Mu ngi mel nib jëtun tey, te noon ràññ fi biir xeet yi! Moo doon lingeeru diiwaan yi, tey mu sasoo liggéeyu sañul-bañ.
Lamentations 1:2 Day fanaanee jooya jooy, rongooñ yay bas-basi, te du kenn ku koy dëfal ci mboolemi soppeem. Xaritoo xarit wor ko, walbatiku diy noonam.
Lamentations 1:3 Ngàllo lañu yóbbu Yuda, ci biir naqar ak njaam gu metti. Ci biiri jaambur lañu dëkk, amuñu fu ñu nopploo, mboolem ña leen dàqa leen dab, ba tance leen ca ruq ya.
Lamentations 1:4 Yoon yi jëm Siyoŋ jooy na wéet, kenn jaareetu ca màggalsi. Pénc yépp a gental, sarxalkat yay binni, janq ja jàq, Siyoŋ gépp di naqarlu!
Lamentations 1:5 Seen noon yaa jiite tey, seen bañ yooyoo ne finaax, Aji Sax jee mbugale waa Siyoŋ seeni tooñ yu bare, seeni doom duggig njaam, di moomeel ub noon.
Lamentations 1:6 Lu doon sagub Siyoŋ, dëkk bu taaru bi, tey sàggiku na. Seeni garmee ngi mel ni kéwél yu amul parlu, di koyoŋ-koyoŋiy daw, te rëbb ne leen dann.
Lamentations 1:7 Tey ci janti toroxte ak tumurànke, la Yerusalem di fàttlikoo mboolem ngëneeli démbam. Aw askanam a tàbbi ci loxol noon, te wall amul, noon ba gis leen, di textexi ci seenug yàqule.
Lamentations 1:8 Yerusalem a moya moy, ba tax koo mujj di sobe; ku ko teraloon, sofental ko, ndax gis ko, mu ne duŋŋ. Moom ci boppam mu ngi binni, fuuylu.
Lamentations 1:9 Sobey Siyoŋ ca pendalam, te bàyyiwul xel ag mujam. Jéllam ba yéeme na, te amul ku ko dëfal. Siyoŋ nee: «Éy Aji Sax ji, xoolal sama njàqare; noon bi déy, am na ndam!»
Lamentations 1:10 Loxo la noon bi teg ci ngëneeli Siyoŋ gépp. Siyoŋ kay a gis yéefar yi songsi këram gu sell gi, te ci ñoom nga santaane woon, ne buñu dugg sam ndaje.
Lamentations 1:11 Waa Siyoŋ gépp a ngi binni, di wut ab dund, seeni ngëneel lañuy weccikoo aw ñam wu ñu leqlikoo.
Lamentations 1:12 Yeen mboolem ñiy jaare yoon wi, lii safu leen, waaye seetleen rekk ba gis ndax wenn mitit dab na mitit wi ñu ma teg, te Aji Sax ji naqarale ma ko ci jantub tàkktel sànjam.
Lamentations 1:13 Fa kaw la Aji Sax ji sànnee sawara ci sama biiri yax, moo laaw ab caax ngir fakktal ma, waññi ma, jànnaxe ma, ma dëkke yoggooral.
Lamentations 1:14 Samay tooñ la Aji Sax ji ëmb, fastee ko loxoom, mu tege sama kaw ndodd, ba jeexal sama doole. Boroom bee ma tàbbal ci loxo yu ma manula të.
Lamentations 1:15 Ku doon jàmbaar fi sama biir, la Boroom bi xalab. Am ndaje la ma wooteel, ngir falaxe sama ndaw yu góor. Boroom bee dëggaate Janq Yuda mu taaru mi, ni reseñ ci biir nalukaay.
Lamentations 1:16 Looloo ma tax di jooy, rongooñ di wal-wali, te ku may dëfal sore ma, mook kuy seral sama xol. Samay doom a ngi jaaxle, nde noon bi daan na.
Lamentations 1:17 Siyoŋ tàllal na loxoom, waaye amul ku ko dëfal. Aji Sax jee wool askanu Yanqóoba seeni noon yi leen wër, ba Yerusalem mujj di sobe fi seen biir.
Lamentations 1:18 Aji Sax ji moo yey, kàddoom laa gàntal. Yeen, xeetoo xeet, ngalla dégluleen te xool samaw tiis. Samay ndaw yu góor ak yu jigéen, ñoo duggi ngàllo!
Lamentations 1:19 Samay soppe laa woo wall, ñoom ñu wor ma. Samay sarxalkat ak samay mag di wuti ab dund bu ñu leqlikoo, far faatu ci biir dëkk bi.
Lamentations 1:20 Éy Aji Sax ji, xoolal sama njàqare, samay butit di fuddu, sama biir xol salfaañoo ndaxu tiis. Man de maa gàntal ba gàntaaral, ba fa biti, saamar di fa bóome, te biir kër it di ndee.
Lamentations 1:21 Dégg nañu may binni, te awma ku ma dëfal. Noon yépp a dégg samaw ay te di ko bége, nde yaa ko def. Ngalla indil bés bi nga dige, ba ñu daj li ma daj.
Lamentations 1:22 Yal na seen gépp mbon teew fi sa kanam, ba nga mbugal leen ni nga ma mbugale ndax mboolem samay tooñ. Samay onk bare na, sama xol jeex tàkk.
Lamentations 2:1 Ndeysaan Boroom bee mer ba xiinal Janq Siyoŋ mu taaru mi. Fa asamaan la rattaxe sagu Israyil fa suuf. Keroog bésu meram ma, bàyyiwul xel, ne këram googoo di ndëggastalam.
Lamentations 2:2 Boroom bee modd te yërëmul mboolem sanci Yanqóoba. Ca meram ma la màbbe tatay Janq Yuda mu taaru ma. Moo detteel nguur ga aki garmeem, sobeel leen.
Lamentations 2:3 Tàngooru sànjam la dagge gépp kàttanu Israyil. Fa kanam noon ba la roccee dooley ndijooram. Moo tàkkal Yanqóoba ni sawara wuy sëlsëli, ba xoyom mboolem la ko wër.
Lamentations 2:4 Boroom bee tàwwi ag fittam mel ni ab noon, moo diire ndijooram, mel ni bañ, moo bóom mboolem lu neexa xool. Ci biir xaymay janq Siyoŋ mu taaru ma la yuri am sànjam ni sawara.
Lamentations 2:5 Boroom bee mel nib noon, modd Israyil, moddaale këram yu taaru yépp, tas ay tataam, ba fulal Janq Yuda mu taaru ma, ay yuux aki jooy.
Lamentations 2:6 Moo tas mbaaram ni bu doon mbaarum tool, moo rajaxe bérabu ndajeem. Aji Sax ji moo fàtteloo waa Siyoŋ màggal ak bésub Noflaay, te tàngooru meram la xalabe buur ak sarxalkat.
Lamentations 2:7 Aji Sax jee jañax sarxalukaayam, gedd bérabam bu sell. Moo teg ci loxol noon tatay këram yi. Biir kër Aji Sax ji la baat xaacoo, ni bu doon bésu màggal.
Lamentations 2:8 Aji Sax jee dogoo rajaxe tatam janq Siyoŋ mu taaru, Moo tàllal buumu nattukaay, ngir tas ko, bankul loxoom it te màbbu ko. Moo jooyloo tata ak tabaxub fegukaay, ñu ànd tojatoo.
Lamentations 2:9 Bunti dëkk ba suulu na, te moo yàqte, dammate weñi tëjukaay ya, buuram aki garmeem a tumurànkeji ca yéefar ya, te téereb yoon amul, yonent it gisatul peeñu mu bawoo fa Aji Sax ji.
Lamentations 2:10 Magi janq Siyoŋ mu taaru ña nga toog, xeremlu, xëppoo suuf, sol ay saaku, di ñaawlu. Janqi Yerusalem sëgg, seen bopp jëm suuf.
Lamentations 2:11 Samay gët a giim ndaxi rongooñ, samay butit fuddu, xol ŋiis, jeex tàkk: ci tasteg samaw askan; xale yeek gone yiy nàmp ne lasar fi mbedd yi!
Lamentations 2:12 Seen yaay lañu naan: «Ana fu nuy lekke, ba naan?» Te ne lasiim ci mbeddi dëkk bi, ni ñu gaañoo xare, bakkan di tàggoo fa ñu uufoo ca weenu yaay.
Lamentations 2:13 Yaw Janq Yerusalem mu taaru mi, lu ma lay wax? Ku ma lay méngaleel? Siyoŋ mu jekk mu taaru mi laa ne, ana ku ma lay dendaleel, ba seral sa xol? Yaw mi sab góom yaa ni géej, ana ku lay faj?
Lamentations 2:14 Ag neen aki caaxaan la la say yonent gisal, te biraluñu sag ñaawtéef, ngir tijji sa wërsëg, xanaa di la yéeneel waxyuy caaxaan aki nax.
Lamentations 2:15 Mboolem ñi fi jaareey tacc-taccali loxo, ciipu, wëcc bopp ci gentub Yerusalem mu taaru ma, te naan: «Xanaa du biib dëkk lañu doon tudd sottiteb taar ba, te muy mbégtem àddina sépp?»
Lamentations 2:16 Sa noon yépp a lay ñaawal, di la kókkaleek a kekku, te naan: «Sànk nanu leen nag! Bii bés lanu yàggoona séentu, te noo ko fekke tey.»
Lamentations 2:17 Aji Sax jee def la mu nammoon, moo sottal kàddoom ga mu santaane woon janti démb. Moo fàdd te yërëmul, ba may noon bége leen, te moo kaweel sa kàttanu bañ yi.
Lamentations 2:18 Askan waa ngi jooy jooyi xol fi kanam Boroom bi. Éy yaw tatay janq Siyoŋ mu taaru mi, sottil say rongooñ ni walum dex guddeek bëccëg; bul nopplu, bul feral say rongooñ.
Lamentations 2:19 Jógal guddi, xaacu: ndoortel wattub guddi, ngay yuri sab xol nim ndox, jàkkaarlook Boroom bi. Tàllal koy loxo, ngir sa bakkani doom, yi xiif tax ne lasiim fi boppu mbeddoo mbedd.
Lamentations 2:20 Éy Aji Sax ji, xoolal, seetal rekk ki nga def nii! Xanaa du ndey mooy dem ba yàpp doomam, doom ju mu sukk jur, mu wér péŋŋ! Xanaa du sarxalkat akub yonent lañuy bóom fi bérabu Aji Sax bu sell bi!
Lamentations 2:21 Mag ak ndaw a ngi ne lareet fi suuf ci mbedd yi; sama janq jeek sama xale yu góor yi tëdd, fàddoo saamar. Yaa rey ci sa bésub mer, yaa rendi te yërëmoo.
Lamentations 2:22 Yaa woote ni su doon bésu màggal, tiitaange dar kepp ma. Bésub merum Aji Sax ji, kenn rëccul, kenn muccul. Doom yi ma jur, yar leen, noon bi fàkkas leen!
Lamentations 3:1 Man maay nit ki gisu naqar, naqar wu ko yarub sànjum Aji Sax ji teg.
Lamentations 3:2 Man la jañax, te lëndëm la ma doxloo, dug leer.
Lamentations 3:3 Man doŋŋ lay yen aka yenaat loxoom, bésoo bés.
Lamentations 3:4 Moo ràppal sama der ak samaw suux, tas samay yax.
Lamentations 3:5 Moo tabax fi sama kaw, tanc ma, gawe ma tooke ak coono.
Lamentations 3:6 Bérab yu lëndëm la ma dëël, ni ña dee bu yàgg.
Lamentations 3:7 Moo ma ñag ba manumaa bëtt, te jéng yu diis la ma jénge.
Lamentations 3:8 Su ma yuuxoo, woote wall it, mu tanqamlu samag ñaan.
Lamentations 3:9 Ay doji yett la ñage samay yoon, te moo lajjal samay ñall.
Lamentations 3:10 Moo di segg mu may tëru, di gaynde gu waafe làqukaayam.
Lamentations 3:11 Samaw yoon la ma wàcce, xotat ma, tumurànkeel ma.
Lamentations 3:12 Moo ma bankal xalaam, diire mag fittam.
Lamentations 3:13 Sama xóotey xol la soqil ay fittam.
Lamentations 3:14 Maa mujj di reetaanukaayu bokk yépp, di seen woyu bés bu nekk.
Lamentations 3:15 Moo ma reggal wextan, màndal ma lu mel ni xay.
Lamentations 3:16 Yéyloo na may doj, dëggaate ma ci pënd bi.
Lamentations 3:17 Jàmmi xol a ma réer, ma fàtte sax luy mbégte.
Lamentations 3:18 Ca laa ne sama doolee (/muñukaaya/darajaa) jeex! ak sama yaakaar ci Aji Sax ji.
Lamentations 3:19 Baal xel sama naqar ak sama tumurànke, wii wextan akug tooke!
Lamentations 3:20 Dama ciy xalaat aka xalaataat, sama xol jeex tàkk!
Lamentations 3:21 Waaye li may dëkke bàyyi xel, ba dese yaakaar mooy lii:
Lamentations 3:22 Aji Sax ji, ngoram du dakk, te yërmandeem du jeex.
Lamentations 3:23 Xanaa di yeeslu jant bu nekk. Kee bare kóllëre!
Lamentations 3:24 «Samab séddoo, Aji Sax jee» la sama xol wax, te moo tax ma di ko xaar.
Lamentations 3:25 Aji Sax jee baax ci ñi ko yaakaar, baax ci ki koy sàkku.
Lamentations 3:26 Li baax mooy muñ, xeremluy xaar wallu Aji Sax ji.
Lamentations 3:27 Li baax ci nit mooy nga nangoo muñ ba ngay ndaw.
Lamentations 3:28 Bu la Aji Sax ji tegee nattu, berul te muñ.
Lamentations 3:29 Dëppal sa kanam ci suuf, jombul yaakaar nuyoo.
Lamentations 3:30 Dékkal ub lex ku lay mbej, di la tifaari saaga, ba nga tooy.
Lamentations 3:31 Boroom bi déy du la wacc ba fàww.
Lamentations 3:32 Bu la tegee naqar it, yërëm la, ngoram a ni baree.
Lamentations 3:33 Du bànneexam lay tege coono, aka naqaral doom aadama.
Lamentations 3:34 Bu ñuy dëggaate mboolem ñi ñu tëj cim réew,
Lamentations 3:35 di jalgati yelleefu nit fi kanam Aji Kawe ji,
Lamentations 3:36 di been dëgg cib layoom, Boroom bi da ko dul gis?
Lamentations 3:37 Ana ku wax, mu am, te Boroom bi dogalu ko?
Lamentations 3:38 Muy lu baax, di lu aay, du Aji Kawe jeey àddu, amal?
Lamentations 3:39 Kuy dund, ana loo deeti jàmbat, bu ñu la añalee sa bàkkaar?
Lamentations 3:40 Nan càmbar, ba xoolaat jikko yi te dellu ci Aji Sax ji.
Lamentations 3:41 Nan tàllal sunu xol ak sunuy loxo Yàlla ja fa asamaan,
Lamentations 3:42 noo tooñ, noo fippu, ba tax yaw jéggalewoo.
Lamentations 3:43 Sam sànj nga làmboo, topp nu, di rey te ñéebluwoo,
Lamentations 3:44 aw niir nga sàngoo, ba ag ñaan du ko jàll.
Lamentations 3:45 Mbuubitum sën nga nu def fi biir xeet yi.
Lamentations 3:46 Sunu noon yépp a nuy waxal,
Lamentations 3:47 tiitaange ak pax dikkal na nu, ak yàquteek sànkute.
Lamentations 3:48 Saay gët a ngi wal ndax sama askan wi rajaxoo.
Lamentations 3:49 Saay gët a ngi rogalaat, du fer, du ŋiis,
Lamentations 3:50 ba keroog Aji Sax ji séentoo asamaan, ba gis.
Lamentations 3:51 Bi ma gisee li dal jigéeni dëkk bi yépp, la sama xol jeex.
Lamentations 3:52 Ñi ma bañ ci dara ñoo ma këpptala këpptal ni picc.
Lamentations 3:53 Cib teen lañu ma tàbbal, ube kow doj, te may dund,
Lamentations 3:54 ndox ma mëdd ma, ma ne: «sànku naa.»
Lamentations 3:55 Aji Sax ji, fa xóotey pax ma laa la wooye
Lamentations 3:56 Sama baat nga dégg, ma ne la: «Bul fattal sab nopp, samay onk ak samay yuux.»
Lamentations 3:57 Bés ba ma la wooyee nga dikk, ne ma: «Bul tiit.»
Lamentations 3:58 Boroom bi, yaa sàmm sama àq, yaa jot sama bakkan.
Lamentations 3:59 Aji Sax ji, yaa gis ni ñu ma tooñe, jox ma sama àtte.
Lamentations 3:60 Yaa gis seen mboolem mébetu feyu, seen mboolem pexe yi ñu may lalal.
Lamentations 3:61 Aji Sax ji, yaa dégg seeni kókkalee, ak mboolem pexe yi ñu may lalal.
Lamentations 3:62 Ci man la noon yiy diisoo aka déeyoo, bés bu nekk.
Lamentations 3:63 Xoolal, bu ñu toogee ak bu ñu jógee, man lañuy léeboo.
Lamentations 3:64 Aji Sax ji, jox leen seenub añ, seen kemu liggéeyu loxo.
Lamentations 3:65 Dërkiisalal seen xol (Tegleen njàqarey xol / Muural seenum xel,) na leen sag alkànde ñeel.
Lamentations 3:66 Toppe leen sa mer, te nga sànke leen mboolem fu asamaanu Aji Sax ji tiim.
Lamentations 4:1 Ndeysaan, wurus wa giim na! Ngëneelu wurus soppiku na. Doj yu sell yaa wasaaroo, ca boppu mbedd yépp.
Lamentations 4:2 Doomi Siyoŋ yu góor yu jar ya! Wurus lees leen daan nàttablee, ndeysaan tey, ñu jàppe leen ni njaqu ban lu tabaxkatu njaq liggéeye loxoom.
Lamentations 4:3 Ag till sax joxe na weenam, nàmpal doomam, te sama bokk yi mujj néeg ba mel ni bànjóolig màndiŋ.
Lamentations 4:4 Luy nàmp a nga mara mar, ba làmmiñ taqoo denqleñ. Gone yaa ngi ñaan mburu, te kenn daggalu leen.
Lamentations 4:5 Ñi daan xéewloo ay bernde, tey ñoo xiif, ne lasar ca mbedd ya. Ña yaroo woon yérey tànneef, tey ñoo goore jalu mbuubit.
Lamentations 4:6 Sama ñaawtéefu askan wee màgg, ba raw ñaawtéefu waa Sodom, dëkk ba jekki jàllarbiku, te loxo laalu ko.
Lamentations 4:7 Sunu kàngam ya setoon wecc, seen yaram mucc gàkk, di lerxat bay tàkk, wér péŋŋ, leer nàññ.
Lamentations 4:8 Tey ñu gëna lëndëm bànqanoos, xàmmeesu leen ci mbedd yi, ñu ngi lax, di yaxi neen, der wow koŋŋ ni matt!
Lamentations 4:9 Ña saamar rey a gënu demin ña deeye xiif, jeex tàkk, ne lasar, ndax ñàkk meññatum tool.
Lamentations 4:10 Ndey ak xolu njureelam, moo togge loxoom, doomu boppam, def ko njëlam, ci sama biir toskareg askan wi!
Lamentations 4:11 Aji Sax jee xëpp am sànjam, sotti tàngooru meram, moo jafal sawara fi Siyoŋ, ba xoyom kenu ya.
Lamentations 4:12 Du benn buur fi kaw suuf bu gëmoon, du kenn ci mboolem waa àddina ne bañ akub noon dina dem ba bëtt bunti Yerusalem.
Lamentations 4:13 Seen bàkkaari yonent yaa, seen ñaawtéefi sarxalkat yaa; ñoo tuur fa digg dëkk ba deretu aji jub ñi.
Lamentations 4:14 Ña ngay tëñëx-tëñëxi niy gumba ci mbedd yi, deret ja sobeel leen ba maneesula laal seeni yére.
Lamentations 4:15 Ñoom lañuy gëdd naan: «Soreleen nu, nit ñu sobewu ñi! Soreleen, soreleen, buleen nu laal.» Ñu daw di tambaambalu ba ca yeneen xeet; ñooña ne leen: «Dootu fii!»
Lamentations 4:16 Aji Sax ji ci boppam moo leen tasaare, faaleetu leen; cér lees séddul sarxalkat, te teraleesul mag.
Lamentations 4:17 Ba tey sunu gët a ngi giim, ndax ndimbal lu nuy séentu ci dara. Fa sunuy tata lanu séentoo wenn xeet wu nu manula wallu.
Lamentations 4:18 Sunuy tànk lees di topp, ba manatunoo daagoo sunuy mbedd; sunu bés jege, sunu àpp di matal, sunu saa taxaw!
Lamentations 4:19 Ñi ñuy dàqa gëna gaaw ay jaxaay, ci kaw tund yi lañu nu ne dann, màndiŋ mi, ñu di nu fa tëroo.
Lamentations 4:20 Ki nuy noyyee, Buur bi Aji Sax ji fal, ca seeni yeer la tance, te nu noon ci keppaaram lanuy dëkke fi digg xeet yi.
Lamentations 4:21 Bégleen te bànneexooy, yeen Edomeeni réewum Ucc, ci yeen it la kaasu mbugal di jàllsi, ngeen màndi, futteeku, ne duŋŋ.
Lamentations 4:22 Yaw Siyoŋ, sa mbugal mat na, deesatu la yóbbu ngàllo; yaw Edom laa ne, Aji Sax jee lay fey sa ñaawtéef, feeñal say bàkkaar.
Lamentations 5:1 Éy Aji Sax ji, bàyyil xel li nu dal, xoolal, gisal sunu toroxte!
Lamentations 5:2 Sunu suuf toxu ciy jaambur, sunuy kër ñeel ay doxandéem.
Lamentations 5:3 Baay dëddu, nu diy jirim; ndey dib jëtun.
Lamentations 5:4 Sunum ndox, xaalis lanu koy feye, naan, sunu matt ak njégam la mu nuy dikke.
Lamentations 5:5 Sunuw loos lañu ràng, nu loof, te noppaleesu nu.
Lamentations 5:6 Nu nangul Misra, nangul Asiri ngir ab dund.
Lamentations 5:7 Sunuy maam a moyoon, tey nekkatuñu; nun, noo gàddu seeni mbugal.
Lamentations 5:8 Ay surgaa nu yilif, te amunu ku nu wallu ci seen loxo.
Lamentations 5:9 Bu nu lekkee, sunu bakkan lanu jaay, nde saamar a ngi ci màndiŋ mi.
Lamentations 5:10 Sunu yaram nib taal la tànge ndax tàngoorub xiif.
Lamentations 5:11 Jigéeni Siyoŋ lañuy tëdde, ak janqi dëkki Yuda.
Lamentations 5:12 Kàngam yi, ñu jàpp, wékk; te mag ñi, teraleesu leen.
Lamentations 5:13 Waxambaane yee yenu doji wolukaay, gone yu góor yi sëfoo sayi matt, di tërëf.
Lamentations 5:14 Mag dakkal na jataayu pénc, te waxambaane talatula xalam.
Lamentations 5:15 Xol nux-nuxeetul, te ay rongooñ a wuutuy pooj.
Lamentations 5:16 Sunu mbaxana foq na! Wóoy ngalla nun ñi moy!
Lamentations 5:17 Lee jeexal sunu xol, lii moo nu jooyloo, ba gët giim:
Lamentations 5:18 tundu Siyoŋ wi gental, ba till yi di fi daagoo.
Lamentations 5:19 Yaw Aji Sax ji, yaay toog ba fàww, sab jal, sët ba sëtaat.
Lamentations 5:20 Ana lu waral nga fàtte nu fàww, ba nu jant yu yàgge nii?
Lamentations 5:21 Éy Aji Sax ji, délloosi nu fi yaw, nu dellusi, yeesalal sunuy jant, mu mel na woon.
Lamentations 5:22 Xanaa doo nu wacca wacc, mere nu mer mu amul kemu?
Ezekiel 1:1 ¶ Am na bés, mu yemook sama fanweereelu at, juróomi fan ca ñeenteelu weer wa, booba maa nga bokkoon ca ña ñu toxal ca tàkkal dexu Kebar. Asamaan daa ubbiku, ma daldi gis ay peeñuy Yàlla.
Ezekiel 1:2 ¶ Juróomi fani weer wa moo yemook juróomi at gannaaw ba ñu toxalee Buur Yowakim.
Ezekiel 1:3 Kàddug Aji Sax ji moo dikkal Esekiyel doomu Busi, sarxalkat ba fa réewum Kaldeen ña ca tàkkal dexu Kebar. Te foofa la loxol Aji Sax ji dikke fa kawam.
Ezekiel 1:4 ¶ Naka laa xool rekk, ngelaw lu réy jekki dikke bëj-gànnaar, ànd ak niir wu mag, sawara di ca fettaxe, ag leer gu ne ràññ wër ko; digg ba mel ni weñ guy tàkk.
Ezekiel 1:5 Digg ba, jëmmi ñeenti bindeef a ca feeñ yu ame melokaanu nit.
Ezekiel 1:6 Ku ci nekk am na ñeenti kanam ak ñeenti laaf.
Ezekiel 1:7 Seeni tànk daa jub, téstën ya mel ni weyi sëllu di melax ni xànjar bu ñu jonj.
Ezekiel 1:8 Seen laaf, loxoy nit a nga ca suufam ci seen ñeenti wet yépp, ñoom ñeent ñépp ak seeni kanam ak seeni laaf.
Ezekiel 1:9 Seen ñeenti cati laaf a ngay laale, te ku nekk man naa jubal màkk fépp fu genn kanam jublu te du jar muy warangiku.
Ezekiel 1:10 Seen melokaanu kanam nag nii la bindoo: ku ci nekk am nga kanamu nit fa féete kanam ak kanamu gaynde ci sa ndijoor. Ku ci nekk itam am nga kanamu yëkk fi sa càmmoñ ak kanamu jaxaay fa féete gannaaw.
Ezekiel 1:11 Seeni kanam a ngoogu. Ku ci nekk sa ñaari laaf a jëm kaw, di laal sa laafi moroom. Sa ñaari laaf yi ci des sàng sa yaram.
Ezekiel 1:12 Ku nekk man naa jubal màkk fépp fu genn kanam jublu. Fépp fu Noowug Yàlla jublu, ñu jublu fa te warangikuwuñu.
Ezekiel 1:13 Jëmmi bindeef yaa nga am melow xali sawara yu yànj, mel niy jum, sawara way dem ak dikk ci seen biir. Sawara waa nga ne ràññ, ay melax di ca fettaxe.
Ezekiel 1:14 Bindeef yaa ngay naaw, di dem ak a dikk, mel ni melax.
Ezekiel 1:15 ¶ Naka laa xool, daldi gis ay mbege fi suuf, mbege mu ci nekk feggook menn mbindeef, mook ñeenti kanamam.
Ezekiel 1:16 Mbege yaa ngay nirook peru kirsolit, ci melokaan ak ci bind. Ñoom ñépp a niroo. Seen melokaan ak seen bind daa mel ni, mbege mu ci nekk, mbegee nekk ca biiram,
Ezekiel 1:17 mbege yay dawe ñeenti wet te warangikuwuñu.
Ezekiel 1:18 Taxawaayu mbege ya daa réy ba raglu te mu ci nekk ay gët la sàngoo ba daj.
Ezekiel 1:19 Bu bindeef ya dawee, mbege ya feggook ñoom daw; bu ñu naawee, mbege ya naaw.
Ezekiel 1:20 Fu noo gi wale jublu fa rekk, fa lañu jëm, mbege ya jógandook ñoom, ànd ak noo gi. Noowal boroom bakkan yi daal moo nekk ci mbege yi.
Ezekiel 1:21 Bu ñu dawee, ñu daw; bu ñu taxawee, ñu taxaw. Bu ñu jógee ci suuf, yékkatiku, ñu ànd ak ñoom yékkatiku. Noowal boroom bakkan yi daal moo nekk ci mbege yi.
Ezekiel 1:22 ¶ Lu mel nib dénd a tiim boppi bindeef ya, raglu, leer nàññ ni doju kiristaal.
Ezekiel 1:23 Mbindeef mu ci nekk sa yenn ñaari laaf a ngi ci suufu dénd bi, tàlli, dékkarloo; ñaari laaf yi ci des sàng sa yaram.
Ezekiel 1:24 Bu ñuy naaw, may dégg seen coowal laaf yi, mu mel ni géej mbàmbulaan, melati ni kàddug Aji Man ji, di saf riirum xare. Bu ñu taxawee, daldi wàcce seeni laaf.
Ezekiel 1:25 Saa yu ñu taxawee ba wàcce seeni laaf nag, ag kàddu di jollee ca kaw dénd ba ca seen kaw bopp ya.
Ezekiel 1:26 ¶ Ca kaw dénd ba tiim seeni bopp, ba tey, am na luy nirook ngànguney peru safiir, te jëmmu nit nekk ca kawa kaw lay nirook ngàngune.
Ezekiel 1:27 Ma gis nag lu mel ni weñ guy tàkk, wër ko; dale ca lay niru ndigg la, jëm kaw; daleeti ca lay niru ndigg la, jëm suuf. Ma gis lu mel ni sawara akug leer wër ko.
Ezekiel 1:28 Mu mel ni xon ci biiri niir, bésub taw. Loolooy melokaanu leer ga ko wër. Muy melokaan muy jëmmal leeru Aji Sax ji. Naka laa ko gis, daldi ne gurub, dëpp sama kanam fi suuf. Ma dégg nag kàddu gu jib.
Ezekiel 2:1 ¶ Ba loolu amee boroom kàddu ga ne ma: «Yaw nit ki, jógal taxaw, ma wax la.»
Ezekiel 2:2 Naka la ma wax loolu, ngelaw solu ma, ne ma yékkét, ma taxaw, di dégg kiy wax ak man.
Ezekiel 2:3 Mu ne ma: «Yaw nit ki, maa lay yebal ci bànni Israyil, xeeti fippukat yi fippu ci sama kaw; ñook seeni maam dañu maa masa tooñ ba bésub tey jii.
Ezekiel 2:4 Ci nit ñu dëgër bopp te dërkiis laa lay yónni. Wax leen, ne leen: “Lii Boroom bi Aji Sax ji da koo wax.”
Ezekiel 2:5 Ñoom nag, su ñu la déglook su ñu gàntalee ndax kërug fippukat gi ñu jikkowoo, dinañu xam ne ab yonent a ngi ci seen biir.
Ezekiel 2:6 Waaye yaw nit ki, bu leen ragal, bul ragal seeni wax. Xam naa ne ay taxas aki dég a lay wër, nga toog ci kawi jiit. Waaye bul ragal seeni wax te bul tiit seen kanam doonte kërug fippukat lañu.
Ezekiel 2:7 Nanga leen àgge samay wax, ñu déglook ñu gàntal, nde ay fippukat lañu.
Ezekiel 2:8 Yaw nit ki nag, déglul lii ma lay wax. Bul fippu ni kërug fippukat gii. Sexal, te lekk li ma lay jox.»
Ezekiel 2:9 ¶ Naka laa xool, yem ci loxo bu ñu ma tàllal. Ndeke taxañub téere moo ci nekk.
Ezekiel 2:10 Mu tàqarñi ko fi sama kanam, muy lu ñu bind biir ak biti, mbind ma di kàdduy jooy aki onk aki yuux.
Ezekiel 3:1 ¶ Mu ne ma: «Yaw nit ki, lii ngay gis, lekk ko. Lekkal taxañ bii te dem wax ak waa kër Israyil.»
Ezekiel 3:2 Ma ŋa, mu leel ma taxañ ba.
Ezekiel 3:3 Mu ne ma: «Yaw, nit ki, lekkal taxañ bii ma la jox, ba suur këll.» May lekk, mu neex ni lem.
Ezekiel 3:4 ¶ Mu ne ma: «Yaw nit ki, demal ba ca waa kër Israyil, te nga àgge leen samay wax.
Ezekiel 3:5 Du ci waaso wu xóotu làkk te diisu làmmiñ lees la yebal. Ca waa kër Israyil nga jëm.
Ezekiel 3:6 Bare na waaso yoo xamul seeni wax, yu xóotu làkk te diisu làmmiñ. Te su ma la yebaloon ci ñoom, ñu déggal la.
Ezekiel 3:7 Waaye waa kër Israyil duñu la nangoo déggal, ngir nanguwuñu maa déggal; ndax waa kër Israyil gépp a dëgër bopp te dërkiis.
Ezekiel 3:8 Maa ngii di la may kanam gu ñemee ni seen kanam, ba nga dëgër bopp ni ñoom.
Ezekiel 3:9 Jamaa moo raw doj te ni laay dëgërale sa bopp. Bu leen ragal, bu leen tiit, li ñuy kërug fippukat yépp.»
Ezekiel 3:10 ¶ Mu teg ca, ne ma: «Yaw nit ki nag, mboolem li ma lay wax, dégloo ko nopp, te teewloo ko xel.
Ezekiel 3:11 Nanga dem ba ca sa bokki ngàllo ga, nga wax leen, ñu déglook ñu gàntal, ne leen: “Lii Boroom bi Aji Sax ji da koo wax.”»
Ezekiel 3:12 ¶ Ci kaw loolu ngelaw ne ma siféet, may dégg sama gannaaw, riirum kàddu gu xumb gu ne: «Cant ñeel na teddngay Aji Sax ji fi màkkaanam.»
Ezekiel 3:13 Mu ànd ak riirum laafi bindeef yay fenqoo, ak coowal mbege ya ñu feggool, muy riir mu xumb.
Ezekiel 3:14 Ba loolu amee ngelaw ne ma siféet, yóbbu. Maa ngay deme naqar ak xol bu tàng, te loxol Aji Sax ji diis gann ci sama kaw.
Ezekiel 3:15 Ma àgg ba ca ngàllog Tel Abib, ga dëkke tàkkal dexu Kebar. Foofa ñu dëkk laa toog, jommi ci seen biir diiru juróom ñaari fan.
Ezekiel 3:16 ¶ Ba juróom ñaari fan ya matee, kàddug Aji Sax ji dikkal ma, ne ma:
Ezekiel 3:17 «Yaw nit ki, tabb naa la wattukatub waa kër Israyil. Nangool sama gémmiñ kàddu, artool ma leen ko.
Ezekiel 3:18 Su ma nee nit ku bon ki: “Dee rekk ay sa àtte,” te fekk àrtuwoo ku bon ka, waxuloo lu ko waññee ca mbonam ga, ba mu mucc, ku bon kaay dee ndax tooñam, waaye bakkanam yaw laa koy laaj.
Ezekiel 3:19 Waaye su dee yaa àrtu ku bon ki te taxul mu waññiku, dëddu mbonam nag, tooñu boppam a ko reylu, waaye yaw musal nga sa bopp.
Ezekiel 3:20 Su dee boroom njekk bu dëpp yoonu njekkam, di def ndëngte, maa koy gàllankoor, mu dee. Soo ko àrtuwul ndax bàkkaaram, dina dee, te deesul bàyyi xel njekkal démbam la, waaye bakkanam, yaw laa koy laaj.
Ezekiel 3:21 Waaye nag su dee yaa àrtu boroom njekk bi, ba tax bàkkaaratul, dina dund déy, ndax kàddug àrtu ga, te yaw it musal nga sa bopp.»
Ezekiel 3:22 ¶ Gannaaw loolu loxol Aji Sax ji dikk na fa ci sama kaw. Mu ne ma: «Génnal ba ci joor gi, ma wax faak yaw.»
Ezekiel 3:23 Ma génnsi ba ca joor ga. Ndeke jëmmu leeru Aji Sax jaa nga foofa, taxaw mel ni jëmmu leer, ga ma gisoon ca tàkkal dexu Kebar. Ma ne gurub, dëpp sama kanam fa suuf.
Ezekiel 3:24 Ci kaw loolu ngelaw solu ma, ne ma yékkét, ma taxaw. Mu wax ak man, ne ma: «Doxal, tëjuji sa biir néeg.
Ezekiel 3:25 Te kat yaw nit ki, dees na la fa takke ay buum, yeew la ba dootoo mana génn, dem ci nit ñi.
Ezekiel 3:26 Sa làmmiñ laay taqal ci sa denqleñ, nga luu ba doo leen mana yedd, ndax kërug fippukat lañu.
Ezekiel 3:27 Waaye bu ma amee lu ma lay wax, dinaa ubbi sa gémmiñ. Su ko defee nga ne leen: “Lii Boroom bi Aji Sax ji da koo wax.” Kuy dégg, dégg; kuy gàntal, gàntal. Ndax kërug fippukat lañu.»
Ezekiel 4:1 ¶ Aji Sax ji ne: «Yaw nit ki, jëlal móolu ban, teg fi sa kanam, nga rëdd ci ab dëkk, mu misaal Yerusalem.
Ezekiel 4:2 Nga gaw ko, tabax ab gawukaay bu ko wër, sëkk ko, ba noppi sàkkal ko ay dali xare, wërale ko dénki dàjjikaay ba mu daj.
Ezekiel 4:3 Su ko defee nga jël saafukaayu weñ, teg ko, mu mel ni miiru weñ bu dox sa digganteek dëkk bi, te nga janook dëkk bi. Noonu nga koy gawe, mu gawu. Loolu di misaal, ñeel waa kër Israyil.
Ezekiel 4:4 ¶ «Gannaaw loolu nanga tëdde sa wetu càmmoñ. Googu wet ngay gàddoo ayu waa kër Israyil. Diiru fan yi ngay tëdde wet ngay gàddoo seen ay.
Ezekiel 4:5 Man nag àppal naa la limu fan yu tembook limu ati ayu waa kër Israyil, muy ñetti téeméeri fan ak juróom ñeent fukk (390) yooy tegoo ayu waa kër Israyil.
Ezekiel 4:6 Boo noppee ci loolu nanga tëdde wetu ndijoor. Noonu ngay gàddoo ayu waa kër Yuda diiru ñeent fukki fan, at mu nekk, ma defal la ko benn fan.
Ezekiel 4:7 Te nga jàkkaarlook gawub Yerusalem, tàllal ko sa përëgu neen, daldi biral waxyu ci kawam.
Ezekiel 4:8 Te kat dinaa la yeewe ay buum ngir doo mana walbatiku tëdde geneen wet, ba keroog ngay sottal say fani gaw.
Ezekiel 4:9 ¶ «Te kat nanga sàkk bele ak lors ak ñebbe ak làntin ak dugub ak bele bu dëgër. Nga boole lépp ci lenn ndab. Moom ngay lekk diiru fan yi ngay tëdde wet. Diiru ñetti téeméeri fan ak juróom ñeent fukk (390) nga koy dunde.
Ezekiel 4:10 Sa njëlu bés nag na doon ñaar fukki siikal yooy lekk bés ak bés.
Ezekiel 4:11 Sa ndoxum naan it dees koy natt, mu tollook benn liitar bés bu nekk.
Ezekiel 4:12 Mburum lors ngay lekk te jonkani nit nga koy lakke, nit ñiy gis.»
Ezekiel 4:13 Aji Sax ji teg ca ne: «Noonu la bànni Israyil di lekkeji seen ñamu sobe ci biir xeet yi ma leen di tasaareji.»
Ezekiel 4:14 ¶ Ma ne ko: «Ãhã! Boroom bi Aji Sax ji, man de masumaa sobeel sama bopp. Muy lu médd, di lu aw rab fàdd, masuma koo lekk ba may gone ba tey. Wenn yàpp wu daganul masula dugg sama gémmiñ.»
Ezekiel 4:15 Mu ne ma: «Baax na, kon defal naa la ko ndéef, mu wuutu jonkanu nit, dinga lakke ko sa mburu.»
Ezekiel 4:16 Mu neeti ma: «Yaw nit ki, maa ngii di dagge fi Yerusalem lépp luy dugub. Ci biir njàqare lañuy lekke as mburu te xol bu jeex lañuy naane siitum ndox.
Ezekiel 4:17 Su ko defee ñu ñàkk lekk, ñàkk naan, di xoolante gëti tiitaange, jeex tàkk ndax seeni ñaawtéef.»
Ezekiel 5:1 ¶ «Yaw nit ki, jëlal saamar bu ñaw, nga def ko sa saatus watukaay te nga wate ko sa bopp ak sa sikkim. Nga jël ab màndaxekaay, séddalee ko kawar gi ay cér.
Ezekiel 5:2 Benn cér bi, nanga ko lakk ci digg nataalu dëkk bi, gannaaw bu fani gaw bi matee. Beneen cér bi, nga dóore ko saamar bi, kawar gi tasaaroo fi wër dëkk bi. Ñetteelu cér bi, nga sànni ko ci ngelaw li, man ma toppe ko saamar.
Ezekiel 5:3 Waaye nanga sàkk tuuti ci kawar gi, fas ci sa lafu mbubb.
Ezekiel 5:4 Nga dellu sàkk cooca, sànni ca sawara sa, lakk ko. Ca la sawaray jóge, tàkkal mboolem waa kër Israyil.
Ezekiel 5:5 ¶ «Boroom bi Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: Yerusalem a ngoogu. Ci digg xeet yi laa ko teg, réew yi wër ko.
Ezekiel 5:6 Ñoo gàntal sama àttey yoon, ba gëna bon xeet yi, gàntal samay dogal, ba gëna bon réew yi leen séq. Xalab nañu sama àttey yoon te jëfewuñu samay dogal.
Ezekiel 5:7 ¶ «Moo tax Boroom bi Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: Gannaaw seen reewande wees na reewandey xeet yi leen séq, samay dogal, jëfewuleen ko; sama àttey yoon, sàmmuleen ko; sàmmuleen sax àttey xeet yi leen wër,
Ezekiel 5:8 kon nag Boroom bi Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: Maa ngii ci seen kaw, man itam. Maay wàcce fi seen biir ay mbugal, xeet yi teg ci seeni gët.
Ezekiel 5:9 Maay def fi seen biir lu ma masula def te duma defati lu ni mel, ndax seen mboolem jëf ju siblu.
Ezekiel 5:10 Moo tax baay dina yàpp doom, doom yàpp baay fi biir Yerusalem. Maay wàcce ay mbugal fi yeen, te maay tasaare seenu ndes wépp fépp fu ngelaw jublu.
Ezekiel 5:11 ¶ «Moo tax, dogu naa ci man miy dund, kàddug Boroom bi Aji Sax jee, gannaaw yeena def seen wépp njombe ak seen jépp jëf ju siblu, di sobeel sama bérab bu sell bi, man itam, maa leen di wat nel te duma leen xool bëtu ñéeblu, duma leen ñeewante.
Ezekiel 5:12 Seen ñetteelu xaaj, mbas lañuy deeye mbaa xiif bu leen di sànk ci biir dëkk bi. Beneen ñetteelu xaaj bi, saamar lañuy fàddoo ci seen dig-digal bi. Xaajub ñetteel bi ci des, fépp fu ngelaw jublu laa leen di tasaare, te saamar laa leen di toppe.
Ezekiel 5:13 Maa leen di ŋaccal sama mer, sottil leen sama xadar ba giif, te bu ma leen ŋaccalee sama mer, ñu xam ne man Aji Sax ji, maa waxe sama fiiraange.
Ezekiel 5:14 Yeen waa Yerusalem maa leen di gental, sewal leen ci biir xeet yi leen séq, ku fi romb, di ci gis.
Ezekiel 5:15 Keroog bu ma leen wàcceelee àtteb mer ak xadar ak dumay xadar, seen dëkk beey doon dëkkub toroxte bu ñuy kókkali, dëkk bu gental buy yedd xeet yi leen séq. Man Aji Sax ji maa ko wax.
Ezekiel 5:16 ¶ «Ñoom bu ma leen soqee fitti xiif yu aay, fitti faagaagalkat yooyu may fitt ngir faagaagal leen, xiif laa leen di yokkal, ba dagge dugub fi seen biir.
Ezekiel 5:17 Maay yebal ci seen kaw ab xiif ak rabi àll yu leen di xañ ay doom; mbas ak deret ju tuuru gane leen, saamar, ma indil leen. Man Aji Sax ji, maa ko wax.»
Ezekiel 6:1 ¶ Gannaaw loolu kàddug Aji Sax ji da maa dikkal, ne ma:
Ezekiel 6:2 «Yaw nit ki, jàkkaarlool ak tundi Israyil, nga waxal leen waxyu.
Ezekiel 6:3 Neel: “Yeen Tundi Israyil, Dégluleen kàddug Boroom bi, Aji Sax ji. Boroom bi Aji Sax ji moo wax lii, jëme ci tund wu mag ak wu ndaw ak xunteeku xur, ne: Maa ngi nii di leen wàcceel saamar, maay màbb seen jaamookaayi tuur,
Ezekiel 6:4 seen sarxalukaay gental, seen suurukaayi tuur tasaaroo, ma tëral seeni nit ñu ñu bóom fi seen kanam kasaray tuur.
Ezekiel 6:5 Maay tegal seen kasaray tuur néewi bànni Israyil. Maay wasaare seeni yax fi wër seeni sarxalukaay.
Ezekiel 6:6 Fu ngeen mana sance, seeni dëkk ay gental, seen jaamookaayi tuur wéet, seeni sarxalukaay yàqu, gental, seen kasaray tuur rajaxoo ba jeex, seen suurukaayi tuur màbb, seeni liggéey réer.
Ezekiel 6:7 Dees na leen bóom, ba ngeen xam ne maay Aji Sax ji.
Ezekiel 6:8 Waaye maay déeg lenn ci yeen, ñu rëcc saamar, tasaaroo ci xeet yi, ci biir réewi jaambur.
Ezekiel 6:9 Su boobaa seenu ndes di ma fàttlikoo fa biir xeet ya ñu leen yóbbu njaam, fa may jeexale seen xolu gànc, bi ma dëddu, ak seen gët yi ñuy gànctook seeni tuur. Su boobaa ñu jéppi seen bopp ndax lu bon li ñu def ak seen jépp jëf ju siblu.
Ezekiel 6:10 Dinañu xam ne maay Aji Sax ji, te du neen laa leen artoo, ba ma leen di tëkkoo mii musiba.
Ezekiel 6:11 «“Boroom bi Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: Fenqeel say loxo, dóor sa tànk fi suuf te ne: ‘Ñaw!’ ci mboolem jëfi waa kër Israyil ju bon ju siblu. Saamar ak xiif ak mbas lañuy fàddoo.
Ezekiel 6:12 Ku sore deeye mbas, ku jege fàddoo saamar, ku ca mucce, deeye xiif, ma ŋaccal leen sama xadar.
Ezekiel 6:13 Dingeen xam ne maay Aji Sax ji, bu seeni néew nee xas fi seen biiri tuur, ak fi wër seeni sarxalukaay, ak kaw tund wu mag ak wu ndaw, ak mboolem ker garab gu naat, ak mboolem garab gu mag te sëq, fépp fu ngeen di taale cuuraay, ñeel seen mépp tuur.
Ezekiel 6:14 Maa leen di dóor sama loxo, réew mi, ma gental koo gental, dale ko màndiŋ ma ba Dibla, ak fépp fu ñu mana sance. Su boobaa ñu xam ne man maay Aji Sax ji.”»
Ezekiel 7:1 ¶ Gannaaw loolu kàddug Aji Sax ji da maa dikkal, ne ma:
Ezekiel 7:2 «Léegi nag, yaw nit ki, Boroom bi Aji Sax ji dafa wax réewum Israyil ne ko: “Jeex na tàkk! Jeexal dikkal na ñeenti weti réew mi.
Ezekiel 7:3 Jeexal nga nag léegi! Maay yebal sama mer fi sa kaw. Maa lay mbugale say jëfin, yool la sa jépp jëf ju siblu.
Ezekiel 7:4 Duma la xool bëtu ñéeblu, duma ñeewante. Say jëfin laa lay yool, sa jëf ju siblu ji ci sa biir. Su boobaa ngeen xam ne man maay Aji Sax ji”».
Ezekiel 7:5 Boroom bi Aji Sax ji dafa wax ne: «Céy wii ay, guléet wii ay! Mu ngii di dikk.
Ezekiel 7:6 Jeexlee ngoog, jeexle dikk na, jekki, yewwul la. Mu ngii, di dikk!
Ezekiel 7:7 Yaw nitu réew mee, sànkute dikkal na la. Àpp mat, bés dëgmal, tiitaange wuutu ca mbéx fa kaw tund ya.
Ezekiel 7:8 Du yàgg dara ma xëpp la sama xadar, ŋaccal la sama mer, mbugale la say jëfin, yool la sa jépp jëf ju siblu.
Ezekiel 7:9 Duma xool bëtu ñéeblu, duma ñeewante. Say jëfin laa lay yool ak sa jëf ju siblu ji ci sa biir. Su boobaa ngeen xam ne maay Aji Sax jiy dumaa.
Ezekiel 7:10 «Bés baa ngi, mu ngooguy dikk, sànkute sàqi na, yetu njubadee tóor, reewande jebbi.
Ezekiel 7:11 Fitnaa taxaw, di yet wuy dóoral coxor. Seen lenn du des, du seen mbooloo, du seen alal, du seen daraja.
Ezekiel 7:12 Àpp mat, bés jege. Bu ca jëndkat tala bég, bu ca jaaykat tala naqarlu! Am sànj a dikkal askan wépp.
Ezekiel 7:13 Bu jaaykat bi muccee it, du jotaat ca njaayam. Peeñu mi jëm ci askan wépp, daal, du toxu, ku nekk ñaawtéefam lay dunde, ba du leqliku.
Ezekiel 7:14 Liitu xareey jib, ba lépp jekk ngir xare, te kenn du xareji, samam sànj a dikkal askan wépp.
Ezekiel 7:15 Saamar biti, mbas akub xiif ci biir, ki ci àll bi deeye xare, ki ci biir dëkk bi, xiif ak mbas rey ko.
Ezekiel 7:16 Ña rëcc, rawi ca tund ya, waru pitaxi xur ya, ñooy binneendoo ndax seeni tooñ.
Ezekiel 7:17 Yoxo yépp yoqi, tànk tooy xepp.
Ezekiel 7:18 Ñooy sol ay saaku di ko ñaawloo, seen yaram wépp daw, gépp kanam sëlmoo gàcce, bopp ya di nel yu set wecc.
Ezekiel 7:19 Seen xaalis, ñu sànni ci mbedd yi, seen wurus di leen saf sagaru sobe. Keroog bésub sànjum Aji Sax ja, du xaalis, du wurus wu leen di xettli. Du leen fajal xiif, du leen reggal, xanaa tàbbal leen cig njubadi.
Ezekiel 7:20 Ñoo doon sagoo seen gànjar gu yànj, di ci sàkk jëmmi tuur yu jara bañ te jomblu, ba tax ma defal leen ko sagaru sobe.
Ezekiel 7:21 Maa koy teg ci loxoy doxandéem, ñu foqati ko, muy alal ju sagari niti àddina sëxëtoo, teddadil ko.
Ezekiel 7:22 Maa leen di dummóoyu, maay bàyyi nit ñi teddadil sama ngëneelu bérab, ay sàcc a cay tàbbi, teddadil ko.
Ezekiel 7:23 Waajal-leen càllala yi, tuur nañu deret ba réew mi fees, dëkk bi fees ak fitna.
Ezekiel 7:24 Maay indi xeet yi gëna néeg, ñu nangu seeni kër, ma daldi sàggi sagu boroom doole yi, sobeel seen bérab yu sell.
Ezekiel 7:25 Tiitaangee ngi dikk, ñuy sàkku jàmm, jàmm réer.
Ezekiel 7:26 Ay ci kaw ay a ngi dikk, xibaar ci kaw xibaar, ñuy sàkku peeñum yonent ci neen, ndigalu yoon réer sarxalkat, pexe réer mag.
Ezekiel 7:27 Buur dina tiislu, garmi làmboo séri ñaawlu, baadoolay réew mi di kat-kati. Seeni jëfin laay jëfeek ñoom, seeni àtte laa leen di àttee, ñu xam ne maay Aji Sax ji!»
