1 Corinthians 15:38 Waaye Yàllaa koy yaramal ni mu ko soobe, te jiwu wu nekk ak yaramu gàncaxam.
1 Corinthians 15:39 Suux yépp nag du wenn suux wi. Wii suux wu nit la, wee wu mala, wale wu picc, wa ca des wu jën.
1 Corinthians 15:40 Am na itam ay yaram yu farewoo asamaan, ak ay yaram yu farewoo suuf. Yaram wu farewoo asamaan nag, ag leeram wuute na ag leeru yaram wu farewoo suuf.
1 Corinthians 15:41 Jant bi ak leeru boppam, weer wi ak leeru boppam, biddiiw yi ak seen leeru bopp, te biddiiw sax wuute naak moroom ma, ag leer.
1 Corinthians 15:42 ¶ Noonu itam la ndekkitel ñi dee di deme. Li ñu suul mooy jiwu wiy yàqu, te bu dekkee dootu yàqu.
1 Corinthians 15:43 Ci ag teddadi lañu ji néew bi ñu suul, te teraanga lay dekkaale. Ci néew doole lees ko ji, mu dekkaale doole.
1 Corinthians 15:44 Li ñu suul mooy yaramu judduwaale wi ñu ji, mu dekki di yaram wuy dunde Noo gi. Ndaxte ni yaramu judduwaale ame, ni la yaram wuy dunde Noo gi ame.
1 Corinthians 15:45 ¶ Noonu lañu binde ne: «Aadama, nit ku jëkk ka, lañu def jëmm juy dund,» waaye Aadama mu mujj mi moo di Noo giy dundloo.
1 Corinthians 15:46 Du yaram wi bindoo ag noo nag mooy jiitu, waaye yaramu judduwaale wi mooy jiitu, yaram wi bindoo ag noo topp ci.
1 Corinthians 15:47 Aadama mu jëkk ma, ci suuf la jóge woon, di suuf; Aadamam ñaareel mi jóge fa asamaan.
1 Corinthians 15:48 Kooka di suuf nag, na mu mel, ni la niti suuf mel. Ku asamaane ka it, na mu mel, ni la ñu asamaane ñi mel.
1 Corinthians 15:49 Te ni nu doone tey, takkndeeru nitu suuf ka, noonu lanuy dooneji takkndeeru ku asamaane ka.
1 Corinthians 15:50 ¶ Li may wax bokk yi, moo di suux ak deret du am cér ci nguurug Yàlla, te luy yàqu manula am cér ci lu dul yàqu.
1 Corinthians 15:51 Kaayleen ma xamal leen mbir mu umpe. Dunu dee nun ñépp, waaye nun ñépp ay soppiku.
1 Corinthians 15:52 Lu gaawa gaaw lay doon, ci xef ak xippi, bu liit gu mujj ga jibee; nde liit ga mooy jib, ñi dee, dekki, di ñu dul yàqooti, nun nag, nu soppiku.
1 Corinthians 15:53 Sunu yaramu judduwaale wii nara yàqu, fàww mu sol weneen wu dul yàqu; sunu yaramu ndee wii, fàww mu sol yaramu deetil.
1 Corinthians 15:54 Bu yaramu judduwaale wii nara yàqu solee weneen wu dul yàqu, ba yaramu ndee wii sol yaramu ndeetil, su boobaa la kàddu gii ñu bind di mat: «Mëddees na ndee ci géeju ndam.
1 Corinthians 15:55 Moo yaw ndee, Ana sa ndam? Moo yaw ndee, ana sag fitt?»
1 Corinthians 15:56 Ndee, ag fittam mooy bàkkaar, te bàkkaar, dooleem mooy Yoon wi.
1 Corinthians 15:57 Waaye cant ñeel na Yàlla, mi nu may ndam ci sunu Sang Yeesu Almasi!
1 Corinthians 15:58 ¶ Kon nag yeen sama bokk yi ma soppal sama bopp, farluleen, bu leen dara yëngal, te saxooleena jëm kanam ci liggéeyu Sang bi, te ngeen xam ne seenu ñaq, ci seenub ànd ak Sang bi, du neen.
1 Corinthians 16:1 ¶ Ci wàllu ndimbal li jëm ci gëmkat ñu sell ñi, noonu ma ko digale mboolooy gëmkati diiwaanu Galasi, yeen itam defeleen ko noonu.
1 Corinthians 16:2 Bés bu jëkk ci ayu bés yi, na ku nekk génne as lëf ca la mu am, na mu ko àttane, te mu dencal ko boppam, ngir bu ma dikkee, dootu soxlaa wër, di dajale.
1 Corinthians 16:3 Bu ma dikkee, ñi ngeen tànn, ñoom laay yebale ab bataaxal, ngir ñu yóbbu Yerusalem seen ndimbal.
1 Corinthians 16:4 Su aajoo ma dem man itam, ñu ànd ak man.
1 Corinthians 16:5 ¶ Dinaa dikk ba ci yeen, gannaaw bu ma jaaree diiwaanu Maseduwan, ndax Maseduwan laay jaare.
1 Corinthians 16:6 Man naa am ma yàgg ci yeen, jombul sax ma lollikoo fi yeen. Su ko defee ngeen yiwi ma, ma dem, ak fu ma mana jëm.
1 Corinthians 16:7 Ndaxte itam, buggumaa jaare fi yeen rekk, jàll, waaye yaakaar naa toog ci yeen ab diir, su ko Boroom bi mayee.
1 Corinthians 16:8 Waaye ci Efes gii laay toog ba màggalu Pàntakot,
1 Corinthians 16:9 ndax bunt ubbikul na ma fi ŋàpp, ngir liggéey bu am njariñ, te noon yi bare nañu.
1 Corinthians 16:10 ¶ Bu Timote dikkee nag, fexeleen ba bumu am lu muy tiit ci seen biir, ndax liggéeyu Boroom bi lay liggéey ni man.
1 Corinthians 16:11 Kon bu ko kenn xeeb. Gannaaw loolu nangeen ko yiwi ak jàmm, ba mu délsi ci man, ndax moom laay xaar, mook bokk yi itam.
1 Corinthians 16:12 ¶ Mbokk mi Apolos nag moom, soññ naa ko lu bare, ngir mu dikk ba ci yeen, ànd ak bokk yi, waaye fii nu tollu yebuwu ci dara. Teewul bu jekkoo, dina dikk.
1 Corinthians 16:13 ¶ Teewluleen te saxoo ngëm, góor-góorluleen te dëgërlu.
1 Corinthians 16:14 Lépp lu ngeen di def, defeleen ko cofeel.
1 Corinthians 16:15 ¶ Bokk yi, xam ngeen ne Estefanas ak njabootam ñooy jooxeb ndoortel meññeef ci diiwaanu Akayi, te jàpple ñu sell ñi lañu séddoo. Kon dama leen di ñaan,
1 Corinthians 16:16 ngeen nangul nit ñu mel noonu, ñoom ak mboolem ñu bokk ak ñoom liggéey bi ak coono bi.
1 Corinthians 16:17 Maa ngi bége teewaayu Estefanas ak Fortunatus ak Akaykus, ndax bi ngeen wuutee tey, ñoo leen taxawal.
1 Corinthians 16:18 Dalal nañu sama xel, ak seen mos, yeen itam. Kon nit ñu mel noonu, fonkleen leen.
1 Corinthians 16:19 ¶ Mboolooy gëmkati diiwaanu Asi nag ñu ngi leen di nuyu. Akilas ak Pirsil, ñu ngi leen di nuyu bu baax ci turu Sang bi, ñoom ak mbooloom gëmkat ñiy daje seen kër.
1 Corinthians 16:20 Bokk yépp a ngi leen di nuyu. Saafoonteeleen fóonante yu sell.
1 Corinthians 16:21 ¶ Man Póol maa bind nuyoo bii ci sama loxol bopp.
1 Corinthians 16:22 ¶ Ku buggul Sang bi, na alku. Maranata (mu firi sunu Sang, dikkal!)
1 Corinthians 16:23 ¶ Yal na yiwu Sang Yeesu ànd ak yeen.
1 Corinthians 16:24 ¶ Sama cofeel ñeel na leen, yeen ñépp, ci Yeesu Almasi mi nu bokk.
2 Corinthians 1:1 ¶ Ci man Póol, ndawal Almasi Yeesu ci coobarey Yàlla, ci man la bataaxal bii bawoo, bawoo itam ci Timote mbokk mi, ñeel mbooloom Yàlla mi ci Korent, ak mboolem ñu sell ñi ci diiwaanu Akayi gépp.
2 Corinthians 1:2 Aw yiw ak jàmm ñeel na leen, bawoo fa Yàlla sunu Baay, ak Sang Yeesu Almasi.
2 Corinthians 1:3 ¶ Cant ñeel na Yàlla sunu Baayu Sang Yeesu Almasi, Baayu yërmande yi, Yàlla jiy dëfale nu nekk,
2 Corinthians 1:4 moom mi nuy dëfal ci sunu jépp njàqare, ngir noonu nu jote nun ci sunu bopp, ndëfalaay lu nu dëfaloo fa Yàlla, nu man koo dëfale ñi nekke mboolem xeeti njàqare.
2 Corinthians 1:5 Ndax kat coonoy Almasi, nu mu gëna yokkoo ci sunu kaw, ndax li nu ko gëm, noonu itam la ndëfalaay liy bawoo ci Almasi di yokkoo.
2 Corinthians 1:6 Su nu jaaree ci njàqare, seen ndëfalaay ak seen jàmm lay doon. Sunu amee ndëfalaay it, seen ndëfalaay lay doon, ngir coono yi nuy dékku, ngeen man koo dékku, yeen itam.
2 Corinthians 1:7 Te itam am nanu yaakaar ci yeen bu baax. Xam nanu ne ni ngeen bokke ak nun coono, ni ngeen di bokke ak nun ndëfalaay.
2 Corinthians 1:8 ¶ Ndax kat, bokk yi, buggunu ngeen umple njàqare, ji nu daj ci diiwaanu Asi. Daj nanu coono bu jéggi dayo, te wees sunu kàttan, ba yaakaaratunu woona dund sax.
2 Corinthians 1:9 Nun ci sunu wàllu bopp, jàppoon nanu ne sunu àtteb dee moo taxaw. Waaye loolu tax na nu bañatee yaakaar sunu bopp, xanaa di yaakaar ci Yàlla, miy dekkal ñi dee.
2 Corinthians 1:10 Moo nu wallu ci googu dee gu naroona metti, moo nuy walluwaat, te moom lanu yaakaar mu wallooti nu.
2 Corinthians 1:11 Yeen itam, ni ngeen nu ciy jàpplee mooy ngeen di nu ñaanal. Su ko defee yiw, wa nu ñu bare ñaanal ba nu am ko, dina tax ñu bare biral ag cant ci sunu mbir.
2 Corinthians 1:12 ¶ Li nuy damoo nag moo di seede bi nu sunu xel mu dal seedeel, ne xol bu set ak jikko ju dëggu ju bawoo fa Yàlla, mooy li nu doxale ci àddina si, rawatina sunu digg ak yeen, te du lu nu sunu xam-xamu nitu neen may, waaye yiwu Yàlla moo nu ko may.
2 Corinthians 1:13 Bindunu leen leneen lu moy mbind moomu ngeen jàng te man koo xam. May yaakaar nag ne dingeen xam ba mokkal,
2 Corinthians 1:14 noonu ngeen xawa xame ne nun, man ngeen noo damoo, te nun it, yeen la nuy damoo, keroog bésu Sang Yeesu.
2 Corinthians 1:15 ¶ Kóolute gu ma amoon ci ni ngeen nuy damoo moo tax ma naroona jëkka dikk ba ci yeen, ngir seen yiw mana yaar,
2 Corinthians 1:16 ba bu ma jógee ci yeen, daldi jaareji diiwaanu Maseduwan, bu ma jógee Maseduwan, dikkaat ci yeen, ba ngeen yiwi ma, ma jëm Yude.
2 Corinthians 1:17 Ndax ñàkk pastéef laa mébéte moomu mébét? Am ni nitu suuxu neen di mébéte rekk laa topp bay xel-yaar, naan «waaw» te naan «déet»?
2 Corinthians 1:18 ¶ Yàlla mi mata gëm de seere na ne kàddu gi nu leen di wax du «waaw, déet,»
2 Corinthians 1:19 ndax Doomu Yàlla, Yeesu Almasi, mi nu biral ci seen biir, man ak Silas ak Timote, du kàddug «waaw, déet;» «waaw» doŋŋ a nekk ci moom.
2 Corinthians 1:20 Ak li digey Yàlla di bare lépp, ci Almasi la ay digeem di doone «waaw». Moo tax itam, ci moom lanu naan Yàlla: «Amiin», ngir delloo ko njukkal.
2 Corinthians 1:21 Te ki nuy saxal ci Almasi, nook yeen, moo nu tabbe diwu pal gi, te moo di Yàlla.
2 Corinthians 1:22 Moo nu màndargaale xàmmikaayam, te moo yeb dawalub Noo gu Sell gi ci sunu biir xol.
2 Corinthians 1:23 ¶ Man nag seedey Yàlla laa ciy sàkku, giñ naa ko ci sama bakkan, bañ leena yokku naqar moo tax délsiwuma Korent.
2 Corinthians 1:24 Du caageenu yilif seen ngëm nag, ndax ci ngëm ngeen sax, waaye nook yeen ay liggéey, ngir seen mbégte.
2 Corinthians 2:1 ¶ Man nag li ma dogu mooy lii: Du teg leen aw naqar laay délsee ci yeen,
2 Corinthians 2:2 ndax su ma leen naqaralee, ana kuy seral sama xol ku dul yeen ñi ma naqaral?
2 Corinthians 2:3 Looloo taxoon ma binde noonu, ngir bu ma dikkee, baña am naqar ci ñi ma waroona bégal. Li ma wóor ci yeen ñépp moo di sama mbégte mooy seen mbégte, yeen ñépp.
2 Corinthians 2:4 Ci biir njàqare, ak xol bu fees, ak rongooñ yu bare laa leen bind. Binduma leen ngir naqaral leen, waaye cofeel gu réy gi ma am ci yeen moo tax.
2 Corinthians 2:5 ¶ Su nit tegee aw naqar, man naa ne du man rekk la ko teg, waaye yeen ñépp la teg aw naqar, mbaa boog ma ne ñenn ci yeen, ngir baña réyal mbir mi lool.
2 Corinthians 2:6 Tiiñal, gi ko li ëpp ci mbooloo mi tiiñal, doy na ko mbugal.
2 Corinthians 2:7 Kon kay xanaa ngeen jéggal ko, te dëfal ko, ngir mu baña sóobu ci naqar wu ko ëpp doole.
2 Corinthians 2:8 Kon dama leen di ñaan, ngeen feddli seen mbëggeel ci moom.
2 Corinthians 2:9 Leneen lu ma jublu woon ci bind leen, moo di nattu leen ba xam, ndax dingeen dégg ndigal ci lépp.
2 Corinthians 2:10 Ku ngeen jéggal ag tooñ, ma jéggal ko, man itam. Man nag, su ma jéggalee, ndegam am naa lu ma jéggale, yeena tax ma def ko, ci kanam Almasi,
2 Corinthians 2:11 ngir Seytaane bañ noo nax, ndax ay pexeem, umplewunu ko.
2 Corinthians 2:12 ¶ Ba ma àggee Torowas, ngir yégle fa xibaaru jàmm bi ci Almasi, bunt ubbikul na ma ndax Boroom bi.
2 Corinthians 2:13 Waaye sama xel dalul woon, ndax gisuma woon sama mbokk, Tit. Teewul ma tàggtoo ak ñoom, jëm diiwaanu Maseduwan.
2 Corinthians 2:14 ¶ Waaye cant ñeel na Yàlla! Moom mi Almasi tax mu di nu yóbbaale saa su nekk, ci njaab miy fésal ndamam, te cuuraayal xam-xamam, nun ñii la koy wasaaree fépp,
2 Corinthians 2:15 ndax kat nun nooy cuuraayal Almasi fa Yàlla, ñeel ñi ci yoonu texe, ak ñi ci yoonu sànkute.
2 Corinthians 2:16 Teewul muy ci ñii, xetu ndee gu jëme ci ndee, te di ci ñee, xetu dund gu jëme ci dund. Boobu sas nag, ana ku ko àttan?
2 Corinthians 2:17 Nun nag danoo melul ni ñu bare, ñiy julaa kàddug Yàlla, waaye ci ndigalal Yàlla ak fi kanam Yàlla la nuy waaree xol bu set, ci Almasi mi nu gëm.
2 Corinthians 3:1 ¶ Danuy tàmbaleetee seedeel sunu bopp ne noo yelloo ngërëma? Am danoo soxla ni ñenn nit ñi, ay bataaxal yu jëm ci yeen, mbaa mu bawoo ci yeen, ngir seedeel nu ngërëm?
2 Corinthians 3:2 Sunu bataaxal kay, yeen la, te dees koo bind ci sunu xol, ba ñépp xam ko, jàng ko.
2 Corinthians 3:3 Bir na ne bataaxalub Almasi bu jottlikoo ci sunub liggéey, moom ngeen, te du daa lees ko binde, waaye Noowug Yàlla jiy dund lees ko binde. Du ci àlluway doj lees ko rëdd, waaye ci àlluway xoli suux, lees ko rëdd.
2 Corinthians 3:4 ¶ Googu kóolute lanu am ci Yàlla ndax Almasi.
2 Corinthians 3:5 Du caageenu doyloo sunu manoorey bopp, ba yaakaar ne lenn man naa sottee ci sunu wàllu bopp, waaye sunu manoore ci Yàlla la jóge.
2 Corinthians 3:6 Moo nu may manoorey doon ay liggéeykati kóllëre gu bees gu ajuwul ci mbindum ndigali yoon, xanaa kóllëre gu aju ci Noo gi. Ndaxte mbindum ndigali yoon day rey, te Noo gi di dundloo.
2 Corinthians 3:7 ¶ Mbindum ndigali yoon wi, ci aw doj lees ko rëddoon, te Musaa moo sasoo woon liggéeyu yoon woowuy jëme ci ndee. Teewul muy liggéey bu làmboo ag leer gu doon lerxat ca kanam ga, ba bànni Israyil tële koo xool jàkk, doonte leer guy wéy la woon.
2 Corinthians 3:8 Waaye liggéeyu Noo gi, leer gu gënatee réy la làmboo.
2 Corinthians 3:9 Ndegam liggéey boobuy tege ab daan moo làmboo ag leer, kon liggéeyu Noo, giy maye njekk moo ko gënatee làmboo ag leer.
2 Corinthians 3:10 Soo ko xoolee noonu, leer ga woon, du woon sax ag leer, ci leer gii ko raw tey,
2 Corinthians 3:11 ndax ndegam liy wéy moo làmboo woon ag leer, astamaak li fi sax.
2 Corinthians 3:12 ¶ Gannaaw am nanu jooju yaakaar nag, fit wu réy lanuy deme,
2 Corinthians 3:13 te baña def ni Musaa ma daan muur kanam ga, ndax bànni Israyil bañ ne jàkk ci leer guy wéy, di giim, di giim ba jeex.
2 Corinthians 3:14 Waaye seenum xel a dërkiis. Ba tey jii, bu ñuy jànge biir mbooloo, téereb kóllëre gu jëkk gi, muuraay googoo fi des; murikuwul, ndax ci Almasi lay deñe.
2 Corinthians 3:15 Waaw, ba tey jii kay, saa yu ñuy biral yoonu Musaa, ag muuraay a ngi tege ci seen xol.
2 Corinthians 3:16 Waaye saa su nit waññikoo ci Boroom bi, muuraay gi day muriku.
2 Corinthians 3:17 Boroom bi mooy Noo gi, te fu Noo gi nekk, fa la nit di moome boppam.
2 Corinthians 3:18 Nun ñépp nag, kanam gu muriku lanuy xoole niki cib seetu, leeru Boroom bi, ba tax nuy soppiku, doon takkndeeram, tey làmboo leer guy màgg, di gëna màgg. Looloo di liggéeyu Boroom bi, moom miy Noo gi.
2 Corinthians 4:1 ¶ Ndegam boobu liggéey lanu sasoo, ci yërmandey Yàlla, dunu yoqi.
2 Corinthians 4:2 Waaye danoo dàq jépp jëf ju gàccelu ju nit di jëfe làq-làqal. Doxunu ag njublaŋ te sopparñiwunu kàddug Yàlla. Liy dëgg kay lanuy fésal, ba am kóoluteg ñépp, fi kanam Yàlla.
2 Corinthians 4:3 Sunu xibaaru jàmm nag, su muuroo, ñi nara sànku la muurul.
2 Corinthians 4:4 Aji gëmadi ñooñu la Seytaane yàllay xarnu bii gëlëmal seenum xel, ngir ñu baña gis ceeñeeru xibaaru jàmm bu leeru Almasi, miy melokaanu Yàlla.
2 Corinthians 4:5 Nun kat, du sunu bopp lanuy waare, waaye li Yeesu Almasi dib Sang moom lanuy waare, te nun ci sunu bopp nooy seeni jaam, ndax Yeesu.
2 Corinthians 4:6 Ndaxte Yàlla mi ne: «Na leer gi leere ci biir lëndëm gi,» moo leeral sunu xol, ngir leeraangey xam-xamu leeru Yàlla, te leeraange googu mooy lerxat ci xar-kanamu Yeesu Almasi.
2 Corinthians 4:7 ¶ Nun nag nooy njaqi bani kese yi yeb jooju alal, ngir mu bir ne manoore ju yéeme ji alal ji làmboo, manoorey Yàllaa, waaye du sunu jos.
2 Corinthians 4:8 Nu nekk lees nuy tance, waaye deesu nu nappaaje. Dinanu jaaxle, waaye dunu jàq.
2 Corinthians 4:9 Dees na nu bundxatal, waaye deesu nu wacc. Dees na nu daaneel, waaye deesu nu jekkli.
2 Corinthians 4:10 Dee gi Yeesu dee woon, moom lanu àndal ci sunu yaram, fu nu tollu, ngir dundug Yeesu itam mana fése ci sunu yaram.
2 Corinthians 4:11 Saa su nekk, nun ñiy dund, ñu ngi nuy jébbal ndee ndax Yeesu, ba tax dundu Yeesu it mana fése ci sunuw suux wi jëm ndee.
2 Corinthians 4:12 Kon nag ndee mooy def liggéeyam ci nun, ndund di def liggéeyam ci yeen.
2 Corinthians 4:13 ¶ Bindees na ne: «Damaa gëm, moo tax ma wax.» Nun it, wenn xeetu ngëm wi lanu am. Danoo gëm, moo tax itam nuy wax.
2 Corinthians 4:14 Ndaxte xam nanu ne ki dekkal Sang Yeesu, moo nuy dekkal itam, nook Yeesu, te moo nuy yóbbu ba nu teewi, nook yeen, fa kanamam.
2 Corinthians 4:15 Loolu lépp yeena tax, ngir yiwu Yàlla lawa law, ba cant gu ne gàññ tukkee ci ñi ëpp ci nit ñi, ngir màggug Yàlla.
2 Corinthians 4:16 ¶ Moo tax dunu ñàkk yaakaar. Doonte sax sunu bitib jëmm a ngi gën di bon, sunu jëmmu biir moom, mu ngi yeeslu bés ak bés.
2 Corinthians 4:17 Sunu coono bu woyof bii ci àddina, ci diggante bu gàtt nag, moo nuy jural teraanga ju diisaay ba jéggi dayo, teraanga ju sax dàkk.
2 Corinthians 4:18 Moo waral xoolunu ci li bët mana gis, waaye li bët dul gis, ci lanuy xool, ndax li bët mana gis day wéy, waaye li bët dul gis moo sax ba fàww.
2 Corinthians 5:1 ¶ Xam nanu ne sunu yaram, sunu këru kaw suuf gii di ab xayma, bu daanoo it, am taax lanu am fa Yàlla, kër gu sax dàkk, gu loxol nit tabaxul.
2 Corinthians 5:2 Moo nu tax di onk ci biir xayma bii nu nekk, ndax yàkkamtee soloo sunu dëkkuwaayu asamaan, teg ko ci kaw bii nu jiital,
2 Corinthians 5:3 nde bu nu soloo noonu, dunu def yaramu neen.
2 Corinthians 5:4 Noo ngi onk ndax diis, li feek nu ngeek sunuw yaram, xayma bi nu soloo nii. Du summiku lanu namm, waaye solu teg ko ci lanu namm, ngir li jëm ndee, daldi suux ci biir ndund.
2 Corinthians 5:5 Googu muj ci boppam lanu Yàlla mooñe woon, te Noo gi mu nu jox lanu ci dawalal.
2 Corinthians 5:6 ¶ Moo tax nu saxoo ñeme, te xam ne sunu desagum biir kër, ci yaram wi, mooy sunu desagum fu sore Sang bi,
2 Corinthians 5:7 ndax ngëm lanuy doxe, waaye doxewunu ab gis-gis.
2 Corinthians 5:8 Kon ñeme lanu def, te li nu gënal di génn, des bitib sunu yaramu tey, ngir dëkki ak Sang bi.
2 Corinthians 5:9 Kon nag, nu des biir kër gii, mbaa nu génn, dëkki bitib kër gii, li nu xintewoo daal moo di nu neex Sang bi.
2 Corinthians 5:10 Ndax kat, nun ñépp fàww nu taxawi fa jalub àttekaayu Almasi, ngir ku nekk yooloo kemu jëf ja mu jëfe yaramam, muy lu baax, mbaa lu bon.
2 Corinthians 5:11 ¶ Danoo xam lan mooy ragal Boroom bi nag, te moo nu tax di wax lu gëmloo nit ñi. Yàlla de ràññee na bu baax nooy kan. May yaakaar ne yeen itam, ci seen biir xol, ràññee ngeen bu baax nooy kan.
2 Corinthians 5:12 Seedeelatunu sunu bopp lu jar ngërëm de, danu leen di may lu ngeen nu mana sagoo, ndax ngeen am tontal ñi sagoowul li ci biir xol, xanaa di sagoo am peeñ.
2 Corinthians 5:13 Ndegam danoo teqlikoo ak sunu sago, Yàlla la ñeel. Su nu àndee ak sunu sago nag, yeen la ñeel.
2 Corinthians 5:14 Ndaxte cofeelu Almasi daal moo nu jiite, nun ñi ràññee lii: Gannaaw kenn moo deeyal ñépp, kon ñépp a dee.
2 Corinthians 5:15 Te ki deeyal ñépp, daa deeyal ñépp ngir ñiy dund bañatee dund ngir seen bopp, xanaa di dund ngir ki leen deeyal, ba dekki.
2 Corinthians 5:16 ¶ Kon nag gannaaw-si-tey, ni nitu suuxu neen di xoole moroomam, nun xooleetunu ko kenn. Doonte ni nitu suuxu neen lanu xoole woon Almasi, léegi xooleetunu ko noonu.
2 Corinthians 5:17 Kon bu nit ki bokkee ci Almasi, mbindeef mu bees lay doon. La woon day wonni, li teew nag, di lu yees.
2 Corinthians 5:18 Loolu lépp ci Yàlla la jóge, moom mi nu jubale ak boppam ci Almasi, te moo nu sas, ngir nuy waare juboo googu.
2 Corinthians 5:19 Loolu di firi ne ci Almasi la Yàlla jubale waa àddina, ak jëmmu boppam, ba toppu leen seeni tooñ, te moo nu dénk kàddug juboo gi.
2 Corinthians 5:20 Kon nag Almasi, noo diy ndawam, te ci nun la Yàlla di wootee. Kon ci turu Almasi, danu leen di ñaan: nanguleena juboo ak Yàlla.
2 Corinthians 5:21 Almasi mi masula bàkkaar, moom la Yàlla sëf sunu bàkkaar, ngir nu mana ame ci moom àtteb nit ñu jub fa Yàlla.
2 Corinthians 6:1 ¶ Nun ñi bokk ci liggéey bi nag, noo leen di ñaan ngeen baña nangu yiwu Yàlla ci neen.
2 Corinthians 6:2 Ndaxte Yàlla moo ne: «Jant ba mu jotee laa la nangul, bésu mucc ba laa la wallu.» Te nag, tey jii la jantam jote; tey kat, la bésub mucc.
2 Corinthians 6:3 ¶ Buggunu kenn sikk sunub liggéey, moo tax buggunoo jëfe lenn luy doon tojaange ci kenn.
2 Corinthians 6:4 Ci lépp kay lanu bëgga seedeel sunu bopp, ne noo yelloo ngërëm, te ay jawriñi Yàlla lanu, di ñu muñ lu bare ci biir coono, aki mitit, aki njàqare;
2 Corinthians 6:5 ci ay dóor, ak néegi kaso, ci biir mbooloo yu nu jógal, ci doñ-doñ ju metti, ak fanaanee xoole, akub xiif;
2 Corinthians 6:6 te nuy setal sunu dund, di ànd ak xam-xam, ci biir muñ, akug mbaax, ci biir Noo gu Sell gi, ak cofeel gu amul jinigal,
2 Corinthians 6:7 ci biir kàddug dëgg, ak kàttanu Yàlla; ci kaw gànnaayi njubte yi ci sunu loxol ndijoor ak lu càmmoñ;
2 Corinthians 6:8 ci biir teraanga, ak ci biir toskare; ci biiri baatal, ak jëw yu rafet. Dees noo jàppe ay mbubbookati dëgg, te nuy nit ñu dëggu;
2 Corinthians 6:9 jàppe nu ñu kenn xamul, te nuy ñu siiw; jàppe nu ñuy waaja dee, te nuy dund; jàppe nu ñu ñu wara mbugal, te bañ leena teg àtteb dee.
2 Corinthians 6:10 Dees noo jàppe boroomi tiis, te nu dëkke mbég; jàppe nu ay néew-ji-doole, te nu woomal ñu bare; jàppe nu ñu amul dara, te nu moom lépp.
2 Corinthians 6:11 ¶ Yeen bokki Korent, wax nanu leen sunu biir yépp, ubbil leen sunu xol.
2 Corinthians 6:12 Genn ñooru jógewul ci nun, waaye yeen yeena nu ñooroo seen xol.
2 Corinthians 6:13 Léegi nag, yeen, feyleen nu bor bi boog, ma wax ak yeen ni samay doom, ubbil-leen nu seen xol!
2 Corinthians 6:14 ¶ Buleen lëkkoo ak gëmadikat ñi. Gan lëngoo la njub ak ndëngte séq? Gan booloo la leer ak lëndëm séq?
2 Corinthians 6:15 Gan juboo la Almasi ak Seytaane séq? Wan wàll la gëmkat bi bokk ak gëmadikat bi?
2 Corinthians 6:16 Gan takktoo la kër Yàlla séq ak ay tuur? Ndax kat, nun, nooy kër Yàlla jiy dund, te noonu la ko Yàlla waxe ne: «Maay dëkk ci seen biir, di dox ci seen biir, di seen Yàlla, ñuy sama ñoñ.»
2 Corinthians 6:17 Kon nag: «Nangeen génne ci seen biir, te teqlikoo ak ñoom,» la Boroom bi wax. «Lu sobewu, buleen ko laal. Su boobaa, maa leen di dalal.
2 Corinthians 6:18 Maay doon seen baay, ngeen di samay doom, góor, ak jigéen,» la Boroom bi, Aji Man ji wax.
2 Corinthians 7:1 ¶ Gannaaw noo moom yii dige nag, soppe yi, nanu setal sunu bopp ci mboolem sobey yaram, ak ju xel, te nu matal sellnga ci ag ragal Yàlla.
2 Corinthians 7:2 ¶ Xajal-leen nu. Tooñunu kenn; lorunu kenn; naxunu kenn, lekkunu alalu kenn.
2 Corinthians 7:3 Du teg leen tooñ laay waxe lii, ndax wax naa ko ba noppi, yeena ngi ci sunu xol, ngir nu bokk dund, mbaa nu bokk dee.
2 Corinthians 7:4 Kóolute gu réy laa am ci yeen, te sag bi ma ame ci yeen réy na. Mbégte mu seral sama xol laa feese, te bànneex laa rembatle, ci biir sunu mboolem njàqare!
2 Corinthians 7:5 ¶ Ba nu àggee diiwaanu Maseduwan, sunuw yaram noppluwul, waaye daj nanu bépp coono: xeex ci biti, njàqare ci biir.
2 Corinthians 7:6 Teewul Yàlla miy seral xolu ñi xàddi, tànki Tit la serale sunu xol,
2 Corinthians 7:7 te du tànki Tit rekk la serale sunu xol, waaye itam, seral ga Tit ne, moom ngeen serale woon xolam. Yégal na nu seen nammeel gu réy, ak seeni jooy, ak seen xéraange ci man, ba ma gënatee bég.
2 Corinthians 7:8 ¶ Ndegam sax dama leena tegoon aw tiis ndax bataaxal ba ma leen bind, réccootuma ko, doonte réccu woon naa ko, ndax gis naa ne bataaxal boobu teg na leen aw tiis, lu mu gàtt gàtt.
2 Corinthians 7:9 Waaye tey bég naa, te du tiis wu ngeen tegoo laay bége, waaye li leen tiis wi tuubloo, laay bége, ndax woowu xeetu tiis la Yàlla namm ci yeen, moo tax it yóbbewunu leen jenn loraange.
2 Corinthians 7:10 Ndaxte tiis wu Yàlla namm, ag tuubeel gu jëme cig mucc lay jur, te loolu du tiis wees di tiisoo. Waaye tiisu àddina, ndee lay jur.
2 Corinthians 7:11 Gisleen nag, seen tiis wi leen Yàlla teg ci coobareem, li mu leen jural: gii farlute; gii kàddug layoo gu ngeen yékkati, rawati; mii mer mu war, rawati; gii ragal Yàlla rawati; gii nammeel rawati; gii xéraange rawati; gii pastéef ci yar ki tooñ rawati! Nu nekk ngeen setale seen bopp wecc ci mbir moomu.
2 Corinthians 7:12 Kon nag su ma leen bindee, ki tooñ taxul, ki ñu tooñ it taxul, waaye dama leena bind, ngir farlute gi ngeen am ci nun, mana fés, fi kanam Yàlla, ngeen gisal ko seen bopp.
2 Corinthians 7:13 Loolu seral na sunu xol. Te yemunu ci xol bu sedd, waaye gënati nanoo bége mbégtem Tit, mi ngeen dalal am xelam, yeen ñépp.
2 Corinthians 7:14 Dëgg la, damoo naa leen as lëf fi kanam Tit, waaye gàcce fekku ma ci. Dëgg lanu leen masa wax, waaye la nu leen doon damoo fa kanam Tit itam, noonu la mujje doon dëgg.
2 Corinthians 7:15 Te saa yu Tit xoolaatee ni ngeen dégge ndigal, yeen ñépp, ak wegeel gi ngeen ko dalale, ànd ceek ragal Yàlla bay lox, cofeelam ci yeen di gënatee yokku.
2 Corinthians 7:16 Bég naa, ndax wóolu naa leen ci lépp!
2 Corinthians 8:1 ¶ Gannaaw loolu bokk yi, danu leen di xamal li yiwu Yàlla maye ci biir mboolooy gëmkati diiwaanu Maseduwan.
2 Corinthians 8:2 Doonte jaar nañu ci nattub njàqare bu mag, seen mbégtee rembat ci seen biir ñàkk gu tar, ba géejal seenug tabe.
2 Corinthians 8:3 Seen kemu am-am lañu joxee, maa ko seede, lu wees seen am-am sax lañu joxee xol bu sedd.
2 Corinthians 8:4 Dañu noo ñaan, ba di nu tinu, ngir nu may leen, ñu def seen loxo ci ndimbalu jàpplante gi jëm ci gëmkat ñu sell ñi.
2 Corinthians 8:5 Li nu séentu woon sax wees nañu ko, nde Sang bi lañu jëkka jébbal seen bopp, door noo jébbal seen bopp, te noonu la ko Yàlla bëgge.
2 Corinthians 8:6 Looloo tax nu soññ Tit, ngir noonee mu tàmbalee woon ci yeen, ndajalem ndimbal li, mu àggalee ko ci yeen.
2 Corinthians 8:7 Gannaaw nag yeena duunle ci lépp; muy ci wàllu ngëm, ak wàllu kàddu yu rafet, ak wàllu xam-xam, ak cawarte ci lépp, ak ci cofeel gu nu leen xiir, kon ndajalem ndimbal lii it, ngalla duunleleen ci.
2 Corinthians 8:8 ¶ Du ndigal lu ma leen jox, waaye njaxlafug yeneen gëmkat, moom laay natte seen xol, ngir xam nu seen cofeel dëggoo.
2 Corinthians 8:9 Xam ngeen kat sunu yiwu Boroom Yeesu Almasi, moom mi woomle woon, te yeena tax mu ñàkk, ngir woomale leen ag ñàkkam.
2 Corinthians 8:10 ¶ Ab xalaat laa am ci mbir mii, te mooy doon seen njariñ. Du jëf ji rekk ngeen jëkke woon, waaye yeena jëkkoona biral daaw, yéeney dimbali.
2 Corinthians 8:11 Kon nag léegi, mottlileen jëf ji. Noonu ngeen xére woon ci seen yéene, mottleeleen ko noonu ci seen kem am-am.
2 Corinthians 8:12 Ndax kat ab joxe, bu àndee ak yéene rekk, la boroom joxe bi amul, deesu ci natt lees koy nangul, waaye li mu am, ci lees koy nangul ab joxeem.
2 Corinthians 8:13 ¶ Du caageenu nag, teg leen coono, ngir teggil ñenn ñi, waaye ag tollale war na ci.
2 Corinthians 8:14 Tey jii seenug rembatle mooy faj soxlay ñeneen, ngir ëllëg, rembatley ñooña faj seeni soxla, yeen itam. Su ko defee ag tolloo am.
2 Corinthians 8:15 Noonu lañu binde ne: «Ki dajale lu bare ëpplewul, te ki dajale lu tuut ñàkkul.»
2 Corinthians 8:16 ¶ Cant ñeel na Yàlla, mi def ci xolu Tit, mu xér ci yeen ni ma xére ci yeen!
2 Corinthians 8:17 Ba nu ñaanee Tit mu dikk ba ci yeen, nangul na nu, waaye yemu ca, nde ci xéraangeem la yebul boppam ne mooy dikk ba ci yeen.
2 Corinthians 8:18 Noo ko yebal, boole kook menn mbokk mu mboolooy gëmkat ñépp gërëm, ndax liggéeyam ci xibaaru Almasi bi muy xamle.
2 Corinthians 8:19 Rax ci dolli, mboolooy gëmkat ñi ñoo ko tabb, ngir mu ànd ak nun, ba nu yóbbu ndimbal li, muy teddngay Boroom bi ci boppam, te di sunu firndey cawarte ci dimbalee.
2 Corinthians 8:20 Noonu lanu fàggoo, ndax kenn bañ noo sikk ci ndimbal lu bare lii nu wara saytu.
2 Corinthians 8:21 Li nuy xinte moo di li baax ci kanam Boroom bi, te baax ci kanam nit ñi itam.
2 Corinthians 8:22 ¶ Boole nañu leen itam ak sunu mbokk mu nu nemmiku xéraangeem ay yooni yoon, ci fànn yu bare, te mu gënatee xér bii yoon ndax kóolute gu réy gu mu am ci yeen.
2 Corinthians 8:23 Su dee mbirum Tit, mooy sama wéttal, di ma jàpple ci liggéey bi, ngir yeen. Sunu bokk, yi ànd ak moom nag, ñooy ndawi mboolooy gëmkat ñi, te ñooy teraangay Almasi.
2 Corinthians 8:24 Kon nag wonleen leen lu firndeel seen cofeel ci ñoom, ak ci kanam mboolooy gëmkat ñi, firndeel itam ne noo yey wóolu leen.
2 Corinthians 9:1 ¶ Ci mbirum ndimbal lu jëm ci ñu sell ñi, jarul ma di leen bind,
2 Corinthians 9:2 ndax xam naa seen yéene ju réy, te moom laay damoo ci kanam waa Maseduwan, naan leen: «Daaw fekk na waa Akayi noppi.» Te seen xéraange jooju ngeen nekke xiirtal na ñu bare.
2 Corinthians 9:3 Maa yebal bokk yi, di yaakaar ngeen noppi ni ma ko waxe woon, ngir la nu leen doon damoo ci mbir mii, baña neen.
2 Corinthians 9:4 Lu ko moy bu niti Maseduwan dikkee, ànd ak man, te fekkuleen noppi, kóolute googu sunu gàcce lay doon, rawatina seen gos.
2 Corinthians 9:5 Moo tax ma noon naa soññ bokk yi, ñu jiitu ma ci yeen, ba waajal ndimbal lu takku li ngeen dige woon, ba mu noppi, te baña doon sompi ŋott, xanaa di ndimbal lu duun.
2 Corinthians 9:6 ¶ Lii rekk la: ji lu tuut, góob lu tuut; ji lu bare, góob lu bare.
2 Corinthians 9:7 Kon na ku nekk joxe, ni mu ko waaje ci xolam, te bañ koo tiisoo, bañ koo joxee ñàkk pexe, ndax kiy joxee xol bu sedd, Yàlla sopp na ko,
2 Corinthians 9:8 te Yàlla man na leena baawaanal wépp yiw, ba ngeen saxoo am lu leen doy ci lépp, ak koom gu bare, ngir jépp jëf ju baax.
2 Corinthians 9:9 Noonu lañu binde ne: «Mooy nàddil néew-doole yi, te njekkam sax dàkk.»
2 Corinthians 9:10 Te kiy jagleel beykat bi am jiwu, ak mburu mu nit di dunde nag, kooku moo leen di jox jiwu mu ne gàññ, te mooy ful seen meññeefum njekk.
2 Corinthians 9:11 Su ko defee ngeen woomle ci lépp, mana yéwén ci wet gu nekk, ba seen jëf ji sottee ci nun, mana jur cant gu bare, ñeel Yàlla.
2 Corinthians 9:12 ¶ Ndax liggéey bi ndimbal lii laaj kat, yemul rekk ci faj soxlay ñu sell ñi, waaye itam dina baawaanal cant gu bare, ñeel Yàlla.
2 Corinthians 9:13 Liggéey bi ci ndimbal lii nag, nit ñi dinañu natt soloom bu réy, bay sàbbaal Yàlla, ndax ni ngeen firndeele ne déggal ngeen xibaaru jàmm bu Almasi, ak ni ngeen yéwéne ci seen jàpplante, jëme ci ñoom ak ci ñépp.
2 Corinthians 9:14 Cofeel gu réy nag lañu leen di ñaanale, ndax yiw wi leen Yàlla géejal, yeen.
2 Corinthians 9:15 Cant ñeel na Yàlla ci mayam gu tiiñ aw làmmiñ.
2 Corinthians 10:1 ¶ Man Póol ci sama wàllu bopp nag, maa leen di ñaaxe teeyug Almasi, akug lewetaayam, man miy teew ci seen biir, di ab ragaleey, fi seen kanam, te bu ma soree doŋŋ laa leen di ñemeey,
2 Corinthians 10:2 rikk buleen ma taxa teew, bay ñemee jëfe kóolute, gi ma nara ñemee jëfe, ak ñenn ñi xalaat ne ni nitu suuxu neen doŋŋ lanuy doxale.
2 Corinthians 10:3 Dëgg la, nitu suux lanu, waaye xeexewunu ni nit di xeexe.
2 Corinthians 10:4 Ndaxte gànnaay, yi nuy xeexe du gànnaayi suuxi neen, waaye da di gànnaay yu am fa Yàlla, kàttanu daane ay tata. Te xalaatin yu jubul, noo leen di daaneel,
2 Corinthians 10:5 mook lépp luy réy-réyloo ab taxawaayam, di joŋante ak xam-xamu Yàlla, te nooy jàpp njaam bépp xalaat, ngir déggal-loo ko Almasi.
2 Corinthians 10:6 Te keroog bu seen dégg ndigal matee, fas nanu yéenee mbugal képp ku déggadi.
2 Corinthians 10:7 ¶ Xanaa ci melow biti doŋŋ ngeen di xool! Su amee ku mu wér péŋŋ, moom ci boppam ne ci Almasi la bokk, na dellu jàpp moom ci boppam, ne ndegam ci Almasi la bokk, nun itam, ci Almasi lanu bokk.
2 Corinthians 10:8 Te doonuma am benn kersa, su ma ëppaloon sax ci damoo sañ-sañ bi nu Boroom bi jox, te du sañ-sañu sànk leen it, xanaa yokk seen ngëm.
2 Corinthians 10:9 Buggumaa mel ni ku leen di xëbale ay bataaxal nag.
2 Corinthians 10:10 Ndaxte bataaxal yi kat lañu ne: «Dañoo ñagas, te tàng, waaye bu teewee moom ci boppam, da naan yàcc, te ay kàddoom xeebu.»
2 Corinthians 10:11 Lii nag, kiy waxe noonu, na ko xam: ni nu mel ci kàddu ci sunuy bataaxal, bu nu wuutee, noonu lanuy mel ci jëf, bu nu teewee.
2 Corinthians 10:12 ¶ Ñenn ci ñooñu di seedeel seen bopp ne ñoo yelloo ngërëm nag, nun ñemewunoo boole sunu bopp ak ñoom, mbaa nuy méngale sunu bopp ak ñoom. Waaye ñoom dañoo amul xel, ndax nattukaay bi ñuy nattoo, di ko méngalantee ci seen biir, ñoom ñoo ko sàkkal seen bopp!
2 Corinthians 10:13 Nun, sunub damu dafa am kemu bu mu dul wees. Sunu kemu moo di déndub tool bi nu Yàlla sas, te ci biir tool bi lanu liggéeye, ba agsi ci yeen.
2 Corinthians 10:14 Moo tax weesunu sunu kemu sas, mbete agsiwunu woon ba ci yeen. Waaye noo agsi ba ci yeen, indil leen xibaaru jàmm bu Almasi.
2 Corinthians 10:15 Weesunu kemu, bay damu ci liggéeyu ñeneen. Waaye am nanu yaakaar ne nu seen ngëm gëna yokkoo, ni la sunuw sas di gëna yokkoo, lépp ci biir kemu gi ñu nu àppal.
2 Corinthians 10:16 Su ko defee nu mana wees fa yeen, ba jàll yégleji xibaaru jàmm bi ca wàlla, te baña damoo lu ñeneen def ba noppi, ci seen biir sas.
2 Corinthians 10:17 Kuy damu daal, na damu ci Boroom bi.
2 Corinthians 10:18 ¶ Ndax ki ñu naw mooy ki Boroom bi gërëm, waaye du ki gërëm boppam.
2 Corinthians 11:1 ¶ Céy bu ngeen ma muñaloon, ba ma dof-doflu tuuti! Muñal-leen ma rekk.
2 Corinthians 11:2 Maa leen di fiiree fiiraangey Yàlla ci boppam, ndax jenn jëkkër doŋŋ laa leen digool ab séy, te mooy Almasi mi ma leen namma jébbal, te fekk leen di janq bu set wecc.
2 Corinthians 11:3 Waaye na jaan ja naxe woon Awa, ca pexeem, ragal naa seenum xel yàqoo noonu, ba dëddu ngëm gu dëggu te set gu ngeen ŋoye woon ci Almasi.
2 Corinthians 11:4 Ndax kat gaaw ngeena xajoo lool, nit ku dikk, di leen waare meneen Yeesu mu nu waarewul, mbaa geneen noo gu ngeen jot te jotuleen ko woon, mbaa beneen xibaar bu ngeen dëggal, te mu wuute ak ba ngeen déggoon.
2 Corinthians 11:5 Moona ndaw yu màgga màgg yooyeey, foog naa ne duma seen cuune ci lenn.
2 Corinthians 11:6 Su ma dee ku xareñul ci wàllu wax it, du ci wàllu xam-xam, te nu nekk lanu leen wone loolu, ci bépp fànn.
2 Corinthians 11:7 ¶ Am boog damaa tooñ ca na ma toroxloo ngir darajaal leen, ndax la ma leen laajul ag pey, ba ma leen di àgge xibaaru jàmm bu Yàlla bi?
2 Corinthians 11:8 Yeneen mboolooy gëmkat de laa jëlal, nde maa nangoo ag peyoor ca ñoom, ba man leena liggéeyal, yeen, ci neen.
2 Corinthians 11:9 Te ba ma nekkee ci yeen te soxla dab ma, wéeruwuma ci kenn ci yeen, ndax la ma ñàkkoon, bokk ya jóge Maseduwan ñoo ma ko indil. Fexe naa ba du lenn lu ma leen diisale, te noonu laay saxoo.
2 Corinthians 11:10 Ak dëggu Almasi gi ci man, kàddug damu googu, kenn du ma ko xañ, ci diiwaanu Akayi gépp.
2 Corinthians 11:11 Lu tax? Ndax dama leena buggul? Yàlla xam na ne «ahakay!»
2 Corinthians 11:12 Noonu may def rekk laay saxoo, ngir xañ aw lay, ñiy wut aw lay wu ñu damoo, naan ñook nun a yem kepp daraja.
2 Corinthians 11:13 Ñooñu ay ndawi caaxaan lañu, ay liggéeykat yu njublaŋ yu mbubboo ndawi Almasi.
2 Corinthians 11:14 Te loolu jarula waaru, ndax Seytaane ci boppam, malaakam leer lay mbubboo.
2 Corinthians 11:15 Kon bu ay ndawam itam di mbubboo ndawi njub, du doon lu yéeme. Waaye seenug muj, seeni jëf lay yemool.
2 Corinthians 11:16 ¶ Ma baamu ko, bu ma kenn jàppe ab dof, mbaa boog, ngeen muñal ma ni ñuy muñale ab dof, ba ma damu tuuti, man itam.
2 Corinthians 11:17 Li may wax nag, waxewuma ko ci ndigalal Boroom bi, waaye taxawaayu dof laa koy waxe, gannaaw mbirum damu la.
2 Corinthians 11:18 Ndegam ñu baree ngi damu ni niti suuxu neen di damoo, naa damu, man itam.
2 Corinthians 11:19 Yeen boroom xel yi, yeenaka nangoo muñal ay dof,
2 Corinthians 11:20 nde muñal ngeen ku leen jaamloo, muñal ku leen lekk, muñal ku leen futti, muñal ku leen jaay daraja, muñal ku leen talaata!
2 Corinthians 11:21 Ma waxe ko gàcce, mbete noo néew doole, ba manunoo jëfe ak yeen noonu! Ndaxam, ma wax waxi dof, lu waay ñemee damoo, ñeme naa koo damoo, man it.
2 Corinthians 11:22 ¶ Xanaa ay Ebrë lañu? Ak man itam. Xanaa ci xeetu Israyil lañu bokk? Ak man itam. Xanaa ay sëti Ibraayma lañu? Ak man itam.
2 Corinthians 11:23 Xanaa ay surgay Almasi lañu? Naa ràkkaaju nag, te ne maa leen ko gëna doon. Bu dee ci liggéey yu metti, maa man fopp; bu dee ci fani kaso, maa ëpple fopp; bu dee ci ay yar, maa ëpple ay yooni yoon, te bare na lu ma riisu ndee, ba raw leen:
2 Corinthians 11:24 ci Yawut yi lañu ma dóore juróomi yoon, ñeent fukki kàccri yu yées benn.
2 Corinthians 11:25 Ñetti yoon lañu ma dóori yet, dóor may doj benn yoon. Ñetti yoon laa dugg gaal, mu suux. Fanaan naa, yendu naa biir xóotey géej.
2 Corinthians 11:26 Bare na lu ma tukki, ay aaytéef xaare ma ay dex, xaare ma ay sàcc, xaare ma ay pexe yu ma samaw xeet lalal, ak yu ma jaambur ñi lalal. Ay aaytéef xaare na ma biir dëkk, xaare ma biir màndiŋ, xaare ma biir géej, xaare ma ci biir bokki taalibe yu ko mbubboo.
2 Corinthians 11:27 Doñ-doñ, akub coono ci la, te bare naa lu ma fanaanee xoole. Xiif naa, mar naa, te bare na lu ma ñàkk ab dund. Liw naa, rafle naa,
2 Corinthians 11:28 te gannaaw li ci des lépp sax, sama xintey bés bu nekk a ngi fi, njàqare ji ma am ci mboolooy gëmkat ñépp.
2 Corinthians 11:29 Ana ku ci néew doole, te taxul ma néew doole, man it? Ana ku ñu ci bàkkaarloo, te awma ci tiis wu taal ab xol?
2 Corinthians 11:30 ¶ Su damu waree de, samag néew doole laay damoo.
2 Corinthians 11:31 Yàlla sunu Baayu Sang Yeesu, moom mi yelloo cant ba fàww, xam na ne fenuma.
2 Corinthians 11:32 Ba ma nekkee Damaas, ga boroom dëkk ba di jawriñu Buur Aretas, boroom dëkk baa santaane ñu wattu buntu dëkk ba, ngir jàpp ma.
2 Corinthians 11:33 Waaye ca palanteeru tatay dëkk ba lañu ma yoore cig dàmba, ba ci suuf. Noonu laa ko rëcce.
2 Corinthians 12:1 ¶ Damu war na, moonte amul njariñ, waaye naa jàll ba tey ci mbir yu ma Sang bi gisloo, ak peeñu yu mu ma won.
2 Corinthians 12:2 Maa xam aw nitu Almasi, ba ñu ko yéegee ba ñetteelu asamaan, fukki at ak ñeent la tey. Ndax aw yaramam lees ko yéegaale woon? Xawma, ndax yéegaaleesu ko aw yaramam? Xawma, Yàlla rekk a xam.
2 Corinthians 12:3 Xam naa ne nit kooku, ndegam yaramam lees ko booleel, am booleesu ko ak yaramam? Xawma, Yàlla rekk a xam,
2 Corinthians 12:4 Waaye yéegees na ko ba Àjjana, mu dégg fa mbir mu waxuwul, te mayeesul nit mu tudd ko.
2 Corinthians 12:5 Nit ku mel noonu laay damoo, waaye du sama bopp laay damoo, xanaa ma damoo diggante yu ma néewe doole.
2 Corinthians 12:6 Su ma nammoona damu it, du doon ag ndof, ndax dëgg laay wax. Waaye damay moytoo damu, ngir kenn bañ maa fooge lu wees li mu gis, may def, ak li mu dégg, may wax.
2 Corinthians 12:7 ¶ Te it, waccalees na ma ndégu biir suux, mu taxawe ndawal Seytaane, di ma mitital, ngir ma baña bew ndax peeñu yu yéeme.
2 Corinthians 12:8 Mbir moomu, ñetti yoon laa ci ñaan Sang bi, ngir mu sorele maak moom.
2 Corinthians 12:9 Mu ne ma: «Sama yiw doŋŋ nga soxla; sama manoore, ci ag néew doole lay mate.» Kon kat dinaa gëna bégati ci damoo diggante yu ma néewe doole, ngir manoorey Almasi wàcc ci sama kaw.
2 Corinthians 12:10 Looloo ma tax di bànneexu ci biir diggante yu ma néewe doole, ak ci biiri saaga, ak ci biir ag ñàkk, ak ci biir coono yu ñu may bundxatale, ak ci biir njàqare yu ma dal ngir Almasi. Ndaxte bu ma néewee doole, booba laa am kàttan.
2 Corinthians 12:11 ¶ Mujj naa dib dof nag, te yeena ma ko yóbbe, nde gërëm maa leen waroon, ndax doonte duma dara sax, ndaw yu màgga màgg yooyeey, duma seen cuune ci lenn.
2 Corinthians 12:12 Firnde yiy màndargaal ndawal Almasi, feeñalees na ko ci seen biir, lépp ci ag muñ gu mat sëkk: firnde yeek kéemaan yeek jaloore yi.
2 Corinthians 12:13 Ci lan ngeen yéesle yeneen mboolooy gëmkat ñi? Xanaa sama soxlay jëmmu bopp jii ma leen wéerul. Kon baal-leen ma, maa tooñ!
2 Corinthians 12:14 ¶ Maa ngii di leen waaja ganesi ñetteel bi yoon, te duma wéeru ci yeen. Wutsiwuma lu ngeen am, yeen laa soxla. Ndaxte doom du dencal waajuram, waaye waajur mooy dencal doom.
2 Corinthians 12:15 Man nag xol bu sedd laa yeboo ci jaay mboolem lu ma am, ba jaay sama dooley bopp ngir seen jëmmi bopp. Xanaa duma leen ji gii cofeel gu réy, di feyoo cofeel gu ko yées?
2 Corinthians 12:16 Xanaa dees na ne, man ci sama wàllu bopp diisaluma leen moos, waaye samag njublaŋ laa fexee ba nax leen?
2 Corinthians 12:17 ¶ Ndax am na kenn ku ma jëfandikoo, ci ñi ma yebaloon ci yeen, ba lekkal leen lenn?
2 Corinthians 12:18 Maa soññ Tit, ngir mu seetsi leen, te maa yebal mbokk moomu, boole kook moom. Ndax Tit da leena lekkal? Xanaa du maak mooma bokk menn mébét, ak wenn doxalin?
2 Corinthians 12:19 ¶ Mbaa fooguleen ne sunu bopp lanuy layal nii fi seen kanam? Fi kanam Yàlla de lanu waxe, ndax Almasi mi nu gëm, te lépp, soppe yi, seen yokkute la ñeel.
2 Corinthians 12:20 Ragal naa, bu ma dikkee, fekke leen nu ma neexul, yeen it, ngeen gise ma nu leen neexul. Ragal naa ay réeroo ci seen biir ak kiñaan ak mer mu ëpp, ak diiroo mbagg, ak waxi sos aki jëw, ak réy-réylu, akug salfaañoo.
2 Corinthians 12:21 Ragal naa, bu ma dikkee, sama Yàlla ruslooti ma ndax yeen, may tiisoo ñu bare ñu wéye seen bàkkaar ya woon, te tuubuñu jëfi sobe ji, ak powum séy mi, ak yàqute gu af, gi ñu nekke.
2 Corinthians 13:1 ¶ Ñetteel bi yoon a ngii, bu ma leen di ganesi. «Ci kàddug ñaari seede ba ñett nag la àtteb mépp mbir di wére.»
2 Corinthians 13:2 La ma waxoon ba noppi ca sama ñaareelu ngan, tey bi ma wuutee, moom laay baamtu, artoo ko ñi jëkkoona bàkkaar, ak ñi ci des ñépp: su ma délsee, duma ñéeblu kenn,
2 Corinthians 13:3 gannaaw yeenay wut lu firndeel ne ci man la Almasi di waxe ak yeen, te moom néewul kàttan, diggam ak yeen, waaye ku manoorewu la ci seen biir.
2 Corinthians 13:4 Cig néew doole lees ko daaje ci bant ba rey ko, waaye tey ci manoorey Yàlla lay dunde. Nun itam sunug bokk ci Almasi moo tax nu néew doole, waaye ci manoorey Yàlla lanuy bokk ak moom di dund, bu nuy jëflante ak yeen.
2 Corinthians 13:5 ¶ Xoolaatleen seen bopp, ba xam ndax yeena ngi ci yoonu ngëm wi. Nattleen seen bopp, xanaa xam ngeen ne Yeesu Almasee ngi ci yeen? Ndegam du seen gëmadi, la natt ba firndeel!
2 Corinthians 13:6 May yaakaar nag ne nun, dingeen xam ne firndeel nanu sunu taxawaay.
2 Corinthians 13:7 Teewul nuy ñaan Yàlla, ngeen baña def dara lu bon, te ñaanunu loolu am, ngir nu man koo firndeele sunu taxawaay, waaye bu sunub taxawaay doonul woon lu firndewu itam, sunu yéene mooy ngeen di def lu baax.
2 Corinthians 13:8 Ndax kat manunoo def dara ba sot liy dëgg, manunu lu dul liggéeyal liy dëgg.
2 Corinthians 13:9 Bu nu néewee doole, te ngeen am doole, bég nanu. Lii itam, nu ngi koy ñaan, te mooy ngeen yokku ba mat sëkk.
2 Corinthians 13:10 Looloo tax ma bind leen lii bala maa dikk, ba buma dikkee, du jar may mettil ni may jëflante ak yeen, ci kaw sañ-sañ bi ma Boroom bi jox. Ndax kat sañ-sañ bi, yokke moo ko taxa jóg, waaye deesu ko yàqe.
2 Corinthians 13:11 ¶ Ma tëje fii nag, bokk yi, bégleen, yokkuleen ba mat sëkk, ñaaxanteleen, mànkooleen te jàmmoo. Su ko defee Yàlla miy Yàllay cofeel ak jàmm mooy ànd ak yeen.
2 Corinthians 13:12 ¶ Saafoonteeleen fóonante yu sell. Ñu sell ñépp a ngi leen di nuyu.
2 Corinthians 13:13 ¶ Sunu yiwu Sang Yeesu Almasi nag, ak cofeelu Yàlla, ak bennoo geek Noo gu Sell gi, yal nañu bokk ànd ak yeen ñépp.
Galatians 1:1 ¶ Ci man Póol, ndaw li bàyyikoowul ci ay nit, jottliwul yónnentu nit, xanaa Yeesu Almasi, ak Yàlla Baay bi ko dekkal, ci man la kàddu gii bawoo,
Galatians 1:2 bawoo itam ci mboolem bokk yi nekk ak man, ñeel mboolooy gëmkat yu diiwaanu Galasi.
Galatians 1:3 Aw yiw ak jàmm ñeel na leen, tukkee ci Yàlla sunu Baay, ak Sang Yeesu Almasi,
Galatians 1:4 mi maye bakkanam ngir njotug sunuy bàkkaar, ba musal nu ci jamonoy tey ju bon ji, ci coobarey Yàlla sunu Baay,
Galatians 1:5 bi daraja ñeel, tey ak ëllëg ba fàww. Amiin.
Galatians 1:6 ¶ Man de jaaxle naa ci nii ngeen gaawa dëddoo Yàlla mi leen woo ci boppam, ci ndimbalal yiwu Almasi, bay topp xaat beneen xibaaru jàmmeey!
Galatians 1:7 Te beneen dafa amul sax, xanaa ñenn ñi leen di jaxase, te bëgga sopparñi xibaaru jàmm bu Almasi.
Galatians 1:8 Waaye nun ci sunu bopp, mbaa malaaka mu bawoo asamaan sax, ku leen ci àgge woon beneen xibaaru jàmm bu dul bi nu leen àgge, kooku yal na alku!
Galatians 1:9 Wax nanu ko ba noppi, ma waxati ko tey: képp ku leen àgge beneen xibaaru jàmm bu moy bi ngeen xasa jot, yal na alku!
Galatians 1:10 ¶ Léegi nag ndax nit ñi laay sàkkoo jubool, am Yàlla? Am nit ñi laay wuta neex? Su ma bëggoona wéye neex nit ñi de, duma doon jaamub Almasi.
Galatians 1:11 ¶ Bokk yi, ma xamal leen ne leen xibaaru jàmm bi may yégle, bàyyikoowul ci nit.
Galatians 1:12 Te it man jëlewuma ko, jàngewuma ko ci nit, xanaa ci peeñum Yeesu Almasi.
Galatians 1:13 ¶ Ndax kat dégg ngeen ni ma doon jëfe bu jëkk, bi ma nekkee ci yoonu Yawut, bundxatal gu jéggi dayo ga ma daan teg mbooloom gëmkati Yàlla mi, di ko yàq.
Galatians 1:14 Yoonu Yawut, maa ci rawoon ñu bare ci sama maas gi ma bokkal askan, te maa leen gënoona xér fuuf ci sunu aaday maam.
Galatians 1:15 Waaye ca sama biiru ndey la ma Yàlla séddoo, woo ma ci boppam ci kaw yiwam, te moom la soob,
Galatians 1:16 mu feeñalal ma Doomam, ba ma àgge jaambur ñi dul Yawut, xibaaru jàmm bi ci mbirum Almasi. Ci saa si diisoowuma ci ak kenn.
Galatians 1:17 Demuma sax Yerusalem, seeti ñi ma jëkka doon ndawi Almasi, waaye Arabi laa dem, doora délsi Damaas.
Galatians 1:18 ¶ Gannaaw ba ñu ca tegee ñetti at laa doora dem Yerusalem, ngir xamanteji ak Sefas, toog fa moom ñaari ayi bés.
Galatians 1:19 Teewul gisuma kenn ci ndaw yi ci des, ku dul Yanqóoba, rakku Sang bi.
Galatians 1:20 Li ma leen bind nii nag, Yàlla mi nu tiim seere na ne du ay fen.
Galatians 1:21 Gannaaw gi laa dem diiwaani Siri ak Silisi.
Galatians 1:22 Waaye ba boobu, mboolooy gëmkati Almasi ya ca diiwaanu Yude xamuñu ma woon.
Galatians 1:23 Déggoon nañu rekk ñu naan: «Ki nu daan bundxatal bu jëkk, di yàq sunu yoonu ngëm wi de, léegi mooy yégle xibaaru jàmm bi koy xamle!»
Galatians 1:24 Mboolooy gëmkat yooyu nag di sant Yàlla ci man.
Galatians 2:1 ¶ Fukki at ak ñeent gannaaw gi laa dellu Yerusalem, ànd ak Barnaba, yóbbaale Tit itam.
Galatians 2:2 Sama tànk yooyu nag am peeñu moo ko waral. Ca laa wéetoo ak ña ñu jàppoon ne ñooy kàngami mbooloom gëmkat ña, faramfàcceel leen xibaaru jàmm bi may yégal jaambur ñi dul Yawut, ngir ragal sama liggéey bi ma jota def, te di ko wéye, doon coonob neen.
Galatians 2:3 Moonte Tit mi ma àndaloon sax, tegeesu ko fa wartéefu xaraf, te ci askanu gereg yi dul xaraf la bokk.
Galatians 2:4 Doonte booba, ay nit ñu tuddoo bokki gëmkat ñoo yoxoosu ba tàbbi ci sunu biir, di nu yëddu, ngir luqatu ni nu moome sunu bopp ndax Almasi Yeesu mi nu gëm, te li ñu ci jublu di delloo nu ci buumi njaam.
Galatians 2:5 Waaye ñooñu, nangulunu leen lu tollook simili sax, ndax bëgg leena sàmmal yeen, dëggug xibaaru jàmm bi, ba mu sax ci yeen.
Galatians 2:6 ¶ Teewul ñooñu ñu jàppe woon ay kàngam, ak daraja ju ñu masoona am, amalu ma solo, nde Yàlla amul xejj ak seen, ñooñu yokkuñu lenn ci kàddu gi may xamle.
Galatians 2:7 Xanaa kay li ñu gis moo di ni Yàlla yebale Piyeer ngir mu àgge askanu Yawut xibaaru jàmm bi, noonu la ma yebale ngir ma àgge ko jaambur ñi xaraful,
Galatians 2:8 ndax ki liggéey ci Piyeer, ngir mu doon ndawam ci Yawut yi, moo liggéey ci man itam, ngir may ndawam ci yeneen xeet yi.
Galatians 2:9 Ña ñu jàppoon ne ñooy kenuy mbooloom gëmkat ña nag, te ñuy Yanqóoba ak Sefas ak Yowaan, ba ñu ràññee yiw wi ñu ma jagleel, maak Barnaba lañu jox loxo, ngir nun nu liggéeyi ca jaambur ña, te ñoom ñu liggéeyi ci Yawut yi.
Galatians 2:10 Laajuñu lu moy nu fàttliku néew doole yi, te loolu di lu ma pastéefoo jëfe.
Galatians 2:11 ¶ Waaye ba Sefas dikkee Àncos, jàkk laa ko def, weddi ko, ndax moo nekkul woon ci dëgg.
Galatians 2:12 Ndax kat balaa aw nit a dikk, bàyyikoo fa Yanqóoba, Sefas da daan bokk lekk ak jaambur ñi dul Yawut. Waaye ba ñooñu dikkee la rocciku, daldi beddeeku jaambur ñi, ndax ragal waa làng, ga jàpp ne aaday xaraf wartéef la.
Galatians 2:13 Yeneen Yawut ya it di jinigalandoo, ba Barnaba sax lajj topp leen ci seenug jinigal.
Galatians 2:14 ¶ Waaye ba ma gisee ne doxewuñu njub gi dëggug xibaaru jàmm bi laaj, maa wax Sefas ci kanam ñépp, ne ko: «Ndegam yaw miy ab Yawut, yaa jëfewul ni ab Yawut, xanaa di jëfe ni xeeti jaambur ñi, ana lu tax ngay ërtal jaambur ñi dul ay Yawut, ngir ñu yawutal?»
Galatians 2:15 ¶ Nun danoo juddu diy Yawut, te bokkunu ca xeet yee diy bàkkaarkat.
Galatians 2:16 Xam nanu nag ne nit ki, du ci jëfi sàmm ndigali yoon la ko Yàlla di joxe àtteb ku jub, xanaa ci ngëm gu mu gëm Yeesu Almasi. Te nun itam, Almasi Yeesu lanu gëm, ngir Yàlla jox nu àtteb ku jub ci kaw gëm gu nu gëm Almasi, te du ci kaw jëf ju nu sàmme ndigali yoon. Ndax kat du ci jëfi sàmm yoon lees di joxe kenn àtteb ku jub.
Galatians 2:17 ¶ Ba tey su nu dee sàkku àtteb ku jub, ndax li nu gëm Almasi, te teewul nit ñi gis ne nu ngi bàkkaar, nun itam, ndax loolu day wund ne Almasi mooy xiirtale ci bàkkaar? Mukk kay!
Galatians 2:18 Ndaxam su dee tabaxub ndigalu yoon bi ma tojoon, moom laa tabaxaat, maa def sama bopp moykatub yoon.
Galatians 2:19 Su dee wàllu yoonu Musaa nag, man nit ku dee laa, te yoonu Musaa moo ko waral, ngir ma mana dund dund gu ñeel Yàlla. Dees maa boole ak Almasi rey ca bant ba.
Galatians 2:20 Moo tax dootu man maay dund, waaye Almasi mooy dund léegi ci man. Sama dundu yaramu suux wii tey nag, ci ngëm gi ma gëm Doomu Yàlla laa koy dunde, moom mi ma sopp, ba jébbale boppam ngir man.
Galatians 2:21 Duma neenal yiwu Yàlla, ndax kat su doon ci sàmm ndigalu yoon lees di ame àtteb ku jub, konoon Almasi moo dee cig neen.
Galatians 3:1 ¶ Yeen waa Galasi, yeena ñàkk xel! Ku leen gëlëmal, te na Yeesu Almasi deeye ca bant ba di lu ñu leen leeralal ba mu mel ni lu ngeen gise seeni bët?
Galatians 3:2 Lenn rekk laa bëgg ngeen xamal ma ko: ndax ci jëfi sàmm ndigalu yoon ngeen jote Noowug Yàlla gi, am li ngeen dégg xibaaru jàmm bi ba gëm ko moo leen ko may?
Galatians 3:3 Ana nu ngeen mana ñàkke nii xel? Ngeen tàmbalee ci Noo gi, ba noppi di jéema mottlikoo jëfi nitu suuxu neen!
Galatians 3:4 Dangeena dékku yii coono yépp ci neen? Xanaa déet kay!
Galatians 3:5 Ki leen di may Noo gi, tey sottal ay kéemaan ci seen biir, ndax li ngeen sàmm yoon moo tax mu di ko def, am li ngeen dégg, ba gëm moo tax?
Galatians 3:6 ¶ Noonu la Ibraayma gëme Yàlla, «ñu waññal ko ngëmam ag njub.»
Galatians 3:7 Xamleen boog ne nit ñiy boroom ngëm, ñooñu ñooy doomi Ibraayma.
Galatians 3:8 Mbind mi moo waajaloon lu jiitu ne ci kaw ngëm lees di joxe xeet yi dul Yawut, àtteb nit ñu jub. Moo taxoon mu yégal Ibraayma lu jiitu, bii xibaaru jàmm: «Xeeti àddina yépp ci yaw lañuy barkeele,»
Galatians 3:9 ba tax na, boroom ngëm yi lees di booleek Ibraayma miy boroom ngëm, barkeel leen.
Galatians 3:10 ¶ Mboolem ñi yaakaar seen jëf ju ñu sàmme yoonu Musaa, repp nañoo alku, nde bindees na ne: «Alkànde ñeel na képp ku saxoowul mboolem digal yi ñu bind ci téereb yoon wi, ngir di ko jëfe.»
Galatians 3:11 Li sàmm yoon taxul kenn jot àtteb ku jub fi kanam Yàlla sax, lu leer nàññ la, nde: «Ku jub ndax ngëmam mooy dund.»
Galatians 3:12 Yoon wi nag ajuwul ci ngëm, nde: «Kuy jëfe digal yooyu, yaay dund ndax ñoom.»
Galatians 3:13 ¶ Almasi moom, moo nu jot ci alkàndey yoon wi, ba mu doonee ku alku ngir nun, nde: «Alkute ñeel na képp ku ñu rey, wékk ko ci bant.»
Galatians 3:14 Noonu la deme ngir barkeb Ibraayma wàccal xeet yi dul Yawut ndax Almasi Yeesu, ngir itam nu jot ci digeb Noo gu Sell gi, ci kaw ngëm.
Galatians 3:15 ¶ Bokk yi, ma misaale ko mbiri doom Aadama. Kayitub donale bu nit doŋŋ bind, su dee lu wóor, deesu ko neenal, mbaa di ci yokk dara.
Galatians 3:16 Te Ibraayma lañu digoon dige yi mook ki taxawal askanam. Newuñu: «ñi taxawal ay askanam», mbete ñu bare lañuy wax, waaye wenn rekk la: «ki taxawal askanam,» te ki taxawal askanam moo di Almasi.
Galatians 3:17 Li ma ciy wax mooy lii: kóllëreg Yàlla gi taxawe ni kayitu donale gu mu dëggal, yoonu Musaa, wi dikk ñeenti téeméeri at ak fanweer gannaaw kóllëre gi, manu koo neenal, ba fomm digeb Yàlla.
Galatians 3:18 Su doon ci yoonu Musaa la ndonale ga aju, kon dootul doon lu digeb Yàlla waral. Waaye ci kaw ab dige la Yàlla baaxee Ibraayma aw yiwam.
Galatians 3:19 ¶ Waaw kon yoonu Musaa, ana luy njariñam? Dees koo toftal ca dige ba, ngir muy fésal moyi nit ñi ba keroog boroom dige, bi taxawal askanu Ibraayma, dikk. Ay malaaka ñoo biral yoon wi, ci ndimbalal ab jottlikat.
Galatians 3:20 Ab jottlikat nag ñaar a koy séq, te Yàlla kenn doŋŋ la.
Galatians 3:21 ¶ Ndax kon yoonu Musaa dafa juuyoo ak digey Yàlla? Mukk kay. Ndax kat su fekkoon ne dañoo maye wenn yoon wu mana may nit ku ko sàmm, mu dund, konoon àtteb ku jub fi kanam Yàlla mana jóge dëgg ci sàmm gu nit ki sàmm yoon wi.
Galatians 3:22 Waaye mbind mi biral na ne mboolem àddina moo tënku ci kilifteefu bàkkaar, ngir dige bi gëm Yeesu Almasi di jagle, mana dikkal aji gëm ñi.
Galatians 3:23 ¶ Balaa yoonu ngëm wee dikk, dees noo jàppoon tënk ci yoonu Musaa, ba kera yoonu ngëm wi feeñee.
Galatians 3:24 Noonu la yoonu Musaa doone sunu njaatige, tette nu ba ci Almasi, ngir nu jagoo àtteb nit ñu jub ci kaw ngëm.
Galatians 3:25 Waaye léegi, bi yoonu ngëm wi dikkee, nekkatunu ci kilifteefu njaatige.
Galatians 3:26 ¶ Yeen ñépp doomi Yàlla ngeen, ndax li ngeen gëm Almasi Yeesu.
Galatians 3:27 Ndax kat mboolem yeen ñi ñu sóob sóobeb Almasi, jëmmu Almasi ngeen soloo.
Galatians 3:28 Kon nag amul Yawut ak ku dul Yawut, amul ab jaam ak as gor, amul góor ak jigéen. Yeen ñépp benn ngeen ci Almasi Yeesu.
Galatians 3:29 Te su ngeen bokkee ci Almasi, yeen ay askanu Ibraayma, te yeena jagoo dige ba.
Galatians 4:1 ¶ Li ma leen di wax nag mooy lii: boroom ndono li ci kër gi, li feek mu dib tuut-tànk, wuutewul akub jaam, doonte moo moom lépp.
Galatians 4:2 Ci kilifteefu ay wattukat aki saytukat lay nekk ba kera mu àggee ca at ya ko baayam àppaloon.
Galatians 4:3 Nun itam naka noonu, ba nu dee ay tuut-tànk yu nekk ci kilifteefu mbiri àddina, ay jaam lanu woon.
Galatians 4:4 Waaye ba àpp ba jotee, Yàlla moo yónni Doomam, mu juddoo ci jigéen, juddoo ci biir curgag yoonu Musaa,
Galatians 4:5 ngir jot ñi ci curgag yoon wi, ba nu jagoo cérub doom.
Galatians 4:6 Li ngeen diy doom nag tax na Yàlla yebal Noowug Doomam ci seen biir xol, ba Noo gi naan: «Abba», mu firi Baay.
Galatians 4:7 Moo tax dootuloo ab jaam, doom nga. Gannaaw doom nga nag, boroom cér nga it fa Yàlla sa baay.
Galatians 4:8 ¶ Bu jëkk, ba ngeen xamul Yàlla, ay yàlla yu dul dëgg ngeen daan jaamu.
Galatians 4:9 Waaye léegi bi ngeen xamee Yàlla, mbaa bi leen Yàlla ràññee, nu ngeen mana delluwaate ci mbiri àddina yooyu boole tële ak ñàkk njariñ, bay nekkaat seeni jaam?
Galatians 4:10 Yeena ngi wormaal yenn bés yi, aki weer, ak ay fan, aki at!
Galatians 4:11 Li may ragal ci yeen daal mooy sama coono ci yeen neen.
Galatians 4:12 ¶ Yeen laay tinu, bokk yi, mel-leen ni man, ci yooyu mbir, ndax man itam ni yeen laa mel. Tooñuleen ma benn yoon.
Galatians 4:13 Xam ngeen ne tëleg yaram moo ma mayoon yoon wa ma leen jëkka àgge xibaaru jàmm bi.
Galatians 4:14 Nattu ba leen sama woppi yaram tegoon it taxul ngeen jéppi ma, taxul ngeen beddi ma. Ni malaakam Yàlla ngeen ma dalale, mbaa ni Yeesu Almasi
Galatians 4:15 Ana seen mbég mooma woon nag? Ndax kat maa leen seedeel ne su manoona am sax, seeni bët ngeen di luqi, jox ma.
Galatians 4:16 Xanaa li ma leen di wax dëgg daa tax ma mujj di seenub noon?
Galatians 4:17 ¶ Yitte ju réy ji ñenn ñiy taqoo ak yeen de, jubluwuñu ci lu baax. Dañu leena bëgga tàggale ak nun, ba ngeen taq leen.
Galatians 4:18 Yitte ju réy ju ñu am ci nit ki nag, ndegam lu baax lees ci jublu, saa su nekk lay baax, waaye du rekk saa yu ma teewee ci seen biir.
Galatians 4:19 Yeen samay doom! Maa ngi dellooti ci mat wu ma leen jure woon ni jigéen, ba keroog Almasi mate sëkk ci yeen.
Galatians 4:20 Maaka bëggoona nekk ak yeen tey, ba gëna misaale sama baat, nde jàq naa lool ci yeen!
Galatians 4:21 ¶ Waxleen ma, yeen ñi bëgga nekk ci kilifteefu yoonu Musaa, xanaa xamuleen li yoon wi wax?
Galatians 4:22 Bindees na ne Ibraayma ñaari doom yu góor la am; kenn ki jaam bi jur, ak ki gor si jur.
Galatians 4:23 Doomu jaam bi moo juddu ci kaw coobarey bakkanu nit, waaye ki gor si jur, ci kaw digeb Yàlla la juddu.
Galatians 4:24 ¶ Mbir mi misaal a ngi ci. Ñaari jigéen ñi ñaari kóllëre lay bijji. Genn kóllëre gi bawoo tundu Sinayi moo meññ lu ñeel njaam, te kooku mooy Ajara.
Galatians 4:25 Ajara moomu mooy tundu Sinayi, wa ca réewum Arabi, te moo taxawe Yerusalem gii tey, dëkk bii dib jaam mook doomam yi ko dëkke.
Galatians 4:26 Waaye Yerusalem, ga fa kaw, mooy gor si, te moom mooy sunu ndey.
Galatians 4:27 Ndax kat bindees na ne: «Yaw mi jaasir, ba juroo, xaacul, yaw mi xamul mititu mat, sarxolleel, nde ndaw si ñu foñ moo gëna jaboot kiy séy.»
Galatians 4:28 ¶ Yeen nag bokk yi, yeenay doomi digeb Yàlla, ni ko Isaaxa doone.
Galatians 4:29 Waaye doom ji juddoo ci coobarey bakkan, noonu mu daan bundxatale, bu jëkkoon, doom ji juddoo ci Noowug Yàlla, noonu rekk lay deme ba tey jii.
Galatians 4:30 Te lu ci Mbind mi wax? Mu ne: «Dàqal jaam bu jigéen bii ak doomam, ndax doomu jaam bi du donnandoo ak doomu gor si.»
Galatians 4:31 Kon nag bokk yi, nun dunu doomi jaam bi, waaye nooy doomi gor si.
Galatians 5:1 ¶ Almasi da noo yiwi, ngir nu yiwiku, kon nag saxooleen ko, te baña laxasooti buumi njaam.
Galatians 5:2 ¶ Dama ne, man Póol maa leen wax ne leen: su ngeen demee ba ñu xarfal leen kay, Almasi amalatu leen lenn njariñ.
Galatians 5:3 Ma artooti képp ku dem ba ñu xarfal ko, ne ko mboolem yoon wi la wara jëfe.
Galatians 5:4 Yeen ñiy sàmm yoonu Musaa, di ko sàkkoo àtteb njub fa kanam Yàlla, daggoo ngeen ak Almasi, ñàkk ngeen yiwu Yàlla.
Galatians 5:5 Ndax nun kat, ci ndimbalal Noo gi, ak ci sunu kaw ngëm lanu yaakaare ñu jox nu àtteb njub bi nuy séentu.
Galatians 5:6 Ci Almasi Yeesu mi nu gëm, xaraf ak ñàkka xaraf, dara amu ci solo; li am solo mooy ngëm, gi jëfi cofeel di firndeel.
Galatians 5:7 ¶ Seen njàlbéenu xél de baax na! Ana ku leen gàllankoor ba toppuleen dëgg gi?
Galatians 5:8 Loolu leen fàbbi de jógewul ci ki leen woo.
Galatians 5:9 As lawiir, tooyalub sunguf bépp lay funkil.
Galatians 5:10 Man de gëm naa ndax Boroom bi, ne dungeen wuuteek man xalaat benn yoon ci lii. Waaye kiy jaxase seenum xel, ak ku mu mana doon, mooy gàddu mbugalam.
Galatians 5:11 Man nag bokk yi, su ma dee xiirtale ci xaraf, ana lees may bundxataleeti? Konoon kay sama waareb deewu Almasi ca bant ba dootu doon ag tooñ ci kenn.
Galatians 5:12 Ñi leen di lëjal ak waxi xaraf, nañu xuuf boog seen ngóorag bopp benn yoon!
Galatians 5:13 ¶ Yeen de bokk yi, cig yiwiku lees leen woo. Moytuleen lenn rekk: bu seenug yiwiku diw lay, ngir topp seen bakkan, waaye deeleen surgawoonte ngir cofeel.
Galatians 5:14 Ndax yoonu Musaa wépp, ci lenn ndigal lii la tënku: «Ni ngeen soppe seen bopp, nangeen ko soppe seen moroom.»
Galatians 5:15 Waaye su ngeen dee màttante ak a lekkante kat, moytuleena far yàqante yaxeet!
Galatians 5:16 ¶ Li ma leen di wax moo di: doxeleen Noowug Yàlla, su boobaa dungeen topp seen xemmemtéefi bakkan.
Galatians 5:17 Ndax bakkan, la muy xemmem, daa dëngoo ak Noo gi; Noo gi it, la muy xemmem dëngoo ak bakkan. Dañu di yaar yu féewaloo, te moo tax dungeen def la ngeen nammoona def.
Galatians 5:18 Waaye su leen Noo gi jiitee, su boobaa nekkatuleen ci kilifteefu yoon wi.
Galatians 5:19 ¶ Jëfi bakkan nag yomb naa xàmmi, te mooy: powum séy, ak jëfi sobe, ak yàqute,
Galatians 5:20 ak bokkaale, ak xërëm, ak mbañeel, ak féewaloo, ak kiñaan, ak mer mu ëpp, ak jiital say bëgg-bëgg, ak réeroo, ak xàjjalikoo,
Galatians 5:21 ak ñeetaane, ak màndite, ak mbumbaay, ak yeneen yu ni mel. Ma àrtu leen nag na ma leen artoo woon, ñiy jëfe noonu, amuñu cér ci nguurug Yàlla.
Galatians 5:22 ¶ Meññeefum Noowug Yàlla nag moo di: cofeel, ak mbég, ak jàmm, ak xolu muñ, ak mbaax, akug tabe, ak ngëm,
Galatians 5:23 akug teey, ak moom sa bakkan. Yu mel noonu, wenn yoon bañu ko.
Galatians 5:24 Ñi bokk ci Almasi Yeesu nag, ñoo daaj ca bantam ba, seen bakkan, daajaale ko ak sàkkuteefam yu tar, aki xemmemtéefam.
Galatians 5:25 Gannaaw nag Noowug Yàlla moo nu dundal, nanu topp Noo gi.
Galatians 5:26 Bunu di yég sunu bopp, di merloonte ak a iñaanante.
Galatians 6:1 ¶ Bokki gëmkat ñi, su ñu bettee nit ci ag tooñ, yeen ñi topp Noowug Yàlla, waññileen ko ndànk, te kenn ku nekk ci yeen xoolaat boppam bu baax, ngir seen bakkan bañ leena xiirtal, ba ngeen daanu ci fiir gu ni mel.
Galatians 6:2 Yennikoonteleen seeni yen, su boobaa ngeen di topp yoonu Almasi ba mu mat sëkk.
Galatians 6:3 Ku foog ne moo am solo, te du dara nag, boppam lay nax.
Galatians 6:4 Ku ci nekk, jëfi boppam, na ko niir. Su ci amee lenn lu mu mana sagoo, na ko yemale ci boppam, te baña sagoo lenni boppam lu mu xool ci ñeneen,
Galatians 6:5 nde ku nekk ak sa añu jëfi bopp.
Galatians 6:6 ¶ Ki ñuy jàngal kàddug Yàlla nag war naa sédd ki koy jàngal ci mboolem alalam.
Galatians 6:7 ¶ Bu leen lenn nax; Yàlla deesu ko foontoo. Nit ki, li mu ji, moom lay góob.
Galatians 6:8 Ku jiyal bànneexu bakkanam, ci bànneexu bakkanam lay jële ngóobum yàqute; ku jiyal Noowug Yàlla, ci Noo gi ngay góobe texe gu sax dàkk.
Galatians 6:9 Bunu tàyyi ci def lu baax, nde bu jotee rekk nooy góob, ndegam yoqiwunu.
Galatians 6:10 Kon nag bi nu koy jekku, nanuy def lu baax, ngir ñépp, rawatina waa kër yoonu ngëm wi.
Galatians 6:11 ¶ Seetluleen mbind mi; ci araf yu mag yii ngeen wara xàmmee, ne sama loxol bopp laa ko binde!
Galatians 6:12 ¶ Ñi leen di gétën ci xaraf mooy ñi ngistal tax ñu bëgg nit ñi gërëme leen seen melow yaram, te jubluwuñu ci lu moy ragal ku leen bundxatal ndax deewug Almasi gi ñuy xamle ne mooy taxa mucc.
Galatians 6:13 Ñi xaraf ñoom ci seen bopp sax toppuñu yoon wi. Teewul ñu bëgg ngeen xaraf, ngir mana damoo seen màndargam yaram, yeen ñi ñu xarafloo.
Galatians 6:14 Waaye man de Yàlla buma damoo lenn lu moy deewug sunu Boroom Yeesu Almasi ca bant ba. Bant boobu moo tax àddina di lu ñu ma daajal ci bant, ba àddina dee; man it may lu ñu daajal àddina ci bant ba ma dee.
Galatians 6:15 Xaraf ak ñàkka xaraf, dara amu ci solo. Li am solo mooy doon mbindeef mu bees.
Galatians 6:16 Mboolem ñiy sàmm ndigal lii nag, te di Israyilu Yàlla, jàmm ak yërmande ñeel na leen.
Galatians 6:17 ¶ Li ci des moo di gannaaw-si-tey, bu ma kenn lëjalati, ndax légét yi ci sama yaram, samag bokk ci Yeesu la màndargaal.
Galatians 6:18 ¶ Bokk yi, yal na sunu yiwu Boroom Yeesu Almasi ànd ak seenum xel. Amiin.
Ephesians 1:1 ¶ Ci man Póol, ndawal Almasi Yeesu ci coobarey Yàlla, ci man la kàddu gii bawoo, ñeel ñu sell ña ca Efes te di ñu sàmm seen kóllëre ak Almasi Yeesu.
Ephesians 1:2 Aw yiw ak jàmm ñeel na leen, bawoo fa Yàlla sunu Baay, ak Sang Yeesu Almasi.
Ephesians 1:3 ¶ Cant ñeel na Yàlla sunu Baayu Sang Yeesu Almasi, mi nu baaxe bépp barkey biir, ci Almasi mi nu bokk, fa déndi asamaan ya.
Ephesians 1:4 Te mooy noonu mu nu taamoo ba àddina sosoogul ndax Almasi mi nu bokk, ngir nu doon ñu sell te mucc sikk fa kanamam. Ci biir cofeel
Ephesians 1:5 la dogaloon lu jiitu, ne ci Yeesu Almasi la nuy defe ay doomi boppam, te muy bànneexam, di coobareem.
Ephesians 1:6 Moo tax cant ñeel ko, ndax yiwam wu màgg wi mu nu baawaanal ci Soppeem bi.
Ephesians 1:7 ¶ Ci moom lanu ame njot gi nu sottalal njéggalug moy, ndax deretam ji tuuru, noonu ko Yàlla defe ci yiwam wu yaa,
Ephesians 1:8 wi mu nu baawaanal, mayaale nu mépp xel mu rafet akug dégg.
Ephesians 1:9 Moo nu xamal mbóotum coobareem, mi mu nammoona sottale naka jekk ci Almasi, na mu ko neexe.
Ephesians 1:10 Li Yàlla namm, bu fan yi matee, moo di dajale lépp ci kilifteefu Almasi, mboolem la fa asamaan, ak li fi suuf.
Ephesians 1:11 Ci moom lanu jote sunu muur ci kaw dogalu Yàlla mi nu taamu lu jiitu, moom miy sottal lépp ni mu ko namme ci coobareem.
Ephesians 1:12 Moo tax nu di ko sante màggaayam, nun ñi jëkka wékk sunu yaakaar ci Almasi.
Ephesians 1:13 ¶ Kooku, yeen ñi dul Yawut, ba ngeen déggee, yeen itam kàddug dëgg gi, xibaaru jàmm, bi jëm ci seenug mucc, gannaaw ba ngeen gëmee, ci moom itam lañu leen màndargaale Noo gu Sell gi ñu dige woon.
Ephesians 1:14 Noo gi moo di dawal bi nu jotagum ci sunu muur, ba kera njotug ñoñi Yàlla matee, ba nit ñi sante Yàlla màggaayam.
Ephesians 1:15 ¶ Moo tax man it, bi ma déggee ba tey, seen ngëm ci Sang Yeesu, ak seen cofeel ci ñu sell ñépp,
Ephesians 1:16 noppiwumaa sant Yàlla ndax yeen, te maa ngi leen di fàttliku ci samay ñaan,
Ephesians 1:17 ngir Yàllay sunu Sang Yeesu Almasi, Baay bu màgg bi, sol leen xel mu rafet, ak ngis, ngir ngeen man koo xam bu baax.
Ephesians 1:18 Ngir itam seen bëti xol leer ba ngeen gis yaakaar ji ci wooteem, ak ni ay ngëneelam géejoo te yéeme, ñeel ñu sell ñi mu séddoo.
Ephesians 1:19 Ngeen boole ci xam manooreem gu nattuwul gi mu nu lañalal, nun gëmkat ñi. Manoore googu feeñ na ci jëf ji sottee ci kàttanam ak dooleem,
Ephesians 1:20 ji mu fésal ci Almasi, ba mu ko dekkalee, dëël ko ci ndijooram, fa déndi asamaan.
Ephesians 1:21 Foofa la Almasi tiime lu sore gépp nguur, ak bépp sañ-sañ, ak gépp manoore, ak gépp kilifteef, ak wépp tur wees di tudd, muy tey, di ëllëg.
Ephesians 1:22 Yàlla moo teg lépp fi suufu ndëgguy tànkam, te moo ko def muy bopp bi tiim lépp, ñeel mbooloom gëmkat ñi,
Ephesians 1:23 mbooloo miy aw yaramam. Ci mbooloo mi nag la Almasi teewe teewaay bu mat sëkk, te Almasi mooy matal lépp ci ñépp.
Ephesians 2:1 ¶ Yeen dangeena dee woon ndax seeni moy ak seeni bàkkaar,
Ephesians 2:2 yi ngeen doon dunde démb, ngeen àndoon ci ak doxalinu àddinay tey jii, ak ku bon kiy kàngamu boroom baat yi ci jaww, ji asamaan tiim, boroom noo gi wéye liggéeyam ci biir aji déggadi ñi, tey.
Ephesians 2:3 Ci ñoom lanu bokkoon nun ñépp itam; mas nanoo topp sunu bakkan, di jëfe lu sunu bakkan, ak sunum xel xemmem. Sunu bindu nit taxoon na noo yeyoo am sànj ni ñépp.
Ephesians 2:4 ¶ Waaye Yàlla mi bare yërmande, ci kaw cofeel gu réy, gi mu nu sopp,
Ephesians 2:5 nun ñi doon nit ñu dee ba noppi ndax sunuy moy, moo nu booleek Almasi, dundalaat nu. Ci kaw yiw daal ngeen mucce.
Ephesians 2:6 Ci sunu bokk ak Yeesu Almasi la nu Yàlla dekkalandoo ak moom, dëëlandoo nook moom fa déndi asamaan.
Ephesians 2:7 Mbaax gi nu Yàlla won ci Almasi Yeesu, moom lay firndeele mboolem xarnu yiy ñëw, ni yiwam yaatoo ba tiiñ am xel.
Ephesians 2:8 Ndax kat ci yiw ngeen mucce ci kaw ngëm, te loolu jógewul ci yeen, mayu Yàlla la;
Ephesians 2:9 du peyu jëf, ba kenn di ci kañu.
Ephesians 2:10 Ndax kat noo di liggéeyu Yàlla; Yàllaa nu yeesal ci Almasi Yeesu, ngir nu wéye jëf ju rafet, ja mu nu fàgguloon ca njàlbéen, ngir nu di ko jëfe.
Ephesians 2:11 ¶ Kon nag, yeen jaambur ñi dul Yawut cib juddu, yeen ñi ñuy wooye yéefar yi xaraful, te ñi leen ko dàkkantale woon di Yawut yi xarafe ci loxol nit ku leen xarfal ci seen yaram, fàttlikuleen seen démb.
Ephesians 2:12 Jant yooyu amuleen woon benn cér ci Almasi, te amuleen woon jenn yelleef ci mbootaayu bànni Israyil. Bokkuleen woon ci kóllëre yi ëmb digeb Yàlla, te mu fasoo ko ak ñoom. Ñàkk yaakaar, ak ñàkka xam Yàlla ngeen nekke woon ci àddina.
Ephesians 2:13 Waaye yeen ñi sore woon, léegi bi ngeen nekkee ci Almasi Yeesu, jege ngeen ndax deretu Almasi ji tuuru.
Ephesians 2:14 ¶ Ndaxte moom mooy sunu jàmm, moom mi boole ñaar, Yawut bi ak jaambur bi dul Yawut, def leen kenn. Ci suuxu yaramam wa ñu daaj la ñàggee ñagu mbañeel bi doxoon sunu diggante.
Ephesians 2:15 Yoonu Musaa ak santaane yaak ndigal ya, moom la xewil, ngir yeesal ñaar ñi, Yawut beek jaambur bi, ci jenn jëmmu boppam, ñu doon kenn nit ku yees, ba jàmmoo.
Ephesians 2:16 Ñaar ñi la Almasi boole ci jenn jëmm, jubale leen ak Yàlla, ca bant ba ñu ko daajoon, te bant ba la dakkale sunub tongoo.
Ephesians 2:17 Moo dikke xibaaru jàmm buy yégle jàmm ju leen ñeel, yeen jaambur ñi ko sore woon, te ñeel nu, nun ñi ko jege,
Ephesians 2:18 ndax nun ñaari xeet yépp, ci moom Almasi lanu jote ci Baay bi, ci ndimbalal genn Noo gi.
Ephesians 2:19 ¶ Kon nag dootuleen ay gan mbaa ay doxandéem, waaye ay nawley ñu sell ñi ngeen, te waa kër Yàlla ngeen.
Ephesians 2:20 Yeena di tabax, bi ndawi Almasi ak yonent yi di kenu gi, te Almasi Yeesu ci boppam di doju coll wi.
Ephesians 2:21 Ci moom la tabax bi bépp di temboo, ba jóg, doon jaamookaay bu sell ngir Boroom bi.
Ephesians 2:22 Ci Almasi ngeen bokke ci tabax bi, yeen jaambur ñi itam, ba mana doon dëkkuwaayu Yàlla, ci ndimbalal Noo gu Sell gi.
Ephesians 3:1 ¶ Moo ma tax di ñaan, man Póol mi ñu tëj ngir Almasi, ndax ñi dul Yawut, yeen jaambur ñi,
Ephesians 3:2 ndegam yég ngeen sas wi ma Yàlla sas ciw yiwam, ñeel leen.
Ephesians 3:3 Ci am peeñu lañu ma xamale mbóot mi, noonu ma leen ko tënkale woon ci bataaxal.
Ephesians 3:4 Bu ngeen jàngee loolu, dingeen ràññee bu baax, ni ma dégge mbóot mi ci mbirum Almasi.
Ephesians 3:5 Moomu mbóot, xamaleesu ko woon doom aadama yi, ca janti maas ya woon, ni ñu ko feeñalale tey, ñu sell ñi diy ndawam ak yonent yi, ci ndimbalal Noo gu Sell gi,
Ephesians 3:6 ba mu leer ne jaambur ñi dul Yawut ñooy bokk ak Yawut yi benn cér bi, ñooy doon wenn yaram, te ñooy bokk benn dige bi ci Almasi Yeesu, ni ko xibaaru jàmm bi xamlee.
Ephesians 3:7 ¶ Xibaaru jàmm boobu lañu ma def ab jawriñam, te Yàlla, ciw yiwam, moo jëfe manooreem, ba jagleel ma boobu cér.
Ephesians 3:8 Man mi yées ci ñu sell ñépp lañu may woowu yiw, ba may xibaar jaambur ñi dul Yawut, xéewal yu amul kem yi ci Almasi.
Ephesians 3:9 May niital ñépp, ni Yàlla nara sottale mébétam, miy mbóot mu làqu woon naka jekk fa moom Yàlla mi sos lépp.
Ephesians 3:10 Su ko defee boroom nguur yeek boroom sañ-sañ ya fa déndi asamaan, mana xame ci mbooloom gëmkati Almasi, ni xelum Yàlla rafete ci wet gu nekk.
Ephesians 3:11 Loolu moo doon naka jekk nammeelam gi mu sottale ci Almasi Yeesu sunub Sang.
Ephesians 3:12 Ci Yeesu, ci kaw ngëm gu nu ko gëm lanu ñemee àgge fit wu mat sëkk, fa kanam Yàlla.
Ephesians 3:13 Kon nag dama leen di ñaan, ngeen baña yoqi ngir coono, yi may sonn ndax yeen; lépp seen teraanga la.
Ephesians 3:14 ¶ Looloo ma taxa sukk sama bëti óom, janook Baay bi,
Ephesians 3:15 ki gépp njabootug asamaan ak suuf, jële aw tur.
Ephesians 3:16 May ñaan nag, mu may leen, ci koomu teraangaam, seen jëmmu biir feddlikoo kàttanu Noowam gu Sell.
Ephesians 3:17 Su ko defee seen ngëm tax Almasi dëkke seen xol, ngeen sax ay reen yu sampe ci biir cofeel,
Ephesians 3:18 ngir yeen ak mboolem ñu sell ñi, seenum xel mana jàpp, ni mu leen ware, luy yaatuwaayub cofeelu Almasi, ak guddaay ba, ak kawewaay ba, ak xóotaay ba.
Ephesians 3:19 Ngeen boole ci daj cofeelu Almasi, gi wees xam-xam, ngir ngeen fees, ba fees dell ak koomu Yàlla.
Ephesians 3:20 ¶ Moom mi mana jëfoo kàttan giy liggéey ci nun, ba sottal mboolem lu nu ñaan ak lu nu xalaat, ba wees loola fuuf sax,
Ephesians 3:21 moo yelloo daraja ci biir mbooloom gëmkat ñi, ak ci Almasi Yeesu, tey ak ëllëg, ba fàww. Amiin.
Ephesians 4:1 ¶ Dama leen di dénku nag, man mi ñu tëj ndax Sang bi, ngir ngeen dund dundin wu yellook wooteb Yàlla, bi mu leen woo.
Ephesians 4:2 Saxooleen woyof, lewet, te deeleen muñ, di muñalante ngir cofeel.
Ephesians 4:3 Defleen seen kem kàttan, ngir di jàmmoo, ba mana sàmm seenug bennoo ci biir Noo gi ngeen bokk.
Ephesians 4:4 ¶ Wenn yaram a fi nekk, ak genn Noo, ak jenn yaakaar ju leen wooteb Yàlla jëme.
Ephesians 4:5 Benn Sang bi la it, ak genn ngëm, ak genn sóobu cim ndox.
Ephesians 4:6 Te it jenn Yàllaa am; mooy Baayu ñépp, moo tiim ñépp, di jëf ci ñépp te nekk ci ñépp.
Ephesians 4:7 ¶ Waaye ku nekk ci nun ak mayam, ci yiwu Yàlla, ni ko nattub Almasi séddalee.
Ephesians 4:8 Moo tax ñu ne: «Moo yéeg fa kawa kaw, yóbbaale gàngoor gu mu jàppe xare, te moo séddale nit ñi ay may.»
Ephesians 4:9 Li ñu ne «moo yéeg,» ana lu mu tekki lu moy wàccoon na it ba fu gëna suufe?
Ephesians 4:10 Kooku wàccoon mooy kenn ki yéegaat ba tiim asamaan yépp, ngir def lépp feese jëmmam.
Ephesians 4:11 Moo may ñii di ay ndawam, ñee di ay yonent, ñee di ay xamlekati xibaaru jàmm bi, ñale di ay sàmmi mbooloom gëmkat ñi, mbaa ay jànglekat.
Ephesians 4:12 Almasi moo waajale noonu ñu sell ñi, ba ñu mana bey seen sas ci liggéeyam, ngir tabax mbooloom gëmkat, mi taxawe yaramu Almasi.
Ephesians 4:13 Su ko defee nu mana màgg nun ñépp ba doon benn ci ngëm, ak ci xam-xam bu mat ci Doomu Yàlla ji, ba kera nuy doon magum jëmm, bay tollook taxawaayu Almasi bi mat sëkk.
Ephesians 4:14 ¶ Su boobaa nu noppee doon ay tuut-tànk yu nit ñiy muusaatoo kàddu yu mel ni gannax yu nuy baaje, ak ngelawal mboolem àlluwa ju bees ju nuy pamti-pamtee ci seen biir pexey naxe ak njublaŋ, ngir fàbbi nu.
Ephesians 4:15 Su boobaa kay, dëgg gu nu wodde cofeel lanuy wéye, tey màgg ci bépp fànn, ci moom Almasi miy bopp bi.
Ephesians 4:16 Ci moom miy bopp bi la yaram wépp di déggoo, témboo ndax ndimbalal mboolem tenqo yi koy saytu, na mu dëppook wàllu cér bu ci nekk. Su ko defee yaram wiy yokku, di màgg ci biir cofeel.
Ephesians 4:17 ¶ Lii nag maa leen ko wax, te di ko biral ci turu Boroom bi: Ni xeeti yéefar yiy jëfe, topp seen xalaat yu tekkiwul dara, buleen jëfeeti noonu.
Ephesians 4:18 Seenum xel a tàbbi ag lëndëm, ñu tumurànke dundin wi Yàlla di maye, te umple gi ci ñoom moo tax, ndax seenug dëgër bopp.
Ephesians 4:19 Dañoo mujj dërkiis, yebu ci topp seen bakkan, ba xaabaabal ci jépp jëfi sobe.
Ephesians 4:20 ¶ Yeen nag du loolu ngeen jànge ci Almasi,
Ephesians 4:21 ndegam kay Yeesu ci boppam ngeen dégg mbiram, ba jànge ci moom, dëgg gi bawoo ci moom,
Ephesians 4:22 te mooy ngeen ba seen jikko ju jëkk ja, ngeen teqlikoo ak seen jëmmu démb ja masa topp bànneexi bakkan yuy naxe, ba sóobu ci yàqute.
Ephesians 4:23 Su ko defee ngeen mana yeeslu ci seenum xel, ci ndimbalal Noo gi,
Ephesians 4:24 te ngeen soloo jëmm ju yees ji Yàlla sàkke ci takkndeeram, di jëfe njub, ak sellnga ji dëgg di jur.
Ephesians 4:25 ¶ Kon nag bàyyileen fen, te ku nekk di wax sa moroom, dëgg, ndax ku nekk ci yeen sab céru moroom nga.
Ephesians 4:26 Buleen mer ba bàkkaar, te bu jant bi sowe seen mer;
Ephesians 4:27 buleen xajal Seytaane.
Ephesians 4:28 Sàcc bi, na ba sàcc te nangoo sonn, di liggéeye loxoom liggéey bu rafet, ba man cee dimbali néew-ji-doole ji.
Ephesians 4:29 ¶ Bu genn kàddu gu bon génne seen gémmiñ, xanaa su ko jaree ngeen wax lu baax, luy jariñe, te diw yiw ci ñi koy dégg.
Ephesians 4:30 Te it buleen tiisal Noowug Yàlla gu Sell, gi leen màndargaale xàmmikaayam ngir bésub njot ba.
Ephesians 4:31 Lépp luy wextan, ak naqari deret, ak mer mu ëpp, ak coow, ak wax ju ñaaw, na lépp buube, ba génne ci seen biir, mook mboolem jëfi coxor.
Ephesians 4:32 Baaxleen ci seen diggante, di ñeewantante, tey balante, ni leen Yàlla baale ci Almasi.
Ephesians 5:1 ¶ Kon nag doonleen ay roykati Yàlla, gannaaw yeenay doomam yi mu sopp,
Ephesians 5:2 te ngeen di doxale cofeel, ni Almasi mi nu sopp, ba jooxeel nu bakkanam, def ko saraxu sawara, ngir xetug jàmm, ñeel Yàlla.
Ephesians 5:3 ¶ Lu jëm nag ci powum séy, ak jépp jëfi sobe, mbaa ag bëgge, li jekk ci ay nit ñu sell, moo di ñu bañ koo tudd sax ci seen biir,
Ephesians 5:4 te ag ñàkk kersa, ak waxi caaxaan, ak kaf yu bon, dara jekku ci, waaye saxooleen kàdduy cant.
Ephesians 5:5 Ndax lii kat na leen wóor: képp ku nekke powum séy, mbaa jëfi sobe, mbaa ag bëgge, kooku amul cér ci nguurug Almasi ak Yàlla, ndax ku bëgge ab bokkaalekat la.
Ephesians 5:6 ¶ Bu leen kenn naxe waxi ngelawal neen, ndax yooyu ma lim mooy wàcce sànjum Yàlla ci kaw aji déggadi ñi.
Ephesians 5:7 Kon nag buleen séq ak ñooñu dara.
Ephesians 5:8 Ag lëndëm ngeen woon démb, waaye tey ag leer ngeen ci Boroom bi ngeen bokk. Jëfeleen nag ni niti leer.
Ephesians 5:9 Li leer gi ci yeen di meññ moo di mboolem luy mbaax ak njub ak dëgg.
Ephesians 5:10 Ràññeeleen li neex Boroom bi;
Ephesians 5:11 jëfi lëndëm amul njariñ, buleen ci bokk, xanaa ngeen feeñal ñaawtéefu jëf ja.
Ephesians 5:12 Ndax kat li nit ñooñu di làquy def, waxtaane ko sax, lu ruslu la.
Ephesians 5:13 Waaye mboolem lu ñu feeñal, leer ga ñu ko leerale moo ko wone,
Ephesians 5:14 te lépp lu ñu wone ci ag leer, di ag leer. Moo tax ñu ne: «Yaw miy nelaw, yewwul, dekkil, Almasi leeral la.»
Ephesians 5:15 ¶ Kon nag xool-leen bu baax seen jëfin, defleen jëfinu nit ñu am xel, te baña mel ni ñu ñàkk xel,
Ephesians 5:16 Jariñooleen lu ngeen man, jot gi ngeen amagum, ndax jant yu bona ngii tey.
Ephesians 5:17 Moo tax buleen def jëfi ñàkk bopp, waaye jéemleena xam coobarey Boroom bi.
Ephesians 5:18 Buleen naan biiñ ba màndi, màndite ci afal seen bakkan la leen jëme, waaye na leen Noo gi fees,
Ephesians 5:19 ngeen di jàngalante jàngi Sabóor, ak jàngi cant, ak jàng yu bawoo ci Noo gi leen fees, te ngeen di woy aka kañ Boroom bi, ci seen xol.
Ephesians 5:20 Fu ngeen tollu, ak ci mbir mu mu mana doon, santleen Yàlla Baay bi ci sunu turu Sang Yeesu Almasi,
Ephesians 5:21 te ngeen rus Almasi, ba tax ngeen di nangulante.
Ephesians 5:22 ¶ Na jabar nangul jëkkëram ni mu nangule Sang bi.
Ephesians 5:23 Almasi moo di musalkatu mbooloom gëmkat ñi, mbooloo mi di aw yaramam. Te itam ni Almasi dee boppu mbooloom gëmkat ñi, ni la jëkkër ji dee boppu jabaram.
Ephesians 5:24 Kon nag ni mbooloo mi nangule Almasi, ni la jabar ji wara nangule jëkkëram ci lépp.
Ephesians 5:25 ¶ Jëkkër nag, na sopp jabaram ni Almasi soppe mbooloom gëmkat ñi, ba jooxeel leen bakkanam.
Ephesians 5:26 Moo defal loolu mbooloo mi ba man koo setale cangaayal ndox mu ànd ak kàddoom, ngir sellal ko.
Ephesians 5:27 Li mu ci namm moo di teewal mbooloo mi fi kanamam, mu mel ni ab séetam bu ne ràññ, gàkkul, rasul, taqul lenn, xanaa sell, mucc sikk.
Ephesians 5:28 ¶ Noonu la jëkkër ji wara soppe jabaram, ni mu soppe yaramu boppam rekk. Sopp sa jabar sopp sa bopp la,
Ephesians 5:29 ndax kenn masula bañ suuxu boppam, xanaa mu di ko dundal, di ko topptoo, ni Almasi ak mbooloom gëmkat ñi,
Ephesians 5:30 nde noo di céri yaramam.
Ephesians 5:31 Ni ko Mbind mi indee: «Looloo tax góor di bàyyikoo ci ndeyam ak baayam, daldi taqoo ak jabaram, ba ñoom ñaar di wenn suux.»
Ephesians 5:32 Mbóot mu xóota ngi ci dog boobu, waaye man, li may wax moo di dog bi moo misaal diggante, bi Almasi séq ak mbooloo mi.
Ephesians 5:33 Teewuleen koo moom yeen itam; kon na ku nekk sopp jabaram ni mu soppe boppam, te ku nekk weg jëkkëram.
Ephesians 6:1 ¶ Naka yeen xale yi, déggal-leen seeni waajur, ngir Boroom bi, ndax moo war.
Ephesians 6:2 «Teral-leen seen ndey ak seen baay,» mooy ndigal li jëkka ànd akub dige,
Ephesians 6:3 ndax da ne: «ngir ngeen baaxle te gudd fan ci kaw suuf.»
Ephesians 6:4 ¶ Yeen ñiy baay it, buleen xoñoñal xale yi, waaye yarleen leen, di leen jubanti, di leen xamal coobarey Boroom bi.
Ephesians 6:5 ¶ Yeen jaam yi, déggal-leen seen sangi àddina, ànd ceek ragal Yàlla bay kat-kati, ak xol bu dëggu. Ni ngeen déggale Almasi, nangeen leen ni déggale.
Ephesians 6:6 Buleen ko defe ngistal, mbaa ngeen di ko sàkkoo lu leen neex, na di yéene ju ngeen tibbe ci seen xol, ngir jëfe liy coobarey Yàlla, ni mu ware ay jaami Almasi.
Ephesians 6:7 Liggéeyal-leen leen ci xol bu tàlli, ba mu mel ni Boroom bi ngeen ko defal, waaye du nit doŋŋ,
Ephesians 6:8 te ngeen xam ne nit ki, mu dis gor mbaa ab jaam, mboolem lu mu def ci lu baax, loola la ko Boroom biy delloo.
Ephesians 6:9 ¶ Yeen it sang yi, jëfeleen noonu seen diggante ak seeni jaam, bàyyileen di tëkkoo, te ngeen xam ne yeen ak ñoom a bokk benn Boroom fa asamaan, te xejj ak seen amul fa moom.
Ephesians 6:10 ¶ Li ci des nag moo di ngeen manoorewoo Boroom bi, te ngeen sàkkoo ndimbal ci dooleem ak kàttanam gi amul kem.
Ephesians 6:11 Ràngooleen mboolem gànnaayi Yàlla, ngir ngeen mana jànkoonte ak pexey Seytaane.
Ephesians 6:12 Ndax kat sunub xare du nook boroomi deret ak suux, waaye ñi ñu ko séqal ay boroom nguur lañu, ak ay boroom sañ-sañ, ak ay boroom doole yu nekk ci àddina ju lëndëm jii, di ay dagi Seytaane yu fare déndi asamaan.
Ephesians 6:13 Kon nag jël-leen gànnaayi Yàlla yépp, ba bu bésub safaan taxawee, ngeen mana jëflante, ba sottal, tey wéye taxaw temm.
Ephesians 6:14 ¶ Taxawleen kon temm. Defleen dëgg di ngañaay li ci seen ndigg, njub di seen kiiraayal dënn.
Ephesians 6:15 Xibaaru jàmm bi indi jàmm nag, defleen ko muy dàll yu dëgëral seen taxawaay.
Ephesians 6:16 Te fu ngeen tollu ŋàbbleen pakk biy seen ngëm, ci ngeen mana fanqe mboolem jumi sawaray ku Bon ki.
Ephesians 6:17 Mbaxanam xare miy seen kaaraange, jël-leen ko, sol, jël-leen itam saamar bi Noo giy joxe, te muy kàddug Yàlla.
Ephesians 6:18 Deeleen ñaan fu ngeen tollu, gépp xeetu ñaan aki dagaan ci ndimbalal Noo gi, ànd ci ak teewlu fu ngeen tollu, ak gépp farlute, te ngeen di ñaanal mboolem gëmkat ñu sell ñi.
Ephesians 6:19 ¶ Man itam, booleleen ma ci, ngir saa yu ma ubbee sama gémmiñ, mana xéewloo ndéey lu ma xamlee fit wu dëgër, mbóoti xibaaru jàmm bi,
Ephesians 6:20 xibaar bi ma di ndawam lu ñu tënke ay jéng. Waaye ñaanal-leen ma ma di ko waxee fit, ni mu ma ware.
Ephesians 6:21 ¶ Dingeen mana xam nag lu jëm ci man, ak li may def, ndax Tisig, mbokk mu ñu sopp, jawriñ ju wóor ci liggéeyu Boroom bi, moo leen di xamal lépp.
Ephesians 6:22 Loolu ci boppam sax moo waral ma yónni ko ci yeen, ngir mu xamal leen ni nu nekke, ba seral seen xol.
Ephesians 6:23 ¶ Yal na jàmm ñeel bokki gëmkat ñi, ak cofeel gu ànd ak ngëm, bawoo fa Yàlla Baay bi, ak Sang Yeesu Almasi.
Ephesians 6:24 Na aw yiw ñeel mboolem ñi sopp sunu Sàng Yeesu Almasi, cofeel gu dul fey.
Philippians 1:1 ¶ Man la Póol, Timote miy jaamub Almasi Yeesu ni man ànd ak man ci lii, ñeel mboolem ñu sell ñi gëm Almasi Yeesu, te dëkke Filib, yeen ak seeni njiit ak taxawukati mbooloo mi.
Philippians 1:2 Aw yiw ak jàmm ñeel na leen, bawoo fa sunu Baay, ak Sang Yeesu Almasi.
Philippians 1:3 ¶ Damay sant Yàlla saa Boroom saa yu ma leen fàttlikoo,
Philippians 1:4 te saa su ma leen di ñaanal, mbég laa leen di ñaanale yeen ñépp,
